突然遭受压力或打击时，出现短时间的“情感倒错”是正常的。
Tūrán zāoshòu yālì huò dǎjī shí，chūxiàn duǎn shíjiān de“qínggǎn dàocuò”shì zhèngcháng de。
Temporary insanity is normal after the shock experienced in a great trauma.
那些流言飞语给她造成了很大的压力。
Nàxiē liúyán fēiyǔ gěi tā zàochéng le hěndà de yālì。
The rumors gave her a lot of pressure.
就业和升学的压力在一定程度上成了年轻人迷信星座占卜的风源。
Jiùyè hé shēngxué de yālì zài yídìng chéngdù shàng chéng le niánqīngrén míxìn xīngzuò zhānbǔ de fēngyuán。
In a certain sense, the pressures of work and study have caused the prevalence of astrology among young people.
为了缓减交通压力，在这里最好建造一座高架路。
Wèile huǎnjiǎn jiāotōng yālì，zài zhèlǐ zuìhǎo jiànzào yízuò gāojiàlù。
To ease traffic pressure, we\'d better build an overhead road here.
现在的高中生学习压力很大。
Xiànzài de gāo zhōng shēng xuéxí yālì hěndà。
Nowadays, high school students are under great pressure.
现在社会压力那么大，哪碗饭也不好吃。
Xiànzài shèhuì yālì nàme dà，nǎ wǎn fàn yě bùhǎo chī。
There are now great pressures, no one has an easy job.
第一次上战场，把人当作箭靶来看就会减轻很多压力。
Dìyī cì shàng zhànchǎng，bǎ rén dàngzuò jiànbǎ lái kàn jiùhuì jiǎnqīng hěnduō yālì。
When you go to the battlefield for the first time, look at the enemy as a target and you will feel less scared.
考试前夕，小明觉得妈妈给他的压力足有800帕斯卡。
Kǎoshì qiánxī，Xiǎo Míng juédé māma gěi tā de yālì zúyǒu bābǎi pàsīkǎ。
On the eve of the exam, Xiao Ming felt that the pressure given by his mother was as high as 800 pascals.
他迫于压力，不得不让位给部下。
Tā pòyú yālì，bùdébù ràng wèi gěi bùxià。
He had to give up his position to a subordinate.
物议让她倍感压力，精神几乎崩溃。
Wùyì ràng tā bèigǎn yālì，jīngshen jīhū bēngkuì。
Public censure puts her under great pressure to the extent of breaking down.
为了舒缓工作的压力，小王暇时常去公园散心。
Wèile shūhūǎn gōngzuò de yālì，Xiǎo Wáng xiáshí chángqù gōngyuán sànxīn。
Xiao Wang often goes to the park in her spare time to relieve the pressure from her work.
压力表坏了，你有时间再去买一只。
Yālìbiǎo huài le，nǐ yǒu shíjiān zài qù mǎi yì zhī。
The pressure gauge is broken. Buy another one when you have time.
我们用压力锅炖鸡汤，节省了时间和煤气。
Wǒmen yòng yālìguō dùn jītāng，jiéshěng le shíjiān hé méiqì。
With the help of the pressure-cooker, we cook chicken soup with less time and gas.
她从小就把登高远望当成是舒缓压力的一种方法。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù bǎ dēnggāo yuǎnwàng dàngchéng shì shūhūǎn yālì de yìzhǒng fāngfǎ。
Since she was young, she has seen climbing and looking far into the distance as a way to relieve pressure.
看见一屋的长亲，他感到了前所未有的压力。
Kànjiàn yì wū de zhǎngqīn，tā gǎndào le qiánsuǒ wèiyǒu de yālì。
Looking at the room filled with senior relatives, he felt greater pressure than ever before.
地下铁道的修建减轻了地面交通的压力。

The construction of underground railways has eased traffic pressure on the ground.
父母太望子成龙，会给孩子很大压力。

zài quánwēi de yālì xià

the heavy burden of existence

Before finishing the project, everyone was very stressed.

wǔlì zhènyā

这个沙发很结实，禁得住强力挤压。

[inf] 对某人施加压力

pressure/temperature gauge

shòu yāpò

tèyā tiānjiājì

液压填密
yèyā tiánmì 
hydraulic packing
以压倒多数通过
yǐ yādǎo duōshù tōngguò 
be passed by an overwhelming majority
顶住外界的种种压力
dǐngzhù wàijiè de zhǒng zhǒng yālì

累累的果实把树枝都压弯了。
Lěilěi de guǒshí bǎ shùzhī dōu yāwān le。
Clusters of fruit weighed the branches down.
欺压百姓，为非作歹
qīyā bǎixìng，wéifēizuòdǎi 
ride roughshod over the people and commit all sorts of crimes

wǔlì zhènyā 
armed suppression
旧衣服都压箱底了。
Jiù yīfu dōu yā xiāngdǐ le。
The old clothes are stowed away at the bottom of the chest.
三相变压器
sān xiàng biànyāqì

gāoxuèyā

低血压
dīxuèyā

yābiǎn

yāsǐ

压坏
yāhuài

这盒子怕压。
Zhè hézi pà yā。

不受捧，不怕压
bú shòupěng，bú pàyā

太阳压山了。
Tàiyángyāshān le。
The setting sun was touching the hilltop.
这份公文压了不少时间。
Zhè fèn gōngwén yā le bùshǎo shíjiān。
This document was pigeonholed for quite some time.
压不住心头怒火
yā bu zhù xīntóu nùhuǒ
cannot control one\'s anger (or hold back one\'s rage)
压不住场
yā bu zhù chǎng
cannot hold the audience\'s attention
干稻草不压秤。
Gāndàocǎo bùyāchèng。
Dry straw doesn\'t weigh much.
今年5月份，在港外待卸的货船，平均每天下降到276艘，比压船最多的2月份减少77艘。
Jīnnián wǔyuèfèn，zài gǎngwài dàixiè de huòchuán，píngjūn měitiān xiàjiàng dào èrbǎiqīshíliù sōu，bǐ yāchuán zuìduō de èryuèfèn jiǎnshǎo qīshíqīsōu。
In May this year, the average number of cargo ships waiting to be unloaded in the harbor every day dropped to 276, 77 less than the record number in February.

shǒubān yāchuáng

压倒一切的任务
yādǎo yíqiè de rènwu

yǐ yādǎo duōshù tōngguò yí xiàng juéyì

yā de zhù huǒ

yādī wùjià

乌云压顶。
Wūyún yādǐng。
Dark clouds hung overhead.
解决思想问题只能靠说服，不能压服。
Jiějué sīxiǎngwèntí zhǐ néngkào shuōfú，bùnéng yāfú。
Ideological problems can be solved only through persuasion, not by coercion.
压服手段
yāfú shǒuduàn

他压根儿就没对过。
Tā yàgēnr jiù méi duìguò。
He has never been right.
塑料从微孔压挤出来形成纤维。
Sùliào cóngwēikǒngyājǐ chūlái xíngchéngxiānwéi。

yājià chūshòu

Zhǒngliú yāpò shénjīng，yǐnqǐ téngtòng。

The cut has healed, but my arm is still tender.

如何处理这些积压的背货，这让总经理非常头疼。

标准大气压受空气流动和温度影响。
Biāozhǔn dàqìyā shòu kōngqì liúdòng hé wēndù yǐngxiǎng。
The standard atmosphere is influenced by the flow of the air, and the temperature.
在量电压时，红表笔接正，黑表笔接负。
Zài liáng diànyā shí，hóngbiǎobǐ jiē zhèng，hēibiǎobǐ jiē fù。
When measuring the voltage, the red test pen should be connected to the positive electrode, and the black one to the negative electrode.
这个变压器已经烧毁了，早该拆换一个新的了。
Zhège biànyāqì yǐjing shāohuǐ le，zǎo gāi chāihuàn yígè xīn de le。
This transformer has burnt out. It should have been replaced a long time ago.
这个实验在常压条件下进行即可。
Zhège shíyàn zài chángyā tiáojiàn xià jìnxíng jíkě。
This experiment can be done under normal pressure.
我的自行车车辐已经被压弯了。
Wǒ de zìxíngchē chēfú yǐjing bèi yāwān le。
The spoke of my bike has been bent.
我的车圈都被压得变形了。
Wǒ de chēquān dōu bèi yā de biànxíng le。
The rims on my bicycle have been bent out of shape.
这突来的舛错一下把他压垮了。
Zhè tūlái de chuǎncuò yíxià bǎ tā yākuǎ le。
He was overwhelmed by the sudden mishap.
奶奶把这几张大票封好，准备当压岁钱给我们。
Nǎinai bǎ zhèjǐzhāng dàpiào fēnghǎo，zhǔnbèi dāng yāsuìqián gěi wǒmen。
Grandma sealed the 100 Yuan notes in envelopes to give to the children as New Year\'s gifts.
大气压大约等于10万帕。
Dàqìyā dàyuē děngyú shíwànpà。
The atmospheric pressure is about 100000 Pa.
突然遭受压力或打击时，出现短时间的“情感倒错”是正常的。

Temporary insanity is normal after the shock experienced in a great trauma.
党纪就像是高压线，谁敢碰它，就如同灯蛾扑火。
Dǎngjì jiù xiàng shì gāoyāxiàn，shéi gǎn pèng tā，jiù rútóng dēngé pūhuǒ。
Party discipline is like a high voltage cable. He who messes with it is seeking his own doom.
电压表显示有电流通过。
Diànyābiǎo xiǎnshì yǒu diànliú tōngguò。
The voltmeter shows that there is an electric current.
他把不用的棉被都叠压在柜子里了。
Tā bǎ búyòng de miánbèi dōu diéyā zài guìzi lǐ le。
He put the quilts that were no longer needed in the case one on top of other.
他到处兜卖这些积压货物。
Tā dàochù dōumài zhèxiē jīyā huòwù。
He sells surplus goods everywhere.
这个车间主要是对产品进行锻压加工。
zhège chējiān zhǔyào shì duì chǎnpǐn jìnxíng duànyā jiāgōng。
Products are forged and processed in this workshop.
那些流言飞语给她造成了很大的压力。
Nàxiē liúyán fēiyǔ gěi tā zàochéng le hěndà de yālì。
The rumors gave her a lot of pressure.
就业和升学的压力在一定程度上成了年轻人迷信星座占卜的风源。
Jiùyè hé shēngxué de yālì zài yídìng chéngdù shàng chéng le niánqīngrén míxìn xīngzuò zhānbǔ de fēngyuán。
In a certain sense, the pressures of work and study have caused the prevalence of astrology among young people.
为了缓减交通压力，在这里最好建造一座高架路。
Wèile huǎnjiǎn jiāotōng yālì，zài zhèlǐ zuìhǎo jiànzào yízuò gāojiàlù。
To ease traffic pressure, we\'d better build an overhead road here.
请勿触摸，此处有高压电。
Qǐng wù chùmō，cǐchù yǒu gāoyādiàn。
Don\'t touch, it is high-voltage electricity.
我们用高压锅炖肉吃吧。
Wǒmen yòng gāoyāguō dùnròu chī ba。
Let\'s stew pork with the pressure cooker.
由于高压线短路造成这个地区大面积停电。
Yóuyú gāoyāxiàn duǎnlù zàochéng zhège dìqū dàmiànjī tíngdiàn。
Due to a short circuit in the high-tension wire, power has been cut over a large area.
每个公民都不应触动法律这条高压线。
Měigè gōngmín dōu bùyīng chùdòng fǎlǜ zhètiáo gāoyāxiàn。
No citizen should touch the high-voltage wire of the law.
现在的高中生学习压力很大。
Xiànzài de gāo zhōng shēng xuéxí yālì hěndà。
Nowadays, high school students are under great pressure.
这个摄制组照明用的是高压汞灯。
Zhège shèzhìzǔ zhàomíng yòng de shì gāoyā gǒngdēng。
This production unit uses high-pressure mercury-arc lamps for illumination.
测量气压是以汞柱高度为计算单位。
Cèliáng qìyā shì yǐ gǒngzhù gāodù wéi jìsuàn dānwèi。
The atmospheric pressure is measured and calculated  by the height of the mercury.
奸商和贪官勾连起来镇压剥削人民，老百姓苦不堪言。
Jiānshāng hé tānguān gōulián qǐlái zhènyā bōxuē rénmín，lǎobǎixìng kǔbùkānyán。
Unscrupulous merchants collude with corrupt government officials in suppressing and exploiting the people. The common people are suffering unspeakably.
古时压岁钱是为了避邪。
Gǔshí yāsuìqián shì wèi le bìxié。
In the old times, money given to children as a lunar New Year\'s gift was for the purpose of avoiding evil spirits.
我国劳动人民最终推翻了官僚资本主义的压迫。
Wǒ guó láodòng rénmín zuì zhōng tuīfān le guānliáo zīběnzhǔyì de yāpò。
The working class of our country finally overthrew the oppression of bureaucrats.
管卡压这种计划经济时代的生硬手段早就该废除。
Guǎnkǎyā zhèzhǒng jìhuà jīngjì shídài de shēngyìng shǒuduàn zǎo jiù gāi fèichú。
The inflexible approach of the time of planned economy, which was controlling, blocking and suppressing, should have been abandoned already.
科学家依据经典电磁理论指出了光压的存在。
Kēxuéjiā yījù jīngdiǎn diàncí lǐlùn zhǐchū le guāngyā de cúnzài。
Based on classical electromagnetic theory, scientists identified the existence of light pressure.
现在社会压力那么大，哪碗饭也不好吃。
Xiànzài shèhuì yālì nàme dà，nǎ wǎn fàn yě bùhǎo chī。
There are now great pressures, no one has an easy job.
话说五百年前，有只大闹天宫的猴子被压在这里。
Huàshuō wǔbǎi niánqián，yǒu zhī dànào tiāngōng de hóuzi bèi yāzài zhèlǐ。
The story goes like this: 500 years ago, a monkey who  made big trouble in the heavenly palace was pressed under the mountain here.
第一次上战场，把人当作箭靶来看就会减轻很多压力。
Dìyī cì shàng zhànchǎng，bǎ rén dàngzuò jiànbǎ lái kàn jiùhuì jiǎnqīng hěnduō yālì。
When you go to the battlefield for the first time, look at the enemy as a target and you will feel less scared.
由于销路不好，这个厂的冷库里积压了大量的冷冻食品。
Yóuyú xiāolù bùhǎo，zhège chǎng de lěngkù lǐ jīyā le dàliàng de lěngdòng shípǐn。
Because of small market, a lot of frozen foods were overstocked in the refrigeratory of the factory.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
我们这个地方的水压太低，需要安装一个离心泵了。
Wǒmen zhège dìfāng de shuǐyā tài dī，xūyào ānzhuāng yígè líxīnbèng le。
The hydraulic pressure here is very low. We need to install a centrifuge pump.
刚做完开颅手术的他，颅内压不太稳定。
Gāng zuòwán kāilú shǒushù de tā，lúnèiyā bú tài wěndìng。
Just after a having a craniotomy, his intracranial pressure is not stable.
用木屑压制而成的人工复合板材也能够做家具。
Yòng mùxiè yāzhì ér chéng de réngōng fùhé bǎncái yě nénggòu zuò jiājù。
Artificial press compound board made of saw dust can also make furniture.
南瓜子营养丰富，据说有降血压、治疗慢性病等很多用处。
Nánguāzǐ yíngyǎng fēngfù，jùshuō yǒu jiàngxuèyā、zhìliáo mànxìngbìng děng hěnduō yòngchu。
Pumpkin seeds are nutritious. It is said that it can be used to reduce blood pressure, and cure chronic diseases.
在古代，农奴制使得大批农民世代为奴，受尽欺压。
Zài gǔdài，nóngnúzhì shǐdé dàpī nóngmín shìdài wéinú，shòujìn qīyā。
In ancient times, serfdom made large quantities of farmers slaves for generations and they suffered greatly from oppression.
考试前夕，小明觉得妈妈给他的压力足有800帕斯卡。
Kǎoshì qiánxī，Xiǎo Míng juédé māma gěi tā de yālì zúyǒu bābǎi pàsīkǎ。
On the eve of the exam, Xiao Ming felt that the pressure given by his mother was as high as 800 pascals.
他迫于压力，不得不让位给部下。
Tā pòyú yālì，bùdébù ràng wèi gěi bùxià。
He had to give up his position to a subordinate.
每次使用高压锅前都应该检查气阀是否完好。
Měi cì shǐyòng gāoyāguō qián dōu yīnggāi jiǎnchá qìfá shìfǒu wánhǎo。
Every time before using the autoclave, make sure to check whether the air valve is in good condition or not.
请你读出气压表显示的数字。
Qǐng nǐ dúchū qìyābiǎo xiǎnshì de shùzì。
Read the figure shown on the barometer, please.
他家客厅的茶几上有个气压水瓶。
Tā jiā kètīng de chájǐ shàng yǒu gè qìyā shuǐpíng。
There are several barometric pressure water bottles on the tea table in his drawing room.
你不要用强力欺压弱者。
Nǐ búyào yòng qiánglì qīyā ruòzhě。
You mustn\'t use force to bully and oppress the weak.
这个沙发很结实，禁得住强力挤压。
Zhège shāfā hěnjiēshi，jìndézhù qiánglì jǐyā。
The sofa is firm, it can stand being squashed under high pressures.
既然提倡民主，就不能以独裁手段压制清议。
Jìrán tíchàng mínzhǔ，jiù bùnéng yǐ dúcái shǒuduàn yāzhì qīngyì。
Now that we advocate democracy, we shouldn\'t despotically suppress political criticism.
由于上级不断施压要求精简人员，我们只能把一部分员工辞退。
Yóuyú shàngjí búduàn shīyā yāoqiú jīngjiǎn rényuán，wǒmen zhǐnéng bǎ yíbùfen yuángōng cítuì。
We had to dismiss some of the staff because higher authorities are constantly demanding streamlining.
用石硪夯地的时候一定要注意安全，不要压着人。
Yòng shíwò hāngdì de shíhou yídìng yào zhùyì ānquán，búyào yāzháo rén。
Be careful when using a stone rammer to ram the ground. Don\'t hit people.
大气压的测量单位是水银柱的高度。
Dàqìyā de cèliáng dānwèi shì shuǐyínzhù de gāodù。
The unit of atmospheric pressure is shown by the height of the mercury column.
他以泰山压顶之势向我攻来，打得我措手不及。
Tā yǐ tàishān yādǐng zhī shì xiàng wǒ gōnglái，dǎ de wǒ cuòshǒu bùjí。
He came at me with full force, so I was caught unprepared.
这个犯罪团伙经常偷盗变压器的铁芯。

to put pressure on sb (to do sth)
对某人施加压力(去做某事)
to turn {or} tighten the screw(s) on sb
[inf] 对某人增加压力
Americans pressed the Japanese government to abandon its single-minded support of businessmen.
Měiguórén xiàng Rìběn zhèngfǔ shījiāyālì，yāoqiú Rìběn zhèngfǔ fàngqì duì Rìběn shāngrén de qiánglì zhīchí。
美国人向日本政府施加压力，要求日本政府放弃对日本商人的强力支持。
Workers will use a ban on unpaid overtime to keep up the pressure.
Gōngrénmen jiāng lìyòng bù miǎnfèi jiābān de fāngshì lái xiàng chǎngfāng chíxù shījiā yālì。
工人们将利用不免费加班的方式来向厂方持续施加压力。
Agriculture and the transport system were likewise staggering under the strains imposed by the war.
Nóngyè hé yùnshū xìtǒng chǔyú tóngděng de zhànzhēng qiángjiā de yālì zhīxià。
农业和运输系统处于同等的战争强加的压力之下。
If the new teacher won\'t break, we\'ll add some stress.
Rúguǒ nà wèi xīn lǎoshī bú xiàkè xiūxi，wǒmen jiāng shījiā xiē yālì。
如果那位新老师不下课休息，我们将施加些压力。
The public brought pressure to bear on the government.
Gōngzhòng xiàng zhèngfǔ shījiāle yālì。
公众向政府施加了压力。
to floor an accelerator
把(汽车的)加速器压到底
The hands on the office clock seemed to be weighted down.
Bàngōngshì lǐ zhōng de zhǐzhēn hǎoxiàng jiāle zhòngyā yíyàng。
办公室里钟的指针好像加了重压一样。
A collar can put excess stress around the dog\'s throat.
Xiàngquān huì gěi gǒu de hóulóng shījiā guòdà yālì。
项圈会给狗的喉咙施加过大压力。
No amount of arm-twisting will get me to agree.
Shījiā duō dà yālì wǒ dōu búhuì tóngyì。
施加多大压力我都不会同意。
Some gentle arm-twisting produced the desired result.
Shāowēi shījiā yíxià yālì biàn chǎnshēngle yùxiǎng de jiéguǒ。
稍微施加一下压力便产生了预想的结果。
Physical effects of coke use include constricted blood vessels, dilated pupils, and increased temperature, heart rate, and blood pressure.
使用可卡因后身体会出现很多症状，如血管收缩、瞳孔放大、体温上升、心率加快和血压升高。
Then simply crunch the ingredients together and add milk.
Ránhòu zhǐxū jiāng yuánliào yìqǐ yāsuì，jiāshàng niúnǎi。
然后只需将原料一起压碎，加上牛奶。
They put a voltage between the tip and the sample so that an electric current will flow.
Tāmen zài dǐngduān hé yàngběn zhījiān shījiā yí gè diànyā，hǎo ràng diànliú liúdòng。
他们在顶端和样本之间施加一个电压，好让电流流动。
The gain is the amount of increase in signal power or voltage.
Zēngyì jiùshì xìnhào gōnglǜ huò diànyā zēngjiā de shùliàng。
增益就是信号功率或电压增加的数量。
This undue pressure exerted on the elderly is unacceptable.
Duì lǎoniánrén shījiā rúcǐ guòfèn de yālì，shì nányǐ lìng rén jiēshòu de。
对老年人施加如此过分的压力，是难以令人接受的。
The voltage was increased stepwise.
Diànyā zhúbù zēngjiā。
电压逐步增加。
Increased expenses put a squeeze on profits.
Zhīchū de zēngjiā duì lìrùn chǎnshēngle yālì。
支出的增加对利润产生了压力。
超高压线路带电作业
chāogāoyā xiànlù dàidiàn zuòyè 
working on live extrahigh tension power lines
党纪就像是高压线，谁敢碰它，就如同灯蛾扑火。
Dǎngjì jiù xiàng shì gāoyāxiàn，shéi gǎn pèng tā，jiù rútóng dēngé pūhuǒ。
Party discipline is like a high voltage cable. He who messes with it is seeking his own doom.
由于高压线短路造成这个地区大面积停电。
Yóuyú gāoyāxiàn duǎnlù zàochéng zhège dìqū dàmiànjī tíngdiàn。
Due to a short circuit in the high-tension wire, power has been cut over a large area.
每个公民都不应触动法律这条高压线。
Měigè gōngmín dōu bùyīng chùdòng fǎlǜ zhètiáo gāoyāxiàn。
No citizen should touch the high-voltage wire of the law.
严肃执法纪律，明确设置高压线。
两路高压线立交于此
高压输电线断落，造成大面积停电。
A high tension wire，brought down by a storm，can continue to spark.
Bèi bàofēng chuīduàn de gāoyāxiàn kěnéng huì búduàn de mào huǒxīng。
被暴风吹断的高压线可能会不断地冒火星。
高压手段
gāoyā shǒuduàn
high-handed measures
A heavy hand was placed on the workers.
Gāoyā shǒuduàn bèi yòng zài gōngrén shēnshàng。
高压手段被用在工人身上。
The senator steamrollered the bill to defeat.
Gāi cānyìyuán shǐyòng gāoyā shǒuduàn shǐ gāi yì\'àn wúfǎ tōngguò。
该参议员使用高压手段使该议案无法通过。
高压电力网
gāoyā diànlìwǎng
high-tension network

Don\'t touch, it is high-voltage electricity.

高压手段
gāoyā shǒuduàn
high-handed measures
挑选使用高压锅时，一定要注意它的安全阀。

Check the safety valve before you buy or use a pressure pot.
党纪就像是高压线，谁敢碰它，就如同灯蛾扑火。

Wǒmen yòng gāoyāguō dùnròu chī ba。
Let\'s stew pork with the pressure cooker.

Zhège shèzhìzǔ zhàomíng yòng de shì gāoyā gǒngdēng。
This production unit uses high-pressure mercury-arc lamps for illumination.
每次使用高压锅前都应该检查气阀是否完好。
Měi cì shǐyòng gāoyāguō qián dōu yīnggāi jiǎnchá qìfá shìfǒu wánhǎo。
Every time before using the autoclave, make sure to check whether the air valve is in good condition or not.
爆炸的高压锅炸裂了天花板。
Bàozhà de gāoyāguō zhàliè le tiānhuābǎn。
The pressure cooker exploded, and blew open the ceiling.
新买的高压锅出了点质量问题，他今天去商场追偿。
Xīnmǎi de gāoyāguō chū le diǎn zhìliàng wèntí，tā jīntiān qù shāngchǎng zhuīcháng。
There is something wrong with the pressure cooker he has just bought,so he\'s going to the shop for compensation.

high-handed policy

He appears to be healthy, but has high blood pressure.

gāoqìyāqū

高血压
gāoxuèyā
high blood pressure; hypertension

yì zhǒng zhì gāoxuèyā de xīnyào
a new remedy for high blood pressure

Hǎibá yuè gāo，qìyā yuè dī，fǎnzhī yìrán。
The higher the altitude, the lower the air pressure is, and vice versa.
超高频变压器
chāogāopín biànyāqì 
ultrahigh-frequency transforme
现在的高中生学习压力很大。
Xiànzài de gāo zhōng shēng xuéxí yālì hěndà。
Nowadays, high school students are under great pressure.
高速公路又压车了，不知道堵到什么时候呢。

There is a traffic jam on the highway. God knows when it will end.
我们正对青藏高原的大气压进行测量。
Wǒmen zhèng duì Qīngzàng gāoyuán de dàqìyā jìnxíng cèliáng。
We are measuring the atmospheric pressure on the Qinghai-Tibet Plateau.
护士用血压计给他测血压，他很不高兴。
Hùshì yòng xuèyājì gěi tā cè xuèyā，tā hěn bùgāoxìng。
He is very unhappy because the nurse used a sphygmomanometer to test his blood pressure.
测量气压是以汞柱高度为计算单位。
Cèliáng qìyā shì yǐ gǒngzhù gāodù wéi jìsuàn dānwèi。
The atmospheric pressure is measured and calculated  by the height of the mercury.
她从小就把登高远望当成是舒缓压力的一种方法。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù bǎ dēnggāo yuǎnwàng dàngchéng shì shūhūǎn yālì de yìzhǒng fāngfǎ。
Since she was young, she has seen climbing and looking far into the distance as a way to relieve pressure.
为了缓减交通压力，在这里最好建造一座高架路。
Wèile huǎnjiǎn jiāotōng yālì，zài zhèlǐ zuìhǎo jiànzào yízuò gāojiàlù。
To ease traffic pressure, we\'d better build an overhead road here.
大气压的测量单位是水银柱的高度。
Dàqìyā de cèliáng dānwèi shì shuǐyínzhù de gāodù。
The unit of atmospheric pressure is shown by the height of the mercury column.

到目前为止的政策还是只有高压而没有怀柔。
Deep-sea divers can suffer nitrogen narcosis from breathing air under high pressure.
Shēn hǎi qiánshuǐ zhě huì yīn zài gāoyā xià hūxī ér chūxiàn dàn mázuì。
深海潜水者会因在高压下呼吸而出现氮麻醉。

high/low pressure
高/低压

to have high/low blood pressure
有高/低血压

I must diet you according to the doctor\'s suggestion in case your blood pressure gets too high.
如果你的血压过高，那么我就会按照医生的建议让你节食。
Contrary to popular belief glaucoma is not always caused by elevated intraocular pressure.

母亲必须住院，因为她的血压太高了。
Glaucoma can result from increased intraocular pressure.

闭角型青光眼可导致眼压快速升高，在几天内就会造成永久性视力损伤。
Solar gravity creates extreme pressures and temperatures.
Tàiyáng yǐnlì zhìzàole jí qiáng de yālì hé jí gāo de wēndù。
太阳引力制造了极强的压力和极高的温度。
A tall olive skinned figure bore down upon us.
Yí zuò gāodà de gǎnlǎnsè diāoxiàng yāzài wǒmen shēnshàng。
一座高大的橄榄色雕像压在我们身上。
We can graft, divide, or layer to propagate the crops.
我们可以采用嫁接、分株、压条等多种方式来提高作物产量。

lǜyè

luōdiào shùzhī shàng de yèzi

zhīyè màoshèng

嫩叶
nèn yè

荷叶上凝聚着晶莹的露珠。
Héyè shàngníngjù zhe jīngyíng de lùzhū。
Glistening dewdrops have formed on the lotus leaves.
浓密的枝叶
nóngmì de zhīyè
thick foliage
把枯树叶扒在一起
Bǎ kūshùyè pázài yìqǐ
rake together the dead leaves
微风吹来，枝叶披拂。
Wēifēngchuīlái，zhīyè pīfú。
The trees are swaying in the light breeze.
一叶扁舟
yíyè piānzhōu
a small boat
树叶在水上漂着。
Shùyè zài shuǐ shàngpiāo zhe。
Leaves were floating on the water.
黄叶飘零。
Huángyè piāolíng。
Brown leaves came whirling down.
几片树叶飘飘悠悠地落下来。
Jǐ piàn shùyè piāopiaoyōuyōu de luò xiàlái。
A few leaves fell floating to the ground.
把多余的枝叶剪去。
Bǎ duōyú de zhīyè jiǎnqù。
Cut off the unnecessary twigs and branches.
柔枝嫩叶
róuzhī nènyè
supple twigs and tender leaves
风吹树叶沙沙响。
Fēngchuī shùyè shasha xiǎng。
The leaves rustled in the wind.
二十世纪上半叶
èrshí shìjì shàngbàn yè

上好烟叶
shànghǎo yānyè

上色茶叶
shàngsè cháyè

Héyè shūzhǎn zhe，fā chū qīngxiāng。

阔叶树种
kuòyè shùzhǒng

dānyè shuāngqūmiàn

双叶双曲面
shuāngyè shuāngqūmiàn

风吹树叶簌簌响。
Fēng chuī shùyè sùsù xiǎng。
The leaves are rustling in the wind.
微风吹动树叶索索作响。
Wēifēng chuīdòng shùyè suosuo zuò xiǎng。
The leaves rustled in the breeze.
网状脉叶
wǎngzhuàngmàiyè

涡轮叶片
wōlún yèpiàn 
turbine blade
风吹得杨树叶淅淅飒飒直响。
Fēngchuī de yángshùyè xixisasa zhí xiǎng。
The wind set the poplar leaves a-rustling.
那鲜艳夺目的浆果，在绿叶的衬托下，显得格外娇妍。
Nà xiānyànduómù de jiāngguǒ，zài lùyè de chèntuō xià，xiǎnde géwài jiāoyán。
The contrast of the bright, eye-catching red of the berries against the green of the leaves looked particularly charming.
用茉莉花熏茶叶
yòngmòlìhuā xūn cháyè

叶轮泵
yèlúnbèng

yèpiànshì yāsuōjī

荷叶上露珠盈盈。
Héyè shànglù zhū yíngyíng。
The lotus leaves glistened with dewdrops.
刚下过雨，花草树木的叶子都是油亮油亮的。
Gāngxiàguo yǔ，huācǎoshùmù de yèzi dōushì yóuliàngyóuliàng de。
The rain had just stopped, and the leaves of plants and trees all took on a beautiful sheen.
长叶子了。
Zhǎngyèzi le。
The leaves are coming out.
中档茶叶
zhōngdàng cháyè 
medium-quality tea
茶叶走味儿了。
Cháyè zǒuwèir le。
The tea has lost its flavour.
风吹树叶沙沙作响。
Fēngchuī shùyè shāshā zuòxiǎng。
The leaves rustled in the wind.
风吹得树叶哗啦哗啦地响。
Fēng chuī de shùyè huala huala de xiǎng。
The leaves rustled in the wind.
叶脉
yèmài
leaf vein
玉米叶子被风吹得刷刷响。
Yùmǐ yèzi bèi fēng chuī de shuashua xiǎng。
The corn leaves rustled in the wind.
烟叶
yānyè
tobacco leaf; leaf tobacco
她拾起一片落叶夹在书里。
Tā shíqǐ yípiàn luòyè jiázài shūlǐ。
看见半山腰那片红叶了吗？
Kànjiàn bànshānyāo nà piàn hóngyè le ma？
Did you see the red leaves halfway up the hill?
这些写在贝多叶上的经文十分珍贵。
Zhèxiē xiězài bèiduōyè shàng de jīngwén shífēn zhēnguì。
The scriptures on the peepul tree leaves are very precious.
贝叶树是西双版纳珍稀植物，一辈子只开花一次。
Bèiyèshù shì Xīshuāngbǎnnà zhēnxī zhíwù，yíbèizi zhǐ kāihuā yícì。
The peepul tree is a rare and precious plant in Xishuangbanna. Such kind of trees blossom only once in their lifetime.
“接天莲叶无穷碧，映日荷花别样红”。
“Jiētiān liányè wúqióngbì，yìngrì héhuā biéyànghóng”。
The green lotus leaves stretch to the horizon, and the lotus looks extremely bright under the sunshine.
采择茶叶的时节是十分讲究的。
Cǎizé cháyè de shíjié shì shífēn jiǎngjiū de。
The timing for picking tea leaves deserves careful study.
小姑娘摘了很多桑叶，准备回家喂她的蚕宝宝。
Xiǎogūniang zhāi le hěnduō sāngyè，zhǔnbèi huíjiā wèi tā de cánbǎobao。
The little girl picked many folia mori, intending to feed it to her baby silkworms
他一不小心打翻了蚕匾，桑叶散满了一地。
Tā yíbùxiǎoxīn dǎfān le cánbiǎn，sāngyè sǎnmǎn le yídì。
He carelessly knocked over the silkworm tray, leaving the floor covered with folia mori.
茶叶中含有茶碱这种物质。
Cháyè zhōng hányǒu chájiǎn zhèzhǒng wùzhì。
Tea contains theosine.
我每天早上起来都喜欢吃两个茶叶蛋。
Wǒ měitiān zǎoshàng qǐlái dōu xǐhuan chī liǎnggè cháyèdàn。
I like eating two eggs after getting up in the morning.
这个特色商店主要经营茶叶食品。
Zhège tèsè shāngdiàn zhǔyào jīngyíng cháyè shípǐn。
This specialty shop mainly sells food with tea flavor.
这种昆虫会把虫卵产在树叶上。
Zhèzhǒng kūnchóng huì bǎ chóngluǎn chǎn zài shùyè shàng。
This insect will lay their eggs on leaves.
河边垂杨的枝叶都延伸到了河里。
Hébiān chuíyáng de zhīyè dōu yánshēn dào le hé lǐ。
The branches and leaves of the weeping willows by the river bank are stretching into the river.
落叶在风中不停的打旋。
Luòyè zài fēng zhōng bùtíng de dǎxuán。
The fallen leaves turn round and round in the wind.
那盆花蔫儿了，叶子都倒垂了下来。
Nà pén huā niānr le，yèzi dōu dàochuí le xiàlái。
The potted flower has withered, and the leaves have all drooped.
秋天过去了，树叶逐渐凋枯了。
Qiūtiān guòqù le，shùyè zhújiàn diāokū le。
Autumn has passed and tree leaves are gradually withering and falling.
“荷叶粉蒸肉”是一道杭州名菜。
“Héyèfěnzhēngròu”shì yídào Hángzhōu míngcài。
One of the famous dishes in Hangzhou is pork steamed with ground rice flour wrapped in lotus leaves.
落叶归根的情怀一直萦绕在身处异国他乡的老人心中。
Luòyè guīgēn de qínghuái yìzhí yíngràozài shēnchǔ yìguó tāxiāng de lǎorén xīn zhōng。
As an inhabitant of a foreign country, the willingness to return to his ancestral home always lingers in the old man\'s mind.
已至寒秋，黄叶落尽，万物凋零。
Yǐzhì hánqiū，huángyè luòjìn，wànwù diāolíng。
It is already autumn.  All tree leaves have fallen, and everything has withered.
我饿极了，一连吃了三个荷叶饼。
Wǒ è jí le，yìlián chī le sāngè héyèbǐng。
I was so hungry that I ate three thin pancakes in succession.
这种植物的叶子尖溜溜的，很容易刺伤手。
Zhèzhǒng zhíwù de yèzi jiānliūliū de，hěnróngyì cìshāng shǒu。
The leaves of this plants are pointed, so we are easily hurt by them.
箭竹的嫩叶子是大熊猫的主要食物。
Jiànzhú de nènyèzi shì dàxióngmāo de zhǔyào shíwù。
Giant pandas mainly live on arrow bamboo.
卷曲的茶叶遇到开水渐渐舒展开来，在杯子里上下浮沉。
Juǎnqū de cháyè yùdào kāishuǐ jiànjiàn shūzhǎn kāilái，zài bēizi lǐ shàngxià fúchén。
The crimped tea leaves gradually unfold after hitting the hot water and are floating up and down in the cup.
果树的叶子卷缩了，是不是染上了什么病虫害？
Guǒshù de yèzi juǎnsuō le，shìbushì rǎnshàng le shénme bìngchónghài？
The leaves of the fruit trees are folding and shrinking, is it because of some plant diseases or insect pests?
秋天，她喜欢在落满枯叶的花园小路上散步。
Qiūtiān，tā xǐhuan zài luòmǎn kūyè de huāyuán xiǎolù shàng sànbù。
In autumn, she is fond of walking a garden path covered with fallen leaves.
这片阔叶林面积很大，树木长势很好。
Zhè piàn kuòyèlín miànjī hěndà，shùmù zhǎngshì hěnhǎo。
The broad-leaved forest is vast, with well-grown trees.
这盆花的叶子两歧着长，真有趣。
Zhè pén huā de yèzi liǎngqí zhe zhǎng，zhēn yǒuqù。
The leaves of this pot of flower grow into two branches. How interesting.
她长了一双柳叶弯眉，十分好看。
Tā zhǎng le yì shuāng liǔyè wānméi，shífēn hǎokàn。
Her long and slender eyebrows are very beautiful.
在所以茶叶中，我最喜欢龙井茶的茶香。
Zài suǒyǐ cháyè zhōng，wǒ zuì xǐhuan lóngjǐngchá de cháxiāng。
I like the flavor of longjing tea best.
医生在给他的处方里写上了蒌叶这味药。
Yīshēng zài gěi tā de chǔfāng lǐ xiěshàng le lóuyè zhèwèi yào。
The doctor wrote betel in his prescription.
一眼望去菜地里都是绿生生的菜叶。
Yìyǎn wàngqù càidì lǐ dōushì lǜshēngshēng de càiyè。
The vegetable plot in the distance is full of fresh green leaves.
有了绿叶的衬托鲜花显得更加美丽。
Yǒu le lǜyè de chèntuō xiānhuā xiǎnde gèngjiā měilì。
Flowers are more beautiful set off by green leaves.
这种气候不适合落叶植物的生长。
Zhèzhǒng qìhou bú shìhé luòyè zhíwù de shēngzhǎng。
The climate is not suitable for deciduous vegetation.
这些嫩绿的叶子，都是要用来埋青的。
Zhèxiē nènlǜ de yèzi，dōushì yào yònglái máiqīng de。
These tender green leaves will be buried as manure.
又是春天了，暖风吹绿了树叶和草芽。
Yòu shì chūntiān le，nuǎnfēng chuīlǜ le shùyè hé cǎoyá。
Spring comes again, the warm winds blow the leaves and sprouting grass.
厨房的排气扇坏了，扇叶怎么都不转！
Chúfáng de páiqìshàn huài le，shànyè zěnme dōu búzhuàn！
The ventilator in the kitchen is broken, the vanes don\'t turn freely.
竹子等许多植物都有着披针形叶子。
Zhúzi děng xǔduō zhíwù dōu yǒu zhe pīzhēnxíng yèzi。
Many plants like bamboo grow lanceolar leaves.
秋天来了，秋风中树叶在枝头上飘籔不定。
Qiūtiān lái le，qiūfēng zhōng shùyè zài zhītóu shàng piāo籔 búdìng。
Autumn comes, the leaves on the branches are swaying to and fro in the wind.
品茶，就是借助于感觉来感知茶叶的品质高下。
Pǐnchá，jiùshì jièzhùyú gǎnjué lái gǎnzhī cháyè de pǐnzhì gāoxià。
Sipping tea and appraising its flavor and quality is to define the quality of the tea through personal feelings.
清秋正是赏红叶的最佳时节。
Qīngqiū zhèngshì shǎng hóngyè de zuì jiā shíjié。
The best time to enjoy maple leaves is in late autumn.
对待敌人要像秋风扫落叶一样残酷无情。
Duìdài dírén yào xiàng qiūfēng sǎo luòyè yíyàng cánkù wúqíng。
We should make a clear sweep of our enemies the way that the autumn wind sweeps away fallen leaves.
灿烂的秋光染红了枫叶。
Cànlàn de qiūguāng rǎnhóng le fēngyè。
The maple leaves are aflame with brilliant autumnal sunshine.
入秋后树上的叶子渐渐枯萎飘落了。
Rùqiū hòu shù shàng de yèzi jiànjiàn kūwěi piāoluò le。
Since the beginning of autumn, the leaves on the tree  wither and fall one by one.
她小心翼翼地把蚕宝宝放在铺好的桑叶上。
Tā xiǎoxīnyìyì de bǎ cánbǎobǎo fàng zài pū hǎo de sāngyè shàng。
She carefully put the baby silkworm on the well-laid mulberry leaf.
当下茶叶市场上把普洱炒得火热，不知是不是昙花一现？
Dāngxià cháyè shìchǎng shàng bǎ pǔěr chǎo de huǒrè，bùzhī shìbushì tánhuā yíxiàn？
Currently, Pu\'er Tea is very popular, but maybe it\'s just a passing fad.
秋天的落叶铺满了庭除。
Qiūtiān de luòyè pūmǎn le tíngchú。
Fallen leaves have covered the whole yard and the steps as well.
满枝萎黄的树叶说明深秋已经来临了。
Mǎnzhī wěihuáng de shùyè shuōmíng shēnqiū yǐjing láilín le。
The yellow leaves on the trees show that late Autumn approaches.
冬天到了，树叶在凄冷的寒风中萎落了。
Dōngtiān dào le，shùyè zài qīlěng de hánfēng zhōng wěiluò le。
It\'s winter now, and leaves wither and fall in the cold wind.
谁知道那种叶子呈线形的植物叫什么？
Shuí zhīdào nàzhǒng yèzi chéng xiànxíng de zhíwù jiào shénme？
Does anyone know the name of the plant with line-shape leaves?
初秋的一个早上，路边的小叶上沾满了露水。
Chūqiū de yígè zǎoshàng，lùbiān de xiǎoyè shàng zhānmǎn le lùshuǐ。
It is a morning in early autumn, the little leaves by the roadside are covered with dew.
爸爸买了今年新出的小叶，泡出的茶可香了。
Bàba mǎi le jīnnián xīnchū de xiǎoyè，pàochū de chá kě xiāng le。
My father bought the little leaf tea, which tastes great.
道路的两侧整整齐齐地长着两排小叶杨。
Dàolù de liǎngcè zhěngzhěngqíqí de zhǎng zhe liǎngpái xiǎoyèyáng。
There are two rows of Simon poplars growing neatly on either side of the street.
这首诗根本不叶韵，你怎么偏说它是七律呢？
Zhèshǒushī gēnběn bùxiáyùn，nǐ zěnme piān shuō tā shì qīlǜ ne？
This poem has no rhyme at all, how can you call it seven-character &quot;regulated&quot; verse?
他伸手抓住了一片虚飘的树叶。
Tā shēnshǒu zhuāzhù le yípiàn xūpiāo de shùyè。
He reached out his hand and grabbed a floating tree leaf.
秋天，丫枝上一片树叶都没有了。
Qiūtiān，yāzhī shàng yípiàn shùyè dōu méiyǒu le。
In autumn, there aren\'t any leaves left on the branches of the tree.
叶面上有虫子，需要杀虫了。
Yèmiàn shàng yǒu chóngzi，xūyào shāchóng le。
There are some worms on the foliage, we need to kill them.
叶腋被掐断了，你真不小心。
Yèyè bèi qiāduàn le，nǐ zhēn bùxiǎoxīn。
The auxiliary bud has been nipped off, you should be more careful.
叶枝繁茂，修剪一下会更好的。
Yèzhī fánmào，xiūjiǎn yíxià huì gènghǎo de。
The tree has luxuriant leaf branches, it would be better if you trimmed the branches.
你现在一叶蔽目，糊里糊涂。
Nǐ xiànzài yíyè bìmù，húli hútú。
You can\'t see the wood for the trees, you are confused.
你要把问题想清楚不能一叶障目。
Nǐ yào bǎ wèntí xiǎng qīngchu bùnéng yíyè zhàngmù。
You can\'t have your views overshadowed by trivial things if you want to make the problems clear.
蚁蚕天天不停地吃着桑叶，吃饱了就等着褪皮长大。
Yǐcán tiāntiān bùtíng de chī zhe sāng yè，chībǎo le jiù děng zhe tuìpí zhǎngdà。
Newly-hatched silkworms eat mulberry leaves every day; when they are full, they just wait to shed their skin and grow up.
从远处看，长在半山腰上的针叶林郁郁苍苍。
Cóng yuǎnchù kàn，zhǎng zài bànshānyāo shàng de zhēnyèlín yùyùcāngcāng。
Seen from the distance, the coniferous forest growing half way down the hill is lush and green.
你看这里，枝繁叶茂的景象让人看了心醉。
Nǐkàn zhèlǐ，zhīfán yèmào de jǐng xiàng ràng rén kàn le xīnzuì。
You see, the scene of the mass of branches and leaves is so fascinating.
如今到了中秋时节，叶子已经枯黄了。
Rújīn dào le zhōng qiū shíjié，yèzi yǐjing kūhuáng le。
Now in the middle of autumn, the leaves have already turned yellow.
日本的歌舞伎兴起于十七世纪中叶。
Rìběn de gēwǔjì xīngqǐ yú shíqī shìjì zhōng yè。
Kabuki appeared in the mid-seventeenth century in Japan.
这棵松树是落叶松，适合生长在温带。
Zhè kē sōngshù shì luòyèsōng，shìhé shēngzhǎng zài wēndài。
This pine is called the larch, it grows well in temperate zones.
出水荷叶还带着露珠，晶莹剔透。
Chūshuǐ héyè hái dàizhe lùzhū，jīngyíngtītòu。
The lotus leaf on the water surface is still with dewdrops looking bright, and clear as crystals on its surface.
哪位同学能说出植物叶子的生长点在哪里？
Nǎ wèi tóngxué néng shuōchū zhíwù yèzi de shēngzhǎngdiǎn zài nǎlǐ？
Who can tell us where the growing point of the plant leaf is?
小王在显微镜下看到了叶子的细胞质。
Xiǎo Wáng zài xiǎnwēijìng xià kàndàole yèzi de xìbāozhì。

表演水平参差不齐，有勉强能接受的，也有技艺高超的。

chāochū fànwéi 
go beyond the scope (or bounds)

chāochū dìng\'é 
exceed the quota

超出范围
beyond the reach of sb/sth

艾米丽的工作成果超出了我的预期。

go beyond the limit

在网络上发表言论，同样不能超出相应的边限。

不幸的是，障碍物阻挡了你看到跑道的视线。
At our airport we have a small underused field that can be converted into hangars.
Zài wǒmen de jīchǎng，yǒu yígè shàngwèi lìyòng de pǎodào kěyǐ biànchéng fēijī péng。
在我们的机场，有一个尚未利用的跑道可以变成飞机棚。
To lose height pilots have to spiral down to the runway.
Wèile jiàngdī gāodù，fēixíngyuánmen bùdébù xiàngzhe pǎodào luóxuán jiàngdī。
为了降低高度，飞行员们不得不向着跑道螺旋降低。
The dense fog made it difficult for pilots to see the landing strip.
Nóngwù shǐde fēixíngyuán hěn nán kànqīng jiàngluò pǎodào。
浓雾使得飞行员很难看清降落跑道。
The jeep headed for the runway.

The runway was silent once more.
Pǎodào yòu ānjìng le xiàlái。
跑道又安静了下来。
They stayed in the pattern until the fog lifted.

他们留在降落跑道上，直至大雾散去。
The plane taxied down the runway.
Fēijī shùnzhe pǎodào huáxíng。

她驾驶的是一辆每加仑油可以跑40公里的经济适用性轿车。
My new car is four years old but has only 15,000 miles on it.
Wǒ de xīnchē mǎile yǒu sì nián le，dàn cái pǎole yíwàn wǔqiān yīnglǐ。
我的新车买了有四年了，但才跑了一万五千英里。
The runners awaited the start.
Pǎobùzhě děngdài qǐpǎo。
跑步者等待起跑。
The marathon tests a runner\'s endurance.
Mǎlāsōng yùndòng shì duì pǎobù zhě nàilì de kǎoyàn。
马拉松运动是对跑步者耐力的考验。
You could use a bike, walk, or run rather than use a car, bus, or train.
Nǐ kěyǐ qí zìxíngchē、zǒulù huòzhě pǎobù，dàn bú yào chéng qìchē、gōngjiāochē huò huǒchē。
你可以骑自行车、走路或者跑步，但不要乘汽车、公交车或火车。
跑步走！
Pǎobùzǒu！
(word of command) At the double, quick march!
跑步前进！
Pǎobùqiánjìn！
(word of command) Double time!
刮风也罢，下雪也罢，他都坚持跑步。
Guāfēngyěbà，xiàxuě yěbà，tā dōu jiānchí pǎobù。
He keeps up his jogging whether it\'s blowing or snowing.
学生们一边跑步一边高喊着号子。
Xuéshēngmen yìbiān pǎobùyìbiān gāohǎn zhe hàozi。
The students shout at the top of their voice as they are running.
跑步时若用口呼气容易让人岔气。
Pǎobùshí ruò yòng kǒu hūqì róngyì ràng rén chàqì。
Breathing through the mouth while running is apt to make people feel pain in their chest.
跑步时使用计步器，可以有效计算自己的体力。
Pǎobùshí shǐyòng jìbùqì，kěyǐ yǒuxiào jìsuàn zìjǐ de tǐlì。
With a step counter in running, you can accurately calculate your physical strength.
空荡的操场上，只有小明一个人在跑步。
Kōngdàng de cāochǎng shàng，zhǐyǒu Xiǎo Míng yígèrén zài pǎobù。
Only Xiaoming is running on the empty sports ground.
她总是平明时分起床，然后去跑步做操。
Tā zǒngshì píngmíng shífēn qǐchuáng，ránhòu qù pǎobùzuòcāo。
She always gets up at dawn to go jogging and do morning exercises.
她跑步的时候用头绳儿把头发扎起来。
Tā pǎobù de shíhou yòng tóushéngr bǎ tóufà zā qǐlái。
She tied her hair with string while running.
人跑步，车子移动等运动其实就是简单的机械运动。
Rén pǎobù，chēzi yídòng děng yùndòng qíshí jiùshì jiǎndān de jīxiè yùndòng。
People\'s running and cars\' moving are actually simple mechanical motions.
天气很冷，我今天就不去跑步了。
Tiānqì hěn lěng，wǒ jīntiān jiù búqù pǎobù le。
The weather is cold so I won\'t jog today.
论跑步你不如她。
Lùn pǎobù nǐ bùrú tā。
You are not as good as her at running.
我每天跑步去学校。
Wǒ měitiān pǎobù qù xuéxiào.
I run to school every day.
他喜欢跑步。
Tā xǐhuan pǎobù.
He likes jogging.
他每天绕着操场跑步。
Tā měitiān ràozhe cāochǎng pǎobù.
He runs several times round the sports ground every day.
为健康着想，他每天去跑步。
Wèi jiànkāng zhuóxiǎng，tā měitiān qù pǎobù。
He went jogging every day for the sake of his health.
绕着操场跑步
听到哨声，拔步就跑。
The first training run was a one-mile loop from home.
Dì-yī xiàng pǎobù xùnliàn jiùshì cóng jiā kāishǐ yì yīnglǐ huánrǎo pǎobù。
第一项跑步训练就是从家开始1英里环绕跑步。
The runners awaited the start.
Pǎobùzhě děngdài qǐpǎo。
跑步者等待起跑。
The treadmill has a heart rate monitor.
跑步机上有个脉搏监视器。
High heels are not practical for running.
穿高跟鞋不适合跑步。
Her daily run keeps her slim.
她每天坚持跑步，这使她一直保持苗条的身材。
He keeps up running every day to be fit.
为了保持身材，他每天坚持跑步。
I was late for the meeting so I started running, and when I got there I was totally out of breath.
因为开会快迟到了，我就开始跑步前进，所以赶到那儿时，已经是上气不接下气了。
to go for a run
跑步锻炼
Make sure your body can adapt and do not drink too much before running.
Zài pǎobù qián yídìng yào bǎozhèng nǐ de shēntǐ nénggòu shìyìng，érqiě bùnéng hē tàiduō shuǐ。
在跑步前一定要保证你的身体能够适应，而且不能喝太多水。

你可以骑自行车、走路或者跑步，但不要乘汽车、公交车或火车。
I was running along the river when I got a stitch just behind my ribs.
Wǒ zài hébiān pǎobù shí hūrán juéde lèigǔ hòumiàn yí zhèn jùtòng。
我在河边跑步时忽然觉得肋骨后面一阵剧痛。
We were burning off calories on the running machine.
Wǒmen zài pǎobùjī shàng ránshāo zhīfáng。
我们在跑步机上燃烧脂肪。
The marathon tests a runner\'s endurance.
Mǎlāsōng yùndòng shì duì pǎobù zhě nàilì de kǎoyàn。
马拉松运动是对跑步者耐力的考验。
They ran forward into the heart of the struggle.
Tāmen pǎobùqiánjìn dào zhàndòu de héxīn dìdài。
他们跑步前进到战斗的核心地带。
His daily run keeps him fit.
Měi tiān jiānchí pǎobù shǐ tā bǎochízhe jiànkāng de shēntǐ。
每天坚持跑步使他保持着健康的身体。
Running is very aerobic.
Pǎobù xūyào dàliàng yǎngqì。
跑步需要大量氧气。
He was fifth out of several hundred runners.
Tā zài jǐbǎi gè pǎobù yùndòngyuán zhōng páimíng dì 5 wèi。
他在几百个跑步运动员中排名第5位。
She hoped one day to hear the pat of children\'s feet running around her home.
Tā xīwàng yǒu yìtiān néng tīngjiàn háizǐmen zài tā jiā zhōuwéi pǎolái-pǎoqù de jiǎobùshēng。
她希望有一天能听见孩子们在她家周围跑来跑去的脚步声。
The horse trotted along at a steady pace.
Mǎ wěnbù xiǎopǎo qiánjìn。
马稳步小跑前进。
The coach called a draw for the next play.
Jiàoliàn mìnglìng xiàyíbù cǎiyòng xūchuánshípǎo cèlüè。

He walked backward before turning and running away

刚出生的牛崽不到半天工夫就会围着牛妈妈跑来跑去了。

要说跑，咱们谁也比不过他。

None of us can run as fast as he can.

你把地址搞错了，害得我白跑一趟。

她一心记挂着生病的孩子，一下班就往家跑。

要(收，送)彩礼

ask for (accept, present) betrothal gifts

送一份礼去

jiēshōu lǐwù

要(收，送)彩礼
yào（shōu，sòng）cǎilǐ
ask for (accept, present) betrothal gifts

fēngjiàn lǐjiào de pànnì

All people present at the wedding ceremony should write their names on the red paper.
吏、户、礼、兵、刑、工六部是清朝的行政机构。
Lì、hù、lǐ、bīng、xíng、gōng liù bùshì Qīngcháo de xíngzhèng jīgòu。
Administrative organs in the Qing dynasty were the Six Boards: the Board of Civil Office, the Board of Revenue, the Board of Rites, the Board of War, the Board of Punishments, and the Board of Works.
在古代六艺是指礼、乐、射、御、书、数等六种技能。
Zài gǔdài liùyì shì zhǐ lǐ、lè、shè、yù、shū、shù děng liùzhǒng jìnéng。
The six arts in ancient China meant rites, music, archery, charioteering, reading and writing, and arithmetic.
今天是他的婚礼，他家门庭若市，来往宾客络绎不绝。
Jīntiān shì tā de hūnlǐ，tā jiā méntíngruòshì，láiwǎng bīnkè luòyìbùjué。
Today is his wedding. Many people are streaming to his house.

那件黑色皮夹克是妻子送他的生日礼物，很适合他。

他身体微微前倾了一下，就算是见面礼了。

婚礼
hūnlǐ
wedding ceremony; wedding
婚礼上，亲朋好友都来称贺。
Hūnlǐ shàng，qīnpéng hǎoyǒu dōu lái chēnghè。
At weddings, relatives and friends come to offer their congratulations.
他俩已经订亲了，明年就会举行婚礼。
Tā liǎ yǐjing dìngqīn le，míngnián jiùhuì jǔxíng hūnlǐ。
They are already engaged, and will hold the wedding ceremony next year.
教堂里有六对新人共同举行集体婚礼。
Jiàotáng lǐ yǒu liù duì xīnrén gòngtóng jǔxíng jítǐ hūnlǐ。
There are six couples holding a collective wedding ceremony together in the church.
婚礼上，新郎新娘依次向客席上的来宾敬酒致意。
Hūnlǐ shàng，xīnláng xīnniáng yīcì xiàng kèxí shàng de láibīn jìngjiǔ zhìyì。
At the wedding ceremony, the bride and bridegroom toasted the guests in turn.
婚礼礼毕，请大家入席。
Hūnlǐ lǐbì，qǐng dàjiā rùxí。
The wedding ceremony is over.  Please take a seat.
出席婚礼的人都要在红纸上留名。
Chūxí hūnlǐ de rén dōuyào zài hóngzhǐ shàng liúmíng。
All people present at the wedding ceremony should write their names on the red paper.
今天是他的婚礼，他家门庭若市，来往宾客络绎不绝。
Jīntiān shì tā de hūnlǐ，tā jiā méntíngruòshì，láiwǎng bīnkè luòyìbùjué。
Today is his wedding. Many people are streaming to his house.
为了婚礼那天显得帅气些，他特意定做了一身呢料礼服。
Wèile hūnlǐ nàtiān xiǎnde shuàiqì xiē，tā tèyì dìngzuò le yìshēn níliào lǐfú。
For the purpose of being more handsome on his wedding day, he had woolen wedding clothes made to order.
小刘婚礼上，我们都看见了他的新娘子，很漂亮。
Xiǎo Liú hūnlǐ shàng，wǒmen dōu kànjiàn le tā de xīnniángzi，hěnpiàoliàng。
We all saw Xiao Liu\'s wife at their wedding. She\'s very beautiful.
我们的婚礼将由这位神父主持。
Wǒmen de hūnlǐ jiāng yóu zhèwèi shénfù zhǔchí。
Our nuptials will be performed by this priest.
我受邀参加朋友于明天举办的婚礼。
Wǒ shòuyāo cānjiā péngyou yú míngtiān jǔbàn de hūnlǐ。
I have been invited to attend my friend\'s wedding tomorrow.
在司铎的主持见证下，他们二人进行了婚礼。
Zài sīduó de zhǔchí jiànzhèng xià，tāmen èr rén jìnxíng le hūnlǐ。
They got married under the priest\'s direction and witness.
今天是我的婚礼，特请来了戏班唱堂会。
Jīntiān shì wǒ de hūnlǐ，tè qǐnglái le xìbān chàng tánghuì。

Dàqìhuánliú hěn dà chéngdù shàng shòudào biǎomiàn tǔdì rènéng pínghéng de yǐngxiǎng。
大气环流很大程度上受到表面土地热能平衡的影响。
Shaking hands is an important part of a mock interview.

握手是模拟面试中的一个重要环节。
It seems that good circumstances can help buffer any negative impact.
Hǎo huánjìng sìhū nénggòu bāngzhù dǐxiāo fùmiàn yǐngxiǎng。
好环境似乎能够帮助抵消负面影响。
北京的三环路
Běijīng de sānhuánlù 
the Third Ring Road of Beijing
环路已通车。
Huánlù yǐ tōngchē。
The ring road has opened to traffic.

huánchénɡ ɡōnɡlù

你刚学会开车，咱们绕开环形交叉路走。

You are a novice car driver. Let\'s steer clear of the circular cross road.
公路回环于山间，蜿蜒曲折，好像一条巨蟒。
Gōnglù huíhuán yú shānjiān，wānyán qūzhé，hǎo xiàng yìtiáo jùmǎng。
The twists, and turns on the mountain road resemble the shape of a python.
这里丛山环绕，很容易迷路。

This group of mountains surround each other so that it is quite easy to get lost here.
各条环城快速路已经通连。

Rúguǒ huánlù zēngyì guòdà，xìtǒng kěnéng fāshēng zhèndàng。
如果环路增益过大，系统可能发生振荡。
Designing serial loop networks can be difficult at the best of times.
Jíshǐ zài zuì yǒulì de qíngkuàng xià，shèjì liánxù de xúnhuán wǎnglù yě fēicháng kùnnán。
即使在最有利的情况下，设计连续的循环网路也非常困难。

Wǒ suǒ zhǎngwò de rúhé gěi Huánxíngzhàomíngdiànlù bùxiàn de zhīshi chízǎo huì pàishàngyòngchǎng de。

列车线路是一条环线，绕着城市的中心环行一圈。
鲎虫生活在池沼、水潭或水畔，对环境没有什么影响。

Tadpole shrimp lives in ponds, swags or river sides. They have no impact on the environment.
The influence of environment is indeterminate.
Duì huánjìng de yǐngxiǎng hái bú quèdìng。
对环境的影响还不确定。
Enviromental changes have affected the original course of the river.

环境变化已经影响了这条河最初的航向。

贸易生产会对环境产生负面影响。

不注意环境保护造成的恶果
bú zhùyì huánjìng bǎohù zàochéng de èguǒ
the evil consequences of the neglect of environmental protection
生态环境保护
shēngtài huánjìng bǎohù
protection of ecological environment
随着工业的发展，对环境保护也采取了相应的措施。
Suí zhe gōngyè de fāzhǎn，duì huánjìngbǎohù yě cǎiqǔ le xiāngyìng de cuòshī。
With the development of industry, appropriate measures have been taken to protect the environment.
有识之士很早就呼吁要加强环境保护。
Yǒushí zhīshì hěnzǎo jiù hūyù yào jiāqiáng huánjìng bǎohù。
People with insight called for increasing environmental protection a long time ago.
我们在环境保护方面取得了很大成绩。
Wǒmen zài huánjìngbǎohù fāngmiàn qǔdéle hěndà chéngjì。
We have had considerable success in environmental protection.
经济增长与环境保护，二者不可偏废。
Jīngjì zēngzhǎng yǔ huánjìngbǎohù，èrzhěbùkěpiānfèi.
Economic growth and environmental protection should be given equal emphasis.
工业发展和环境保护要同步进行。
Gōngyèfāzhǎn hé huánjìngbǎohù yào tóngbù jìnxíng。
Industrial development must be in step with environmental protection.
不要等到环境恶化了，才明白保护环境的迫切性和重要性。

Don’t wait until the environment has deteriorated until we figure out the urgency and importance of environmental protection.

protect the environment against pollution

bǎohùhuánjìng
protect the environment

Economic botany makes significant contributions to anthropology, botany and environmental conservation.
经济植物学为人类学、植物学和环境保护作出了重要的贡献。
There is universal agreement that saving the environment is a worthy cause.
保护环境是一项值得为之奋斗的事业，人们在这一点上有着广泛的认同。
The new government is urged to take measures to protect the environment.
人们敦促政府采取措施保护环境。
We should help conserve the environment and discourage the unnecessary destruction.

我们应该保护环境，阻止不必要的破坏。
There are many opportunities to back the Environment by boycotting certain products.

通过抵制某些产品，我们有许多机会来保护环境。
I stand with everyone who helps protect the environment.
Wǒ hé suǒyǒu wèile bǎohù huánjìng ér nǔlì de rén zhàn zài yìqǐ。
我和所有为了保护环境而努力的人站在一起。
Seagrass provides a protective environment in which young fish can develop.
Hǎizǎo wèi yòuyú de shēngzhǎng tígōngle bǎohùhuánjìng。
海藻为幼鱼的生长提供了保护环境。
实行环境监测是掌握环境状况的一种手段。
Shíxíng huánjìng jiāncè shì zhǎngwò huánjìng zhuàngkuàng de yìzhǒng shǒuduàn。
Implementing environmental supervision is a means to control environmental conditions.
环境部门加大力度改善环境，市区降尘量明显下降。
Huánjìng bùmén jiādà lìdù gǎishàn huánjìng，shìqū jiàngchénliàng míngxiǎn xiàjiàng。
The fall of dust has obviously reduced since environmental protection departments determined  to improve the environment.

My child has always lived in comfort. He can be said to have grown up in a honey jar.
他一辈子老实、无能，对环境的压迫逆来顺受。

All his life he had been simple, ineffective, docilely accepting the worst his environment had given him.

在艰苦环境中工作，经过千锤百炼，他意志越来越坚强了。

Toughened by working under difficult conditions, his will-power became stronger.
环境污染问题日趋严重。
Huánjìng wūrǎn wèntí rìqū yánzhòng。
Environmental pollution is an increasingly serious problem.

这里环境很幽静。

周围环境
zhōuwéi huánjìnɡ 
surroundings; environment

一些动植物的保护色会随环境的变化而变化。

Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
能够随着环境的变易而变易，这是他的生存之道。
Nénggòu suí zhe huánjìng de biànyì ér biànyì，zhè shì tā de shēngcún zhī dào。
Adapting to surroundings is his philosophy.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.
长期在这种环境下工作会吸入许多尘毒。
Chángqī zài zhèzhǒng huánjìng xià gōngzuò huì xīrù xǔduō chéndú。
You will inhale a lot of poisonous dust if you work under this condition for a long time.
臭氧层不断被破坏，人类的生存环境受到威胁。
Chòuyǎngcéng búduàn bèi pòhuài，rénlèi de shēngcún huánjìng shòudào wēixié。
As the ozone gradually becomes damaged, humankind\'s survival is threatened.
人的初愿往往会因为环境的改变而改变。
Rén de chūyuàn wǎngwǎng huì yīnwèi huánjìng de gǎibiàn ér gǎibiàn。
People\'s initial aspirations often change with their environment.
这些细菌在高温环境下仍能存活。
Zhèxiē xìjūn zài gāowēn huánjìng xià réng néng cúnhuó。
These bacteria can survive in hot environment.
这儿环境挺好的，再也不用打熬过日子了。
Zhèr huánjìng tǐnghǎo de，zài yě búyòng dǎ\'áo guò rìzi le。
The environment here is very good, thus we no longer have to fight for our life.
在目前的这个大环境下，一定要有竞争意识。
Zài mùqián de zhège dà huánjìng xià，yídìng yào yǒu jìngzhēng yìshí。
We must be competitive in current environment.
因为发生原油泄漏，这里的海域环境恶变。
Yīnwéi fāshēng yuányóu xièlòu，zhèlǐ de hǎiyù huánjìng èbiàn。
The marine environment here has deteriorated due to crude oil leakage.
这些工业废弃物对环境的危害很大，应当妥善处理。
Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。
We must deal with this industrial waste very carefully as it can cause great pollution to our environment.
观察哨上的哨兵工作环境很艰苦。
Guāncháshào shàng de shàobīng gōngzuò huánjìng hěnjiānkǔ。
The working environment for guards at the observation post is very tough.
全球变暖是国际性的环境问题。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn shì guójìxìng de huánjìng wèntí。
Global warming is an international environmental issue.
这个实验要求恒湿的环境。
Zhège shíyàn yāoqiú héngshī de huánjìng。
A constant humid environment is needed for this experiment.
鲎虫生活在池沼、水潭或水畔，对环境没有什么影响。
Hòuchóng shēnghuó zài chízhǎo、shuǐtán huò shuǐpàn，duì huánjìng méiyǒu shénme yǐngxiǎng。
Tadpole shrimp lives in ponds, swags or river sides. They have no impact on the environment.
想要看到环境效益，不是靠一时半刻的努力就能实现的。
Xiǎngyào kàndào huánjìng xiàoyì，búshì kào yìshí bànkè de nǔlì jiùnéng shíxiàn de。
The benefits from environmental protection can\'t be realized through short term efforts.
自然环境要素，包括水、空气、阳光、生物、土壤、岩石等。
Zìrán huánjìng yàosù，bāokuò shuǐ、kōngqì、yángguāng、shēngwù、tǔrǎng、yánshí děng。
Environmental elements include water, air, sunshine life-forms, soil, and rocks.
现代人的环境意识逐渐完善起来了。
Xiàndài rén de huánjìng yìshí zhújiàn wánshàn qǐlái le。
The environmental awareness of the modern people is gradually being established.
国家环保局一直很关注环境质量这项工作。
Guójiā huánbǎojú yìzhí hěnguānzhù huánjìng zhìliàng zhè xiàng gōngzuò。
The National Bureau of Environmental Protection has been paying attention to the environmental quality program.
公司给我创造了良好的工作环境，使我工作起来犹如蛟龙得水。
Gōngsīgěi wǒ chuàngzào le liánghǎo de gōngzuò huánjìng，shǐ wǒ gōngzuò qǐlái yóurú jiāolóng déshuǐ。
The company offers me a good working environment, which enables me to display my talent.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。
Jífēng chuī jìncǎo，yuèshì kùnnan de huánjìng，wǒmen yuèyào jiānchí。
Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
谁也不知道是不是环境的恶变绝灭了恐龙。
Shéi yě bùzhīdào shìbushì huánjìng de èbiàn juémiè le kǒnglóng。
No one knows whether it is because of the dramatic changes in the environment that the dinosaurs became extinct.
这个度假村靠近林泉环境优美。
Zhège dùjiàcūn kàojìn línquán huánjìng yōuměi。
Close to a forest and spring, this holiday village has beautiful surroundings.
这个园林的漏窗设计得和环境不太相称。
Zhège yuánlín de lòuchuāng shèjì de hé huánjìng bú tài xiāngchèn。
The glassless windows in the garden are not suitable for the surroundings.
在潮湿闷热而且没有空调的环境里，人人都是一身黏湿。
Zài cháoshī mènrè érqiě méiyǒu kōngtiáo de huánjìng lǐ，rénrén dōushì yìshēn niánshī。
In the damp and muggy environment without an air-conditioner, everyone feels sticky and wet.
环境污染正在啮噬人类的健康。
Huánjìng wūrǎn zhèngzài nièshì rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
我们欠下的环境的污染孽债，难道要等下一代来偿还吗？
Wǒmen qiànxià de huánjìng de wūrǎn nièzhài，nándào yào děng xià yídài lái chánghuán ma?
Should the next generation pay for what we have done to the environment?
我们前去看一下环境，然后再说是否要买这房子。
Wǒmen qiánqù kàn yíxià huánjìng，ránhòu zài shuō shìfǒu yào mǎi zhè fángzi。
We will go to look around the house first, and then we will decide whether we will buy it or not.
环境污染是个全球性的问题。
Huánjìng wūrǎn shì gè quánqiúxìng de wèntí。
Environmental pollution is a world wide problem.
市政府为引进外资，创造了很好的软环境。
Shìzhèngfǔ wèi yǐnjìn wàizī，chuàngzào le hěnhǎo de ruǎnhuánjìng。
In order to bring in foreign investment, the municipal government has created good conditions.
政府创造了宽松的投资环境，甚而还可减免税收。
Zhèngfǔ chuàngzào le kuānsōng de tóuzī huánjìng，shènér hái kě jiǎnmiǎn shuìshōu。
The government has created a favorable environment for investment, and has even agreed to reduce or exempt tax.
乱砍乱伐会破坏整个自然环境的生态平衡。
Luànkǎn luànfá huì pòhuài zhěnggè zìrán huánjìng de shēngtài pínghéng。
Indiscriminate felling of trees will destroy the ecological balance of nature.
长期生活在噪音较大的环境之中，可能会扰乱人体的生物节律。
Chángqī shēnghuó zài zàoyīn jiàodà de huánjìng zhīzhōng，kěnéng huì rǎoluàn réntǐ de shēngwù jiélǜ。
Living in a noisy environment for a long time might disturb one\'s biorhythm.
陶渊明作品的诗境都很悠远，这和他的生活环境与处世心态有关。
Táo Yuānmíng zuòpǐn de shījìng dōu hěnyōuyuǎn，zhè hé tā de shēnghuó huánjìng yǔ chǔshì xīntài yǒuguān。
The artistic conception of Tao Yuanming\'s poems are very remote in time and space, which is related to his living environment and his attitude towards life.
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
条件反射是动物和人后天获得的，是个体生活过程中适应环境变化并经过学习学会的反射。
Tiáojiàn fǎnshè shì dòngwù hé rén hòutiān huòdé de，shì gètǐ shēnghuó guòchéng zhōng shìyìng huánjìng biànhuà bìng jīngguò xuéxí xuéhuì de fǎnshè。
Conditioned reflexes are acquired instead of being inborn. They are a kind of reflex that is learned when adapting to the environment.
为下一代着想，我们必须保护环境。
Wéi xiàyídài zhuóxiǎng，wǒmén bìxū bǎohù huánjìng。
We must protect the environment for future generations.
九华山树木蓊郁，环境清幽，是个旅游圣地。
Jiǔhuáshān shùmù wěngyù，huánjìng qīngyōu，shì gè lǚyóu shèngdì。
The Jiuhua Mountain is surrounded by trees, and is a tourist resort.
小而言之，保护地球环境要从我做起。
Xiǎoér yánzhī，bǎohù dìqiú huánjìng yào cóngwǒ zuòqǐ。
To protect the environment, we must start from own behavior.
北京为了改善环境，积极治理扬尘天气。
Běijīng wèile gǎishàn huánjìng，jījí zhìlǐ yángchén tiānqì。
To improve the environment, many measures have been taken to reduce and control flying dust.
有识之士很早就呼吁要加强环境保护。
Yǒushí zhīshì hěnzǎo jiù hūyù yào jiāqiáng huánjìng bǎohù。
People with insight called for increasing environmental protection a long time ago.
我国人民生活在一个政通人和的社会环境中。
Wǒ guó rénmín shēnghuó zài yígè zhèngtōng rénhé de shèhuì huánjìng zhōng。
People in our country are living in a harmonious society where the policies are enforced smoothly, and the people are united.
废旧电池即使没有了使用价值也不可随手乱丢，因为它们会污染环境！
Fèijiù diànchí jíshǐ méiyǒule shǐyòng jiàzhí yě bùkě suíshǒu luàn diū，yīnwèi tāmen huì wūrǎn huánjìng！
Old batteries can\'t be discarded casually even when they are no longer useful, because they\'ll pollute the environment!
双重人格的人在不同的环境下会有不同的表现。
Shuāngchóngréngé de rén zài bùtóng de huánjìng xià huì yǒu bùtóng de biǎoxiàn。
People with a double personality will behave differently in different circumstances.
这个开发区已具备投资环境，敬请投资者选址。
Zhège kāifāqū yǐ jùbèi tóuzīhuánjìng，jìngqǐng tóuzīzhě xuǎnzhǐ。
This development zone is ready for investment. Please select concrete locations yourself.

Guójiā huánbǎojú yìzhí hěnguānzhù huánjìng zhìliàng zhè xiàng gōngzuò。
The National Bureau of Environmental Protection has been paying attention to the environmental quality program.
世界各国都有环保问题，中国也不例外。
shìjiègèguó dōu yǒu huánbǎo wèntí，Zhōngguó yě bú lìwài。
The problem of environmental protection affects all countries, and China is no exception.
电瓶车是靠电能作为动力的，安静环保。
Diànpíngchē shì kào diànnéng zuòwéi dònglì de，ānjìng huánbǎo。
Battery cars use electric energy as their driving force, which is clean and environmentally friendly.
这个小区采用了房顶绿化，既环保美观又节省空间。
Zhège xiǎoqū cǎiyòng le fángdǐng lǜhuà，jì huánbǎo měiguān yòu jiéshěng kōngjiān。
This living community adopts roof greening measures which are environmental-friendly, pleasing to the eye, and can save space.
发展环保型火电利国利民，势在必行。
Fāzhǎn huánbǎoxíng huǒdiàn lìguó lìmín，shìzài bìxíng。
It benefits the nation and the people to develop environmentally-friendly thermal power, and it will definitely be developed in the future.
政府的工业化政策遭到了环保主义者的诘难。
Zhèngfǔ de gōngyèhuà zhèngcè zāodào le huánbǎozhǔyìzhě de jiénàn。
The government\'s industrialization policies were questioned by environmentalists.
这个小区的所有楼房都是用空心砖建造的，既环保又便宜。
Zhège xiǎoqū de suǒyǒu lóufáng dōushì yòng kōngxīnzhuān jiànzào de，jì huánbǎo yòu piányí。
All buildings in this housing development are made of hollow bricks, which are cheap and can protect the environment.
古代的连环保制度对百姓很不公平。
Gǔdài de liánhuánbǎo zhìdù duì bǎixìng hěn bùgōngpíng。
The interlink assurance system in ancient societies was very unfair to the common people.
小排量的汽车更节能环保，应该鼓励和提倡大家使用！
Xiǎo páiliàng de qìchē gèng jiénéng huánbǎo，yīnggāi gǔlì hé tíchàng dàjiā shǐyòng！
Low displacement automobiles save more energy and protect the environment, so we should encourage people to use them.
出于健康的考虑，他采用了环保的墙面漆。
Chūyú jiànkāng de kǎolǜ，tā cǎiyòng le huánbǎo de qiángmiànqī。
In view of health, he adopted the environmentally friendly wall lacquer.
为了环保，我们呼吁大家尽量不要使用卫生筷。
Wèile huánbǎo，wǒmén hūyù dàjiā jìnliàng búyào shǐyòng wèishēngkuài。
We call on people not to use disposable chopsticks to protect the environment.
采取环保措施
cǎiqǔ huánbǎocuòshī
take measures to protect the environment
不注意环境保护造成的恶果
bú zhùyì huánjìng bǎohù zàochéng de èguǒ
the evil consequences of the neglect of environmental protection

shēngtài huánjìng bǎohù
protection of ecological environment

Suí zhe gōngyè de fāzhǎn，duì huánjìngbǎohù yě cǎiqǔ le xiāngyìng de cuòshī。
With the development of industry, appropriate measures have been taken to protect the environment.
有识之士很早就呼吁要加强环境保护。
Yǒushí zhīshì hěnzǎo jiù hūyù yào jiāqiáng huánjìng bǎohù。
People with insight called for increasing environmental protection a long time ago.
我们在环境保护方面取得了很大成绩。
Wǒmen zài huánjìngbǎohù fāngmiàn qǔdéle hěndà chéngjì。
We have had considerable success in environmental protection.
经济增长与环境保护，二者不可偏废。
Jīngjì zēngzhǎng yǔ huánjìngbǎohù，èrzhěbùkěpiānfèi.
Economic growth and environmental protection should be given equal emphasis.
工业发展和环境保护要同步进行。
Gōngyèfāzhǎn hé huánjìngbǎohù yào tóngbù jìnxíng。
Industrial development must be in step with environmental protection.
不要等到环境恶化了，才明白保护环境的迫切性和重要性。
Búyào děngdào huánjìng èhuà le，cái míngbai bǎohù huánjìng de pòqièxìng hé zhòngyàoxìng。
Don’t wait until the environment has deteriorated until we figure out the urgency and importance of environmental protection.
保护环境，防止污染

protect the environment against pollution

保护环境

protect the environment

Developing the economy and protecting the environment are interrelated.
保护环境，世代受用。

一些动植物的保护色会随环境的变化而变化。

He is an environmentalist with a passion of the biology and geography of the region.

他是一个环保人士，对这个地区的生物和地理很有热情。
People do want to see action on the environment.
Rénmen quèshí xiǎng cānjiā yǒuguān huánbǎo de zhàndòu。
人们确实想参加有关环保的站斗。
Dave will bicycle to work, in support of a greener planet.

Environmental protests are becoming more frequent.
huánbǎofāngmiàn de kàngyì zhèngzài biàn de gèngwéi pínfán。
环保方面的抗议正在变得更为频繁。
Economic botany makes significant contributions to anthropology, botany and environmental conservation.
经济植物学为人类学、植物学和环境保护作出了重要的贡献。
There is universal agreement that saving the environment is a worthy cause.
保护环境是一项值得为之奋斗的事业，人们在这一点上有着广泛的认同。
The new government is urged to take measures to protect the environment.
人们敦促政府采取措施保护环境。

There are many opportunities to back the Environment by boycotting certain products.

一环套一环
yì huán tào yì huán 
all linked with one another; wheels within wheels
生产上一个环节套一个环节
shēngchǎn shàngyígè huánjié tào yígè huánjié 
a closely linked succession in the production chain
生产过程中每个步骤都环环相扣，一个也不能错。
Shēngchǎn guòchéng zhōng měigè bùzhòu dōu huánhuán xiāngkòu，yígè yě bùnéng cuò。
Every procedure in the manufacturing process is closely linked to another. There can be no mistake in any of them.
实行环境监测是掌握环境状况的一种手段。
Shíxíng huánjìng jiāncè shì zhǎngwò huánjìng zhuàngkuàng de yìzhǒng shǒuduàn。
Implementing environmental supervision is a means to control environmental conditions.
国家环保局一直很关注环境质量这项工作。

The National Bureau of Environmental Protection has been paying attention to the environmental quality program.
环境部门加大力度改善环境，市区降尘量明显下降。
Huánjìng bùmén jiādà lìdù gǎishàn huánjìng，shìqū jiàngchénliàng míngxiǎn xiàjiàng。

据说这种疾病会破环人体的血液循环系统。
Jùshuō zhèzhǒng jíbìng huì pòhuài réntǐ de xuèyèxúnhuán xìtǒng。
It is said that this disease can destroy the human blood circulatory system.
她拿着那副耳环爱不释手。
Tā ná zhe nà fù ěrhuán àibúshìshǒu。
The moment she got hold of those earrings, she took a fancy to them and wouldn\'t let go of them.

měihuà huánjìnɡ

xuèyè xúnhuán tōngchàng
free circulation of the blood
环状凸缘
huánzhuànɡ tūyuán 
collar flange
土星光环
tǔxīnɡ ɡuānɡhuán 
Saturn\'s rings
随着工业的发展，对环境保护也采取了相应的措施。
Suí zhe gōngyè de fāzhǎn，duì huánjìngbǎohù yě cǎiqǔ le xiāngyìng de cuòshī。
With the development of industry, appropriate measures have been taken to protect the environment.
他们希望周围的小环境充满正气、友善和谅解。
Tāmen xīwàngzhōuwéi de xiǎo huánjìngchōngmǎn zhèngqì、yǒushàn hé liàngjiě。
They want the atmosphere to be positive, friendly and understanding.
循环不息
xúnhuán bù xī
move in endless cycles
四季的循环
sìjì de xúnhuán
the cycle of the seasons
循环往复，以至无穷
xúnhuán wǎngfù，yǐ zhì wúqióng
repeat itself in endless cycles
这里环境很幽静。
Zhèlǐ huánjìnghěn yōujìng。
It\'s rather peaceful and secluded around here.
杂环化合物
záhuán huàhéwù
heterocyclic compound
改善环境，拯救珍稀野生动物
ɡǎishàn huánjìnɡ, zhěnɡjiù zhēnxī yěshēnɡ dònɡwù 
improve the environment to save rare wild animals
制冷循环
zhìlěnɡ xúnhuán 
refrigeration cycle
中转环节
zhōngzhuǎn huánjié 
intermediate link
周期性循环
zhōuqīxìngxúnhuán 
periodic return
环顾周围
huánɡù zhōuwéi 
look about; look around
周围环境
zhōuwéi huánjìnɡ 
surroundings; environment
环宇公司开业了。
Huányŭgōngsī kāiyè le。
这些不能降解的白色垃圾对环境造成危害很大。
Zhèxiē bùnéng jiàngjiě de báisè lājī duì huánjìng zàochéng wēihài hěndà。
Permanent white trash can do great damage to the environment.
一些动植物的保护色会随环境的变化而变化。
Yìxiē dòngzhíwù de bǎohùsè huì suí huánjìng de biànhuà ér biànhuà。
The protective color of some plants and animals changes with their surroundings.
虽然张飞长得豹头环眼，可心底不坏。
Suīrán Zhāng Fēi zhǎng de bàotóu huányǎn，kě xīndǐ búhuài。
Though Zhangfei looks very fierce, he is essentially a good person.
竞争激烈的环境会逼使我们不断要学习新的东西。
Jìngzhēng jīliè de huánjìng huì bīshǐ wǒmen búduàn yào xuéxí xīn de dōngxi。
Fierce competition forces us to keep learning new things.
专家指出，避孕环并非人人适用。
Zhuānjiā zhǐchū，bìyùnhuán bìngfēi rénrén shìyòng。
According to some experts, intrauterine devices are not applicable for everyone.
能够随着环境的变易而变易，这是他的生存之道。
Nénggòu suí zhe huánjìng de biànyì ér biànyì，zhè shì tā de shēngcún zhī dào。
Adapting to surroundings is his philosophy.
进入不惑之年的他仍然在努力学习新的知识，适应新的环境。
Jìnrù búhuò zhī nián de tā réngrán zài nǔlì xuéxí xīn de zhīshi，shìyīng xīn de huánjìng。
Though in his 40s, he still tries to learn new things to adapt to the new environment.
长期在这种环境下工作会吸入许多尘毒。
Chángqī zài zhèzhǒng huánjìng xià gōngzuò huì xīrù xǔduō chéndú。
You will inhale a lot of poisonous dust if you work under this condition for a long time.
环卫工人被誉为是城市美容师。
Huánwèi gōngrén bèi yùwéi shì chéngshì měiróngshī。
City sanitation workers are called &quot;city beauticians&quot;.
臭氧层不断被破坏，人类的生存环境受到威胁。
Chòuyǎngcéng búduàn bèi pòhuài，rénlèi de shēngcún huánjìng shòudào wēixié。
As the ozone gradually becomes damaged, humankind\'s survival is threatened.
人的初愿往往会因为环境的改变而改变。
Rén de chūyuàn wǎngwǎng huì yīnwèi huánjìng de gǎibiàn ér gǎibiàn。
People\'s initial aspirations often change with their environment.
这里丛山环绕，很容易迷路。
Zhèlǐ cóngshān huánrào，hěnróngyì mílù。
This group of mountains surround each other so that it is quite easy to get lost here.
这些细菌在高温环境下仍能存活。
Zhèxiē xìjūn zài gāowēn huánjìng xià réng néng cúnhuó。
These bacteria can survive in hot environment.
这儿环境挺好的，再也不用打熬过日子了。
Zhèr huánjìng tǐnghǎo de，zài yě búyòng dǎ\'áo guò rìzi le。
The environment here is very good, thus we no longer have to fight for our life.
在目前的这个大环境下，一定要有竞争意识。
Zài mùqián de zhège dà huánjìng xià，yídìng yào yǒu jìngzhēng yìshí。
We must be competitive in current environment.
大江截流，是三峡工程建设的重要环节。
Dàjiāng jiéliú，shì sānxiá gōngchéng jiànshè de zhòngyào huánjié。
The closure work is the key link in the Three Gorges Project.
这里三面环海，是片地角区域。
Zhèlǐ sān miàn huánhǎi，shì piàn dìjiǎo qūyù。
This region is a cape, surrounded by sea on the other three sides.
电瓶车是靠电能作为动力的，安静环保。
Diànpíngchē shì kào diànnéng zuòwéi dònglì de，ānjìng huánbǎo。
Battery cars use electric energy as their driving force, which is clean and environmentally friendly.
因为发生原油泄漏，这里的海域环境恶变。
Yīnwéi fāshēng yuányóu xièlòu，zhèlǐ de hǎiyù huánjìng èbiàn。
The marine environment here has deteriorated due to crude oil leakage.
你要摆脱这种情绪的恶性循环，做一个坚强乐观的人。
Nǐ yào bǎituō zhèzhǒng qíngxù de èxìng xúnhuán，zuò yígè jiānqiáng lèguān de rén。
You should get yourself out of this vicious circle of emotions and become strong and optimistic.
她就是因为喜爱那对儿精美的耳环，才下决心打耳孔的。
Tā jiùshì yīnwèi xǐ\'ài nà duìr jīngměi de ěrhuán，cái xià juéxīn dǎ ěrkǒng de。
She made up her mind to pierce her ears because of a pair of attractive earrings.
他经常手脚发麻，医生说这是血液循环不畅的表现。
Tā jīngcháng shǒujiǎo fāmá，yīshēng shuō zhè shì xuèyè xúnhuán búchàng de biǎoxiàn。
His hands and feet often go numb, which the doctor has diagnosed as non-smooth circulation of blood.
这个小区采用了房顶绿化，既环保美观又节省空间。
Zhège xiǎoqū cǎiyòng le fángdǐng lǜhuà，jì huánbǎo měiguān yòu jiéshěng kōngjiān。
This living community adopts roof greening measures which are environmental-friendly, pleasing to the eye, and can save space.
这些工业废弃物对环境的危害很大，应当妥善处理。
Zhèxiē gōngyè fèiqìwù duì huánjìng de wēihài hěndà，yīngdāng tuǒshàn chǔlǐ。
We must deal with this industrial waste very carefully as it can cause great pollution to our environment.
他梦到自己头上环绕着一片光明，金黄闪耀如同佛光。
Tā mèngdào zìjǐ tóushàng huánrào zhe yípiàn guāngmíng，jīnhuáng shǎnyào rútóng fóguāng。
He dreamed that he had a halo over his head shining like the Buddha\'s halo.
用这架高倍望远镜可以看到月亮上的环形山。
Yòng zhè jià gāobèi wàngyuǎnjìng kěyǐ kàndào yuèliàng shàng de huánxíngshān。
You can see round mountains on the moon through this high-powered telescope.
观察哨上的哨兵工作环境很艰苦。
Guāncháshào shàng de shàobīng gōngzuò huánjìng hěnjiānkǔ。
The working environment for guards at the observation post is very tough.
全球变暖是国际性的环境问题。
Quánqiú biànnuǎn shì guójìxìng de huánjìng wèntí。
Global warming is an international environmental issue.
这个实验要求恒湿的环境。
Zhège shíyàn yāoqiú héngshī de huánjìng。
A constant humid environment is needed for this experiment.
鲎虫生活在池沼、水潭或水畔，对环境没有什么影响。
Hòuchóng shēnghuó zài chízhǎo、shuǐtán huò shuǐpàn，duì huánjìng méiyǒu shénme yǐngxiǎng。
Tadpole shrimp lives in ponds, swags or river sides. They have no impact on the environment.
想要看到环境效益，不是靠一时半刻的努力就能实现的。
Xiǎngyào kàndào huánjìng xiàoyì，búshì kào yìshí bànkè de nǔlì jiùnéng shíxiàn de。
The benefits from environmental protection can\'t be realized through short term efforts.
自然环境要素，包括水、空气、阳光、生物、土壤、岩石等。
Zìrán huánjìng yàosù，bāokuò shuǐ、kōngqì、yángguāng、shēngwù、tǔrǎng、yánshí děng。
Environmental elements include water, air, sunshine life-forms, soil, and rocks.
现代人的环境意识逐渐完善起来了。
Xiàndài rén de huánjìng yìshí zhújiàn wánshàn qǐlái le。
The environmental awareness of the modern people is gradually being established.
他的工作难度很大，困难环生。
Tā de gōngzuò nándù hěndà，kùnnan huánshēng。
His work was of great difficulty, and trouble appeared ceaselessly.
你刚学会开车，咱们绕开环形交叉路走。
Nǐ gāng xuéhuì kāichē，zánmen ràokāi huánxíng jiāochālù zǒu。
You are a novice car driver. Let\'s steer clear of the circular cross road.
科学家根据安装在鸟腿上的环志来研究候鸟的迁徙规律。
Kēxuéjiā gēnjù ānzhuāng zài niǎotuǐ shàng de huánzhì lái yánjiū hòuniǎo de qiānxǐ guīlǜ。
Scientists do researches on the migrating rules of migratory birds according to the circular marks fixed on bird legs.
为了节约用水，废水应当回环使用。
Wèile jiéyuē yòngshuǐ，fèishuǐ yīngdāng huíhuán shǐyòng。
In order to save water, waste water should be used circularly.
公路回环于山间，蜿蜒曲折，好像一条巨蟒。
Gōnglù huíhuán yú shānjiān，wānyán qūzhé，hǎo xiàng yìtiáo jùmǎng。
The twists, and turns on the mountain road resemble the shape of a python.
他用回环的方式来造句，效果不错。
Tā yòng huíhuán de fāngshì lái zàojù，xiàoguǒ búcuò。
He made sentences using palindrome. The effect was positive.
发展环保型火电利国利民，势在必行。
Fāzhǎn huánbǎoxíng huǒdiàn lìguó lìmín，shìzài bìxíng。
It benefits the nation and the people to develop environmentally-friendly thermal power, and it will definitely be developed in the future.
公司给我创造了良好的工作环境，使我工作起来犹如蛟龙得水。
Gōngsīgěi wǒ chuàngzào le liánghǎo de gōngzuò huánjìng，shǐ wǒ gōngzuò qǐlái yóurú jiāolóng déshuǐ。
The company offers me a good working environment, which enables me to display my talent.
政府的工业化政策遭到了环保主义者的诘难。
Zhèngfǔ de gōngyèhuà zhèngcè zāodào le huánbǎozhǔyìzhě de jiénàn。
The government\'s industrialization policies were questioned by environmentalists.
疾风吹劲草，越是困难的环境，我们越要坚持。
Jífēng chuī jìncǎo，yuèshì kùnnan de huánjìng，wǒmen yuèyào jiānchí。
Strength of character is tested in a crisis; the harder the environment is, the more determined we are.
谁也不知道是不是环境的恶变绝灭了恐龙。
Shéi yě bùzhīdào shìbushì huánjìng de èbiàn juémiè le kǒnglóng。
No one knows whether it is because of the dramatic changes in the environment that the dinosaurs became extinct.
这个小区的所有楼房都是用空心砖建造的，既环保又便宜。
Zhège xiǎoqū de suǒyǒu lóufáng dōushì yòng kōngxīnzhuān jiànzào de，jì huánbǎo yòu piányí。
All buildings in this housing development are made of hollow bricks, which are cheap and can protect the environment.
古代的连环保制度对百姓很不公平。
Gǔdài de liánhuánbǎo zhìdù duì bǎixìng hěn bùgōngpíng。
The interlink assurance system in ancient societies was very unfair to the common people.
我有收集连环画的爱好。
Wǒ yǒu shōují liánhuánhuà de àihào。
My hobby is collecting comic strips.
东汉末年，司徒王允使用连环计杀了奸贼董卓。
Dōnghàn mònián，Sītú Wángyǔn shǐyòng liánhuánjì shā le jiānzéi Dǒng Zhuó。
At the end of the East Han Dynasty, Situ Wang Yong killed the traitor Dong Zhou by using interlinking plans.
链子中的一个链环断了，就得赶快修好，否则链子就会散掉。
Liànzi zhōng de yígè liànhuán duàn le，jiù děi gǎnkuài xiūhǎo，fǒuzé liànzi jiùhuì sǎndiào。
If one link of the chain is broken, we must repair it soon, or the whole chain will break.
我们这个案子关键的一个链环就是这封信的真伪。
Wǒmen zhège ànzi guānjiàn de yígè liànhuán jiùshì zhèfēngxìn de zhēnwěi。
One key to the case is whether the letter is real or fake.
她的钻石耳环在灯光下亮闪闪的。
Tā de zuānshí ěrhuán zài dēngguāng xià liàngshǎnshǎn de。
Her diamond rings are shining under the light.
这个度假村靠近林泉环境优美。
Zhège dùjiàcūn kàojìn línquán huánjìng yōuměi。
Close to a forest and spring, this holiday village has beautiful surroundings.
这个园林的漏窗设计得和环境不太相称。
Zhège yuánlín de lòuchuāng shèjì de hé huánjìng bú tài xiāngchèn。
The glassless windows in the garden are not suitable for the surroundings.
我使劲扣他家的门环，也不见有人来开门。
Wǒ shǐjìn kòu tā jiā de ménhuán，yě bújiàn yǒurén lái kāimén。
I knocked hard on his door, but no one opened it.
在潮湿闷热而且没有空调的环境里，人人都是一身黏湿。
Zài cháoshī mènrè érqiě méiyǒu kōngtiáo de huánjìng lǐ，rénrén dōushì yìshēn niánshī。
In the damp and muggy environment without an air-conditioner, everyone feels sticky and wet.
环境污染正在啮噬人类的健康。
Huánjìng wūrǎn zhèngzài nièshì rénlèi de jiànkāng。
Environmental pollution is eroding people\'s health.
我们欠下的环境的污染孽债，难道要等下一代来偿还吗？
Wǒmen qiànxià de huánjìng de wūrǎn nièzhài，nándào yào děng xià yídài lái chánghuán ma?
Should the next generation pay for what we have done to the environment?
小排量的汽车更节能环保，应该鼓励和提倡大家使用！
Xiǎo páiliàng de qìchē gèng jiénéng huánbǎo，yīnggāi gǔlì hé tíchàng dàjiā shǐyòng！
Low displacement automobiles save more energy and protect the environment, so we should encourage people to use them.
《红楼梦》里的平儿，是王熙凤的陪房丫环。
《Hónglóumèng》lǐ de Píng\'ér，shì Wáng Xīfèng de péifáng yāhuán。
Ping\'er in the novel &quot;A Dream of the Red Mansions&quot;, is a maid servant brought by the bride from her parents\' home.
我们前去看一下环境，然后再说是否要买这房子。
Wǒmen qiánqù kàn yíxià huánjìng，ránhòu zài shuō shìfǒu yào mǎi zhè fángzi。
We will go to look around the house first, and then we will decide whether we will buy it or not.
出于健康的考虑，他采用了环保的墙面漆。
Chūyú jiànkāng de kǎolǜ，tā cǎiyòng le huánbǎo de qiángmiànqī。
In view of health, he adopted the environmentally friendly wall lacquer.
环境污染是个全球性的问题。
Huánjìng wūrǎn shì gè quánqiúxìng de wèntí。
Environmental pollution is a world wide problem.
我选定了一个观测日环食的最佳地点。
Wǒ xuǎndìng le yígè guāncè rìhuánshí de zuì jiā dìdiǎn。
We have chosen the best place to observe the annular eclipse of the sun.
市政府为引进外资，创造了很好的软环境。
Shìzhèngfǔ wèi yǐnjìn wàizī，chuàngzào le hěnhǎo de ruǎnhuánjìng。
In order to bring in foreign investment, the municipal government has created good conditions.
政府创造了宽松的投资环境，甚而还可减免税收。
Zhèngfǔ chuàngzào le kuānsōng de tóuzī huánjìng，shènér hái kě jiǎnmiǎn shuìshōu。
The government has created a favorable environment for investment, and has even agreed to reduce or exempt tax.
乱砍乱伐会破坏整个自然环境的生态平衡。
Luànkǎn luànfá huì pòhuài zhěnggè zìrán huánjìng de shēngtài pínghéng。
Indiscriminate felling of trees will destroy the ecological balance of nature.
长期生活在噪音较大的环境之中，可能会扰乱人体的生物节律。
Chángqī shēnghuó zài zàoyīn jiàodà de huánjìng zhīzhōng，kěnéng huì rǎoluàn réntǐ de shēngwù jiélǜ。
Living in a noisy environment for a long time might disturb one\'s biorhythm.
陶渊明作品的诗境都很悠远，这和他的生活环境与处世心态有关。
Táo Yuānmíng zuòpǐn de shījìng dōu hěnyōuyuǎn，zhè hé tā de shēnghuó huánjìng yǔ chǔshì xīntài yǒuguān。
The artistic conception of Tao Yuanming\'s poems are very remote in time and space, which is related to his living environment and his attitude towards life.
时序循环自有定律，我们也应该应时而动，随季节变化而调整自己的生活起居。
Shíxù xúnhuán zìyǒu dìnglǜ，wǒmen yě yīnggāi yìngshí ér dòng，suí jìjié biànhuà ér tiáozhěng zìjǐ de shēnghuó qǐjū。
There are rules for the alternation of seasons, and we should adjust our living habits according to them.
面对日益变换的社会环境，我们不应该抱怨自己的时运不济，而是应该识时务，而后应时而动。
Miànduì rìyì biànhuàn de shèhuì huánjìng，wǒmen bùyīnggāi bàoyuàn zìjǐ de shíyùn bújì，ér shì yīnggāi shí shíwù，ér hòu yìngshí ér dòng。
Faced with the ever-changing society, we should rather make good judgment about current affairs and take corresponding actions than complain about bad luck.
这次手术要通过血液的体外循环来完成。
Zhècì shǒushù yào tōngguò xuèyè de tǐwài xúnhuán lái wánchéng。
The operation is to be done through extracorporeal blood circulation.
条件反射是动物和人后天获得的，是个体生活过程中适应环境变化并经过学习学会的反射。
Tiáojiàn fǎnshè shì dòngwù hé rén hòutiān huòdé de，shì gètǐ shēnghuó guòchéng zhōng shìyìng huánjìng biànhuà bìng jīngguò xuéxí xuéhuì de fǎnshè。
Conditioned reflexes are acquired instead of being inborn. They are a kind of reflex that is learned when adapting to the environment.
微循环系统对人体健康会产生重要的影响。
Wēixúnhuán xìtǒng duì réntǐ jiànkāng huì chǎnshēng zhòngyào de yǐngxiǎng。
The microcirculatory system has an important influence on our health.
为了环保，我们呼吁大家尽量不要使用卫生筷。
Wèile huánbǎo，wǒmén hūyù dàjiā jìnliàng búyào shǐyòng wèishēngkuài。
We call on people not to use disposable chopsticks to protect the environment.
为下一代着想，我们必须保护环境。
Wéi xiàyídài zhuóxiǎng，wǒmén bìxū bǎohù huánjìng。
We must protect the environment for future generations.
九华山树木蓊郁，环境清幽，是个旅游圣地。

Silver-ringed snakes are venomous, don\'t try to capture them when you see them.
这个侦探小说把我的思绪引向了一个险象环生的世界。

toss and turn in bed
把大衣领儿翻起来
bǎ dàyīlǐngr fānqǐlái 
turn up one\'s coat collar
翻制轮胎
fānzhì lúntāi 
retreaded tyre
麦浪翻滚。
Màilànɡ fānɡǔn。
The wheat bent before the wind in swaying billows.
他俩为了一点小事儿就闹翻了。
Tā liǎ wèi le yìdiǎn xiǎo shìr jiù nàofān le。
They fell out with each other over some little thing.
把墨水瓶碰翻了
Bǎ mòshuǐpíng pèngfān le。
knock the inkbottle over
企图推翻政府
qǐtú tuīfān zhènɡfǔ
seek to overthrow the government
我们对待在工作中犯过错误的人采取规劝态度，使之翻然改进，弃旧图新。
Wǒmen duìdài zài gōngzuò zhōng fànguò cuòwù de rén cǎiqǔ guīquàn tàidu，shǐ zhī fānrán gǎijìn，qìjiùtúxīn。
Our attitude towards any person who has made mistakes in his work should be one of persuasion in order to help him change and start afresh.
他把两腿蜷曲起来做了个前滚翻。
Tā bǎ liǎng tuǐ quánqū qǐlái zuò le gè qiángǔnfān。
Drawing up his knees against his chest, he did a forward roll.
不要把他惹翻了。
Búyào bǎ tā rěfān le。
Don\'t touch off his temper.
好的翻译可以使宾主谈得水乳交融。
Hǎo de fānyì kěyǐ shǐ bīnzhǔ tán de shuǐrǔjiāoróng。
A competent interpreter can help bring about a meeting of minds like milk mingling with water.
不顾人民死活的政府早晚要被人民推翻。
Bùgù rénmín sǐhuó de zhèngfǔ zǎowǎn yào bèi rénmín tuīfān。
A government which doesn\'t give a thought to the welfare of the people will sooner or later be overthrown.
把凳子踢翻
bǎ dèngzi tīfān 
kick over a stool
天翻地覆的变化
tiānfāndìfù de biànhuà 
earthshaking (or tremendous) changes
推翻协议
tuīfān xiéyì 
repudiate an agreement
推翻原定计划
tuīfān yuán dìngjìhuà 
cancel the original plan
把对手掀翻在地
bǎ duìshǒu xiānfānzàidì
throw the opponent off his balance
她心潮翻滚，无法入睡。
Tā xīncháo fāngǔn，wúfǎ rùshuì。
Her mind being in a tumult, she could not go to sleep.
你两人一言为定，各无翻悔。
Nǐ liǎngrén yìyánwéidìng，gè wú fānhuǐ。
Now that you have both agreed to this, you must neither of you go back on your word.
他整夜翻来复去睡不着。
Tā zhěngyè fānláifùqù shuì bu zháo。
He tossed about all night, unable to get to sleep.
逐字逐句的翻译
zhúzìzhújù de fānyì 
a word-for-word (or literal) translation
翻番
fānfān
increase by a specified number of times
翻案
fān\'àn
reverse a verdict
翻山越岭
fānshānyuèlǐng
cross over mountain after mountain; tramp over hill and dale

fānténg
tuck dive
他是英文杂志的翻译。
Tā shì yīngwénzázhì de fānyì。
他一不小心打翻了蚕匾，桑叶散满了一地。
Tā yíbùxiǎoxīn dǎfān le cánbiǎn，sāngyè sǎnmǎn le yídì。
He carelessly knocked over the silkworm tray, leaving the floor covered with folia mori.
今天他终于和老伴吵翻了。
Jīntiān tā zhōng yú hé lǎobàn chǎofān le。
Finally, he has fallen out with his wife today.
他历尽心血终于完成了这一成本大套的翻译作品。
Tā lìjìn xīnxuè zhōng yú wánchéng le zhè yì chéngběn dàtào de fānyì zuòpǐn。
He completed the translation of this monumental work with a herculean effort.
火焰山上炽焰翻滚，方圆百里都似火炉一样。
Huǒyànshān shàng chìyàn fāngǔn，fāngyuán bǎilǐ dōu sì huǒlú yíyàng。
The whole Huoyan Mountain was covered in flames, which made the areas miles away feel as warm as an oven.
我们的队伍翻越崇山峻岭，终于到达了目的地。
Wǒmen de duìwu fānyuè chóngshān jùnlǐng，zhōng yú dàodá le mùdìdì。
After climbing across the toweringly steep mountains, our army finally reached their destination.
这场球赛，我们队打了个翻身仗。
Zhèchǎng qiúsài，wǒmen duì dǎ le gè fānshēnzhàng。
Our team changed for the better after we won the match.
大经济体系的建立，使我们公司的产值翻了一番。

她感觉胃中倒海翻江，难受极了。
Tā gǎnjué wèi zhōng dǎohǎi fānjiāng，nánshòu jí le。
Her stomach hurts.
这些道木全部需要翻新。

Jìnniánlái，Zhōngguó fāshēng le dìfù tiānfān de biànhuà。

经过武装起义，独裁者终于被推翻了。

你老想着翻本儿，只会越赌越输。
Nǐ lǎo xiǎng zhe fānběnr，zhǐ huì yuè dǔ yuè shū。
If you keep thinking of winning back what you have lost, you will lose more.
那艘游轮因大风翻沉。
Nà sōu yóulún yīn dàfēng fānchén。
The passenger ship capsized because of strong wind.
那个河段刚刚发生了翻船事故，好在没有人员伤亡。

There was a shipping accident at that part of the river just now, but luckily no one died or got hurt.
他尽干违法的坏事，早晚有一天会翻船！

一阵风从窗口吹来，翻动着他摊开的书页。

A gust of wind blows from the window, ruffling through the leaves of the book he had left open.
那些海鸥总是在我们的游轮周围翻飞。
Nàxiē hǎi\'ōu zǒngshì zài wǒmen de yóulún zhōuwéi fānfēi。
The seagulls always fly to and fro around our passenger ship.
煎鱼时不能只煎一面，要及时翻个儿。
Jiān yú shí bùnéng zhǐ jiān yímiàn，yào jíshí fāngèr。

这房子是去年翻建的。
Zhè fángzi shì qùnián fānjiàn de。
The house was rebuilt last year.
天空乌云翻搅奔腾，眼看着就要下雨了。
Tiānkōng wūyún fānjiǎo bēnténg，yǎn kàn zhe jiùyào xiàyǔ le。
With dark clouds whirling in the sky, it looks like it\'s going to rain.
咱们就说今天的事，别总是翻旧账。

这张照片是我从杂志封面上翻拍下来的。

xiǎodiàn
my store
