The goods in the store dazzled all of us.
商店的所有商品在进行贱卖，价格十分低廉。
Shāngdiàn de suǒyǒu shāngpǐn zài jìnxíng jiànmài，jiàgé shífēn dīlián。
All the goods in the store are on sale, the prices are really cheap.
那个商店专门经营出口转内销的商品，我们一起去看看吧。
Nàge shāngdiàn zhuānmén jīngyíng chūkǒu zhuǎn nèixiāo de shāngpǐn，wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkàn ba。
That shop specializes in selling export-oriented-transformed-domestic-market-targeted goods. Let\'s go and see.
便民商店
biànmín shāngdiàn 
convenience shop
仓储销售商店
cānɡchǔ xiāoshòu shānɡdiàn 
cash-and-carry store
商店日夜服务，群众无不称便。
Shāngdiàn rìyè fúwù，qúnzhòng wúbùchēngbiàn。
Shops that stay open twenty-four hours a day are a great convenience to the public.
在这里建个百货商店，地点倒适中。
Zài zhèlǐ jiàn gè bǎihuò shāngdiàn，dìdiǎn dào shì zhōng。
This would be a suitable site for a new department store.
这个地段商店多。
Zhège dìduàn shāngdiàn duō。
There\'re quite a few shops in this area.
商店里各色货物，一应俱全。
Shāngdiàn lǐ gè sè huòwù，yìyīngjùquán。
The shop is well stocked with goods of all kinds.
咱们今天下午到城里逛去，看商店有什么东西卖。
Zánmen jīntiān xiàwǔ dào chénglǐ guàngqù，kàn shāngdiàn yǒu shénme dōngxi mài。
Let\'s just roam around the town this afternoon, looking in the shop windows.
把自行车放在委托商店里寄卖
bǎ zìxíngchē fàngzài wěituō shāngdiàn lǐ jìmài 
put a bicycle on sale in a secondhand shop
三家商店
sān jiā shāngdiàn 
three shops
这个商店每天有好几千元的进出。
Zhège shāngdiàn měitiān yǒu hǎo jǐ qiān yuán de jìnchū。
This store has a daily turnover of several thousand yuan.
这家商店进了一批货。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jìn le yì pī huò。
The shop laid in a new stock of goods.
这家农村商店经售邮票。
Zhèjiā nóngcūn shāngdiàn jīngshòu yóupiào。
The village shop sells postage stamps.
这家商店净坑人。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jìngkēngrén。
That store is a racket.
学校邻近有商店。
Xuéxiào línjìn yǒu shāngdiàn。
There\'s a shop in the vicinity of the school.
我跑了好几家商店，才找到那种扳手。
Wǒ pǎo le hǎo jǐjiā shāngdiàn，cái zhǎodào nà zhǒng bānshǒu。
I had to run around to several shops to get that wrench.
这家商店经常欺诈顾客。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jīngchángqīzhà gùkè。
This shop often swindles customers.
这商店虽然小，货物却很齐全。
Zhè shāngdiàn suīrán xiǎo，huòwù què hěn qíquán。
This store, though small, has a satisfactory variety of goods.
一家门面气派的商店
yìjiā ménmiàn qìpài de shāngdiàn
a store that has an imposing facade
商店里很热闹，已经有过年的气象了。
Shāngdiàn lǐ hěn rènào，yǐjing yǒu guònián de qì xiàng le。
The shops are very lively. They already have a New Year atmosphere.
这个商店来了一批新式毛衣，一上午就被抢购一空。
Zhège shāngdiàn lái le yì pī xīnshì máoyī，yí shàngwǔ jiù bèi qiǎnggòu yìkōng。
The store received a shipment of new-style sweaters, which were all sold out in one morning.
把商店抢劫一空
bǎ shāngdiàn qiǎngjiéyìkōng
ransack a store
这商店虽小，货物倒是很全乎。
Zhè shāngdiàn suī xiǎo，huòwù dàoshì hěn quánhu。
Small as it is, the store has a wide assortment of goods.
今天星期天，商店里人很多。
Jīntiān xīngqītiān，shāngdiàn lǐ rén hěn duō。
Today is Sunday. The stores are full of people.
百货商店有很多童装可供挑选。
Bǎihuòshāngdiàn yǒu hěnduō tóngzhuāng kěgōngtiāoxuǎn。
The department store has a large selection of children\'s clothes.
这鞋如果不合适，商店管退钱。
Zhè xié rúguǒ bùhéshì，shāngdiàn guǎn tuìqián。
If the shoes do not wear well, the shop will refund your money.
剧场在商店的西面。
Jùchǎngzài shāngdiàn de xīmian。
The theatre is to the west of the store.
商店虽小，各样货物俱全。
Shāngdiàn suī xiǎo，gè yànghuòwù jùquán。
Small as it is, the shop stocks all kinds of wares.
商店上午九时开始营业。
Shāngdiàn shàngwǔ jiǔ shí kāishǐ yíngyè。
The shops open at nine in the morning.
这是一家卖箔材的商店。
Zhè shì yìjiā mài bócái de shāngdiàn。
This is a shop that sells materials such as aluminium foil, and tin foil.
他从商店买回来了不干胶。
Tā cóng shāngdiàn mǎihuílái le bùgānjiāo。
He bought some adhesive tape from the store.
这是一家专门经营布艺的商店。
Zhè shì yìjiā zhuānmén jīngyíng bùyì de shāngdiàn。
This shop specializes in dealing with cloth processing.
这个特色商店主要经营茶叶食品。
Zhège tèsè shāngdiàn zhǔyào jīngyíng cháyè shípǐn。
This specialty shop mainly sells food with tea flavor.
这个商店唱付唱收，井然有序。
Zhège shāngdiàn chàngfù chàngshōu，jǐngrán yǒuxù。
This shop is in good order, calling out all the received and paid money.
我们商店一定要秤平斗满，诚信经营。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn yídìng yào chèngpíng dǒumǎn，chéngxìn jīngyíng。
We don\'t cheat customers, and we run the store sincerely.
这家商店是磁器专卖店。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn shì cíqì zhuānmàidiàn。
This shop is an exclusive porcelain shop.
你去商店打点油吧。
Nǐ qù shāngdiàn dǎ diǎn yóu ba。
You will go to buy some oil, won\'t you?
他开着车为各百货商店供货。
Tā kāi zhe chē wèi gè bǎihuò shāngdiàn gōnghuò。
He delivers goods for all the department stores by car.
这家商店的后边有一家银行。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn de hòubiān yǒu yìjiā yínháng。
There is a bank behind the shop.
这家商店出售花秧，可以自己买回家种植。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn chūshòu huāyāng，kěyǐ zìjǐ mǎi huíjiā zhòngzhí。
This store sells flower seedlings. We can buy some, and plant them by ourselves in our home.
商店里出售着各式各样的健美裤。
Shāngdiàn lǐ chūshòu zhe gè shì gè yàng de jiànměikù。
The shop sells all kinds of form-fitting pants.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn de kùfáng lǐ jīyā zhe dàliàng lěngmén huò，zhèng zhǔnbèi jiàngjià xiāoshòu。
In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
爸爸从商店买了一双名牌溜冰鞋给她。
Bàba cóng shāngdiàn mǎi le yìshuāng míngpái liūbīngxié gěi tā。
Father bought her a pair of famous brand skates in a store.
她从商店买来了炉具，准备在这过冬。
Tā cóng shāngdiàn mǎilái le lújù，zhǔnbèi zài zhè guòdōng。
She bought a cooker from the store, planning to live here for the winter.
我从商店买了几盒录音带。
Wǒ cóng shāngdiàn mǎi le jǐ hé lùyīndài。
I bought several magnetic tapes from the store.
我从五金商店买来了螺丝刀。
Wǒ cóng wǔjīn shāngdiàn mǎilái le luósīdāo。
I bought a screwdriver from a hardware store.
这家军用品商店经国家批准可出售骑枪。
Zhèjiā jūnyòngpǐn shāngdiàn jīng guójiā pīzhǔn kě chūshòu qíqiāng。
The military supplies store is approved by the government to sell cabin guns.
这条街上光专营汽配的商店就不下10家。
Zhè tiáo jiē shàng guāng zhuānyíng qìpèi de shāngdiàn jiù búxià shíjiā。
There are no less than 10 automotive parts shops in the street.
街口拐角处新开了一家专卖西裤的商店。
Jiēkǒu guǎijiǎochù xīnkāi le yìjiā zhuānmài xīkù de shāngdiàn。
A shop that sells western style trousers just opened on the street corner.
你这双运动袜是从哪家商店买的？
Nǐ zhè shuāng yùndòngwà shì cóng nǎ jiā shāngdiàn mǎi de？
Where did you buy this pair of sports socks?
商店里各式各样的游泳衣琳琅满目。
Shāngdiàn lǐ gè shì gè yàng de yóuyǒngyī línláng mǎnmù。
There are various kinds of swimming suits at the shop.
百货商店
bǎihuòshāngdiàn
department store
步行街两侧是大大小小的商店。
Bùxíngjiē liǎngcè shì dàdàxiǎoxiǎode shāngdiàn。

这家商店离学校近，加以价格便宜，所以顾客很多。

This shop is close to campus, and it\'s also cheap, so there are a lot of customers.

the manager of the brand\'s concession at Selfridges in London

她在商店买了一个新钱包。

就是银行左侧的那家商店。

去趟商店，买些牛奶回来。

这个商店销售该工厂制作的等外品。

我得去商店里买点儿牛奶。

那个商店搞了次促销，我半价买了点儿吃的东西。

我让这家商店为我把这双鞋预留到今天下午。

明天下班后，我要顺便去趟商店。

我已经对比了所有商店的价格，这里是最便宜的。

I\'m a regular customer of this store.
我是这家商店的常客。
The store is delivering her computer on Monday.
这家商店周一时会把她的电脑送过来。

Many shops won\'t accept checks unless you have a check card with you.
很多商店不接受支票，但有支票保证卡就另当别论。
New research from Boston University finds that 86 percent of adults carry a store loyalty card and use it, even though cards give stores the right to track consumer purchases.
波士顿大学的最新研究显示，虽然使用会员卡会让商家能追踪到消费者的购物习惯，但还是有高达86%的成年人持有并使用某家商店的会员卡。
Pre-paid phone cards are sold in convenient places, such as newsstands, post offices, and stores.
很多地方都有卖电话卡的，比如报亭、邮局还有商店。
In this cash &amp; carry store you can find many kinds of products.
这个现款取货商店有很多种产品。
The minimum purchase value in Cash &amp; Carry store is $50.

The barber shop is at the corner of the street, near to my home.
这个理发店的生意不错，原因是师傅的手艺好。
Zhège lǐfàdiàn de shēngyì búcuò，yuányīn shì shīfu de shǒuyì hǎo。
The business of the hairdressing salon is quite good due to the skill of the stylists techniques.
Blake got his beard trimmed at the barber.
布莱克在理发店修了胡子。
He joined a barbershop quartet.

他加入了理发店四重唱。

Wǒ zài nàjiā fàndiàn dāi le sāngè wǎnshàng。
I stayed three nights at that hotel.
本店只此一家，别无分号。
Běndiàn zhǐcǐyìjiā，biéwú fēnhào。
Our shop is the only one bearing the name; there are no branches.
三家商店
sān jiā shāngdiàn 
three shops
这家商店进了一批货。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jìn le yì pī huò。
The shop laid in a new stock of goods.
这家商店净坑人。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jìngkēngrén。
That store is a racket.
我跑了好几家商店，才找到那种扳手。
Wǒ pǎo le hǎo jǐjiā shāngdiàn，cái zhǎodào nà zhǒng bānshǒu。
I had to run around to several shops to get that wrench.
这家商店经常欺诈顾客。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jīngchángqīzhà gùkè。
This shop often swindles customers.
那家饭店真是敲竹杠！
Nà jiā fàndiàn zhēn shì qiāo zhúgàng！
They really fleeced us at that hotel!
这家小店薄利多销，有不少的回头客。

This shop features small profits but quick turnover and has many loyal clients.
这家书店陈售的书籍种类齐全。
Zhèjiā shūdiàn chénshòu de shūjí zhǒng lèi qíquán。
The book store sells all kinds of books.
这家商店是磁器专卖店。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn shì cíqì zhuānmàidiàn。
This shop is an exclusive porcelain shop.
父亲死后，他成了这家旅店的店东。
Fùqīn sǐ hòu，tā chéng le zhè jiā lǚdiàn de diàndōng。
He became the owner of this shop after his father\'s death.
为了招徕生意，这家饭店重新装修了店面。
Wèile zhāolái shēngyì，zhè jiā fàndiàn chóngxīn zhuāngxiū le diànmiàn。
In order to boost business, this restaurant renovated its appearance.
这条小巷的东头有一家药店。

There is a medicine store at the east end of the lane.

The hotel has been renamed.

The small shop is going to change to a new business.

这家饭店的装饰反璞归真，很有特色。

Zhèjiā fàndiàn de huáliūyúwán zuò de hěnhǎo chī。

这家饭店做的醪糟鸡蛋味道很好。

kāishè diànpù
set up a store
那家新粮店开张了。
Nà jiā xīn liángdiàn kāizhāng le。
The new grain store has opened for business.
这家商店净坑人。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jìngkēngrén。
That store is a racket.
本店设有快修部，立等可取。
Běndiàn shèyǒu kuàixiūbù，lìděngkěqǔ。
We have a quick repair service where repairs can be done on the spot.
学校邻近有商店。
Xuéxiào línjìn yǒu shāngdiàn。
There\'s a shop in the vicinity of the school.
在客店落脚
zài kèdiàn luòjiǎo 
put up at an inn
这家店铺门面很大。
Zhèjiā diànpù ménmiàan hěn dà。
The shop puts on a very prosperous front.
那些饭店都是最近几年盖的。
Nàxiē fàndiàn dōushì zuìjìn jǐnián gài de。
Those hotels were all built in recent years.
我跑了好几家商店，才找到那种扳手。
Wǒ pǎo le hǎo jǐjiā shāngdiàn，cái zhǎodào nà zhǒng bānshǒu。
I had to run around to several shops to get that wrench.
这家商店经常欺诈顾客。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn jīngchángqīzhà gùkè。
This shop often swindles customers.
这商店虽然小，货物却很齐全。
Zhè shāngdiàn suīrán xiǎo，huòwù què hěn qíquán。
This store, though small, has a satisfactory variety of goods.
一家门面气派的商店
yìjiā ménmiàn qìpài de shāngdiàn
a store that has an imposing facade
商店里很热闹，已经有过年的气象了。
Shāngdiàn lǐ hěn rènào，yǐjing yǒu guònián de qì xiàng le。
The shops are very lively. They already have a New Year atmosphere.
汽车旅店
qìchē lǚdiàn
motor hotel; motel
这个商店来了一批新式毛衣，一上午就被抢购一空。
Zhège shāngdiàn lái le yì pī xīnshì máoyī，yí shàngwǔ jiù bèi qiǎnggòu yìkōng。
The store received a shipment of new-style sweaters, which were all sold out in one morning.
把商店抢劫一空
bǎ shāngdiàn qiǎngjiéyìkōng
ransack a store
那家饭店真是敲竹杠！
Nà jiā fàndiàn zhēn shì qiāo zhúgàng！
They really fleeced us at that hotel!
这商店虽小，货物倒是很全乎。
Zhè shāngdiàn suī xiǎo，huòwù dàoshì hěn quánhu。
Small as it is, the store has a wide assortment of goods.
今天星期天，商店里人很多。
Jīntiān xīngqītiān，shāngdiàn lǐ rén hěn duō。
Today is Sunday. The stores are full of people.
你上书店的话，捎带给我买张世界地图。
Nǐ shàngshūdiàn de huà，shāodài gěi wǒ mǎi zhāngshìjiè dìtú。
If you happen to be going to the bookshop, please get me a map of the world.
购买我店家具，可以先付半数货款，赊欠部分在三个月内付清。
Gòumǎi wǒ diàn jiājù，kěyǐ xiān fù bànshù huòkuǎn，shēqiàn bùfen zài sāngè yuè nèi fùqīng。
You can always buy our furniture on credit if you can pay half the price now and the rest in three months.
当晚总经理设座国际饭店宴请外宾。
Dāngwǎn zǒngjīnglǐ shèzuò guójìfàndiàn yànqǐngwàibīn。
In the evening the General Manager gave a banquet at the International Hotel in honour of the foreign guests.
本店售价略低于时价。
Běndiàn shòujià lüèdīyú shíjià。
Our listed prices are slightly lower than the current prices.
糖果店
tángguǒ diàn
sweet shop; candy store; confectionery
百货商店有很多童装可供挑选。
Bǎihuòshāngdiàn yǒu hěnduō tóngzhuāng kěgōngtiāoxuǎn。
The department store has a large selection of children\'s clothes.
这鞋如果不合适，商店管退钱。
Zhè xié rúguǒ bùhéshì，shāngdiàn guǎn tuìqián。
If the shoes do not wear well, the shop will refund your money.
玩具店
wánjùdiàn 
toyshop
五金店
wǔjīndiàn 
hardware store
剧场在商店的西面。
Jùchǎngzài shāngdiàn de xīmian。
The theatre is to the west of the store.
下榻于新侨饭店
xiàtà yú Xīnqiáo Fàndiàn
stay at the Xinqiao Hotel
小店
xiǎodiàn
my store
商店虽小，各样货物俱全。
Shāngdiàn suī xiǎo，gè yànghuòwù jùquán。
Small as it is, the shop stocks all kinds of wares.
商店上午九时开始营业。
Shāngdiàn shàngwǔ jiǔ shí kāishǐ yíngyè。
The shops open at nine in the morning.
本店早市供应豆浆。
Běndiàn zǎoshì gōngyìng dòujiāng。
We sell soya-bean milk in the morning.
饭店着火，旅客炸了窝。
Fàndiàn zháohuǒ，lǚkè zhà le wō。
The guests stampeded out of the burning hotel.
支店
zhīdiàn 
branch store
钟表店
zhōnɡbiǎodiàn 
watchmaker\'s shop
珠宝店
zhūbǎodiàn 
a jeweller\'s (shop)
这付药他跑了好几家店才配好。
Zhèfùyào tā pǎole hǎojǐjiādiàn cái pèihǎo。
本店出售优质香精。
Běn diàn chūshòu yōuzhì xiāngjīng．
欢迎您再次惠顾本店。
Huānyíng nín zài cì huígù běndiàn．
这家饭店很好找，出了我家胡同的把口儿就是。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn hěnhǎo zhǎo，chū le wǒjiā hútòng de bǎkǒur jiù shì。
Finding the restaurant is easy. It is right outside my hutong.
我想电话包席，可饭店那边一直占线。
Wǒ xiǎng diànhuà bāoxí，kě fàndiàn nàbiān yìzhí zhànxiàn。
I wanted to book at that restaurant, but the line was always busy.
我已经在饭店订了两卓包席。
Wǒ yǐjing zài fàndiàn dìng le liǎng zhuō bāoxí。
I\'ve already booked two tables at the restaurant.
店员已经去备货了。
Diànyuán yǐjing qù bèihuò le。
The shop assistant has gone to prepare the goods.
备货不足是我们店里工作的失误。
Bèihuò bùzú shì wǒmen diànlǐ gōngzuò de shīwù。
The shortage of goods is due to the negligence of our staff.
他在乐器店看上了一个做工精细的筚篥。
Tā zài yuèqìdiàn kànshàng le yígè zuògōng jīngxì de bìlì。
He took a fancy to a nice Tartar pipe in a musical instrument shop.
他从五金店买了一个扁锉。
Tā cóng wǔjīndiàn mǎi le yígè biǎncuò。
He bought a flat file from the hardware store.
书店里，名人秉笔签名售书。
Shūdiàn lǐ,míngrén bǐngbǐ qiānmíng shòushū.
A celebrity is signing, and selling his book at the bookstore.
这是一家卖箔材的商店。
Zhè shì yìjiā mài bócái de shāngdiàn。
This is a shop that sells materials such as aluminium foil, and tin foil.
这家小店薄利多销，有不少的回头客。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn bólì duōxiāo，yǒu bùshǎo de huítóukè。
This shop features small profits but quick turnover and has many loyal clients.
他朋友从药店为他买来了补酒。
Tā péngyou cóng yàodiàn wèi tā mǎilái le bǔjiǔ。
His friend bought him some tonic alcohol at the drugstore.
他从商店买回来了不干胶。
Tā cóng shāngdiàn mǎihuílái le bùgānjiāo。
He bought some adhesive tape from the store.
这是一家专门经营布艺的商店。
Zhè shì yìjiā zhuānmén jīngyíng bùyì de shāngdiàn。
This shop specializes in dealing with cloth processing.
这家裁缝店师傅的手艺很好，所以有很多人愿意到这里裁制衣服。
Zhèjiā cáiféngdiàn shīfu de shǒuyì hěnhǎo，suǒyǐ yǒu hěnduōrén yuànyì dào zhèlǐ cáizhì yīfu。
The tailor’s wonderful skills attracted a lot of customers.
这家店用了太多彩饰，显得色彩过多，有些繁琐。
Zhèjiā diàn yòng le tài duō cǎishì，xiǎnde sècǎi guòduō，yǒuxiē fánsuǒ。
This shop uses too many colorful decorations, which makes it look kind of fussy.
我们饭店正在招聘菜案师傅。
Wǒmen fàndiàn zhèngzài zhāopìn càiàn shīfu。
Our restaurant is recruiting new chefs.
小区里新开的菜店方便了大家买菜。
Xiǎoqū lǐ xīnkāi de càidiàn fāngbiàn le dàjiā mǎicài。
This new green grocer’s provides us with a lot of convenience.
这家店专门出售菜秧。
Zhèjiā diàn zhuānmén chūshòu càiyāng。
This store specializes in selling vegetable seedling.
春节期间很多饭店都推出了送餐券的优惠活动。
Chūnjié qījiān hěnduō fàndiàn dōu tuīchū le sòngcānquàn de yōuhuì huódòng。
During the period of Spring Festival, many restaurants gave out coupons to attract customers.
这个特色商店主要经营茶叶食品。
Zhège tèsè shāngdiàn zhǔyào jīngyíng cháyè shípǐn。
This specialty shop mainly sells food with tea flavor.
他的新店开张后，一直是生意昌隆。
Tā de xīn diàn kāizhāng hòu，yìzhí shì shēngyì chānglóng。
Business has been brisk since his new shop opened.
今天去药店，她买了一些家庭的常备药品。
Jīntiān qù yàodiàn，tā mǎi le yìxiē jiātíng de chángbèi yàopǐn。
She went to a drugstore and bought some stock medicines for her family.
这个商店唱付唱收，井然有序。
Zhège shāngdiàn chàngfù chàngshōu，jǐngrán yǒuxù。
This shop is in good order, calling out all the received and paid money.
他在饭店买了一盘鸡蛋炒饭。
Tā zài fàndiàn mǎi le yì pán jīdàn chǎofàn。
He bought a plate of fried rice with scrambled eggs from the restaurant.
今天看来赶不到县城了，就找个车马店过夜吧。
Jīntiān kànlái gǎnbúdào xiànchéng le，jiù zhǎo gè chēmǎdiàn guòyè ba。
这家书店陈售的书籍种类齐全。
Zhèjiā shūdiàn chénshòu de shūjí zhǒng lèi qíquán。
The book store sells all kinds of books.
经过成本核算，他的饭店今年赚钱不多。
Jīngguò chéngběn hésuàn，tā de fàndiàn jīnnián zhuànqián bùduō。
His restaurant recorded little profit this year, after accounting for his expenses.
我们商店一定要秤平斗满，诚信经营。
Wǒmen shāngdiàn yídìng yào chèngpíng dǒumǎn，chéngxìn jīngyíng。
We don\'t cheat customers, and we run the store sincerely.
今天的吃主儿坐满了饭店。
Jīntiān de chīzhǔr zuòmǎn le fàndiàn。
Today, the restaurant is filled with of customers.
冲卷儿要到专业的冲印店，这样可以保证质量。
Chōngjuǎnr yào dào zhuānyè de chōngyìndiàn，zhèyàng kěyǐ bǎozhèng zhìliàng。
Film should be developed in darkrooms to ensure their quality.
这家店就可以冲扩胶卷，不用去别的地方了。
Zhèjiā diàn jiù kěyǐ chōngkuò jiāojuǎn，búyòng qù bié de dìfāng le。
This shop can both develop photos and enlarge prints.  You don’t need to go to another shop.
出号的鞋子真是不好买，转了好多店也没找到。
Chūhào de xiézi zhēnshì bùhǎomǎi，zhuàn le hǎoduōdiàn yě méi zhǎodào。
It is really difficult to find shoes in size XXL, I have visited several shops and still can\'t find a single pair.
那个商店专门经营出口转内销的商品，我们一起去看看吧。
Nàge shāngdiàn zhuānmén jīngyíng chūkǒu zhuǎn nèixiāo de shāngpǐn，wǒmen yìqǐ qù kànkàn ba。
That shop specializes in selling export-oriented-transformed-domestic-market-targeted goods. Let\'s go and see.
粮店今天出粜了五百斤大米。
Liángdiàn jīntiān chūtiào le wǔbǎi jīn dàmǐ。
The grain shop has sold 500 kilos of rice today.
我们饭店的生意越来越好，我看要请一些厨工了。
Wǒmen fàndiàn de shēngyì yuèláiyuè hǎo，wǒ kàn yào qǐng yìxiē chúgōng le。
Our restaurant is becoming increasingly successful, so we will have to hire more staff.
欢迎赐顾小店。
Huānyíng cìgù xiǎodiàn.
Welcome to our store.
本店专营打印台。
Běndiàn zhuānyíng dǎyìntái。
The shop only sells ink pads.
你去商店打点油吧。
Nǐ qù shāngdiàn dǎ diǎn yóu ba。
You will go to buy some oil, won\'t you?
这家店音像大全，我经常过去看。
Zhèjiā diàn yīn xiàng dàquán，wǒ jīngcháng guòqù kàn。
I always go to the audio and video shop because their collection is very comprehensive.
本店的当家菜是麻婆豆腐。
Běndiàn de dāngjiācài shì mápódòufu。
Ma Po\'s bean curd is a specialty in our restaurant.
花岗岩是本店经营的当家品种。
Huāgǎngyán shì běn diàn jīngyíng de dāngjiā pǐnzhǒng。
Granite is our shops\' main business.
商业街的两旁开满了各种店号。
Shāngyèjiē de liǎngpáng kāimǎn le gèzhǒng diànhào。
There are all kinds of shops on the two sides of this commercial street.
我吩咐店小二给我准备一间干净的客房。
Wǒ fēnfù diànxiǎoèr gěi wǒ zhǔnbèi yìjiān gānjìng de kèfáng。
I asked the clerk to prepare a clean guest room for me.
店主亲自为我们介绍这里的特色菜肴。
Diànzhǔ qīnzì wèi wǒmen jièshào zhèlǐ de tèsè càiyáo。
The restaurant owner himself introduced to us their specialties.
经常有刁恶的人来店里无理取闹。
Jīngcháng yǒu diāoè de rén lái diàn lǐ wúlǐ qǔnào。
Cunning and vicious people often come to the shop to provoke unwarranted trouble.
这条小巷的东头有一家药店。
Zhè tiáo xiǎo xiàng de dōngtóu yǒu yìjiā yàodiàn。
There is a medicine store at the east end of the lane.
这家旅店的房费不算高，“标准间”每晚才70元。
Zhèjiā lǚdiàn de fángfèi bú suàn gāo，“biāozhǔnjiān”měi wǎn cái qīshíyuán。
The standard room in this hotel costs only 70 yuan per night, which is not very expensive.
现在不少酒店已经推出了分餐服务。
Xiànzài bùshǎo jiǔdiàn yǐjing tuīchū le fēncān fúwù。
Many hotels provide individual meal service.
这家便利店正在装修，预计下个月复市。
Zhèjiā biànlìdiàn zhèngzài zhuāngxiū，yùjì xià gè yuè fùshì。
The convenience store is being fitted up, it\'s estimated that it will start business next month.
这家快餐店的盖浇饭品种最全。
Zhèjiā kuàicāndiàn de gàijiāofàn pǐnzhǒng zuì quán。
The restaurant has many varieties of rice served with meat and vegetables on top.
这儿要盖一栋高层酒店。
Zhèr yào gài yí dòng gāocéng jiǔdiàn。
A high-rise hotel is going to be built here.
这家店里，各样的小食品都有。
Zhèjiā diàn lǐ，gèyàng de xiǎoshípǐn dōuyǒu。
The store sells various kinds of snacks.
这家酒店现已更名。
Zhèjiā jiǔdiàn xiàn yǐ gēngmíng。
The hotel has been renamed.
这家小店将要改弦更张，做别的买卖。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn jiāngyào gǎixián gēngzhāng，zuò bié de mǎimai。
The small shop is going to change to a new business.
他开着车为各百货商店供货。
Tā kāi zhe chē wèi gè bǎihuò shāngdiàn gōnghuò。
He delivers goods for all the department stores by car.
一座现代化写字楼矗立在这家书店的故址上。
Yízuò xiàndàihuà xiězìlóu chùlìzài zhèjiā shūdiàn de gùzhǐ shàng。
A modern office building is standing on the site of the old bookstore.
这家门饰店中有许多款式别致的门窗挂件。
Zhèjiā ménshìdiàn zhōng yǒu xǔduō kuǎnshì biézhì de ménchuāng guàjiàn。
There are various kinds of unique window decorations in this decoration store.
这家饭店的装饰反璞归真，很有特色。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn de zhuāngshì fǎnpú guīzhēn，hěnyǒu tèsè。
The pure and simple style of this restaurant\'s decoration is really unique.
天下何啻这一家店，你还是再去别处转转。
Tiānxià héchì zhè yìjiā diàn，nǐ háishi zài qù biéchù zhuànzhuàn。
There are far more shops. You\'d better go somewhere else.
海鲜店里有河蚌出售。
Hǎixiāndiàn lǐ yǒu hébàng chūshòu。
Clams are sold in a seafood shop.
这家商店的后边有一家银行。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn de hòubiān yǒu yìjiā yínháng。
There is a bank behind the shop.
这家商店出售花秧，可以自己买回家种植。
Zhèjiā shāngdiàn chūshòu huāyāng，kěyǐ zìjǐ mǎi huíjiā zhòngzhí。
This store sells flower seedlings. We can buy some, and plant them by ourselves in our home.
这家饭店的滑熘鱼丸做的很好吃。
Zhèjiā fàndiàn de huáliūyúwán zuò de hěnhǎo chī。
The fried fish balls made by this hotel taste good.
街头那家小吃店的烩饼味道很不错。
Jiētóu nàjiā xiǎochīdiàn de huìbǐng wèidào hěnbúcuò。
Braised cakes from that street restaurant are very delicious.
他们把婚宴的地址定在了本市最豪华的酒店。
Tāmen bǎ hūnyàn de dìzhǐ dìngzài le běn shì zuì háohuá de jiǔdiàn。
They decided on the most luxurious hotel in the city to hold their wedding reception.
这个蛋糕店还兼营奶茶，冰淇淋，生意很好。
Zhège dàngāodiàn hái jiānyíng nǎichá，bīngqílín，shēngyì hěnhǎo。
The cake shop has a sideline in selling milk tea and ice cream, which makes a good profit.
理发店组织一些发型师为老人免费剪发。
Lǐfàdiàn zǔzhī yìxiē fàxíngshī wèi lǎorén miǎnfèi jiǎnfà。
The barber shop sends a few barbers to cut the hair of old people for free.
商店的所有商品在进行贱卖，价格十分低廉。
Shāngdiàn de suǒyǒu shāngpǐn zài jìnxíng jiànmài，jiàgé shífēn dīlián。
All the goods in the store are on sale, the prices are really cheap.
商店里出售着各式各样的健美裤。
Shāngdiàn lǐ chūshòu zhe gè shì gè yàng de jiànměikù。
The shop sells all kinds of form-fitting pants.
这家工艺品店卖的角雕很精美。
Zhèjiā gōngyìpǐndiàn mài de jiǎodiāo hěnjīngměi。
The horn carvings sold at the craftwork shop are very delicate.
这家小店的老板，每次都按时主动缴税。
Zhèjiā xiǎodiàn de lǎobǎn，měi cì dōu ànshí zhǔdòng jiǎoshuì。
The owner of the small shop always pays taxes punctually on his own initiative.
这家美工店的服务很好，每天都不少接活儿。
Zhèjiā měigōngdiàn de fúwù hěnhǎo，měitiān dōu bùshǎo jiēhuór。
This art design shop offers good services and draws many customers every day.
那家理发店就在街角处，离我家很近。

The barber shop is at the corner of the street, near to my home.

Wǒ zài jīndiàn mǎi le yígè jièzhǐ。

这家精品店的服装卖得很贵。

这家百年老字号的烤鸭店久负盛名。

Tīngshuō yúxíng zhuāngshìwù kěyǐ jùcái，tā jiù zài zìjǐ de diàn lǐ guà le yígè jíxiángyú。
It is said that displaying can help collect money, so she hangs an auspicious fish in her own store.
他为自己的店门装配上了自动的卷帘门。

He has installed an automatic rolling door in his own store.
跑了几家店，他总算买到了可意的电脑。

He finally bought a satisfying computer after looking in several shops.
她自己创业开了一家刻印店。
Tā zìjǐ chuàngyè kāi le yìjiā kèyìndiàn。
She started an engraving seal store.

他从来没时间自己做午饭，总是叫快餐店里的外卖。

He has never cooked lunch himself and always takes out from a fast-food restaurant.
店里的苹果已经亏短了，需要补货！

这家店一直亏折，生意实在是做不下去了！

This shop has been running a deficit and can hardly continue with its business.

这家店是老板娘做主，老板只是表面应酬。

他开了一个冷荤菜小店，由于物美价廉，生意很红火。

He has opened a store selling cold meet. Because the food is cheap and good, the business is prosperous.
我们商店的库房里积压着大量冷门货，正准备降价销售。

In our depot, there overstocks a lot of outdated goods. We are preparing to sell them at a lowered price.
这个理发店的生意不错，原因是师傅的手艺好。

The business of the hairdressing salon is quite good due to the skill of the stylists techniques.
这是家老字号的小吃店，真是历久不衰，现在都还在营业。

This is an old snack bar. It has prospered through time, and is still in operation.
因为时间仓促，我饭店聊备一间会议室先供你们使用。

她从商店买来了炉具，准备在这过冬。

我店的宗旨就是诚信经营，童叟无欺。

街角那家店里卖的香干儿是我们这里最有名的。

他想上网开店续念已久，今天终于如愿了。

这饭店太宰人了，东西又贵又难吃。

Today\'s chef is the chief chef at a five-star hotel.
他从厨师学校毕业后进入一家三星级酒店作了掌灶。

After graduating from a cooking school, he became the chef at a three-star hotel.
本店清仓处理中低档皮具。
Běndiàn qīngcāng chǔlǐ zhōngdīdàng píjù。

她去中药店买药了，您找她有事吗？
Tā qù zhōng yàodiàn mǎi yào le，nín zhǎo tā yǒu shì ma？
She has gone to the Chinese pharmacy to buy medicines. Is there anything she can get for you?
我今天在书店买了一本《论语注疏》。
Wǒ jīntiān zài shūdiàn mǎi le yìběn《Lúnyǔzhùshū》。
I bought &quot;Commentary and Subcommentary on The Analects of Confucius&quot; today at a bookstore.
现在许多酒店都流行办自助餐晚宴。

At present, it is popular among hotels to hold buffet dinner parties.
普通人住不起五星级饭店的总统套房。
Pǔtōngrén zhù bùqǐ wǔxīngjí fàndiàn de zǒngtǒng tàofáng。
Common people can\'t afford the presidential suite in five-star hotels.
药店为了提高知名度，请来了大名鼎鼎的中医教授坐堂。

In order to enhance its popularity, the drugstore invited a famous professor of Chinese medicine to practice medicine there.

在网络上发表言论，同样不能超出相应的边限。
Zài wǎngluò shàng fābiǎo yánlùn，tóngyàng bùnéng chāochū xiāngyìng de biānxiàn。
When making comments on the internet, one should not go beyond its corresponding boundary.
他是著名的网络炒手。
Tā shì zhùmíng de wǎngluò chǎoshǒu。
He is a famous internet hyper.
我们应当科学规划，建设合理的城市网络。
Wǒmen yīngdāng kēxué guīhuà，jiànshè hélǐ de chéngshì wǎngluò。
We should plan scientifically, and establish a proper city network.
为了避免网络拥堵，我们最好错时上网。
Wèile bìmiǎn wǎngluò yōngdǔ，wǒmen zuìhǎo cuòshí shàngwǎng。
In order to avoid pressure on the Internet, we\'d better stagger our Internet surfing times.
他在网络聊天室里大放阙辞。
Tā zài wǎngluò liáotiānshì lǐ dàfàng quēcí。
He made absurd statements in the internet chat room.
虽然现在的网络通讯极为方便，她依然喜欢那份飞鸿传情的感觉。
Suīrán xiànzài de wǎngluò tōngxùn jí wéi fāngbiàn，tā yīrán xǐhuan nà fèn fēihóng chuánqíng de gǎnjué。
Though communication has been made easier by the development of the internet, she still likes the feeling of receiving handwritten love letters.
博客热已经成为网络时代新的风向标。
Bókèrè yǐjing chéngwéi wǎngluò shídài xīn de fēngxiàngbiāo。
The prevalence of blogs has become the new weather vane of the internet age.
网络广告不仅价格相对低廉，而且覆盖面广。
Wǎngluò guǎnggào bùjǐn jiàgé xiāngduì dīlián，érqiě fùgàimiàn guǎng。
Advertising through the internet has a lower price and wider coverage.
网络动画大有搞头。
Wǎngluò dònghuà dàyǒu gǎotóu。
Internet cartoons are worth drawing.
请留下联络方式，我亟盼您能赐教。
Qǐng liúxià liánluò fāngshì，wǒ jípàn nín néng cìjiào。
Would you please tell me how I can get in touch with you? I am eager to hear your instructions.
中医认为筋络不通人就容易生病。
Zhōngyī rènwéi jīnluò bùtōng rén jiù róngyì shēngbìng。
According to traditional Chinese medicine, one gets sick if his veins get blocked.
他这病是由于经络不通造成的。
Tā zhè bìng shì yóuyú jīngluò bùtōng zàochéng de。
He got sick because his primary and collateral channels are blocked.
橘络对人体健康非常有益。
Júluò duì réntǐ jiànkāng fēicháng yǒuyì。
Tangerine pith is good for one\'s health.
用这个络子装这些东西吧，大小差不多。
Yòng zhège luòzi zhuāng zhèxiē dōngxi ba，dàxiǎo chàbuduō。
Use this net to load these things. The size is fit.
这个络子坏了，线总缠死到里面，你拿去修修吧。
Zhège luòzi huài le，xiàn zǒng chánsǐ dào lǐmian，nǐ náqù xiūxiū ba。
This spindle is broken. The thread always tangles there. Please have it repaired.
上级派来的联络员已经在等候我们了。
Shàngjí pàilái de liánluòyuán yǐjing zài děnghòu wǒmen le。
The connector sent by the higher-up is already waiting for us.
根据络脉的脉象来看，他身体很好。
Gēnjù luòmài de mài xiàng láikàn，tā shēntǐ hěnhǎo。
From the pulse condition of his collaterals, he is very well.
他讲话结束后，掌声络绎不绝。
Tā jiǎnghuà jiéshù hòu，zhǎngshēng luòyìbùjué。
After his speech, applause went on endlessly.
今天是他的婚礼，他家门庭若市，来往宾客络绎不绝。
Jīntiān shì tā de hūnlǐ，tā jiā méntíngruòshì，láiwǎng bīnkè luòyìbùjué。
Today is his wedding. Many people are streaming to his house.
搜索引擎是按照关键词来排检相关信息的网络技术。
Sōusuǒ yǐnqíng shì ànzhào guānjiàncí lái páijiǎn xiāngguān xìnxī de wǎngluò jìshù。
A search engine is an internet technology which arranges and searches for related information according to key words.
输电网络都是由政府投资统建的。

Transmission networks are all built in a unified way by the government.

The leader of a local army acted as an organizer, communicator, fund-raiser, and rule-maker.
由于沉迷于网络游戏，他养成了晚睡晚起的顽习。
Yóuyú chénmí yú wǎngluò yóuxì，tā yǎngchéng le wǎnshuì wǎnqǐ de wánxí。
Indulging in on-line games, he got into the inveterate habit of sleeping late at night and getting up late in the morning.
网络经济的发展带动了这个国家国民经济的发展。
Wǎngluò jīngjì de fāzhǎn dàidòng le zhège guójiā guómínjīngjì de fāzhǎn。
The development of the cyber-economy has promoted this country\'s national economy.
《无尽的任务》是时下流行的一个网络游戏。
《Wújìn de rènwù》shì shíxià liúxíng de yígè wǎngluò yóuxì。
&quot;The Endless Task&quot; is a current internet game that is very popular.
虽然老师劝过他无数次，他对网络游戏的热衷却丝毫未消减。
Suīrán lǎoshī quàn guò tā wúshù cì，tā duì wǎngluò yóuxì de rè zhōng què sīháo wèi xiāojiǎn。
Though criticized by the teacher many times, he is still obsessed with internet games.

Wǎngluò zuòjiā de xùgǎo dàjiā dōu bùxiǎng kàn le。
No one wants to read sequels written by web-writers.
他们根据网络的评论，选编了一部散文集。

红缨枪的缨络垂了下来，挡住了她的视线。
Hóngyīngqiāng de yīngluò chuí le xiàlái，dǎngzhù le tā de shìxiàn。

由于网络的中继线出了问题，造成数据通信不畅，技术人员正在抢修。

He was immersed in his recollection of the past and forgot about my existence.

The lives of the stars has long been an interest of entertainment journalists and fans.

Dōngfāngrén pǔbiàn zhuīqiú yìzhǒng hánxù de měi。
Generally speaking, oriental people look for a more implicit beauty.
久居城市的人们都喜欢到乡村度假，就是为了追寻反璞归真的乐趣。
Jiǔjū chéngshì de rénmen dōu xǐhuan dào xiāngcūn dùjià，jiùshì wèi le zhuīxún fǎnpúguīzhēn de lèqù。
People living in the city like to spend their vacation in the countryside to pursue the pleasures of returning to nature.
我们应当把优秀的人物当成自己的榜样，奋起直追。
Wǒmen yīngdāng bǎ yōuxiù de rénwù dàngchéng zìjǐ de bǎngyàng，fènqǐ zhízhuī。
We should learn from the examples of excellent people and try to catch them up.
那些追名逐利的人，正是他这次批判的锋芒所向。
Nàxiē zhuīmíng zhúlì de rén，zhèngshì tā zhècì pīpàn de fēngmáng suǒ xiàng。
He is attacking those who strive for vanity and fame.
人类对真善美的追求，亘古不变。
Rénlèi duì zhēnshànměi de zhuīqiú，gèngǔ búbiàn。
People have never stopped the pursuit of truth, virtue and beauty since ancient times.
夸父追日是个古远的神话。
Kuāfù zhuīrì shì gè gǔyuǎn de shénhuà。
Kuafu\'s chasing after the sun is an ancient mythology.
他顾念旧情，没有追究这件事情。
Tā gùniàn jiùqíng，méiyǒu zhuījiū zhèjiàn shìqing。
Thinking about old friendships, he didn\'t investigate this matter.
李将军挥师南下，乘胜追击。
Lǐ jiāngjūn huīshī nánxià，chéngshèng zhuījī。
General Li led the army towards the south, chasing the enemy by exploiting a victory.
交警紧追不舍，终于将肇事司机抓获。
Jiāojǐng jǐnzhuī bùshě，zhōng yú jiāng zhàoshì sījī zhuāhuò。
The traffic police chased the driver who had caused the accident, and finally caught him.
这只郎猫一直在追逐那只美丽的白色母猫。
Zhèzhī lángmāo yìzhí zài zhuīzhú nàzhī měilì de báisè mǔmāo。
The tomcat has been chasing the beautiful white female cat.
她魔怔了似的，沉浸在了对往事的追忆之中。
Tā mózhēng le sì de，chénjìnzài le duì wǎngshì de zhuīyì zhī zhōng。
With abnormal behavior, she is immersed in the recalling of the past days.
对于当事人的民事责任，我们必须穷追到底。
Duìyú dāngshìrén de mínshì zérèn，wǒmen bìxū qióngzhuī dàodǐ。
We should search thoroughly for any civil liabilities of the client.
小猫对那只老鼠穷追不舍。
Xiǎomāo duì nàzhī lǎoshǔ qióngzhuībùshě。
The cat keeps on chasing after the mouse.
人家说不知道，你就不要再穷追不舍地问了。
Rénjiā shuō bùzhīdào，nǐ jiù búyào zài qióngzhuībùshě de wèn le。
When someone says he has no idea, you should not question him closely.
这件事情不要再追究了，你惹不起他。
Zhèjiàn shìqing búyào zài zhuījiū le，nǐ rě bùqǐ tā。
Don\'t persist in the matter, you can\'t afford to offend him.
为了追求真理，他不惜舍身求法。
Wèile zhuīqiú zhēnlǐ，tā bùxī shěshēn qiú fǎ。
He is willing to sacrifice himself for his pursuit of truth.
感情要随缘，不要为了想出国而刻意追求涉外婚姻。
Gǎnqíng yào suíyuán，bú yào wèi le xiǎng chūguó ér kèyì zhuīqiú shèwài hūnyīn。
Love is predestined by fate. Don\'t pursue a foreign marriage just because of your wish to go abroad.
他是一个执着的人，对于自己的追求矢志不渝。
Tā shì yígè zhízhuó de rén，duìyú zìjǐ de zhuīqiú shǐzhìbùyú。
He is a determined person, persistent in pursuit.
求取功名是一般士人最大的追求。
Qiúqǔ gōngmíng shì yìbān shìrén zuìdàde zhuīqiú。
Rank and name were the highest pursuits of general scholars.
裋褐也照样能够御寒，他在穿着方面并不追求奢华。
Shùhè yě zhàoyàng nénggòu yùhán，tā zài chuānzhuó fāngmiàn bìng bùzhuīqiú shēhuá。
Coarse clothes can also keep one warm, he is not extravagant in his dress.
他们的船已经顺流而下，我们很难追上。
Tāmen de chuán yǐjing shùnliú ér xià，wǒmen hěnnán zhuīshàng。
Their boat has moved down the river with a favorable current, so it\'s hard for us to catch up.
明星逸事成了娱乐记者和追星族们的谈资。
Míngxīng yìshì chéng le yúlè jìzhě hé zhuīxīngzúmen de tánzī。
The lives of the stars has long been an interest of entertainment journalists and fans.
我们要组织优势兵力、追击逃敌。
Wǒmen yào zǔzhī yōushì bīnglì、zhuījī táodí。
We must mobilize strong forces to pursue and attack the fleeing enemy.
同源的艺术往往有共同的审美追求。
Tóngyuán de yìshù wǎngwǎng yǒu gòngtóng de shěnměi zhuīqiú。
Arts with the same origin often share the same aesthetic aims.
年轻的时候她妍丽动人，追求她的人很多。
Niánqīng de shíhou tā yánlì dòngrén，zhuīqiú tā de rén hěnduō。
She was very pretty when she was young and had many suitors.
古语说，一言既出，驷马难追。
Gǔyǔ shuō，yìyán jìchū，sìmǎ nánzhuī。
As the saying goes, a word spoken can never be taken back.
小猫喜欢追着尾巴转圈。
Xiǎomāo xǐhuan zhuī zhe wěibā zhuànquān。
Kitties like to chase their tails by running in circles.
由于法律的不健全，他追偿的事情不得不放弃。
Yóuyú fǎlǜ de bú jiànquán，tā zhuīcháng de shìqing bùdébùfàngqì。
As the law is incomplete, he has to give up pressing for payment.
新买的高压锅出了点质量问题，他今天去商场追偿。
Xīnmǎi de gāoyāguō chū le diǎn zhìliàng wèntí，tā jīntiān qù shāngchǎng zhuīcháng。
There is something wrong with the pressure cooker he has just bought,so he\'s going to the shop for compensation.
警员全力追堵这名穷凶极恶的逃犯。
Jǐngyuán quánlì zhuīdǔ zhè míng qióngxiōng jíè de táofàn。
The police are chasing an extremely vicious escaped criminal with all their resources.
老师很喜欢小明这股追根究底的学习劲头。
Lǎoshī hěn xǐhuan Xiǎo Míng zhè gǔ zhuīgēn jiūdǐ de xuéxí jìntóu。
The teacher really likes Xiaoming\'s learning strength of getting to the root of matters.
追光灯下的她依然显得那么的高贵。
Zhuīguāngdēng xià de tā yīrán xiǎnde nàme de gāoguì。
She still looks very elegant under the following spotlights.
事情已经过去了，我追悔莫及。
Shìqíng yǐjing guòqù le，wǒ zhuīhuǐmòjí。
As the matter has already passed, it is too late for me to repent.
他一个人在自己的房间，追记那些伤心的往事。
Tā yígèrén zài zìjǐ de fángjiān，zhuījì nàxiē shāngxīn de wǎngshì。
He stayed alone in his room, recalling the sad things of the past.
军区在他死后把他追记为烈士。
Jūnqū zài tā sǐ hòu bǎ tā zhuījì wéi lièshì。
After death, he was posthumously awarded the title of martyr by the military command.
他来到墓地追念那些和他并肩战斗过的兄弟们。
Tā láidào mùdì zhuīniàn nàxiē hé tā bìngjiān zhàndòu guò de xiōngdimen。
He came to the cemetery to recall those brothers who had fought shoulder to shoulder with him.
他因得罪了黑社会而遭到他们的追杀。
Tā yīn dézuì le hēishèhuì ér zāodào tāmen de zhuīshā。
He was chased by killers after offending the criminal syndicate.
看着老屋里的点点滴滴，他追思着在这里度过的童年。
Kàn zhe lǎowūlǐ de diǎndiǎndīdī，tā zhuīsī zhe zài zhèlǐ dùguò de tóngnián。
Looking at the trivial things in the old house, he reminsced about his childhood spent there.
大雾使高速公路上已经发生了几起追尾事故。
Dàwù shǐ gāosù gōnglù shàng yǐjing fāshēng le jǐ qǐ zhuīwěi shìgù。
Because of the heavy frost, there are several cars hitting the bottom of cars in front of them on the expressway.
他在伤感地追想着和她曾经甜蜜的爱情。
Tā zài shānggǎn de zhuīxiǎng zhe hé tā céngjīng tiánmì de àiqíng。
He was sadly recalling the sweet love he used to have for her.
他驾车超速了，从反光镜里可以看到警察在后面追他。
Tā jiàchē chāosù le，cóng fǎnguāngjìng lǐ kěyǐ kàndào jǐngchá zài hòumiàn zhuī tā。
He can see that the police are right after him due to his speeding.
那天的追悼会上，他为敬爱的老师致了哀辞。
Nàtiān de zhuīdàohuì shàng，tā wèi jìng\'ài de lǎoshī zhìle\'āicí。
He gave a speech during his teacher\'s funeral.
他沉浸在往事的追忆中，忘记了我的存在。
Tā chénjìnzài wǎngshìde zhuīyì zhōng，wàngjìle wǒde cúnzài。
He was immersed in his recollection of the past and forgot about my existence.
在记者的追问下，总统面露窘态。
Zài jìzhě de zhuīwèn xià，zǒngtǒng miànlù jiǒngtài.
Under questioning from the journalist, the president looked embarrassed.
为了追求理想他将金钱置之度外。
Wèile zhuīqiú lǐxiǎng tā jiāng jīnqián zhìzhīdùwài。
In pursuit of his dreams, he gave money no thought.

批评与自我批评
pīpíngyǔ zìwǒ pīpíng
criticism and self-criticism
他的自我批评是认真的，不是摆样子的。
Tā de zìwǒ pīpíng shì rènzhēn de，búshì bǎiyàngzi de。
His self-criticism was serious and not made for show.
有了错误要作自我批评，不要怕丢面子。
Yǒu le cuòwù yào zuò zìwǒpīpíng，búyào pà diūmiànzi。
Criticize yourself when you\'ve made a mistake. Don\'t be afraid of losing face.
富于自我批评精神
fù yú zìwǒ pīpíng jīngshén
be imbued with the spirit of self-criticism
认真的自我批评
rènzhēn de zìwǒ pīpíng
an earnest self-criticism
无关痛痒的自我批评
wúguāntòngyǎng de zìwǒ pīpíng
irrelevant or superficial self-criticism
遇到矛盾我们要多做自我批评。
Yùdào máodùn wǒmen yào duō zuò zìwǒ pīpíng。
When coming across contradictions, we should resort to self-criticism more often.
他也为自己的错误流下了眼泪，我就不落忍再批评他了。
Tā yě wèi zìjǐ de cuòwù liúxià le yǎnlèi，wǒ jiù bùlàorěn zài pīpíng tā le。
He has already shed tears for his mistakes, and I can\'t bear to scold him any more.
面对面地开展批评和自我批评。
拿起批评与自我批评的武器。
勇于自我批评。
自我批评。
It is difficult enough to be critical of our own mistakes.
对我们自己的错误采取批评的态度确实非常困难。
To bridge that gap we practically have to pull to pieces everything contemporary science has to say about the orders of nature.
Wèile míhé nàgè hónggōu，wǒmen shíjìshàng bùdébù yánlì pīpíng dāngdài kēxué duìyú zìránjiè zhìxù de rènhé yánlùn。

新书评介
xīnshū pínɡjiè
book review

书评专栏
shūpínɡ zhuānlán 
book review column; book reviews
书评
shūpíng
book review
这次图书奖评比，他有两本著作参评。
Zhècì túshūjiǎngpíngbǐ，tā yǒu liǎngběn zhùzuò cānpíng。
He has two of his works nominated for appraisal and selection for the Book Awards.
卖关子是评书中常用的手段技巧，术语称留扣子。
Màiguānzi shì píngshū zhōng chángyòng de shǒuduàn jìqiǎo，shùyǔ chēng liúkòuzi。
Keeping the audience guessing is a common technique in storytelling, the term for it is Liukouzi.
小时候，广播里最让我着迷的栏目就是评书连播。
Xiǎoshíhou，guǎngbō lǐ zuì ràng wǒ zháomí de lánmù jiùshì píngshū liánbō。
When I was young, the program that attracted me most was the sequential broadcasting of storytelling.
评书演员最爱说的一句话就是书归正传。
Píngshū yǎnyuán zuì ài shuō de yíjù huà jiùshì shūguī zhèngzhuàn。
The most frequent sentence those storytelling performers use is: let\'s return to the subject.
他每天都要听评书，都快成书迷啦。
Tā měitiān dōuyào tīng píngshū，dōu kuài chéng shūmí la。
He listens to the storytelling program every day, and has almost become an addict to it.
书籍里的评论，常以原作正文中夹批、书页上端眉批、章节前后总批等形式出现。
Shūjí lǐ de pínglùn，cháng yǐ yuánzuò zhèngwén zhōng jiápī、shūyè shàngduān méipī、zhāngjié qiánhòu zǒngpī děng xíngshì chūxiàn。
The comments on the book are written between lines, in the top margin and between chapters.
他的新书获得好评。
Tā de xīnshū huòdé hǎopíng.
His new book was well received.

yǔrénwéishàn de pīpíng
well-meaning criticism

to rate sb/sth as sth
把某人/某事物评为某事物

xīnshū pínɡjiè
book review

书评专栏
shūpínɡ zhuānlán 
book review column; book reviews
书评
shūpíng
book review
书籍里的评论，常以原作正文中夹批、书页上端眉批、章节前后总批等形式出现。

时事述评
shíshì shùpíng
current events survey
每周时事述评
měi zhōu shíshì shùpíng
weekly review of current affairs
不要老是只作事后的批评。
Búyào lǎoshì zhǐ zuò shìhòu de pīpíng。
Don\'t get into the habit of criticizing only after the event.
你怎么批评他，他还像个没事人似的。
Nǐ zěnme pīpíngtā，tā hái xiàng gè méishìrén shì de。
However much you criticize him, he still looks unconcerned.
实事求是的批评
shíshìqiúshì de pīpíng
criticism based on facts
对于自己不懂的或不明白的事情，不要妄加评论！
Duìyú zìjǐ bùdǒng de huòbùmíngbai de shìqing，búyào wàngjiā pínglùn！
Don\'t comment casually on things you don\'t understand!
他总是这样讥评单位上上下下的同事，却不去做自己该做的事。
Tā zǒngshì zhèyàng jīpíng dānwèi shàngshàngxiàxià de tóngshì，què búqù zuò zìjǐ gāi zuò de shì。
Instead of doing his own duties, he is always ridiculing his colleagues, high and low.
这件事情说不好，现在还没有定评。
Zhèjiàn shìqing shuō bùhǎo，xiànzài hái méiyǒu dìngpíng。
Nothing definite can be said about the matter.
无论对人还是对事，我们都要全面考量，然后才能做出客观的评价。
Wúlùn duì rén háishi duì shì，wǒmen dōuyào quánmiàn kǎoliàng，ránhòu cáinéng zuòchū kèguān de píngjià。
No matter for people or situations, we should examine and judge in an all-around way and then make an objective appraisal.
评价事物，必须持客观态度。
评论一件事不能只看动机，还要看效果
实事求是地评介每部作品。
时事政策述评。
你无缘无故骂人家，人家要找你评理，那是当然的事
我已然为你挨了批评，不能再为你办这件事了。
事情没那么严重，批评他几句便了。
把事情都端出来，让大家评评理
to rate sb/sth as sth
把某人/某事物评为某事物
to be critical of sb/sth
批评某人/某事
to rate sb/sth as
把某人/某事物评价成
He humiliated his colleague by criticising him in front of the boss.

Kai Yuan Holdings refused to comment.

批评某人(做)某事

给某人/某事物高度评价

Frank\'s remarks always vivify an otherwise dull story.

mark
由评委判分。

pīpíngyǔ zìwǒ pīpíng
criticism and self-criticism

Píngtán shì pínghuà hé táncí de héchēng。

挨批评
áipīpíng 
be criticized

pínggōng bǎihǎo

进行初评
jìnxíngchū píng
make preliminary appraisal

He\'s not a man to criticize.
有错误就得批评。
Yǒu cuòwù jiù děi pīpíng。
Wherever mistakes occur, they must be criticized.
有了错误要作自我批评，不要怕丢面子。

Criticize yourself when you\'ve made a mistake. Don\'t be afraid of losing face.
他不但不支持我，反把我批评了一顿。
Tā búdàn bú zhīchí wǒ，fǎn bǎ wǒ pīpíng le yídùn。
Instead of supporting me, he criticized me.
批评要注意掌握分寸。
Pīpíng yào zhùyì zhǎngwò fēncùn。
Don\'t go too far in criticism.
他批评得对，你别不服气。
Tā pīpíng de duì，nǐ bié bùfúqì。

富于自我批评精神
fù yú zìwǒ pīpíng jīngshén
be imbued with the spirit of self-criticism
人家批评你，并不是跟你过不去。
Rénjiā pīpíngnǐ，bìngbú shì gēn nǐ guòbúqù。
People didn\'t mean to be hard on you when they criticized you.
批评他是可以的，不过你说得过头了。
Pīpíngtā shì kěyǐ de，búguò nǐ shuō de guòtóu le。
It was all right to criticize him, but you overdid it.
含蓄的批评
hánxù de pīpíng
implicit criticism
对他颇有好评
duì tā pō yǒu hǎopíng
have a rather high opinion of him
博得读者好评
bódé dúzhě hǎopíng
be well received by the readers
欢迎大家批评
huānyíngdàjiā pīpíng

Zhèzhǒng pínglùn huāngmiùjuélún。
This comment is absolutely preposterous.
获得好评
huò dé hǎopíng
win acclaim; earn favourable comment
这是讥讽，不是善意的批评。
Zhè shì jīfěng，bú shì shànyì de pīpíng。
This is sarcasm, not constructive criticism.
你批评得对，击中了我的要害。
Nǐ pīpíng de duì，jīzhòng le wǒ de yàohài。

他的评论极其深刻。
Tā de pínglùn jíqí shēnkè。
His comments were most penetrating.
尖锐的批评
jiānruì de pīpíng
incisive (or sharp) criticism
批评得不对，可别见怪。
Pīpíng de bú duì，kě bié jiànguài。
Don\'t take offence if my criticism is incorrect.
专家鉴评
zhuānjiā jiànpíng
expert appraisal
讲评学生的作业
jiǎngpíngxuésheng de zuòyè 
comment on the students\' work

拒绝别人的批评
jùjué biérén de pīpíng
reject other people\'s criticism

tōngguò kǎopíngjuédìnggànbùshēngjiàng

这篇评论语言干瘪，内容空泛。

Pīpíngyào yǐlǐfúrén，bú yào luàn kòu màozi。

Bùgāi ái le pīpíngjiù liàotiāozi。

他一到就没头没脑地把我们批评了一顿。
Tā yídào jiù méitóuméinǎo de bǎ wǒmen pīpíng le yídùn。

The writer was indifferent to criticism.
他有错误，就该批评，有什么磨不开的？
Tā yǒu cuòwù，jiù gāi pīpíng，yǒu shénme mòbukāi de? 
If he\'s made mistakes, you should criticize him and not let personal considerations get in your way.
他的批评是为你好，你可别恼恨他。
Tā de pīpíngshì wèi nǐ hǎo，nǐ kě bié nǎohèn tā。
You shouldn\'t resent his criticism. He meant well.
对于他那种听不进批评的态度，我们感到恼火。
Duìyú tā nà zhǒng tīngbu jìn pīpíng de tàidu，wǒmen gǎndào nǎohuǒ。
We\'re annoyed at his not listening to criticism.

批评缺点和错误
pīpíngquēdiǎn hé cuòwù

píngdìngjìshù zhíchēng

评断是非
pínɡduàn shìfēi
judge between right and wrong; arbitrate a dispute
裁判给他评多少分？
Cáipàn gěi tā píng duōshaofēn?
What score did the judges give him?
评功授奖大会
pínggōngshòujiǎngdàhuì
a meeting to announce commendations and issue awards
资产评估
zīchǎn pínggū
property assessment
高度评价
gāodù píngjià
set a high value on; speak highly of; highly appraise
新书评介
xīnshū pínɡjiè
book review
谁是谁非，让大家来评个理。
Shuí shì shuí fēi，ràng dàjiā lái píngge lǐ。
Let others judge who is right and who is wrong.
请党外群众参加评论党员
qǐngdǎngwài qúnzhòngcānjiā pínglùn dǎngyuán
ask non-Party people to join in the appraisal of Party members
小评论
xiǎo pínglùn
short comments
《湘江评论》
《Xiāng Jiāng Pínglùn》
Xiangjiang Review
评判胜负
píngpàn shèngfù
decide who is the winner; judge between contestants

Dàxué jiàoshī zhíwù píngpìn jiāngzhìdùhuà。
A system will be set up to assess and appoint university faculty.
评审文艺作品
píngshěn wényì zuòpǐn

bèi píngxuǎnwéi xiānjìn gōngzuòzhě

恰如其分的评价
qiàrúqífèn de píngjià
an apt appraisal
给予恰如其分的批评
jǐyǔ qiàrúqífèn de pīpíng
give a balanced criticism
她的批评切中要害。
Tā de pīpíngqièzhòngyàohài。
Her criticism struck home.
过多的评头品足，数不尽的清规戒律
Guò duō de píngtóupǐnzú，shǔ bu jìn de qīngguījièlǜ
endless carping and countless taboos
你的批评对我是一服很好的清凉剂。
Nǐ de pīpíng duì wǒ shì yífù hěnhǎo de qīngliángjì。
Your criticism had a sobering effect on me.
他听了大家的批评，觉得脸上热辣辣的。
Tā tīng le dàjiā de pīpíng，jué de liǎn shàng rèlālā de。
After hearing everybody\'s criticism, he felt his cheeks burning.
认真的自我批评
rènzhēn de zìwǒ pīpíng
an earnest self-criticism
善意的批评
shànyì de pīpíng
well-meaning criticism
他对同志们的批评置若罔闻，甚至反唇相讥。
Tā duì tóngzhìmen de pīpíng zhìruòwǎngwén，shènzhì fǎnchúnxiāngjī。
He not only ignored the criticism of his comrades but went so far as to be sarcastic.
时事述评
shíshì shùpíng
current events survey
实事求是的批评
shíshìqiúshì de pīpíng
criticism based on facts
不要老是只作事后的批评。
Búyào lǎoshì zhǐ zuò shìhòu de pīpíng。
Don\'t get into the habit of criticizing only after the event.
每周时事述评
měi zhōu shíshì shùpíng
weekly review of current affairs
你批评他，他总有说头儿。
Nǐ pīpíng tā，tā zǒng yǒu shuōtour。
Whenever you criticize him, he always has an excuse.
这一期我们特约钱教授写了一篇书评。
Zhè yì qī wǒmen tèyuē Qián jiàoshòu xiě le yì piān shūpíng。
For this issue we have specially requested Professor Qian to write a book review.
通报表扬(批评)
tōngbào biǎoyáng（pīpíng）

妄加评论
wàngjiā pínglùn 
make improper comments
他批评得很委婉。
Tā pīpíng de hěn wěiwǎn。
He made his criticism very tactfully.
文学批评
wénxué pīpínɡ 
literary criticism

Pīpíngyào yǒu zhēnduìxìng，búyào wúdìfàngshī。
Criticism should have an aim; it shouldn\'t be undirected.
无关痛痒的自我批评
wúguāntòngyǎng de zìwǒ pīpíng
irrelevant or superficial self-criticism
这是随便说的，无所谓什么批评。
Zhè shì suíbiàn shuō de，wúsuǒwèi shénme pīpíng。
It was a passing remark; I didn\'t mean it as a criticism.
戏剧评论
xìjù pínglùn
dramatic criticism
压制批评
yāzhì pīpíng

研评会
yánpínghuì
appraisal meeting
对待犯错误的同志，要批评帮助，不能一棍子打死。
Duìdài fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì，yào pīpíngbāngzhù，bùnéng yí gùnzi dǎsǐ。
Instead of bludgeoning our erring comrades, we should help them with criticism.

yǔrénwéishàn de pīpíng

xīnchǎnpǐn zhǎnpínghuì

bùyǔ zhìpíng

He remains unrepentant after repeated criticism.

zhuànxiě pínglùn wénzhāng

影评
yǐngpíng
film review
他端详了好一阵子才开始发表评论。
Tā duānxiang le hǎo yízhènzi cái kāishǐ fābiǎo pínglùn。
他的批评一点不留情。
Tā de pīpíng yìdiǎn bùliúqíng。
评论家说：他的新诗，文辞雅致哀婉。

您的批评如同当头棒喝，让我及时醒悟。

The child was blamed by the teacher for mistreating small animals.
他这篇短评清新而不落常套。
Tā zhèpiān duǎnpíng qīngxīn ér búluò chángtào。

[frm] 对某人进行评论
to comment that...
评论…
to be critical of sb/sth
批评某人/某事

批评某人(做)某事

Wǒmen bù yīnggāi suíyì píngjià qítā rén。
我们不应该随意评价其他人。
The critics hailed the young pianist as a new Rubinstein.
Pínglùnjiā bǎ zhè míng niánqīng de huàjiā pěngwèi xīn de Lǔbīnsītǎn。
评论家把这名年轻的画家捧为新的鲁宾斯坦。
He did not take kindly to my critical remarks.
Tā bù xǐhuan wǒ de pīpíngyìjiàn。
他不喜欢我的批评意见。
He adopted wholeheartedly some of the policies that he had previously criticized.
Tā quánxīnquányì de cǎinàle yìxiē tā xiānqián pīpíng guò de zhèngcè。
他全心全意地采纳了一些他先前批评过的政策。
One paper scurrilously described how Edward was neglecting a bereaved mother to dance attendance on Wally.
Yì jiā bàozhǐ cūsú de píngshùle Àidéhuá rúhé búgù sàngshī qīnrén de mǔqīn ér qù shìfèng Wòlì de shì。
一家报纸粗俗地评述了爱德华如何不顾丧失亲人的母亲而去侍奉沃莉的事。
It was an innocuous remark.
Nà shì yì tiáo wúshāngdàyǎ de píngzhù。
那是一条无伤大雅的评注。
She was diffident when offering a comment on the professor\'s lecture.
Zài duì jiàoshòu de kè jìnxíng pínglùn shí，tā yǒudiǎn bú tài zìxìn。
在对教授的课进行评论时，她有点不太自信。
She was sanctimoniously criticizing everybody.
Tā wěishàn de pīpíngzhe měi yí gè rén。
她伪善地批评着每一个人。
He is a dogmatically opinionated critic of modern art.
Tā shì yí gè dúduàn ér yòu gùzhíjǐjiàn de xiàndài yìshù pínglùnjiā。
他是一个独断而又固执己见的现代艺术评论家。
He made displeasingly cutting remarks about his friends.
Tā duì tā de péngyou jìnxíngle jiānsuānkèbó de pīpíng。
他对他的朋友进行了尖酸刻薄的批评。
Please critique this performance.
Qǐng pínglùn yíxià zhè chǎng biǎoyǎn。
请评论一下这场表演。
He was stoutly replying to his critics.
Duìyú pínglùnjiā men duì tā de pīpàn，tā jiānjué yǔyǐ huíyìng。
对于评论家们对他的批判，他坚决予以回应。
He was outspokenly critical of the government\'s new social policy.
Tā tǎnshuài de pīpíngle zhèngfǔ xīn de shèhuì zhèngcè。
他坦率地批评了政府新的社会政策。
He was incisively critical.
Tā shòudàole jiānruì de pīpíng。
他受到了尖锐的批评。
Don\'t misinterpret my comments as criticism.
Búyào bǎ wǒ de huà wùyǐwéi shì pīpíng。

He co-opted the criticism and embraced it.
Tā xīshōu bìng xīnrán jiēshòule pīpíng。

Tā zài lǎoshī suǒ xiě de nèiróng shàngmiàn jiā shàng le píngzhù。

Tā pīpíng fǎtíng duì péicháng de pànjué。

Her acrid remarks make her many enemies.

Fat people score particularly badly.

新产品展评会
xīnchǎnpǐn zhǎnpínghuì 
exhibition and evaluation of new products
老作家在会上对年轻作家的作品简评了几句。

Senior writers make concise comments on the works of young writers.
在同类产品抽检中，被评为优等品

be evaluated as of excellent quality during a spot check of similar products
过多的评头品足，数不尽的清规戒律

endless carping and countless taboos
经过一番品第，终于评出了本次大赛的一、二、三等奖。

After a certain appraisal process, we finally decided on the first, second and third class medals for this competition.
他很尊重别人，从不随便对别人评头品足。
Tā hěnzūnzhòng biérén，cóngbùsuíbiàn duì biérén píngtóu pǐnzú。
He shows great respect to others and never makes random personal remarks about them.
评比产品质量
píngbǐ chǎnpǐn zhìliàng
compare and appraise the quality of different products; make a public appraisal of the quality of different products
不从文学作品出发的文学评论简直就是无源之水。
Bùcóng wénxué zuòpǐn chūfā de wénxué pínglùn jiǎnzhí jiùshì wúyuán zhīshuǐ。
Literary critical reviews which are not based on the works themselves are like water without a source.
评审文艺作品
píngshěn wényì zuòpǐn
make a critical examination and appraisal of literary works
我厂生产的电视机被评为省级特优产品。

The televisions produced by our factory have been awarded the title &quot;products of excellence&quot;.

他作品所得到的不好评论打击了他的自信心。
I cannot judge some works of modern art.
Wǒ wúfǎ píngjià mǒuxiē xiàndài yìshù zuòpǐn。
我无法评价某些现代艺术作品。
The critics puffed up this Broadway production.
Pínglùnjiā dàsì chuīpěng zhè bù Bǎilǎohuì zuòpǐn。
评论家大肆吹捧这部百老汇作品。
After critics savaged his second symphony he never wrote another major work.
Zìcóng pínglùnjiā duì tā de dì\'èr jiāoxiǎngqǔ jìnxíng měngliè pēngjī hòu，tā zàiyě méiyǒu chuàngzuò chū qítā de zhǔyào zuòpǐn le。
自从评论家对他的第二交响曲进行猛烈抨击后，他再也没有创作出其他的主要作品了。
书评作者的批评没有必要这样欺侮人。
Shūpíngzuòzhě de pīpíngméiyǒu bìyào zhèyàngqīwǔ rén。
The reviewer\'s criticism was unnecessarily insulting.
It was a fair performance that didn\'t deserve any praise or criticism.
Zhège yèjì hěn pǔtōng，bù zhídé biǎoyáng huòzhě pīpíng。
这个业绩很普通，不值得表扬或者批评。

The reviewers gave his book a sound sLating.

He is a popular author who downgraded by critical opinion to a genre writer.
他是一个因批评性言论被降为专题作者的知名作家。
The ciritics assessed him a political speculator rather than a statesman.
批评家认为他根本不是政治家，而只是个政治投机者。
These scholars remarked the new financial policy sarcastically and regarded it would be a total failure.
这些学者对于新出台的财政政策进行了尖刻的批评，认为它将彻底失败。
人家批评你，并不是跟你过不去。
Rénjiā pīpíngnǐ，bìngbú shì gēn nǐ guòbúqù。
People didn\'t mean to be hard on you when they criticized you.
欢迎大家批评
huānyíngdàjiā pīpíng
Criticisms are welcome.
这个作家对批评意见处之漠然。
Zhège zuòjiā duì pīpíngyìjiàn chǔzhīmòrán。
The writer was indifferent to criticism.
他听了大家的批评，觉得脸上热辣辣的。
Tā tīng le dàjiā de pīpíng，jué de liǎn shàng rèlālā de。
After hearing everybody\'s criticism, he felt his cheeks burning.
会上，大家把批评的矛头都指向了老赵。
Huì shàng，dàjiā bǎ pīpíng de máotóu dōu zhǐxiàngle lǎozhào.
At the meeting, Lao Zhao was the target of everybody\'s criticism.
挨了顿批评，蔫不唧地回家了。
The ciritics assessed him a political speculator rather than a statesman.
批评家认为他根本不是政治家，而只是个政治投机者。
Incredibly, He won critical acclaim。
他不可思议地赢得了批评家们的称赞。
Critics argue that the solvent was too fierce to use on such a delicate painting.
Pīpíngjiāmen chēng zhège fāngfǎ tài cūbào le bú shìhé shǐyòng zài zhèyàng jīngměi de huàzuò shàng。
批评家们称这个方法太粗暴了不适合使用在这样精美的画作上。
The critics argued that the resources should be used elsewhere.
Pīpíngjiā shuō zhèxiē zīyuán yīngdāng yòngzài biéde dìfang。
批评家说这些资源应当用在别的地方。
Critics pointed to the government\'s fear of losing votes among middle-class interests and to the power of particular lobbies.
Pīpíngjiā zhǐzé zhèngfǔ hàipà shīqù zhōng chǎn jiēcéng de xuǎnpiào，bìng zhǐzé mǒuxiē yóushuì jítuán de quánlì。
批评家指责政府害怕失去中产阶层的选票，并指责某些游说集团的权力。
The critic was considered to be an arbiter of modern literature.
Zhè wèi pīpíngjiā bèi rènwéi shì xiàndài wénxué fāngmiàn de quánwēi。
这位批评家被认为是现代文学方面的权威。
Shortsighted critics derided the plan.
Mùguāng-duǎnqiǎn de pīpíngjiāmen cháofěng zhè xiàng jìhuà。
目光短浅的批评家们嘲讽这项计划。
criticism turned against the critic
被用来回击评论家的批评
The critics panned the performance.
Pínglùnjiā yánlìpīpíng zhè chǎng biǎoyǎn。

His production was panned by French film critic.
他的作品受到法国影评家的严厉批评。

法式料理被被国际上的美食家批评为过于讲究、厚味难化且无新意。
How could critical mathematicians, wellversed in Greek mathematics, have been content to operate on a heuristic basis?
那些对希腊数学造诣很深的、关于批评的数学家们，怎么能满足于在启发性的基础上进行工作呢？
No one has criticised my choice of those three experts, or challenged their conclusions.
Méiyǒu rén pīpíng wǒ xuǎnzé zhè sān míng zhuānjiā，yě méiyǒu rén zhìyí tāmen de jiélùn。
没有人批评我选择这三名专家，也没有人质疑他们的结论。
He was stoutly replying to his critics.
Duìyú pínglùnjiā men duì tā de pīpàn，tā jiānjué yǔyǐ huíyìng。
对于评论家们对他的批判，他坚决予以回应。
He is a popular author who downgraded by critical opinion to a genre writer.
他是一个因批评性言论被降为专题作者的知名作家。
批评与自我批评
pīpíngyǔ zìwǒ pīpíng
criticism and self-criticism
挨批评
áipīpíng 
be criticized
只爱听恭维话，不爱听批评话
Zhǐ ài tīng gōngweihuà，bú ài tīng pīpínghuà。
be fond of flattery but deaf to criticism
他的回答暗含着对我们工作的批评。
Tā de huídá ànhán zhe duì wǒmen gōngzuò de pīpíng。
His reply implied a criticism of our work.
他的自我批评是认真的，不是摆样子的。
Tā de zìwǒ pīpíng shì rènzhēn de，búshì bǎiyàngzi de。
His self-criticism was serious and not made for show.
害怕批评是进步的绊脚石。
Hàipà pīpíng shì jìnbù de bànjiǎoshí。
Your fear of criticism is an obstacle to your ideological progress.
不痛不痒的批评
bútòngbùyǎng de pīpíng
superficial criticism
因超标占用住房而受到批评
yīn chāobiāo zhànyòng zhùfáng ér shòudào pīpíng
be criticized for moving into an apartment in excess of the set standard of floor space due to one
对于别人的批评，他们是充耳不闻的。
Duìyú biérén de pīpíng，tāmen shì chōng\'ěrbùwén de。
They turned a deaf ear to other people\'s criticisms.
这个人批评不得。
Zhè gè rén pīpíng bu de。
He\'s not a man to criticize.
有错误就得批评。
Yǒu cuòwù jiù děi pīpíng。
Wherever mistakes occur, they must be criticized.
有了错误要作自我批评，不要怕丢面子。
Yǒu le cuòwù yào zuò zìwǒpīpíng，búyào pà diūmiànzi。
Criticize yourself when you\'ve made a mistake. Don\'t be afraid of losing face.
他不但不支持我，反把我批评了一顿。
Tā búdàn bú zhīchí wǒ，fǎn bǎ wǒ pīpíng le yídùn。
Instead of supporting me, he criticized me.
批评要注意掌握分寸。
Pīpíng yào zhùyì zhǎngwò fēncùn。
Don\'t go too far in criticism.
他批评得对，你别不服气。
Tā pīpíng de duì，nǐ bié bùfúqì。
His criticism is justified. You shouldn\'t take it amiss.
富于自我批评精神
fù yú zìwǒ pīpíng jīngshén
be imbued with the spirit of self-criticism
人家批评你，并不是跟你过不去。
Rénjiā pīpíngnǐ，bìngbú shì gēn nǐ guòbúqù。
People didn\'t mean to be hard on you when they criticized you.
批评他是可以的，不过你说得过头了。
Pīpíngtā shì kěyǐ de，búguò nǐ shuō de guòtóu le。
It was all right to criticize him, but you overdid it.
含蓄的批评
hánxù de pīpíng
implicit criticism
欢迎大家批评
huānyíngdàjiā pīpíng
Criticisms are welcome.
这是讥讽，不是善意的批评。
Zhè shì jīfěng，bú shì shànyì de pīpíng。
This is sarcasm, not constructive criticism.
你批评得对，击中了我的要害。
Nǐ pīpíng de duì，jīzhòng le wǒ de yàohài。
You\'re right in your criticism. You\'ve pinpointed my main weakness.
尖锐的批评
jiānruì de pīpíng
incisive (or sharp) criticism
批评得不对，可别见怪。
Pīpíng de bú duì，kě bié jiànguài。
Don\'t take offence if my criticism is incorrect.
即使有些批评过头了，他也不介意。
Jíshǐ yǒuxiē pīpíngguòtóu le，tā yě bú jièyì。
He didn\'t mind even when some criticisms were excessive.
拒绝别人的批评
jùjué biérén de pīpíng
reject other people\'s criticism
批评要以理服人，不要乱扣帽子。
Pīpíngyào yǐlǐfúrén，bú yào luàn kòu màozi。
When criticizing people, we must try to convince them through reasoning, not just put labels on them.
不该挨了批评就撂挑子。
Bùgāi ái le pīpíngjiù liàotiāozi。
It\'s bad to quit one\'s job just because one\'s been criticized.
你怎么批评他，他还像个没事人似的。
Nǐ zěnme pīpíngtā，tā hái xiàng gè méishìrén shì de。
However much you criticize him, he still looks unconcerned.
他一到就没头没脑地把我们批评了一顿。
Tā yídào jiù méitóuméinǎo de bǎ wǒmen pīpíng le yídùn。
No sooner had he stepped in the door than he began criticizing us, for no reason at all.
这个作家对批评意见处之漠然。
Zhège zuòjiā duì pīpíngyìjiàn chǔzhīmòrán。
The writer was indifferent to criticism.
他有错误，就该批评，有什么磨不开的？
Tā yǒu cuòwù，jiù gāi pīpíng，yǒu shénme mòbukāi de? 
If he\'s made mistakes, you should criticize him and not let personal considerations get in your way.
他的批评是为你好，你可别恼恨他。
Tā de pīpíngshì wèi nǐ hǎo，nǐ kě bié nǎohèn tā。
You shouldn\'t resent his criticism. He meant well.
对于他那种听不进批评的态度，我们感到恼火。
Duìyú tā nà zhǒng tīngbu jìn pīpíng de tàidu，wǒmen gǎndào nǎohuǒ。
We\'re annoyed at his not listening to criticism.
爬行主义受到强烈批评。
Páxíngzhǔyì shòudào qiángliè pīpíng。
The stick-in-the-mud mentality was strongly criticized.
批评缺点和错误
pīpíngquēdiǎn hé cuòwù
criticize shortcomings and mistakes
党内批评
dǎnɡ nèi pīpínɡ
inner-Party criticism
书评作者的批评没有必要这样欺侮人。
Shūpíngzuòzhě de pīpíngméiyǒu bìyào zhèyàngqīwǔ rén。
The reviewer\'s criticism was unnecessarily insulting.
给予恰如其分的批评
jǐyǔ qiàrúqífèn de pīpíng
give a balanced criticism
她的批评切中要害。
Tā de pīpíngqièzhòngyàohài。
Her criticism struck home.
你的批评对我是一服很好的清凉剂。
Nǐ de pīpíng duì wǒ shì yífù hěnhǎo de qīngliángjì。
Your criticism had a sobering effect on me.
他听了大家的批评，觉得脸上热辣辣的。
Tā tīng le dàjiā de pīpíng，jué de liǎn shàng rèlālā de。
After hearing everybody\'s criticism, he felt his cheeks burning.
认真的自我批评
rènzhēn de zìwǒ pīpíng
an earnest self-criticism
善意的批评
shànyì de pīpíng
well-meaning criticism
他对同志们的批评置若罔闻，甚至反唇相讥。
Tā duì tóngzhìmen de pīpíng zhìruòwǎngwén，shènzhì fǎnchúnxiāngjī。
He not only ignored the criticism of his comrades but went so far as to be sarcastic.
实事求是的批评
shíshìqiúshì de pīpíng
criticism based on facts
不要老是只作事后的批评。
Búyào lǎoshì zhǐ zuò shìhòu de pīpíng。
Don\'t get into the habit of criticizing only after the event.
你批评他，他总有说头儿。
Nǐ pīpíng tā，tā zǒng yǒu shuōtour。
Whenever you criticize him, he always has an excuse.
通报表扬(批评)
tōngbào biǎoyáng（pīpíng）
circulate a notice of commendation (criticism)
他批评得很委婉。
Tā pīpíng de hěn wěiwǎn。
He made his criticism very tactfully.
文学批评
wénxué pīpínɡ 
literary criticism
批评要有针对性，不要无的放矢。
Pīpíngyào yǒu zhēnduìxìng，búyào wúdìfàngshī。
Criticism should have an aim; it shouldn\'t be undirected.
无关痛痒的自我批评
wúguāntòngyǎng de zìwǒ pīpíng
irrelevant or superficial self-criticism
这是随便说的，无所谓什么批评。
Zhè shì suíbiàn shuō de，wúsuǒwèi shénme pīpíng。
It was a passing remark; I didn\'t mean it as a criticism.
压制批评
yāzhì pīpíng
suppress (or muzzle) criticism
对待犯错误的同志，要批评帮助，不能一棍子打死。
Duìdài fàn cuòwù de tóngzhì，yào pīpíngbāngzhù，bùnéng yí gùnzi dǎsǐ。
Instead of bludgeoning our erring comrades, we should help them with criticism.
与人为善的批评
yǔrénwéishàn de pīpíng
well-meaning criticism
老教授告诫他要经得住赞谀，架得住批评。
Lǎo jiàoshòu gàojiè tā yào jīng de zhù zànyú，jià de zhù pīpíng。
The old professor cautioned him to hear both lavish praise and criticism with equanimity.
正确的批评
zhèngquè de pīpíng
well-founded criticism
经过多次批评他仍无转变。
Jīngguò duō cì pīpíngtā réngwú zhuǎnbiàn。
He remains unrepentant after repeated criticism.
他的批评一点不留情。
Tā de pīpíng yìdiǎn bùliúqíng。
您的批评如同当头棒喝，让我及时醒悟。
Nín de pīpíng rútóng dāngtóu bànghè，ràng wǒ jíshí xǐngwù。
Your criticism has awoken me and made me realize where I had gone wrong.
这个孩子残虐小动物，遭到了老师的批评。
Zhège háizi cánnüè xiǎodòngwù，zāodào le lǎoshī de pīpíng。
The child was blamed by the teacher for mistreating small animals.
他的这篇文章剿说而无当，受到了老师的批评。
Tā de zhèpiān wénzhāng jiǎoshuō ér wúdāng，shòudào le lǎoshī de pīpíng。
He was criticized by the teacher, because in his article he took ideas from others, and presented them as his own.
听了他的批评，我是寸刻难安。
Tīng le tā de pīpíng，wǒ shì cùnkè nánān。
After being criticized by him, I can\'t feel relief for even an instant.
怕妈妈批评，小明改窜了他的数学成绩。
Pà māma pīpíng，Xiǎo Míng gǎicuàn le tā de shùxué chéngjì。
Xiao Ming changed his math score because he was afraid that his mom would criticize him.
我们的学识有限，故此论文中多有谬误之处，还请您批评指正。
Wǒmen de xuéshí yǒuxiàn，gù cǐ lùnwén zhōng duō yǒu miùwù zhī chù，hái qǐng nín pīpíng zhǐzhèng。
Our knowledge has certain boundaries. Therefore, there must be many mistakes in this paper and we are awaiting your criticism and corrections.
我被批评了，觉得脸火烫火烫的，很不好意思。
Wǒ bèi pīpíng le，juédé liǎn huǒtàng huǒtàng de，hěnbùhǎoyìsi。
I was criticized, so my face was scalding and I felt ashamed.
他也为自己的错误流下了眼泪，我就不落忍再批评他了。
Tā yě wèi zìjǐ de cuòwù liúxià le yǎnlèi，wǒ jiù bùlàorěn zài pīpíng tā le。
He has already shed tears for his mistakes, and I can\'t bear to scold him any more.
他由于利用职权卖大号，受到了领导的批评。
Tā yóuyú lìyòng zhíquán màidàhào，shòudào le lǐngdǎo de pīpíng。
He abused his power and profiteers by selling much-needed goods to individual buyers in batches, so he was criticized by the leaders.
他批评你也是为了你好，你岂可错怪他的好意？
Tā pīpíng nǐ yěshì wèi le nǐ hǎo，nǐ qǐkě cuòguài tā de hǎoyì？
He criticized you for your own good. How can you blame him unjustly?
即使伤面子我也要批评你。
Jíshǐ shāngmiànzi wǒ yěyào pīpíng nǐ。
Though it will hurt your feelings, I’ll still criticize your mistakes.
我现在处于试手阶段，有什么不对的地方还请您多批评。
Wǒ xiànzài chǔyú shìshǒu jiēduàn，yǒu shénme búduì de dìfāng hái qǐng nín duō pīpíng。
I am still on probation, so please point out any of my mistakes you find.
这三个逃课的学生遭到了老师严厉的批评。
Zhè sāngè táokè de xuésheng zāodào le lǎoshī yánlì de pīpíng。
The three students that played truant were severely criticized by the teacher.
他偷了生产队的铁镐，遭到了队长的批评。
Tā tōu le shēngchǎnduì de tiěgǎo，zāodào le duìzhǎng de pīpíng。
He stole the pickaxe from the production team and was therefore criticized by the team leader.
在老师的严厉批评下，他们总算息争了。
Zài lǎoshī de yánlì pīpíng xià，tāmen zǒngsuàn xīzhēng le。
They finally reconciled with each other because of the teacher\'s harsh criticism.
他总把老师对他的批评当成是下毛毛雨。
Tā zǒng bǎ lǎoshī duì tā de pīpíng dàngchéng shì xià máomáoyǔ。
He always took his teacher\'s instructions as drizzle.
看他泫然泪下，我们真不忍心再批评他了。
Kàn tā xuànrán lèixià，wǒmen zhēn bùrěnxīn zài pīpíng tā le。
Seeing him crying with such a sadness, we couldn\'t criticize him any more.
你怎么能只听他的一面之词就批评我呢。
Nǐ zěnme néng zhǐ tīng tā de yímiàn zhī cí jiù pīpíng wǒ ne。
How can you criticize me after hearing his one-sided statement?
她委屈的哭了，咬着衣角，让人不忍再批评了。
Tā wěiqū de kū le，yǎo zhe yījiǎo，ràng rén bùrěn zài pīpíng le。
She cried out in grievance and gnawed on the ridge of the lower hem of her jacket, which made lose the heart to continue criticizing her.
领导在全体职工大会上批评他，目的是以一儆百。
Lǐngdǎo zài quántǐ zhígōng dàhuì shàng pīpíng tā，mùdì shì yǐyī jǐngbǎi。
The leader criticized him in the meeting for the whole staff, hoping to caution others.
院长在大会上批评某些医生拿红包的行为，但没有专指是他。
Yuànzhǎng zài dàhuì shàng pīpíng mǒuxiē yīshēng ná hóngbāo de xíngwéi，dàn méiyǒu zhuānzhǐ shì tā。
The president criticized doctors who accept gifts of money from patients. However, the president didn\'t point at him especially.
他是一个自矜的人，不能接受别人的批评。
Tā shì yígè zìjīn de rén，bùnéng jiēshòu biérén de pīpíng。
He always praises himself and never accepts other people\'s criticism.
遇到矛盾我们要多做自我批评。
Yùdào máodùn wǒmen yào duō zuò zìwǒ pīpíng。
When coming across contradictions, we should resort to self-criticism more often.
张教授撰写的文艺批评在文艺界具有较大的影响力。
Zhāng Jiàoshòu zhuànxiě de wényìpīpíng zài wényìjiè jùyǒu jiàodà de yǐngxiǎnglì。
The critical articles written by Professor Zhang are very influential in the literary, and art community.
领导常批评他办事不力。
Lǐngdǎo cháng pīpíng tā bànshìbúlì。
The boss frequently criticizes him for not doing his best.
老师当着全班批评了班长。
Lǎoshī dāngzhe quánbān pīpíngle bānzhǎng。
The teacher criticized the class monitor in front of the whole class.
再不听话，就得挨批评了。
Zàibùtīnghuà，jiùděi āipīpíng le。
If you don\'t do as you are told, you will get a telling off.
我对老师的批评感到不服气。
Wǒ duì lǎoshīde pīpíng gǎndào bùfúqì。
I was unconvinced by the teacher\'s criticism.
他敢于批评他的老板。
Tā gǎnyú pīpíng tāde lǎobǎn。
He dared to criticize his boss.
他对别人的批评很麻木。
Tā duì biérén de pīpíng hěn mámù.
He\'s insensitive to the criticisms of others.
会上，大家把批评的矛头都指向了老赵。
Huì shàng，dàjiā bǎ pīpíng de máotóu dōu zhǐxiàngle lǎozhào.
At the meeting, Lao Zhao was the target of everybody\'s criticism.
接受批评
jiēshòu pīpíng

He tactfully criticized the student.

He was upset at being criticized for no reason.

Don\'t criticize the students or it may backfire on you.
父亲严厉地批评了他。
Fùqīn yánlì de pīpíngle tā。
His father gave him a severe telling-off.
他对别人的批评满不在乎。
Tā duì biérén de pīpíng mǎnbúzàihū。
He doesn\'t care about criticism.
你怎样批评都可以。
Nǐ zěnyàng pīpíng dōu kěyǐ。
Whatever criticisms you have are fine.
书籍里的评论，常以原作正文中夹批、书页上端眉批、章节前后总批等形式出现。
Shūjí lǐ de pínglùn，cháng yǐ yuánzuò zhèngwén zhōng jiápī、shūyè shàngduān méipī、zhāngjié qiánhòu zǒngpī děng xíngshì chūxiàn。
The comments on the book are written between lines, in the top margin and between chapters.

Bobby is ready to confront any criticism of his controversial article about stem cell research which was published recently.
勃比最近发表了一篇有关干细胞研究的文章，他已经做好面对任何批评的准备。
Professor Brown accepted the criticism with grace.
布朗教授有风度地接受了批评。
Don\'t get too excited at the moment you hear a criticism.
听到对你的批评时，不要太激动。
French cuisine is criticized by international food philosophers as fussy, heavy, and unadventurous.
法式料理被被国际上的美食家批评为过于讲究、厚味难化且无新意。
Your criticism were quite uncalled-for.
你的批评是在实在是没有道理。
His emotional criticism was closely related to his womanlike personality.
他的这种情绪化的批评方式与他女性化的性格密切相关。
The ciritics assessed him a political speculator rather than a statesman.
批评家认为他根本不是政治家，而只是个政治投机者。
It is difficult enough to be critical of our own mistakes.
对我们自己的错误采取批评的态度确实非常困难。
He is a popular author who downgraded by critical opinion to a genre writer.
他是一个因批评性言论被降为专题作者的知名作家。
He thought that the criticism that had followed his announcement would die down.
他以为他的声明招来的批评会慢慢地平息下来。
Fell criticism spread all over the mainstream media.
主流媒体上充斥着尖锐的批评。
Our boss is very generous and won\'t take your criticism to heart.
我们老板心胸宽广，不会介意你的批评的。
How could critical mathematicians, wellversed in Greek mathematics, have been content to operate on a heuristic basis?
那些对希腊数学造诣很深的、关于批评的数学家们，怎么能满足于在启发性的基础上进行工作呢？
The project pursues against great media criticism.
顶着媒体的大肆批评，这个项目继续进行着。
These scholars remarked the new financial policy sarcastically and regarded it would be a total failure.
这些学者对于新出台的财政政策进行了尖刻的批评，认为它将彻底失败。
The political scandal triggered the furious criticism of the people against the president.
政治丑闻激起了人民对总统的猛烈批评。
She is very vulnerable to other people\'s criticism.
她对于别人的批评很敏感。
Incredibly, He won critical acclaim。
他不可思议地赢得了批评家们的称赞。
Critics argue that the solvent was too fierce to use on such a delicate painting.
Pīpíngjiāmen chēng zhège fāngfǎ tài cūbào le bú shìhé shǐyòng zài zhèyàng jīngměi de huàzuò shàng。
批评家们称这个方法太粗暴了不适合使用在这样精美的画作上。
You shouldn\'t take her criticisms at face value.
Nǐ bù yīnggāi quán\'é jiēshòu tā de pīpíng。
你不应该全额接受她的批评。
It was a fair performance that didn\'t deserve any praise or criticism.
Zhège yèjì hěn pǔtōng，bù zhídé biǎoyáng huòzhě pīpíng。
这个业绩很普通，不值得表扬或者批评。
Please be more temperate when criticizing others.
Qǐng pīpíng biérén shí wēnhé xiē。
请批评别人时温和些。
The thrust of the argument was nonsense.
Duì cǐ lùndiǎn de pīpíng gēnběn jiùshì yípàihúyán。
对此论点的批评根本就是一派胡言。
He was dispensing critical reviews to all of the employees.
Tā gěi suǒyǒu yuángōng tíchū pīpíngxìng de pínglùn。
他给所有员工提出批评性的评论。
Sensitive to the criticism, the president bristled at the suggestion that war was inevitable.
Yóuyú duì pīpíngyìjiàn hěn mǐngǎn，zǒngtǒng shífēn fǎnduì zhànzhēng yǐ bùkěbìmiǎn de shuōfǎ。
由于对批评意见很敏感，总统十分反对战争已不可避免的说法。
No one has criticised my choice of those three experts, or challenged their conclusions.
Méiyǒu rén pīpíng wǒ xuǎnzé zhè sān míng zhuānjiā，yě méiyǒu rén zhìyí tāmen de jiélùn。
没有人批评我选择这三名专家，也没有人质疑他们的结论。
The critics argued that the resources should be used elsewhere.
Pīpíngjiā shuō zhèxiē zīyuán yīngdāng yòngzài biéde dìfang。
批评家说这些资源应当用在别的地方。
His actions came under severe criticism from the public.
Tā de xíngwéi shòudàole gōngzhòng yánlì de pīpíng。
他的行为受到了公众严厉的批评。
All he wanted, he said, was a little constructive criticism.
Tā suǒ yào de quánbù，tā shuō，zhǐshì yìdiǎn jiànshèxìng de pīpíng。
他所要的全部，他说，只是一点建设性的批评。
This decision was criticised at the time as unnecessarily ambitious.

这个决定在当时被批评为太过野心勃勃的。
He just always criticises me whatever happens.

不管发生了什么，他总是批评我。
So my mother\'s criticism does have an important grain of truth in it.
Wǒ māma de pīpíng yǒu xiēxǔ zhòngyào de zhēnlǐ zài lǐmiàn。
我妈妈的批评有些许重要的真理在里面。

I had some very harsh words with the players at half-time.
Zài zhōngchǎng xiūxi de shíhou，wǒ hěnhěn de pīpíngle wǒ de duìyuán。

博得好评
bódé hǎopíng
have a favourable reception
对他颇有好评
duì tā pō yǒu hǎopíng
have a rather high opinion of him
博得读者好评
bódé dúzhě hǎopíng
be well received by the readers
获得好评
huò dé hǎopíng
win acclaim; earn favourable comment
这个监狱的监规很人性化，得到犯人们的好评。
Zhège jiānyù de jiānguī hěnrénxìnghuà，dédào fànrénmen de hǎopíng。
The regulations of this prison are human-friendly, and receive a good appraisal from the prisoners.

Wēiruǎn gōngsī zài ruǎnjiàn hángyè chēngxióng yǒunián，hǎopíng rúcháo。
The software company has been in the leading position of the software industry for years, gaining lots of favourable comments.
这分机关报纸得到大家的一致好评。

他的小说大受好评。

他的新书获得好评。

His new book was well received.
他的率直赢得了大家的好评。
Tā de shuàizhí yíngdéle dàjiā de hǎopíng。
His forthrightness won everyone\'s approval.
评功摆好
pínggōng bǎihǎo 
enumerate sb.\'s merits; speak of sb. in glowing terms
他的批评是为你好，你可别恼恨他。
Tā de pīpíngshì wèi nǐ hǎo，nǐ kě bié nǎohèn tā。
You shouldn\'t resent his criticism. He meant well.
这件事情说不好，现在还没有定评。
Zhèjiàn shìqing shuō bùhǎo，xiànzài hái méiyǒu dìngpíng。
Nothing definite can be said about the matter.
他又被评为班级三好生了，老师和父母都为他高兴。
Tā yòu bèi píngwéi bānjí sānhǎoshēng le，lǎoshī hé fùmǔ dōu wèi tā gāoxīng。
He was again honoured as the All-around Student. Both his teacher, and parents felt happy for him.
你的批评对我是一服很好的清凉剂。
Nǐ de pīpíng duì wǒ shì yífù hěnhǎo de qīngliángjì。
Your criticism had a sobering effect on me.
他端详了好一阵子才开始发表评论。
Tā duānxiang le hǎo yízhènzi cái kāishǐ fābiǎo pínglùn。
他批评你也是为了你好，你岂可错怪他的好意？
Tā pīpíng nǐ yěshì wèi le nǐ hǎo，nǐ qǐkě cuòguài tā de hǎoyì？
He criticized you for your own good. How can you blame him unjustly?
我被批评了，觉得脸火烫火烫的，很不好意思。
Wǒ bèi pīpíng le，juédé liǎn huǒtàng huǒtàng de，hěnbùhǎoyìsi。
I was criticized, so my face was scalding and I felt ashamed.
得到群众的好评
他的博士论文获知好评。
他彩绘的藻井颇获好评
获得一致好评。
他主动让贤，深受好评。
评功摆好。
评功摆好。
你果真同意当评委，那就太好了
think well of me
对我有好评
The movie got a good write-up.
这部电影获得了好评。
Their second gig earned them a rave review.
Tāmen dì\'èr chǎng yǎnzòu yíngdéle hǎopíng。
他们第二场演奏赢得了好评。
My new book got a good review from the critics.
Wǒ de xīnshū dédàole pínglùnjiāmen de hǎopíng。
我的新书得到了评论家们的好评。
I\'m always impressed with quick delivery times.
Yīn kuàisù sòngdá cìshù， wǒ jīngcháng shòudào hǎopíng。
因快速送达次数，我经常受到好评。
He\'s not popular with some of the neighbors.
Tā zài línlǐ zhījiān bìng méi dédào hǎopíng。
他在邻里之间并没得到好评。
A good review by this critic will make your play!
Zhè míng pínglùnjiā de hǎopíng jiāng huì ràng nǐ zhànjù yǒulì wèizhi。
这名评论家的好评将会让你占据有利位置。
The play received good notices.
Nà chū xì huòdéle hǎopíng。
那出戏获得了好评。
He always appreciated praise for his work.
Tā zǒngshì yīn tā de gōngzuò ér shòudào hǎopíng。
他总是因他的工作而受到好评。
His movie received a good review.
Tā de diànyǐng dédào hǎopíng。
他的电影得到好评。
He was showered with praise.
Duì tā hǎopíng rú cháo。
对他好评如潮。
The opening received good critical reviews.
Kāimùshì shòudàole hǎopíng。
开幕式受到了好评。
The bad review of his work deflated his self-confidence.
Tā zuòpǐn suǒ dédào de bù hǎo pínglùn dǎjī le tā de zìxìnxīn。
他作品所得到的不好评论打击了他的自信心。
He reviewed the play favorably.
Tā gěile zhège jùběn hǎopíng。
他给了这个剧本好评。
to receive a bad press
受到报刊不好的评价
A good assessment is important for both therapist and client.
Yí gè hǎo de píngjià tǐxì duì zhìliáoshī hé tā de kèhù dōu hěn zhòngyào。
一个好的评价体系对治疗师和他的客户都很重要。
to have a good {or} high opinion of sb
对某人评价好{或}高
He thought well of the book.
Tā duì zhè běn shū píngjià hěn hǎo。
他对这本书评价很好。
Bobby is ready to confront any criticism of his controversial article about stem cell research which was published recently.
勃比最近发表了一篇有关干细胞研究的文章，他已经做好面对任何批评的准备。
Fat people score particularly badly.
pàngrén huòdé de píngjià yóuqí bùhǎo。
胖人获得的评价尤其不好。
I rate him very highly as a defender and he will do a good job for us.
Wǒ píngjià tā shì fēicháng hǎo de yì míng hòuwèi，tā jiāng wèi wǒmen gòngxiàn hěn hǎo de chéngjì。
我评价他是非常好的一名后卫，他将为我们贡献很好的成绩。
I think that she is too judgmental to be a good therapist.
Wǒ rènwéi，tā tài ài pīpíng，wúfǎ chéngwéi yì míng hǎo de línchuángyīshēng。
我认为，她太爱批评，无法成为一名好的临床医生。
Her friends\' comments made her curious about his past.
Tā péngyou de píngjià ràng tā duì tā de guòqù hěn hàoqí。
她朋友的评价让她对他的过去很好奇。
他不但不支持我，反把我批评了一顿。
Tā búdàn bú zhīchí wǒ，fǎn bǎ wǒ pīpíng le yídùn。
Instead of supporting me, he criticized me.
他对同志们的批评置若罔闻，甚至反唇相讥。
Tā duì tóngzhìmen de pīpíng zhìruòwǎngwén，shènzhì fǎnchúnxiāngjī。
He not only ignored the criticism of his comrades but went so far as to be sarcastic.
不要总是批评学生，否则，物极必反。
Búyào zǒngshì pīpíng xuésheng，fǒuzé，wùjíbìfǎn。
Don\'t criticize the students or it may backfire on you.
批评别人时要注意反观自身。
Sensitive to the criticism, the president bristled at the suggestion that war was inevitable.
Yóuyú duì pīpíngyìjiàn hěn mǐngǎn，zǒngtǒng shífēn fǎnduì zhànzhēng yǐ bùkěbìmiǎn de shuōfǎ。
由于对批评意见很敏感，总统十分反对战争已不可避免的说法。
赛后，专家对整场球赛进行了点评。
Sài hòu，zhuānjiā duì zhěngchǎng qiúsài jìnxíng le diǎnpíng。
Experts commented on the ball game after the match.
她对这部影片的点评非常到位。
Tā duì zhèbù yǐngpiàn de diǎnpíng fēicháng dàowèi。
Her comments on this film are very much to the point.
脂砚斋评点了曹雪芹的《红楼梦》。
Zhīyànzhāi píngdiǎn le Cáo Xuěqín de《Hónglóumèng》。
Zhiyanzhai wrote commentaries on &quot;The Dream of the Red Mansions&quot; written by Cao Xueqin.
他评点三国人物的讲座，得到了大多数人的认同。
Tā píngdiǎn sānguó rénwù de jiǎngzuò，dédào le dàduōshù rén de rèntóng。
He gave a lecture to annotate and comment on characters in Romance of the Three Kingdoms, which were well received by the majority of people.
批评缺点和错误
pīpíngquēdiǎn hé cuòwù
criticize shortcomings and mistakes
他的批评一点不留情。
Tā de pīpíng yìdiǎn bùliúqíng。
评价一个人，要客观全面一点，不要太绝对化了。
Píngjià yígè rén，yào kèguān quánmiàn yìdiǎn，búyào tài juéduìhuà le。
We should judge a person objectively and in an all-around way, we should never be absolute.
评干工作将于今天下午三点进行。
Pínggàn gōngzuò jiāngyú jīntiān xiàwǔ sān diǎn jìnxíng。
We will make an appraisal of the officials at three o\'clock this afternoon.
请专家点评。
认真阅读正文后面的点评。
评点《二十四史》。
评点人物。
点名批评
对别人的缺点可以批评，但不要讥讽。
A famous critic reviewed the play.
一著名评论家对此剧进行了点评。
The thrust of the argument was nonsense.
Duì cǐ lùndiǎn de pīpíng gēnběn jiùshì yípàihúyán。
对此论点的批评根本就是一派胡言。
It is an excellent book, as I took care to point out, except for my few niggles.
Wǒ zhèli qiángdiào zhǐchū，chúle wǒ de yìdiǎn xiǎo pīpíng yǐwài，zhè shì yì běn hěn bàng de shū。
我这里强调指出，除了我的一点小批评以外，这是一本很棒的书。
Let me pick apart a few of the points you make.
Wǒ jiù jǐdiǎn jǐyǔ pīpíng jiànyì。
我就几点给予批评建议。
All he wanted, he said, was a little constructive criticism.
Tā suǒ yào de quánbù，tā shuō，zhǐshì yìdiǎn jiànshèxìng de pīpíng。
他所要的全部，他说，只是一点建设性的批评。
She was diffident when offering a comment on the professor\'s lecture.
Zài duì jiàoshòu de kè jìnxíng pínglùn shí，tā yǒudiǎn bú tài zìxìn。
在对教授的课进行评论时，她有点不太自信。
His remarks tailed off at this point.
Zhè yìdiǎn hòumiàn xiězhe tā de yìxiē pínglùn。
这一点后面写着他的一些评论。
She grimaced a smile at each of them，and nodded hurriedly at any remark directed at her.
Tā duì měi gè rén dōu miǎnqiǎng jǐchū yìsī wēixiào，duì rènhé píngjià dōu bùjiǎsīsuǒ de diǎntóu biǎoshì zàntóng。
她对每个人都勉强挤出一丝微笑，对任何评价都不假思索地点头表示赞同。
Aside from that, I agree with the author\'s own comment.
Chúle nàdiǎn zhīwài，wǒ tóngyì zuòzhě zìjǐ de píngjià。
除了那点之外，我同意作者自己的评价。
Whoever is approved to carry out the assessments must have to work overtime.
Huòzhǔn jìnxíng pínggū de rén wúlùnshì shuí dōu bìxū jiābānjiādiǎn de gōngzuò。
获准进行评估的人无论是谁都必须加班加点地工作。
It\'s important in assessing how well a writer illustrates an argument.
Zài pínggū yí wèi zuòjiā biǎodá zhǔtí de nénglì shí，zhè yì diǎn hěn zhòngyào。
在评估一位作家表达主题的能力时，这一点很重要。
The members of these groups do not express themselves as accurately or as elegantly as their critics do.
Zhèxiē tuántǐ de chéngyuán bú xiàng tāmen de pínglùnjiāmen nàyàng，nénggòu zhǔnquè huòzhě qiàdàng détǐ de biǎodá chū zìjǐ de guāndiǎn。
这些团体的成员不像他们的评论家们那样，能够准确或者恰当得体地表达出自己的观点。
他很尊重别人，从不随便对别人评头品足。
Tā hěnzūnzhòng biérén，cóngbùsuíbiàn duì biérén píngtóu pǐnzú。
He shows great respect to others and never makes random personal remarks about them.
他恣肆评价领导，这是他在工作中不被重用的原因。
Tā zìsì píngjià lǐngdǎo，zhèshì tā zài gōngzuò zhōng bú bèi zhòngyòng de yuányīn。
He judged his leaders unrestrainedly, and as a result wasn\'t given an important position.
事情没那么严重，批评他几句便了。
The equity of the house needed to be re-valued.
Zhè suǒ fángzi de quányì xūyào jìnxíng chóngxīn pínggū。
这所房子的权益需要进行重新评估。
Homes in our town are reappraised every five years and taxes are increased accordingly.
Zài wǒmen de chéngshì，měi wǔnián duì jiātíng chóngxīn pínggū yí cì cáichǎn，ránhòu yǐcǐ wéi biāozhǔn jìnxíng zhēngshuì。

Above all, he restored the focus of music criticism onto the music itself.

首先，他将音乐批评的重心转移到音乐本身上。
So my mother\'s criticism does have an important grain of truth in it.
Wǒ māma de pīpíng yǒu xiēxǔ zhòngyào de zhēnlǐ zài lǐmiàn。
我妈妈的批评有些许重要的真理在里面。

他给了这个剧本差评。

The reviews were bad.

家道小康
jiādào xiǎokāng
be comfortably off
家道小康。
Jiādào xiǎokāng。
The family was comfortably off.
附近的三个村社都是小康村。

All the three neighboring villages are well-off villages.
小康家庭应该帮助穷匮一同致富。

小康生活
xiǎokāngshēnghuó
a relatively comfortable life
听说小胡桃有益身体健康，所以我们要经常吃。

Walnuts are good for health, so we must eat them more often.
菜里只能放些小味精，多了不利于身体健康。

Emperor Kangxi wrote many poems during his inspection tour to the Southland.
河南郑州是全国的铁路大动脉，康衢交通非常便捷。

小康生活
xiǎokāngshēnghuó
a relatively comfortable life

The health of local people is in crisis because of canal pollution.

Wēixúnhuán xìtǒng duì réntǐ jiànkāng huì chǎnshēng zhòngyào de yǐngxiǎng。
The microcirculatory system has an important influence on our health.
做菜不要放太多味素，那东西对健康没有益处！
Zuò cài búyào fàng tài duō wèisù，nà dōngxi duì jiànkāng méiyǒu yìchù！
Do not add MSG when cooking the dishes, it is bad for your health.
人不能总吃细粮，吃点五谷杂粮也是有益健康的。
Rén bùnéng zǒng chī xìliáng，chī diǎn wǔgǔ záliáng yěshì yǒuyì jiànkāng de。
Men can not always eat flour and rice, it is good for health to eat some cereals.
空闲的时候到氧吧吸氧有利于身体健康。

线麻是一种毒品，对人体健康极为有害。
Xiànmá shì yìzhǒng dúpǐn，duì réntǐ jiànkāng jíwéi yǒuhài。
Marijuana is a kind of drug which does great damage to the human body.
枵腹从公不仅有害健康，还会打消工作积极性。

听说小胡桃有益身体健康，所以我们要经常吃。

Walnuts are good for health, so we must eat them more often.
菜里只能放些小味精，多了不利于身体健康。

Kāngxī yí jìwèi jí mìngrén xiūshǐ.

玄武神保佑你，出入平安，健康长寿。

You will be blessed with safety, good health and longevity by the god Xuanwu.
血细胞低是亚健康状态，你要注意点。

You\'d better take care because your level of blood cells is at an unhealthy level.

Eating myrobalans is better for your recovery.

As the queen and king of chess have got married, the game will be delayed for their honeymoon.
俗话说久别胜新婚，他们虽然很久才见一次面，但却十分甜蜜。
