我俩约好了，明天去申领结婚证！
Wǒ liǎ yuēhǎo le，míngtiān qù shēnlǐng jiéhūnzhèng ！
We have arranged to apply for a marriage certificate tomorrow.
在他们的结婚仪式上，由老所长给他俩做证婚人。
Zài tāmen de jiéhūn yíshì shàng，yóu lǎosuǒcháng gěi tāliǎng zuò zhènghūnrén。
At their wedding ceremony, the old bureau chief was their chief witness.
to get married in a registry office
在户籍登记处公证结婚
小王在结婚纪念日送给妻子一束玫瑰花。
Xiǎo Wáng zài jiéhūn jìniànrì sònggěi qīzǐ yí shù méiguīhuā。
Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
今儿个是他们结婚五周年的纪念日。
Jīnrgè shì tāmen jiéhūn wǔ zhōunián de jìniànrì。
Today is their five-year wedding anniversary.
结婚纪念日。
His visit will coincide with their wedding anniversary.
Tā de dào fǎng jiāng zhènghǎo shì tāmen jiéhūn jìniànrì de shíhou。
他的到访将正好是他们结婚纪念日的时候。
It is my parents twenty-fifth wedding anniversary today.
今天是我父母结婚25周年纪念日。
Peter wrote a sentimental song for his wife on their tenth wedding anniversary.
彼得在结婚十周年纪念日时给他的妻子写了一首充满柔情的歌。
That was their thirtieth wedding anniversary.
那天是他们结婚三十周年纪念日。
你快结婚吧，哪能打一辈子光棍。
Nǐ kuài jiéhūn ba，nǎ néng dǎ yíbèizi guānggùn。
You\'d better get married soon. How could you be a bachelor all your life?
结婚登记
jiéhūn dēngjì 
marriage registration
他们夫妻结婚十年就分居了。
Tāmen fūqī jiéhūn shí nián jiù fēnjū le。
They separated after ten years of marriage.
他们结婚才一年就分开了
tāmen jiéhūn cái yìnián jiù fēnkāi le
They separated after only one year\'s marriage.
结婚不要讲排场。
Jiéhūn búyào jiǎngpáichǎng。
One should not hanker after pomp and extravagance in a wedding.
她结婚了吗？
Tā jiéhūn le ma? 
Is she married?
她跟谁结婚了？
Tā gēn shuí jiéhūn le?
Who did she marry?
结婚戒指
jiéhūn jièzhǐ
wedding ring
她还不打算跟我结婚，说还要考验考验我。
Tā hái bùdǎsuàn gēn wǒ jiéhūn，shuō háiyào kǎoyàn kǎoyàn wǒ。
She\'s not ready to marry me yet. She says she wants to test me some more.
他俩结婚缺乏感情基础，是双方家长硬把他们捏合在一起的。
Tā liǎ jiéhūn quēfá gǎnqíngjīchǔ，shì shuāngfāngjiāzhǎngyìngbǎ tāmen niēhé zài yìqǐ de。
Their marriage was not a love match; it was their parents who brought them together against their wishes.
她结婚多年没有生养。
Tā jiéhūn duōnián méiyǒu shēngyǎng。
She\'s been married for years but is still childless.
兄弟二人都还没结婚。
Xiōngdì èr rén dōu hái méi jiéhūn。
Neither of the two brothers is married.
你们结婚有日子了没有？
Nǐmen jiéhūn yǒurìzi le méiyǒu? 
Have you fixed the date for the wedding?
他俩结婚以来连句重话都没有过。
Tā liǎ jiéhūn yǐlái lián jù zhònghuà dōu méiyǒu guò。
Hardly a harsh word has passed between them ever since their marriage.
结婚的时候，他请最好的朋友做他的伴郎。
Jiéhūn de shíhou，tā qǐng zuìhǎo de péngyou zuò tā de bànláng。
When he got married, he asked his best friend to be his best man.
因为工作繁忙，他们结婚多年不育。
Yīnwéi gōngzuò fánmáng，tāmen jiéhūn duōnián búyù。
They did not have a baby for many years because of their heavy amount of work.
他们结婚时候的财礼是相当的讲究。
Tāmen jiéhūn shíhou de cáilǐ shì xiāngdāng de jiǎngjiū。
They bought exquisite betrothal gifts when they got married.
旧社会，很多人是为了冲喜才结婚的。
Jiù shèhuì，hěnduōrén shì wèi le chōngxǐ cái jiéhūn de。
In the old society, many people went into marriage in order to cure their ill relatives.
好朋友就要结婚了，我们决定一起出份子给他买礼物。
Hǎopéngyou jiùyào jiéhūn le，wǒmen juédìng yìqǐ chūfènzi gěi tā mǎi lǐwù。
Our good friend is going to get married, we decide to buy him a present together.
他们把结婚的新房布置成了古式的，床前挂了床帐。
Tāmen bǎ jiéhūn de xīnfáng bùzhì chéng le gǔshì de，chuáng qián guà le chuángzhàng。
They hang a bed-curtain in front of their bed, making their wedding room in the ancient style.
她结婚的时候请了个乐队，吹打弹唱的，特别热闹。
Tā jiéhūn de shíhou qǐng le gè yuèduì，chuīdǎ tánchàng de，tèbié rènào。
She hired a band when getting married and it was very lively with the band playing the instruments.
我们等房结婚，如同等米下锅一般。
Wǒmen děng fáng jiéhūn，rútóng děng mǐ xiàguō yìbān。
We are awaiting a house to get married, just like awaiting rice to cook.
如果不是这场飞祸，他们两个早就结婚了。
Rúguǒ búshì zhèchǎng fēihuò，tāmen liǎnggè zǎo jiù jiéhūn le。
They would have got married if the accident hadn\'t occurred.
自从结婚后，儿子就从父母家搬出去，分户另过了。
Zìcóng jiéhūn hòu，érzi jiù cóng fùmǔ jiā bān chūqù，fēnhù lìng guò le。
After his marriage, he moved out of his parents\' house and lived separately.
他要等功成名就后再结婚。
Tā yào děng gōngchéng míngjiù hòu zài jiéhūn。
He will not get married until he becomes successful and famous.
由于没法挨家通知，我们只能函告亲友我结婚的消息。
Yóuyú méifǎ āijiā tōngzhī，wǒmen zhǐnéng hángào qīnyǒu wǒ jiéhūn de xiāoxi。
I was unable to inform my relatives and friends of my marriage in person, so I had to send everyone letters.
大学生在校结婚已经合法化了。
Dàxuésheng zàixiào jiéhūn yǐjing héfǎhuà le。
Students have the legal right to marry when they are in university.
朋友结婚，我们给他送去了贺仪。
Péngyou jiéhūn，wǒmen gěi tā sòngqù le hèyí。
We sent him a wedding gift.
昨天他忽地告诉我他要结婚了。
Zuótiān tā hū de gàosù wǒ tā yào jiéhūn le。
Yesterday, he suddenly told me that he was going to get married.
结婚之前要学习一定的婚育知识。
Jiéhūn zhīqián yào xuéxí yídìng de hūnyù zhīshi。
One must learn some knowledge of marriage and child rearing before getting married.
他已经及龄，可以结婚了。
Tā yǐjing jílíng，kěyǐ jiéhūn le。
He has reached the required age to get married.
小王在结婚纪念日送给妻子一束玫瑰花。
Xiǎo Wáng zài jiéhūn jìniànrì sònggěi qīzǐ yí shù méiguīhuā。
Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
在农村新人结婚时要祭拜祖坟。
Zài nóngcūn xīnrén jiéhūn shí yào jìbài zǔfén。
In the countryside, new couples should offer a sacrifice at their ancestral graves.
结婚十几年来，妻子都是一个很典型的家庭妇女，很本分。
Jiéhūn shí jǐnián lái，qīzǐ dōushì yígè hěndiǎnxíng de jiātíng fùnǚ，hěnběnfèn。
Since we got married ten years ago, my better half has always been a typical housewife who does her duty well.
我姐和我姐丈今天结婚。
Wǒ jiě hé wǒ jiězhàng jīntiān jiéhūn。
My sister is going to marry today.
今儿个是他们结婚五周年的纪念日。
Jīnrgè shì tāmen jiéhūn wǔ zhōunián de jìniànrì。
Today is their five-year wedding anniversary.
她要是再不结婚可真成了老姑娘了。
Tā yàoshì zài bùjiéhūn kě zhēn chéng le lǎogūniang le。
She will be an old maiden if she remains single.
儿子结婚时，这些老亲旧邻都来贺喜，大家都很高兴。
Érzi jiéhūn shí，zhèxiē lǎoqīn jiùlín dōu lái hèxǐ，dàjiā dōu hěngāoxìng。
When my son got married, old relatives and neighbours all came to congratulate us and we all had a very good time.
你俩是天造地设的连枝，还是尽早结婚吧。
Nǐ liǎ shì tiānzào dìshè de liánzhī，háishi jìnzǎo jiéhūn ba。
You are an ideal couple. You\'d better get married quickly.
他们结婚20年来没红过脸，真可谓鸾凤和鸣。
Tāmen jiéhūn èrshí niánlái méi hóngguòliǎn，zhēn kěwèi luánfèng hémíng。
They haven’t quarreled for twenty years, they are really a happy couple.
根据我们村的民约，结婚的时候男女双方要各种一棵纪念树。
Gēnjù wǒmen cūn de mínyuē，jiéhūn de shíhou nánnǚ shuāngfāng yào gè zhòng yì kē jìniànshù。
According to the convention in our village, the man and woman should each plant a tree when they get married.
她用手上那明闪闪的钻戒向人们宣布：她结婚了。
Tā yòng shǒushàng nà míngshǎnshǎn de zuànjiè xiàng rénmen xuānbù：tā jiéhūn le。
The shining diamond ring on her hand reveals that she got married.
他和她是年前认识的，打算年后结婚。
Tā hé tā shì niánqián rènshi de，dǎsuàn niánhòu jiéhūn。
They met before the year, and plan to get married after the new year.
他的娘们儿以前是个演员，结婚就离开舞台了。
Tā de niángmenr yǐqián shì gè yǎnyuán，jiéhūn jiù líkāi wǔtái le。
His wife used to be an actress, but she said goodbye to the stage when they married.
结婚前他们为将来的生活添购了许多器用。
Jiéhūn qián tāmen wèi jiānglái de shēnghuó tiāngòu le xǔduō qìyòng。
They bought many utensils for their future life before the wedding.
他们夫妻二人结婚以后一直琴瑟和谐。

她结婚时，亲朋好友纷纷为她添箱。

When she got married, her relatives and friends all gave her gifts of money or presents.

结婚时你应该在桌上放各式各样的喜果招待客人。

You should place all kinds of wedding candies on the table to treat the guests at the wedding.
去年我结婚时，专门请小表妹当我的喜娘。

I invited my little cousin to be my matron of honour at my wedding ceremony.
送发结婚喜贴也不是一件轻松的事。
Sòngfā jiéhūn xǐtiē yě búshì yíjiàn qīngsōng de shì。

小表妹今天结婚，姨妈喜兴得不得了。
Xiǎobiǎomèi jīntiān jiéhūn，yímā xǐxìng de bùdéliǎo。
My aunt was overjoyed at her daughter\'s wedding today.
还未结婚就有了小孩，你这真是有伤风化。
Hái wèi jiéhūn jiù yǒu le xiǎohái，nǐ zhè zhēnshì yǒushāng fēnghuà。
Having children without getting married is an offence against decency.
赞礼宣布结婚仪式正式开始。
Zànlǐ xuānbùjiéhūn yíshì zhèngshì kāishǐ。
The master of the ceremony announced that the wedding ceremony officially began.
她结婚已经有一阵子了。
Tā jiéhūn yǐjing yǒu yí zhènzǐ le。
She has been married for a while.

The staff would ask those registering for marriage, “Sir, your name, please?”
他们不久就要结婚了。

They are getting married soon.

Getting married means you have one more responsibility and more things to care about.
她恨当初和他结了婚。
Tā hèn dāngchū hé tā jiélehūn。

那天是他们结婚三十周年纪念日。
They wear traditional African wedding clothes.
他们穿着非洲传统的结婚礼服。

你要问这么多关于婚姻的问题，却回避了一个实质性问题，就是你到底应不应该结婚。

我真不敢相信她要结婚了。

Jiéhūn zhīqián yào xuéxí yídìng de hūnyù zhīshi。
One must learn some knowledge of marriage and child rearing before getting married.
婚礼当天，她早早儿地披戴上了新娘的婚纱。
Hūnlǐ dāngtiān，tā zǎozǎor de pīdài shàng le xīnniáng de hūnshā。
On her wedding day, she put on her wedding dress as early as possible.
婚姻介绍所的工作就是为未婚男女牵线搭桥。
Hūnyīn jièshàosuǒ de gōngzuò jiùshì wèi wèihūn nánnǚ qiānxiàn dāqiáo。
Dating agencies act as go-betweens for the unmarried.
恋爱婚姻需要男女双方自愿，怎么能抢婚呢？
Liànài hūnyīn xūyào nánnǚ shuāngfāng zìyuàn，zěnme néng qiǎnghūn ne？
A love match should be at the wishes of both sides, how can they grab a bride?
已经订婚两年了，他终于向我正式提婚了。
Yǐjīng dìnghūn liǎng nián le，tā zhōng yú xiàng wǒ zhèngshì tíhūn le。
We\'ve been engaged for two years, and now he has formally proposed.
在他们的结婚仪式上，由老所长给他俩做证婚人。
Zài tāmen de jiéhūn yíshì shàng，yóu lǎosuǒcháng gěi tāliǎng zuò zhènghūnrén。
At their wedding ceremony, the old bureau chief was their chief witness.
操办婚事
cāobàn hūnshì 
make preparations for a wedding
促成那对情人的婚事
cùchéng nà duì qíngrén de hūnshì 
help to bring about a happy union of the lovers
你快结婚吧，哪能打一辈子光棍。
Nǐ kuài jiéhūn ba，nǎ néng dǎ yíbèizi guānggùn。
You\'d better get married soon. How could you be a bachelor all your life?
结婚登记
jiéhūn dēngjì 
marriage registration
他弃家出走，是对旧社会婚姻压迫的反动。
Tā qì jiā chūzǒu，shì duì jiùshèhuì hūnyīn yāpò de fǎndòng。
He finally left home in an effort to counter the tyranny of arranged marriage in the old society.
重婚是犯法的。
Chónghūn shì fànfǎ de。
Bigamy is against the law.
他们夫妻结婚十年就分居了。
Tāmen fūqī jiéhūn shí nián jiù fēnjū le。
They separated after ten years of marriage.
他们结婚才一年就分开了
tāmen jiéhūn cái yìnián jiù fēnkāi le
They separated after only one year\'s marriage.
新婚夫妇
xīnhūn fūfù
a newly married couple; newlyweds
咱俩的婚事赶年下再办吧。
Zánliǎ de hūnshì gǎn niánxià zài bàn ba。
Let\'s put off our wedding till the Spring Festival.
他要出国留学，婚事只好搁置不提。
Tā yào chūguó liúxué，hūnshì zhǐhǎo gēzhì bùtí。
Since he was going abroad to study, he had to shelve his marriage plans.
婚媾
hūnɡòu
marriage
星期天举行婚礼。
Xīngqītiān jǔxínghūnlǐ。
The wedding will take place on Sunday.
这些民族有着不同的婚恋风情。
Zhèxiē mínzú yǒu zhe bùtóng de hūnliàn fēngqíng。
These ethnic groups all have their own customs of courtship and marriage.
法定婚龄
fǎdìnɡ hūnlínɡ 
legally marriageable age
子女两人，均未婚配。
Zǐnǚ liǎngrén，jūn wèi hūnpèi。
Both son and daughter are unmarried.
婚姻自由
hūnyīn zìyóu 
freedom of marriage
婚姻纠纷
hūnyīn jiūfēn 
matrimonial dispute
进入婚育期
jìnrù hūnyùqī 
reach the marriageable and child-bearing age.
解除婚约
jiěchú hūnyuē 
break off one\'s engagement
结婚不要讲排场。
Jiéhūn búyào jiǎngpáichǎng。
One should not hanker after pomp and extravagance in a wedding.
故事讲述两姐妹在恋爱和婚姻中的遭遇。
Gùshi jiǎngshù liǎngjiěmèi zài liàn\'ài hé hūnyīn zhōng de zāoyù。
The story tells about the fortunes of two sisters in love and marriage.
她结婚了吗？
Tā jiéhūn le ma? 
Is she married?
她跟谁结婚了？
Tā gēn shuí jiéhūn le?
Who did she marry?
她是什么时候结的婚？
Tā shì shénme shíhou jié de hūn? 
When did she get married?
她结过两次婚了。
Tā jiéguo liǎngcì hūn le。
She\'s been married twice.
订婚戒指
dìnɡhūn jièzhǐ
engagement ring
结婚戒指
jiéhūn jièzhǐ
wedding ring
旧式婚姻
jiùshì hūnyīn
old-style marriage
你们几时举行婚礼？
Nǐmen jǐ shí jǔxínghūnlǐ?
When are you going to have your wedding?
他犯有破坏军婚罪。
Tā fàn yǒu pòhuàijūnhūnzuì。
He is found guilty of disrupting the marriage of a serviceman.
她还不打算跟我结婚，说还要考验考验我。
Tā hái bùdǎsuàn gēn wǒ jiéhūn，shuō háiyào kǎoyàn kǎoyàn wǒ。
She\'s not ready to marry me yet. She says she wants to test me some more.
他们离婚了。
Tāmen líhūn le。
They divorced (or divorced each other).
她跟他离婚了。
Tā gēn tā líhūn le。
She divorced him.
离婚证明书
líhūn zhènɡmínɡshū 
divorce certificate
他为婚礼录了像。
Tā wèi hūnlǐ lù le xiàng。
He videotaped (or videoed) the wedding ceremony.
买卖婚姻
mǎimài hūnyīn 
mercenary marriage
美满婚姻
měimǎn hūnyīn 
a happy marriage; conjugal happiness
他们是年时才结的婚。
Tāmen shì niánshi cái jié de hūn。
They got married only last year.
他俩结婚缺乏感情基础，是双方家长硬把他们捏合在一起的。
Tā liǎ jiéhūn quēfá gǎnqíngjīchǔ，shì shuāngfāngjiāzhǎngyìngbǎ tāmen niēhé zài yìqǐ de。
Their marriage was not a love match; it was their parents who brought them together against their wishes.
他们的婚礼办得可排场了。
Tāmen de hūnlǐ bàn de kě páichǎng le。
Their wedding was a most ostentatious and extravagant affair.
今天他举行婚礼，许多同事前来贺喜。
Jīntiān tā jǔxínghūnlǐ，xǔduō tóngshì qián lái hèxǐ。
Today is his wedding day and many of his colleagues came to congratulate him.
我们无权干涉她的婚姻自由。
Wǒmen wú quán gānshè tā de hūnyīn zìyóu。
We don\'t have the right to interfere with her freedom of choice in marriage.
法官对离婚案的双方当事人各给予一次审讯。
Fǎguān duì líhūn\'àn de shuāngfāng dāngshìrén gè jǐyǔ yícì shěnxùn。
The judge gave a hearing to both parties of the divorce case.
她结婚多年没有生养。
Tā jiéhūn duōnián méiyǒu shēngyǎng。
She\'s been married for years but is still childless.
皇帝的大婚盛典
huángdì de dàhūn shèngdiǎn
the grand wedding ceremony of the emperor
适婚青年
shì hūn qīngnián
young men and women of marriageable age
提倡晚婚和计划生育
tíchàngwǎnhūn hé jìhuà shēngyù 
advocate late marriage and family planning
挑个好日子举行婚礼
tiāo gè hǎorìzi jǔxínghūnlǐ 
choose a propitious day for the wedding
父母不同意我的婚事。
Fùmǔ bùtóngyì wǒ de hūnshì。
My parents don\'t approve of my marriage.
提倡晚婚
tíchàngwǎnhūn 
encourage late marriage
晚婚晚育应予鼓励。
Wǎnhūn wǎnyù yīngyǔ gǔlì。
Late marriage and late childbirth should be encouraged.
新婚旅行
xīnhūn lǚxíng
go on a honeymoon trip
兄弟二人都还没结婚。
Xiōngdì èr rén dōu hái méi jiéhūn。
Neither of the two brothers is married.
婚宴
hūnyàn
wedding (or marriage) feast
异族通婚
yìzú tōnghūn 
mixed marriages
你们结婚有日子了没有？
Nǐmen jiéhūn yǒurìzi le méiyǒu? 
Have you fixed the date for the wedding?
有了鸳鸯房作为过渡性用房，他俩马上办了婚事。
Yǒu le yuānyāngfángzuòwéi guòdùxìngyòngfáng，tā liǎ mǎshàngbàn le hūnshì。
They got married as soon as they obtained a mandarin duck apartment as their temporary home.
封建婚姻制度葬送了她一生的幸福。
Fēngjiàn hūnyīn zhìdù zàngsòng le tā yìshēng de xìngfú。
The feudal marriage system condemned her an unhappy married life.
早婚妨碍工作和学习。
Zǎohūn fáng\'ài gōngzuò hé xuéxí。
Marrying too early hinders one\'s work and study.
择期完婚
zéqī wánhūn
select a day for the marriage ceremony
征婚广告
zhēnghūn guǎnggào 
advertisement seeking a marriage partner
他俩结婚以来连句重话都没有过。
Tā liǎ jiéhūn yǐlái lián jù zhònghuà dōu méiyǒu guò。
Hardly a harsh word has passed between them ever since their marriage.
男女婚姻自主。
Nánnǚ hūnyīn zìzhǔ。 
Men and women shall marry the partners of their choice.
未婚
wèihūn
unmarried; single
婚姻
hūnyīn
marriage; matrimony
婚礼
hūnlǐ
wedding ceremony; wedding
她的婚育期快结束了。
Tā de hūnyùqī kuài jiéshù le。
她大学的时候一直暗恋一位已婚的教授。
Tā dàxué de shíhou yìzhí ànliàn yíwèi yǐhūn de jiàoshòu。
Throughout her college years she had secret crush on a married professor.
我今天是特意来拜贺二位新婚的。
Wǒ jīntiān shì tèyì lái bàihè èrwèi xīnhūn de。
I\'m here today to congratulate you both for tying the knot.
新婚的他们约定今年过年回老家办酒。
Xīnhūn de tāmen yuēdìng jīnnián guònián huí lǎojiā bànjiǔ。
They newlyweds arranged to go back to their hometown to hold a party during this spring festival.
结婚的时候，他请最好的朋友做他的伴郎。
Jiéhūn de shíhou，tā qǐng zuìhǎo de péngyou zuò tā de bànláng。
When he got married, he asked his best friend to be his best man.
子女们为父母的宝石婚纪念日策划了一个有趣的活动。
Zǐnǚmen wèi fùmǔ de bǎoshíhūn jìniànrì cèhuà le yígè yǒuqù de huódòng。
They arranged a very interesting event to celebrate their parents\' fortieth wedding anniversary.
小李最近总是不开心，原来他是被父母逼婚。
Xiǎo Lǐ zuìjìn zǒngshì bùkāixīn，yuánlái tā shì bèi fùmǔ bīhūn。
Mr. Li junior is not happy recently, he was forced to marry against his will.
小夫妻婚后不育，双方老人都很着急。
Xiǎofūqī hūnhòu búyù，shuāngfāng lǎorén dōu hěnzháojí。
The parents are worried about the couple who could not have a baby.
因为工作繁忙，他们结婚多年不育。
Yīnwéi gōngzuò fánmáng，tāmen jiéhūn duōnián búyù。
They did not have a baby for many years because of their heavy amount of work.
不知为什么她婚后多年不孕。
Bùzhī wèishénme tā hūnhòu duōnián búyùn。
It is not clear why she could not get pregnant many years after her marriage.
他们结婚时候的财礼是相当的讲究。
Tāmen jiéhūn shíhou de cáilǐ shì xiāngdāng de jiǎngjiū。
They bought exquisite betrothal gifts when they got married.
婚礼上，亲朋好友都来称贺。
Hūnlǐ shàng，qīnpéng hǎoyǒu dōu lái chēnghè。
At weddings, relatives and friends come to offer their congratulations.
他之所以迟婚，主要是工作太忙了。
Tā zhīsuǒyǐ chíhūn，zhǔyào shì gōngzuò tài máng le。
He married late because he was always busy with work.
旧社会，很多人是为了冲喜才结婚的。
Jiù shèhuì，hěnduōrén shì wèi le chōngxǐ cái jiéhūn de。
In the old society, many people went into marriage in order to cure their ill relatives.
好朋友就要结婚了，我们决定一起出份子给他买礼物。
Hǎopéngyou jiùyào jiéhūn le，wǒmen juédìng yìqǐ chūfènzi gěi tā mǎi lǐwù。
Our good friend is going to get married, we decide to buy him a present together.
他们把结婚的新房布置成了古式的，床前挂了床帐。
Tāmen bǎ jiéhūn de xīnfáng bùzhì chéng le gǔshì de，chuáng qián guà le chuángzhàng。
They hang a bed-curtain in front of their bed, making their wedding room in the ancient style.
她结婚的时候请了个乐队，吹打弹唱的，特别热闹。
Tā jiéhūn de shíhou qǐng le gè yuèduì，chuīdǎ tánchàng de，tèbié rènào。
She hired a band when getting married and it was very lively with the band playing the instruments.
他催请我去参加他的婚宴。
Tā cuīqǐng wǒ qù cānjiā tā de hūnyàn。
He pressed me to go to his wedding feast.
新婚之日，亲朋好友都来向我道喜。
Xīnhūn zhī rì，qīnpéng hǎoyǒu dōu lái xiàng wǒ dàoxǐ。
Relatives and friends all came to congratulate me on my wedding day.
我们等房结婚，如同等米下锅一般。
Wǒmen děng fáng jiéhūn，rútóng děng mǐ xiàguō yìbān。
We are awaiting a house to get married, just like awaiting rice to cook.
他俩已经订亲了，明年就会举行婚礼。
Tā liǎ yǐjing dìngqīn le，míngnián jiùhuì jǔxíng hūnlǐ。
They are already engaged, and will hold the wedding ceremony next year.
按照习俗，订婚是一定要有定礼的。
Ànzhào xísú，dìnghūn shì yídìng yào yǒu dìnglǐ de。
According to custom, betrothal gifts are necessary for an engagement.
丧偶多年后，他终于决定二婚了。
Sàng\'ǒu duōnián hòu，tā zhōng yú juédìng èrhūn le。
Having been a widower for many years, he finally decided to marry again.
他喜欢她，可是他的家里不同意，嫌她是个二婚。
Tā xǐhuan tā，kěshì tā de jiālǐ bùtóngyì，xián tā shì gè èrhūn。
He loves her, but his parents object to their marriage as she is marrying for the second time.
如果不是这场飞祸，他们两个早就结婚了。
Rúguǒ búshì zhèchǎng fēihuò，tāmen liǎnggè zǎo jiù jiéhūn le。
They would have got married if the accident hadn\'t occurred.
自从结婚后，儿子就从父母家搬出去，分户另过了。
Zìcóng jiéhūn hòu，érzi jiù cóng fùmǔ jiā bān chūqù，fēnhù lìng guò le。
After his marriage, he moved out of his parents\' house and lived separately.
棋后棋王结为夫妻，新婚蜜月暂时封棋。
Qíhòu qíwáng jiéwéi fūqī，xīnhūn mìyuè zànshí fēngqí。
As the queen and king of chess have got married, the game will be delayed for their honeymoon.
在西方，婚后的女人要改姓夫家的姓。
Zài xīfāng，hūnhòu de nǚrén yào gǎi xìng fūjiā de xìng。
In western societies, a woman must adopt her husband\'s last name after marriage.
婚后不久，她就随着夫君走南闯北。
Hūnhòu bùjiǔ，tā jiù suí zhe fūjūn zǒunán chuǎngběi。
She followed her husband to a lot of places not long after they got married.
订婚宴上，男女双方互换了庚帖。
Dìnghūnyàn shàng，nánnǚ shuāngfāng hùhuàn le gēngtiè。
The man and the woman exchanged documents of their horoscopes on the engagement party.
他要等功成名就后再结婚。
Tā yào děng gōngchéng míngjiù hòu zài jiéhūn。
He will not get married until he becomes successful and famous.
结了婚就是多了一种责任，增了一份挂累。
Jié le hūn jiùshì duō le yìzhǒng zérèn，zēng le yífèn guàlèi。
Getting married means you have one more responsibility and more things to care about.
由于没法挨家通知，我们只能函告亲友我结婚的消息。
Yóuyú méifǎ āijiā tōngzhī，wǒmen zhǐnéng hángào qīnyǒu wǒ jiéhūn de xiāoxi。
I was unable to inform my relatives and friends of my marriage in person, so I had to send everyone letters.
大学生在校结婚已经合法化了。
Dàxuésheng zàixiào jiéhūn yǐjing héfǎhuà le。
Students have the legal right to marry when they are in university.
朋友结婚，我们给他送去了贺仪。
Péngyou jiéhūn，wǒmen gěi tā sòngqù le hèyí。
We sent him a wedding gift.
他的后婚妻子很贤惠，把他照顾得很好。
Tā de hòuhūn qīzǐ hěnxiánhuì，bǎ tā zhàogù de hěnhǎo。
His digamous wife is very virtuous, and takes good care of him.
家里人坚决不同意他娶一个后婚做媳妇。
Jiā lǐ rén jiānjué bùtóngyì tā qǔ yígè hòuhūn zuò xífù。
His family firmly disapproved of his marrying a digamous wife.
昨天他忽地告诉我他要结婚了。
Zuótiān tā hū de gàosù wǒ tā yào jiéhūn le。
Yesterday, he suddenly told me that he was going to get married.
这家公司专门从事婚丧服务。
Zhèjiā gōngsī zhuānmén cóngshì hūnsàng fúwù。
This company specializes in providing services for weddings and funerals.
穿着婚纱的女人最幸福。
Chuānzhe hūnshā de nǚrén zuì xìngfú。
A woman feels happiest wearing a wedding dress.
这个地方的婚俗与众不同，很有特色。
Zhège dìfāng de hūnsú yǔzhòngbùtóng，hěnyǒu tèsè。
The matrimonial customs in this place are unique and have special features.
婚外孕出生的孩子大多没有幸福的童年。
Hūnwàiyùn chūshēng de háizi dàduō méiyǒu xìngfú de tóngnián。
Generally speaking, illegitimate children don\'t have happy childhoods.
他们把婚宴的地址定在了本市最豪华的酒店。
Tāmen bǎ hūnyàn de dìzhǐ dìngzài le běn shì zuì háohuá de jiǔdiàn。
They decided on the most luxurious hotel in the city to hold their wedding reception.
她离婚后基本上就很少和异性交往了。
Tā líhūn hòu jīběnshàng jiù hěnshǎo hé yìxìng jiāowǎng le。
She has rarely associated with the other sex since her divorce.
他已经及龄，可以结婚了。
Tā yǐjing jílíng，kěyǐ jiéhūn le。
He has reached the required age to get married.
今天是不容错过的吉期，适于操办婚事。
Jīntiān shì bùróng cuòguò de jíqī，shìyú cāobàn hūnshì。
Today is an unmissable auspicious day, suitable for holding a wedding.
教堂里有六对新人共同举行集体婚礼。
Jiàotáng lǐ yǒu liù duì xīnrén gòngtóng jǔxíng jítǐ hūnlǐ。
There are six couples holding a collective wedding ceremony together in the church.
小王在结婚纪念日送给妻子一束玫瑰花。
Xiǎo Wáng zài jiéhūn jìniànrì sònggěi qīzǐ yí shù méiguīhuā。
Xiao Wang gave his wife a bouquet of roses for their wedding anniversary.
在农村新人结婚时要祭拜祖坟。
Zài nóngcūn xīnrén jiéhūn shí yào jìbài zǔfén。
In the countryside, new couples should offer a sacrifice at their ancestral graves.
结婚十几年来，妻子都是一个很典型的家庭妇女，很本分。
Jiéhūn shí jǐnián lái，qīzǐ dōushì yígè hěndiǎnxíng de jiātíng fùnǚ，hěnběnfèn。
Since we got married ten years ago, my better half has always been a typical housewife who does her duty well.
婚典上交拜的那一刻深深地印在了她的心底。
Hūndiǎn shàng jiāobài de nà yíkè shēnshēn de yìnzài le tā de xīndǐ。
The exchange of bows at her wedding is embedded in her memory.
我姐和我姐丈今天结婚。
Wǒ jiě hé wǒ jiězhàng jīntiān jiéhūn。
My sister is going to marry today.
今儿个是他们结婚五周年的纪念日。
Jīnrgè shì tāmen jiéhūn wǔ zhōunián de jìniànrì。
Today is their five-year wedding anniversary.
大家都很羡慕这老两口的金刚石婚。
Dàjiā dōu hěnxiànmù zhè lǎoliǎngkǒu de jīngāngshíhūn。
People admire the couple\'s diamond marriage.
俗话说久别胜新婚，他们虽然很久才见一次面，但却十分甜蜜。
Súhuà shuō jiǔbié shèng xīnhūn，tāmen suīrán hěnjiǔ cái jiàn yícì miàn，dàn què shífēn tiánmì。
It is said a little separation is better for the newly wedded.They meet only once in a while, but find it very sweet.
婚礼上，新郎新娘依次向客席上的来宾敬酒致意。
Hūnlǐ shàng，xīnláng xīnniáng yīcì xiàng kèxí shàng de láibīn jìngjiǔ zhìyì。
At the wedding ceremony, the bride and bridegroom toasted the guests in turn.
这两支巨大的蜡炬是为他们的新婚之夜而准备的。
Zhè liǎng zhī jùdà de làjù shì wèi tāmen de xīnhūn zhī yè ér zhǔnbèi de。
Two huge candles have been prepared for the wedding night.
古代女孩儿来归的时候，是不穿白色婚纱的。
Gǔdài nǚháir láiguī de shíhou，shì bùchuān báisè hūnshā de。
When girls married in ancient times, they did not wear white wedding dresses.
她要是再不结婚可真成了老姑娘了。
Tā yàoshì zài bùjiéhūn kě zhēn chéng le lǎogūniang le。
She will be an old maiden if she remains single.
儿子结婚时，这些老亲旧邻都来贺喜，大家都很高兴。
Érzi jiéhūn shí，zhèxiē lǎoqīn jiùlín dōu lái hèxǐ，dàjiā dōu hěngāoxìng。
When my son got married, old relatives and neighbours all came to congratulate us and we all had a very good time.
婚礼礼毕，请大家入席。
Hūnlǐ lǐbì，qǐng dàjiā rùxí。
The wedding ceremony is over.  Please take a seat.
他们俩家定下了婚约，立此存照。
Tāmen liǎ jiā dìngxià le hūnyuē，lìcǐ cúnzhào。
The two families struck an affiance, and kept a record.
你俩是天造地设的连枝，还是尽早结婚吧。
Nǐ liǎ shì tiānzào dìshè de liánzhī，háishi jìnzǎo jiéhūn ba。
You are an ideal couple. You\'d better get married quickly.
自从离婚后，他一直过着寥寂的生活。
Zìcóng líhūn hòu，tā yìzhí guò zhe liáojì de shēnghuó。
Since divorced, he has been living a lonely life.
这个不幸的婚姻早该被了断了。
Zhège búxìng de hūnyīn zǎo gāi bèi liǎoduàn le。
This unfortunate marriage should have finished long ago.
出席婚礼的人都要在红纸上留名。
Chūxí hūnlǐ de rén dōuyào zài hóngzhǐ shàng liúmíng。
All people present at the wedding ceremony should write their names on the red paper.
他们结婚20年来没红过脸，真可谓鸾凤和鸣。
Tāmen jiéhūn èrshí niánlái méi hóngguòliǎn，zhēn kěwèi luánfèng hémíng。
They haven’t quarreled for twenty years, they are really a happy couple.
她就是掠夺婚的受害者。
Tā jiùshì lüèduóhūn de shòuhàizhě。
She is the victim of marriage by kidnap.
他买了上好的罗缎送给她的新婚妻子。
Tā mǎi le shànghǎo de luóduàn sònggěi tā de xīnhūn qīzǐ。
He bought high-grade silk for his newly wife.
今天是他的婚礼，他家门庭若市，来往宾客络绎不绝。
Jīntiān shì tā de hūnlǐ，tā jiā méntíngruòshì，láiwǎng bīnkè luòyìbùjué。
Today is his wedding. Many people are streaming to his house.
他们的这起离婚纠纷一直闹上了民事法庭，也没能解决好。
Tāmen de zhè qǐ líhūn jiūfēn yìzhí nàoshàng le mínshì fǎtíng，yě méi néng jiějué hǎo。
Their divorce dispute has gone to civil court, but it has not been settled at last.
根据我们村的民约，结婚的时候男女双方要各种一棵纪念树。
Gēnjù wǒmen cūn de mínyuē，jiéhūn de shíhou nánnǚ shuāngfāng yào gè zhòng yì kē jìniànshù。
According to the convention in our village, the man and woman should each plant a tree when they get married.
她用手上那明闪闪的钻戒向人们宣布：她结婚了。
Tā yòng shǒushàng nà míngshǎnshǎn de zuànjiè xiàng rénmen xuānbù：tā jiéhūn le。
The shining diamond ring on her hand reveals that she got married.
他和她离婚以后就成了陌路人，谁也不理谁了。
Tā hé tā líhūn yǐhòu jiù chéng le mòlùrén，shéi yě bùlǐ shéi le。
After divorce, the two became strangers and do not say a word to each other.
根据之前的安排，婚宴上的男宾皆由男主人招待。
Gēnjù zhīqián de ānpái，hūnyàn shàng de nánbīn jiē yóu nánzhǔrén zhāodài。
According to the prearrangement, male guests in the wedding banquet will be entertained by the bridegroom.
为了婚礼那天显得帅气些，他特意定做了一身呢料礼服。
Wèile hūnlǐ nàtiān xiǎnde shuàiqì xiē，tā tèyì dìngzuò le yìshēn níliào lǐfú。
For the purpose of being more handsome on his wedding day, he had woolen wedding clothes made to order.
他和她是年前认识的，打算年后结婚。
Tā hé tā shì niánqián rènshi de，dǎsuàn niánhòu jiéhūn。
They met before the year, and plan to get married after the new year.
他的娘们儿以前是个演员，结婚就离开舞台了。
Tā de niángmenr yǐqián shì gè yǎnyuán，jiéhūn jiù líkāi wǔtái le。
His wife used to be an actress, but she said goodbye to the stage when they married.
小刘婚礼上，我们都看见了他的新娘子，很漂亮。
Xiǎo Liú hūnlǐ shàng，wǒmen dōu kànjiàn le tā de xīnniángzi，hěnpiàoliàng。
We all saw Xiao Liu\'s wife at their wedding. She\'s very beautiful.
结婚前他们为将来的生活添购了许多器用。
Jiéhūn qián tāmen wèi jiānglái de shēnghuó tiāngòu le xǔduō qìyòng。
They bought many utensils for their future life before the wedding.
抢婚的风俗现在已经很少见了。
Qiǎnghūn de fēngsú xiànzài yǐjing hěnshǎojiàn le。
The grabbing-bride ceremony is a rare custom nowadays.
他们夫妻二人结婚以后一直琴瑟和谐。
Tāmen fūqī èrrén jiéhūn yǐhòu yìzhí qínsè héxié。
They have been living in marital harmony since they got married.
感情要随缘，不要为了想出国而刻意追求涉外婚姻。
Gǎnqíng yào suíyuán，bú yào wèi le xiǎng chūguó ér kèyì zhuīqiú shèwài hūnyīn。
Love is predestined by fate. Don\'t pursue a foreign marriage just because of your wish to go abroad.
我俩约好了，明天去申领结婚证！
Wǒ liǎ yuēhǎo le，míngtiān qù shēnlǐng jiéhūnzhèng ！
We have arranged to apply for a marriage certificate tomorrow.
我们的婚礼将由这位神父主持。
Wǒmen de hūnlǐ jiāng yóu zhèwèi shénfù zhǔchí。
Our nuptials will be performed by this priest.
我受邀参加朋友于明天举办的婚礼。
Wǒ shòuyāo cānjiā péngyou yú míngtiān jǔbàn de hūnlǐ。
I have been invited to attend my friend\'s wedding tomorrow.
大儿子家生孩子，小儿子结婚，这真是双喜临门啊！
Dàérzi jiā shēng háizi，xiǎoérzi jiéhūn，zhè zhēnshì shuāngxǐ línmén a！
The elder son has just had a baby, and the younger one is getting married. It\'s true  that happy events never come alone.
在司铎的主持见证下，他们二人进行了婚礼。
Zài sīduó de zhǔchí jiànzhèng xià，tāmen èr rén jìnxíng le hūnlǐ。
They got married under the priest\'s direction and witness.
今天是我的婚礼，特请来了戏班唱堂会。
Jīntiān shì wǒ de hūnlǐ，tè qǐnglái le xìbān chàng tánghuì。
It is my wedding day today, and I have invited the theatrical troupe to stage a performance in my house.
每当提到她的婚姻生活，她就一脸的幸福。
Měidāng tídào tā de hūnyīn shēnghuó，tā jiù yìliǎn de xìngfú。
Every time she speaks of her married life, she is a picture of happiness.
我准备了很多礼物，明天去你家提婚。
Wǒ zhǔnbèi le hěnduō lǐwù，míngtiān qù nǐ jiā tíhūn。
I\'ve prepared many gifts, because I\'ll go to your parents tomorrow to ask for their consent to our marriage.
他俩在婚礼上发誓要相爱到天荒地老。
Tā liǎ zài hūnlǐ shàng fāshì yào xiāngài dào tiānhuāng dìlǎo。
The two vowed in their wedding ceremony that they would love each other forever.
皇帝大婚时，天庭中举办了盛大的仪式。
Huángdì dàhūn shí，tiāntíng zhōng jǔbàn le shèngdà de yíshì。
The wedding ceremony of the emperor was held in the royal palace.
她结婚时，亲朋好友纷纷为她添箱。
Tā jiéhūn shí，qīnpéng hǎoyǒu fēnfēn wèi tā tiānxiāng。
When she got married, her relatives and friends all gave her gifts of money or presents.
这桩婚姻使他们两家结成了通家。
Zhèzhuāng hūnyīn shǐ tāmen liǎng jiā jiéchéng le tōngjiā。
The marriage has tied the two families together.
我们对全国各地的婚姻风俗进行了通考。
Wǒmen duì quánguó gè dì de hūnyīn fēngsú jìnxíng le tōngkǎo。
We made an investigation of the marriage customs in different places in the country.
在新社会里我们要反对童婚这种陋习。
Zài xīn shèhuì lǐ wǒmen yào fǎnduì tónghūn zhèzhǒng lòuxí。
In the new society, we should oppose the corrupt custom of marrying adolescents.
我头婚娶的是一位四川姑娘。
Wǒ tóuhūn qǔ de shì yíwèi Sìchuān gūniang。
I married a girl from Sichuan in my first marriage.
做子女的应该充分理解父母的夕阳婚。
Zuò zǐnǚ de yīnggāi chōngfèn lǐjiě fùmǔ de xīyánghūn。
Children should support the marriages of old people.
儿子终于结婚了，母亲喜不成寐。
Érzi zhōng yú jiéhūn le，mǔqīn xǐbùchéngmèi。
The mother is now glad that she can sleep without worry, because of her son\'s marriage.
结婚时你应该在桌上放各式各样的喜果招待客人。
Jiéhūn shí nǐ yīnggāi zài zhuō shàng fàng gè shì gè yàng de xǐguǒ zhāodài kèrén。
You should place all kinds of wedding candies on the table to treat the guests at the wedding.
去年我结婚时，专门请小表妹当我的喜娘。
Qùnián wǒ jiéhūn shí，zhuānmén qǐng xiǎobiǎomèi dāng wǒ de xǐniáng。
I invited my little cousin to be my matron of honour at my wedding ceremony.
送发结婚喜贴也不是一件轻松的事。
Sòngfā jiéhūn xǐtiē yě búshì yíjiàn qīngsōng de shì。
It is not an easy task to send wedding invitations.
小表妹今天结婚，姨妈喜兴得不得了。
Xiǎobiǎomèi jīntiān jiéhūn，yímā xǐxìng de bùdéliǎo。
My aunt was overjoyed at her daughter\'s wedding today.
小玉伸出纤纤玉手，接受了定婚戒指。
Xiǎo Yù shēnchū xiānxiān yùshǒu，jiēshòu le dìnghūn jièzhǐ。
Xiao Yu extended her nice thin hand, and accepted the engaging ring.
小王在朋友的婚礼上负责为司仪襄礼。
Xiǎo Wáng zài péngyou de hūnlǐ shàng fùzé wèi sīyí xiānglǐ。
Xiao Wang is going to act as the master of his friend\'s wedding ceremony.
小王因为即将担任婚礼的襄礼而紧张。
Xiǎo Wáng yīnwèi jíjiāng dānrèn hūnlǐ de xiānglǐ ér jǐnzhāng。
Xiao Wang is going to act as the master of the wedding ceremony, which makes him nervous.
文文婚后当了专职太太，在家相夫教子。
Wénwén hūnhòu dāng le zhuānzhí tàitài，zài jiā xiāngfū jiàozǐ。
Wenwen became a housewife after her marriage and takes care of her husband and children.
夫妻间性生活的和谐度也会对婚姻造成影响。
Fūqī jiān xìng shēnghuó de héxié dù yě huì duì hūnyīn zàochéng yǐngxiǎng。
The degree of harmony in a couple\'s sexual life also has an impact on their marriage.
姑娘家许婚了，你快准备迎亲吧。
Gūniangjiā xǔhūn le，nǐ kuài zhǔnbèi yíngqīn ba。
The girl\'s family has accepted your proposal of marriage. Quickly, get ready to marry your bride.
他们新婚宴尔，十分恩爱。
Tāmen xīnhūn yàněr，shífēn ēnài。
They are newly married and love each other very much.
他们离婚的时候要死要活的，现在倒是很好的。
Tāmen líhūn de shíhou yàosǐ yàohuó de，xiànzài dǎoshì hěnhǎo de。
They had a tense relationship when they divorced, but now they have a good relationship.
在中国，妇女一般是对已婚女人的称呼。
Zài Zhōngguó，fùnǚ yìbān shì duì yǐhūn nǚrén de chēnghū。
In China, &quot;women&quot; is a title for married women.
还未结婚就有了小孩，你这真是有伤风化。
Hái wèi jiéhūn jiù yǒu le xiǎohái，nǐ zhè zhēnshì yǒushāng fēnghuà。
Having children without getting married is an offence against decency.
离婚以后他才发现老婆还是原配的好。
Líhūn yǐhòu tā cái fāxiàn lǎopó háishi yuánpèi de hǎo。
After getting divorced, he finally found that his first wife had been much better.
虽然婚后生活十分困苦，但她毫无怨尤。
Suīrán hūnhòu shēnghuó shífēn kùnkǔ，dàn tā háowú yuànyóu。
Though her life after marriage is poor and hard, she has never complained about it.
赞礼宣布结婚仪式正式开始。
Zànlǐ xuānbùjiéhūn yíshì zhèngshì kāishǐ。
The master of the ceremony announced that the wedding ceremony officially began.
他和新婚妻子来到照相馆照相。
Tā hé xīnhūn qīzǐ láidào zhào xiàng guǎn zhào xiàng。
He came to the photo studio with his newly married wife.
他们两人互不相让，这么一来，两人就闹到法院要离婚。
Tāmen liǎng rén hùbùxiāng ràng，zhème yìlái，liǎng rén jiù nàodào fǎyuàn yào líhūn。
They never compromise, so they went to court to apply for a divorce.
她结婚已经有一阵子了。
Tā jiéhūn yǐjing yǒu yí zhènzǐ le。
She has been married for a while.
老婆和他不停的争闹终于导致了离婚。
Lǎopó hé tā bùtíng de zhēngnào zhōng yú dǎozhì le líhūn。
The endless quarrel between him, and his wife finally led to their divorce.
在办理结婚登记的时候，工作人员往往会问“先生，尊姓大名？”
Zài bànlǐ jiéhūn dēngjì de shíhou，gōngzuò rényuán wǎngwǎng huì wèn xiānshēng，zūnxìng dàmíng？
The staff would ask those registering for marriage, “Sir, your name, please?”
配阴婚完全是封建迷信思想在作俑。
Pèi yīnhūn wánquán shì fēngjiàn míxìn sīxiǎng zài zuòyǒng。
Marriage between deceased people was created according to a superstitious feudal idea.
有的人认为婚姻是命中注定的。
yǒu de rén rèn wéi hūn yīn shì mìng zhōng zhù dìng de。
Some people hold that marriage goes by destiny.
他和她的婚典宾朋满座，热闹非凡。
Tā hé tā de hūndiǎn bīnpéng mǎnzuò，rènàofēifán。
A great number of relatives and friends went to their wedding, which was bustling with noise and excitement.
很多婚庆公司都是一条龙服务，很周到。
Hěnduō hūnqìng gōngsī dōushì yìtiáolóng fúwù，hěn zhōudào。
Many matrimonial companies are very thoughtful, providing package services.
小王是我的未婚夫，他是个软件工程师。
Xiǎo Wáng shì wǒ de wèihūnfū，tā shì gè ruǎnjiàn gōngchéngshī。
Xiao wang is my fiance, he is a software engineer.
迈克尔的未婚妻温柔大方，美丽动人。
Màikè\'ěr de wèihūnqī wēnróudàfang，měilìdòngrén。
Michael\'s fiance is very gentle, and pretty.
包办婚姻
bāobànhūnyīn
arranged marriage
他们不久就要结婚了。
Tāmen bùjiǔ jiùyào jiéhūnle。
They are getting married soon.
他父母给他操办婚礼。
Tāfùmǔ gěi tā cāobànhūnlǐ。
His parents made all the arrangements for his wedding.
结婚是人生大事，绝不能草率。
Jiéhūn shì rénshēngdàshì，juébùnéng cǎoshuài。
Marriage is a big deal. You should never go into it rashly.
朋友撮合的婚姻
péngyou cuōhéde hūnyīn
a marriage matchmade by friends
真想不到他会离婚。
Zhēnxiǎngbúdào tā huì líhūn。
I never would have thought he\'d get divorced.
结婚典礼
jiéhūndiǎnlǐ
wedding ceremony
他独身多年后终于结婚了。
Tā dúshēn duōniánhòu zhōngyú jiéhūnle。
After being single for many years, he finally got married.
对于离婚，社会舆论反应不一。
Duìyú líhūn，shèhuìyúlùn fǎnyìngbùyī。
Society is divided in its opinion of divorce.
他的家庭成员多半赞同他的婚事。
Tāde jiātíngchéngyuán duōbàn zàntóng tāde hūnshì。
On the whole, most of his family were happy about his marriage.
婚姻大事得跟父母商量。
Hūnyīndàshì děi gēn fùmǔ shāngliang。
When it comes to marriage you really should talk it through with your parents.
她恨当初和他结了婚。
Tā hèn dāngchū hé tā jiélehūn。
She regretted getting married to him in the first place.
对她来说，结婚即生儿育女。
Duì tā láishuō，jiéhūn jí shēng\'éryùnǚ.
From her point of view, marriage means having children.
她和一位富商结了婚。
Tā hé yíwèi fùshāng jiélehūn.
She married a rich businessman.
这对夫妇结婚30多年了。
Zhè duì fūfù jiéhūn sānshí duōnián le.
This couple have been married for over thirty years.
解除婚约
jiěchú hūnyuē 
break off one\'s engagement
近亲不能结婚。
Jìnqīn bùnéng jiéhūn.
Close relatives cannot marry.
经过3年的恋爱，他们终于结婚了。
Jīngguò sānnián de liàn\'ài，tāmen zhōngyú jiéhūnle.
Having been together for three years, they finally got married.
可惜我不能参加你们的婚礼了。
Kěxī wǒ bùnéng cānjiā nǐmen de hūnlǐ le.
Unfortunately, I can\'t attend your wedding.
门当户对的婚姻未必幸福。
Méndānghùduì de hūnyīn wèibì xìngfú.
Marrying within your own class will not necessarily make you happy.
新婚夫妇一起去度蜜月了。
Xīnhūnfūfù yìqǐ qù dù mìyuè le.
The newly married couple went on their honeymoon.
他们的婚宴办得真排场。
Tāmen de hūnyàn bàn de zhēn páichǎng.
Their wedding was very ostentatious.
未婚妻
wèihūnqī
fiancée
他向她求婚。
Tā xiàng tā qiúhūn.

结婚绝不是他所喜欢的。
The wedding is definitely off.
Hūnlǐ quèdìng qǔxiāo le。
婚礼确定取消了。

Wǒmen yāoqǐngle jǐ wèi yǐhūn niánqīngrén。
我们邀请了几位已婚年轻人。

The divorce caused much gossip.

婚礼日期尚未确定。

在婚礼上穿宠物服装的他非常不合时宜。

Wǒmen chóngfùle tā gèzhǒnggèyàng de jiéhūn jìhuà。
我们重复了她各种各样的结婚计划。
非婚生子女享有与婚生子女同等的继承权。
Fēihūnshēngzǐnǚ xiǎngyǒu yǔ hūnshēngzǐnǚ tóngděng de jìchéngquán。
Children born out of wedlock enjoy the same right of inheritance as children born in lawful wedlock.
非婚生子女享有与婚生子女同等的继承权。
Fēihūnshēngzǐnǚ xiǎngyǒu yǔ hūnshēngzǐnǚ tóngděng de jìchéngquán。
Children born out of wedlock enjoy the same right of inheritance as children born in lawful wedlock.
He was born out of wedlock.
Tā shì fēihūnshēng de。
他是非婚生的。

丧偶多年后，他终于决定二婚了。

他喜欢她，可是他的家里不同意，嫌她是个二婚。
Tā xǐhuan tā，kěshì tā de jiālǐ bùtóngyì，xián tā shì gè èrhūn。
He loves her, but his parents object to their marriage as she is marrying for the second time.

他们夫妻二人结婚以后一直琴瑟和谐。

在司铎的主持见证下，他们二人进行了婚礼。

They got married under the priest\'s direction and witness.

his second marriage

His second marriage was happier than the first.

In the Hall of Sakyamuni, smoke of incense curls up. It is unstained by an evil environment.

Mǎyǐ yìbān kěyǐ fēnwéi cíyǐ、xióngyǐ、gōngyǐ hé bīngyǐ。

我们要有宁作鬼雄不做傀儡的气魄。

Only male cicadas chirp in late summer, and early autumn.

Zhège jíjiāng dǎobì de qǐyè hé jīngjì xiónghòu de dà gōngsī jiāohuān，chénggōng de wǎnjiù le zìjǐ。
The company on the verge of bankruptcy saved itself by building a good relationship with a large prosperous company.

Zhǐyǒu jīnglì jīngtāohàilàng cáinéng jìnxiǎn yīngxióng běnsè。
Only hardships and difficulties can bring out the heroic side of people.
他雄才大略满腹经纶，是个不可多得的人才。
Tā xióngcái dàlüè mǎnfù jīnglún，shì gè bùkě duōdé de réncái。
He has great knowledge and bold vision and is a rare genius .

Shùbēi lìzhuàn shì jīngbiǎo yīngxióng de yìzhǒng fāngfǎ。

Jīntiān zàntíng bǐsài，míngtiān zánmen zài jué cíxióng！

Jūnyuètuán yǎnzòu de jūnyuè géwài xiónghún yǒulì。
The military music played by the military band is especially powerful.
战场上他是个勇猛抗敌的英雄，日常生活中他又像个斯文的书生。
Zhànchǎng shàng tā shì gè yǒngměng kàngdí de yīngxióng，rìcháng shēnghuó zhōng tā yòu xiàng gè sīwén de shūshēng。
On the battlefield he is a brave hero fighting against enemies; during daily life he is like a refined scholar.
据说天空中有一座凌霄宝殿，甚是雄伟。
Jùshuō tiānkōng zhōng yǒu yízuò língxiāo bǎodiàn，shènshì xióngwěi。
It is said that there is a grand and majestic palace in heaven.
他是人们心目中流芳千古的民族英雄。
Tā shì rénmen xīnmù zhōng liúfāng qiāngǔ de mínzú yīngxióng。
He is a national hero with immortal fame in people’s minds.
岳飞做为宋代名将，他的英雄事迹名垂千古。
Yuè Fēi zuòwéi Sòngdài míngjiàng，tā de yīngxióng shìjì míngchuíqiāngǔ。
As a famous Song dynasty general, the heroic deeds of Yuefei are immortalized.
历史上无数英雄都出自这片齐鲁大地。
Lìshǐshàng wúshù yīngxióng dōu chūzì zhèpiàn qílǔ dàdì。
In history, countless numbers of heroes came from Shandong province.
我们要为见义勇为的英雄庆功！
Wǒmen yào wèi jiànyìyǒngwéi de yīngxióng qìnggōng！
We must celebrate the victory for the heroes who have acted bravely in a just cause.
后汉三国时期是一个群雄四起的时期。
Hòuhàn Sānguó shíqī shì yígè qúnxióng sìqǐ de shíqī。
The period between the Later Han Dynasty and the Three Kingdoms was a period in which warlords sprang up everywhere.
替父从军的花木兰说得上是位巾帼英雄。
Tì fù cóngjūn de Huā Mùlán shuōdéshàng shì wèi jīnguó yīngxióng。
Hua Mulan, who joined the army in place of her father, can be counted as a heroine.
有雄厚的经济实力托底，我就可以放手一搏了。
Yǒu xiónghòu de jīngjì shílì tuōdǐ，wǒ jiù kěyǐ fàngshǒu yìbó le。
With such a strong economic foundation, I can do whatever I want without further consideration.
白玉堂是宋朝一个侠胆忠肝的英雄。
Bái Yùtáng shì Sòngcháo yígè xiádǎnzhōnggān de yīngxióng。
Bai Yutang is a chivalrous, and fearless hero.
他从小就希望成为一名侠肝义胆的英雄。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù xīwàng chéngwéi yìmíng xiágānyìdǎn de yīngxióng。
Since he was young, he dreamed of being a chivalous and fearless hero.
中华雄风威震九洲大地。
Zhōnghuá xióngfēng wēizhèn jiǔzhōu dàdì。
The grand appearance of China thrills the whole world.
中国南方有端午节喝雄黄酒的风俗。
Zhōngguó nánfāng yǒu duānwǔjié hē xiónghuángjiǔ de fēngsú。
South China has the custom of drinking realgar wine during the Dragon Boat Festival.
我想知道什么样的人才算是雄杰之才。
Wǒ xiǎng zhīdào shénme yàng de réncái suànshì xióngjié zhī cái。
I want to know what kind of person can be called a man of exceptional ability.
马永贞也可以算是一代雄杰。
Mǎ Yǒngzhēn yě kěyǐ suànshì yídài xióngjié。
Ma Yongzhen can be called a man of great talent.
这支球队以不败的战绩雄居积分榜首。
Zhèzhī qiúduì yǐ búbài de zhànjì xióngjū jīfēn bǎngshǒu。
This team ranks first on the tally with an undefeated record.
长城雄踞在中国北方，起到很好的防御作用。
Chángchéng xióngjù zài Zhōngguó běifāng，qǐdào hěnhǎo de fángyù zuòyòng。
The Great Wall runs graciously across North China, it has worked well in preventing the nomads from attacking.
他的成绩雄踞积分榜第一名，冠军非他莫属。
Tā de chéngjì xióngjù jīfēnbǎng dìyī míng，guànjūn fēi tā mòshǔ。
His marks top the tally. He must be the champion.
这座雄奇的建筑始建于唐代，至今已有一千多年历史了。
Zhèzuò xióngqí de jiànzhù shǐjiànyú Tángdài，zhìjīn yǐyǒu yìqiān duōnián lìshǐ le。
This magnificent and peculiar building was originally built in the Tang Dynasty. It is over one thousand years old.
雄狮虽然是狮群的核心，却不用亲自猎捕食物。
Xióngshī suīrán shì shīqún de héxīn，què búyòng qīnzì lièbǔ shíwù。
Though the male lion is the leader of the pride, it doesn\'t have to hunt food by itself.
吴国一直雄视着赵国，虎视眈眈。
Wúguó yìzhí xióngshì zhe Zhàoguó，hǔshì dāndān。
The State of Wu always covetously eyed the State of Zhao.
雄鹰在苍空飞翔。
Xióngyīng zài cāngkōng fēixiáng。
The eagle is flying up in the blue sky.
莲花峰奇伟秀丽，雄峙在黄山之颠。
Liánhuāfēng qíwěi xiùlì，xióngzhì zài huángshān zhī diān。
Lotus Peak is peculiar and beautiful, sitting high at the top of Mount Huangshan.
东汉末，曹操延纳天下贤才，雄霸一方。
Dōnghàn mò,Cáo Cāo yánnà tiānxià xiáncái,xióngbà yìfāng.
At the end of the Eastern Han Dynasty, Cao Cao recruited a lot of talented people and set up a separatist regime.
古代的大侠扬善除恶，个个都是英雄豪杰。
Gǔdài de dàxiá yángshàn chúè，gègè dōushì yīngxióng háojié。
Chivalrous men in ancient times did good deeds and destroyed evil, all of them were heroes.
工人们把实现英特纳雄耐尔当成最终目标。
Gōngrénmen bǎ shíxiàn yīngtènàxióngnàiěr dàngchéng zuì zhōng mùbiāo。
Workers consider accomplishing internationale their final goal.
他满腹才华，却得不到施展，真是英雄无用武之地！
Tā mǎnfù cáihuá，què débúdào shīzhǎn，zhēnshì yīngxióng wú yòngwǔ zhī dì！
He is full of talent but has no chance to display it; what a hero is he who has no place to display his prowess.
个人英雄主义在任何时候都要不得！
Gèrén yīngxióngzhǔyì zài rènhé shíhou dōu yàobùdé！
Selfish heroism should be abandoned in any circumstance!
战斗英雄在众人的拥簇之下走进了会场。

The war hero walked into the conference hall while thronged by a huge crowd.
微软公司在软件行业称雄有年，好评如潮。

The software company has been in the leading position of the software industry for years, gaining lots of favourable comments.
大敌当前，他表现出了气贯长虹的英雄气概。

蚯蚓是雌雄同体的动物。
Qiūyǐn shì cíxióng tóngtǐ de dòngwù。
Earthworms are androgynous.
有很多植物都是雌雄同株的。
Yǒu hěnduō zhíwù dōushì cíxióng tóngzhū de。
Many plants are androgynous.

Bǔrǔ dòngwù dōushì cíxióng yìtǐ de。

Byron lives on not only in his poetry，but also in his creation of the &quot;Byronic hero&quot; - the persona of a brooding melancholy young man.
Bàilún bùjǐn shēnghuó zài tā de shīgē zhīzhōng，érqiě hái shēnghuó zài tā de“bàilúnshì yīngxióng”de chuàngzuò zhīzhōng；“bàilúnshì yīngxióng”shì zhǐ nà zhǒng chénsī yōuyù de niánqīngrén。
拜伦不仅生活在他的诗歌之中，而且还生活在他的“拜伦式英雄”的创作之中；“拜伦式英雄”是指那种沉思忧郁的年轻人。

The feathers of most male and female pheasants are strikingly different.

From ancient times our forefathers have laboured, lived and multiplied on this land.
祖先
zǔxiān
ancestry; ancestors; forbears; forefathers
祭祀活动的第一项是向祖先奠酒。
Jìsì huódòng de dìyī xiàng shì xiàng zǔxiān diànjiǔ。
The first thing to do at a sacrifice is to toast the elderly.
他的祖先参加过前清的科考，曾经考中过秀才。
Tā de zǔxiān cānjiāguò qiánqīng de kēkǎo，céngjīng kǎozhòngguò xiùcái。
His ancestors took part in the imperial examinations at the early period of the Qing Dynasty. and passed the examination at the county level.
原始时代的人类的祖先们都是群居穴处的。

Man\'s ancestors lived in groups in caves in primitive times.
轩辕黄帝是我们的祖先。
Xuānyuán huángdì shì wǒmen de zǔxiān。
The Yellow Emperor, Xuan Yuan, is our ancestor.
先祖手泽怎能毁在后代手中呢？

根据家谱的记载，我的先祖是清末一名举人。

According to my family record, my late grandfather was a second degree candidate in the provincial examination.

Both species have a common ancestor.

&quot;Proto&quot; is a combining form in a word like &quot;protolanguage&quot; that refers to the hypothetical ancestor of another language or group of languages.
“Proto”shì“protolanguage”zhèyàng de cí de gòucí chéngfèn，hòuzhě shìzhǐ lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán huò lìng yì zǔ yǔyán de jiǎshè zǔxiān。
“Proto”是“protolanguage”这样的词的构词成分，后者是指另一种语言或另一组语言的假设祖先。
Our forefathers brought forth a great nation.

paternal grandparents
祖父母
The sound of tiny feet must have brought much joy to their grandparents.
Xiǎohái kāishǐ xué zǒulù de shēngyīn xiǎngbì yídìng wèi tāmen de zǔ fùmǔ dàiláile jídà huānlè。
小孩开始学走路的声音想必一定为他们的祖父母带来了极大欢乐。
I only knew one of my grandparents had died long before I was born.
Wǒ zhǐ zhīdào wǒ zǔfùmǔ zhōng de yí wèi zài wǒ chūshēng zhīqián hěn jiǔ jiù qùshì le。
我只知道我祖父母中的一位在我出生之前很久就去世了。
Her grandparents set by a college fund for her when she was a baby.
Dāng háishì háizi shí，tā de zǔfùmǔ jiù wèi tā liú chū le dàxué jījīn。
当还是孩子时，她的祖父母就为她留出了大学基金。
I inherited a castle from my French grandparents.
Wǒ cóng wǒ de Fǎguó zǔ fùmǔ nàlǐ jìchéngle yí zuò chéngbǎo。
我从我的法国祖父母那里继承了一座城堡。
Clean up before you see your grandparents.
Dǎban zhěngqí hòu nǐ zài qù jiàn zǔfùmǔ。
打扮整齐后你再去见祖父母。
Grandparents often pamper the children.
Zǔfùmǔ jīngcháng fàngzòng háizi。
祖父母经常放纵孩子。
教育关乎祖国的未来，千万马虎不得。
Jiàoyù guānhū zǔguó de wèilái，qiānwàn mǎhu bùdé。
Education is related to the future of the country and we should take care of it.
She hails from Kalamazoo.
Tā láizì Kǎlāmǎzǔ。
她来自卡拉马祖。
My grandmother is a Roman Catholic and  goes to mass every week.
我祖母是罗马天主教徒，每周都去做礼拜。
Grandmother always treated us to the circus.
Zǔmǔ zǒng ài dài wǒmen qù kàn mǎxì biǎoyǎn。
祖母总爱带我们去看马戏表演。
祖居绍兴
zǔjū Shàoxīng
be a native of Shaoxing
附近的船民都是世居此地，祖祖辈辈以打鱼为生。
Fùjìn de chuánmín dōushì shìjū cǐdì，zǔzǔbèibèi yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
All the neighboring boatmen have lived here and made a living by fishing for generations.
他们是祖祖辈辈都住居在这片土地上的农民。
Tāmen shì zǔzǔbèibèi dōu zhùjū zài zhèpiàn tǔdì shàng de nóngmín。
They are farmers whose forefathers lived on this land.
原始时代的人类的祖先们都是群居穴处的。
Yuánshǐ shídài de rénlèi de zǔxiānmen dōushì qúnjū xuéchǔ de。
Man\'s ancestors lived in groups in caves in primitive times.
祖居北京。
祖居已卖给别姓。
祖父在老家的旧居至今保存完好。
任何国家的人民都不希望自己的祖国变成殖民者的附属国。
Rènhé guójiā de rénmín dōu bùxīwàng zìjǐ de zǔguó biànchéng zhímínzhě de fùshǔguó。
People in any country will not want their homeland to be a dependent colonial state.
保卫祖国
bǎowèi zǔguó 
defend one\'s country
我参军是为了报效祖国。
Wǒ cānjūn shì wèi le bàoxiào zǔguó。
I enlisted in order to serve my country.
走遍祖国大地
zǒubiàn zǔguó dàdì 
travel all over the land
胸怀祖国，放眼世界
Xiōng huái zǔguó, fàngyǎn shìjiè。
have the whole country in mind and the whole world in view
为祖国出一份力
wèi zǔguó chū yífèn lì
do one\'s bit for one\'s country
使祖国更加繁荣富强
shǐ zǔguó gèngjiā fánróngfùqiáng 
make our country more prosperous and powerful
歌唱祖国的繁荣昌盛
gēchàng zǔguó de fánróng chāngshèng
sing (in praise) of the prosperity of our country
光荣归于祖国。
Guānɡrónɡ ɡuī yú zǔɡuó。
The honour (or credit) goes to the country.
光耀祖国
ɡuānɡyào zǔɡuó
bring honour to one\'s country
光荣归于伟大的祖国。
Guāngróngguī yú wěidà de zǔguó。
Glory to the great motherland.
捍卫祖国
hànwèi zǔɡuó
defend one\'s motherland
祖国在呼唤我们！
Zǔguó zài hūhuàn wǒmen！
Our country is calling us.
儿童是祖国的花朵。
Értóngshì zǔguó de huāduǒ。
Children are the flowers of our country.
回到祖国的怀抱
huídào zǔguó de huáibào
return to the embrace of one\'s homeland
热烈欢送毕业生到祖国需要的地方去
rèliè huānsòngbìyèshēngdào zǔguó xūyào de dìfangqù
give a warm send-off to graduates going to where the country needs them
东北是祖国的粮仓。
Dōngběi shì zǔguó de liángcāng。
The Northeast is the granary of the country.
当时他心中只有一个念头，就是为祖国增光。
Dāngshí tā xīn zhōng zhǐyǒu yígè niàntou，jiùshì wèi zǔguó zēngguāng。
At that time he had only one thing in mind: to win credit for his country.
叛卖祖国
pànmài zǔɡuó
betray one\'s country
我们决不辜负祖国对我们的期望。
Wǒmen jué bùgūfù zǔguó duì wǒmen de qīwàng。
We will never disappoint our motherland in her expectations of us.
亲爱的祖国
qīn\'ài de zǔguó
one\'s beloved country
把青春献给祖国
Bǎ qīngchūn xiàngěi zǔguó
dedicate one\'s youth to serving one\'s country
社会主义建设使祖国面貌日新月异。
shèhuìzhǔyì jiànshè shǐ zǔguó miànmào rìxīnyuèyì。
Our socialist construction is changing the face of the land day by day.
为祖国赢得荣誉
wèi zǔguó yíngdé róngyù
win honour for one\'s country
祖国的锦绣山河
zǔguó de jǐnxiù shānhé
our beautiful land
时刻准备保卫祖国
shíkè zhǔnbèi bǎowèi zǔguó
be ready to defend the country at any moment
誓死保卫祖国
shìsǐ bǎowèi zǔguó
pledge to fight to the death in defending one\'s country; be ready to die in defence of one\'s country
勘探队踏遍了祖国的山山水水。
Kāntànduì tàbiàn le zǔguó de shānshānshuǐshuǐ。
The prospecting team has traversed the length and breadth of the land.
祖国在腾飞。
Zǔɡuó zài ténɡfēi。
Our country is developing rapidly.
我只要一息尚存，就要努力为祖国工作。
Wǒ zhǐyào yìxī shàngcún，jiùyào nǔlì wèi zǔguó gōngzuò。
I\'ll work hard for my country as long as I live.
回到日夜萦念的祖国
huídào rìyè yíngniàn de zǔguó 
return to one\'s sorely missed homeland
我今年八十岁了，希望能在有生之年看到祖国统一的实现。
Wǒ jīnnián bāshísuì le，xīwàngnéngzài yǒushēngzhīnián kàndào zǔguó tǒngyī de shíxiàn。
I\'m eighty now. I hope I shall live to see the reunification of our country.
为保卫祖国而战
wèi bǎowèi zǔguó ér zhàn
fight to defend one\'s motherland
祖国大地尽朝晖。
Zǔguó dàdì jìn zhāohuī。
This vast land of ours is glowing in the morning sun.
灿烂的阳光照耀着祖国大地。
Cànlàn de yángguāng zhàoyàozhe zǔguó dàdì。
A bright sun is shining over our country.
为祖国争光
wèi zǔguó zhēngguāng
win honour for our homeland; bring credit to (or be a credit to) our country
祝愿祖国岁岁安澜、年年昌盛！
Zhùyuàn zǔguó suìsuì ānlán、niánnián chāngshèng！
May our country thrive in peace, and prosperity every year.
碑碣上的文字是研究祖国历史的宝贵资料。
Bēijié shàng de wénzì shì yánjiū zǔguó lìshǐ de bǎoguì zīliào。
The words on the tablet are a precious resource for studying the history of the country.
港澳的回归是祖国统一迈出的一大步。
Gǎng Ào de huíguī shì zǔguó tǒngyī màichū de yí dàbù。
The return of Hong Kong and Macao is a big step in the unification of the nation.
教育关乎祖国的未来，千万马虎不得。
Jiàoyù guānhū zǔguó de wèilái，qiānwàn mǎhu bùdé。
Education is related to the future of the country and we should take care of it.
劳动者们为祖国建设谱写着新的华章。
Láodòngzhěmen wèi zǔguó jiànshè pǔxiě zhe xīn de huázhāng。
The labourers are composing new splendid passages for the construction of our country.
为保卫祖国的边境，许多战士浴血疆埸。
Wèi bǎowè zǔguó de biānjìng，xǔduō zhànshì yùxuè jiāngchǎng。
Many soldiers fight hard in bloody battles to guard the border.
过去的一年，祖国建设的各行各业捷音频传。
Guòqù de yìnián，zǔguó jiànshè de gè háng gè yè jiéyīn pínchuán。
All industries and fields in our country have gone smoothly in the past year.
国庆节时，全国人民祝愿祖国昌盛康泰！
Guóqìngjié shí，quánguó rénmín zhùyuàn zǔguó chāngshèng kāngtài！
On National Day, all the people wish their country prosperity and eternal peace.
他从小就想当个能够保卫祖国一方宁靖的将军。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù xiǎng dāng gè nénggòu bǎowè zǔguó yìfāng níngjìng de jiāngjūn。
He has dreamed of being a general defending his motherland since he was a child.
今天派送他们出国学习，是希望明天他们能够回来报效祖国。
Jīntiān pàisòng tāmen chūguó xuéxí，shì xīwàng míngtiān tāmen nénggòu huílái bàoxiào zǔguó。
We send them abroad to study today because we hope that they will come back to serve their country.
轻骑兵为了保卫祖国而整装待发。
Qīngqíbīng wèi le bǎowè zǔguó ér zhěngzhuāng dàifā。
The light cavalry gets ready for a journey in order to defend our motherland.
阔别多年，我终于又回到了祖国的热土上！
Kuòbié duōnián，wǒ zhōng yú yòu huídào le zǔguó de rètǔ shàng！
Having been away from my motherland for several years, I have finally returned to my native land!
我们每个公民都应该和祖国荣辱与共。
Wǒmen měigè gōngmín dōu yīnggāi hé zǔguó róngrǔ yǔgòng。
Every citizen should share honor and disgrace with our country.
唱起这些颂赞伟大祖国的歌曲，使人心情振奋。
Chàngqǐ zhèxiē sòngzàn wěidà zǔguó de gēqǔ，shǐ rén xīnqíng zhènfèn。
Singing these songs that praise our great country, one feels stimulated.
我已经决定学成后投效祖国。
Wǒ yǐjing juédìng xuéchéng hòu tóuxiào zǔguó。
I\'ve decided to devote myself to the nation after finishing my study.
我们立誓要为祖国再立新功。
Wǒmen lìshì yào wèi zǔguó zài lì xīngōng。
We swear to make new contributions to our motherland.
我们要学习他许身祖国的精神。
Wǒmen yào xuéxí tā xǔshēn zǔguó de jīngshén。
We should learn his spirit of devoting himself to the country.
学童是祖国的希望，要好好引导教育。
Xuétóng shì zǔguó de xīwàng，yào hǎohǎo yǐndǎo jiàoyù。
School children are the hope of our country. They need to be well guided and educated.
我们要以祖国为荣，绝不能做有损于国格的事。
Wǒmen yào yǐ zǔguó wéiróng，jué bùnéng zuò yǒusǔnyú guógé de shì。
We should be proud of our country and never do things to violate our national character and morals.
钱学森远渡重洋，历经艰辛才终于回到祖国。
Qián Xuésēn yuǎndù chóngyáng，lìjīng jiānxīn cái zhōng yú huídào zǔguó。
Qianxuesin travelled all the way across the ocean, finally returning to his motherland after undergoing various difficulties.
壮文作为祖国民族文字的一员得到了很好的保护和发扬。
Zhuàngwén zuòwéi zǔguó mínzú wénzì de yìyuán dédào le hěnhǎo de bǎohù hé fāyáng。
The Zhuang Characters, members of the country\'s national characters, are well protected and promoted.
为了祖国的明天，我们必须作好基础教育工作。
Wèile zǔguó de míngtiān，wǒmen bìxū zuòhǎo jīchǔ jiàoyù gōngzuò。
We must do well in our fundamental education for our country\'s future.
经过多年的转战，这个流亡政府终于回到了祖国。
Jīngguò duōnián de zhuǎnzhàn，zhège liúwáng zhèngfǔ zhōngyú huídàole zǔguó。
After years\' fighting in one place after another, the government-in-exile finally returned to its native land.
他是一个爱国的民主人士，多年来一直关注着祖国的建设发展。
Tā shì yígè àiguó de mínzhǔ rénshì，duōnián lái yìzhí guānzhùzhe zǔguó de jiànshè fāzhǎn。
He is a patriotic democratic personage, and has been paying close attention to the development of his motherland.

one\'s native land
祖国
They were trying to defend their land.
他们一直都在努力捍卫自己的祖国。
He wrote a beautiful description of his country.
他将自己的祖国描绘得非常美丽。
country of origin
祖国
Cain has been living overseas for thirty years and he really misses his native soil.
凯恩在国外生活了三十年，他非常想念自己的祖国。
Deep love for his country was conveyed in the poem.
这首诗表达了他对祖国的深深的爱。
The fugitive was delivered to his home country.
Táowángzhě bèi qiǎnsòng huí zìjǐ de zǔguó。
逃亡者被遣送回自己的祖国。
He is a singing sensation in his home country.
Tā zài tā de zǔguó shì yí wèi tiāncái gēshǒu。
他在他的祖国是一位天才歌手。
We are one of the richest states on earth.
Wǒmen zǔguó shì dìqiúshàng zuì fùyù de guójiā zhī yī。
我们祖国是地球上最富裕的国家之一。
Our countries are no longer mortal enemies engaged in a worldwide Cold War.
Wǒmen gèzì de zǔguó búzàishì dì-yī cì shìjiè dàzhàn jiāozhàn zhōng búgòngdàitiān de dírén。
我们各自的祖国不再是第一次世界大战交战中不共戴天的敌人。
They were fighting like lions in defence of their homeland.
Wèile bǎowèi zǔguó，tāmen xiàng shīzi yíyàng zhàndòu。
为了保卫祖国，他们像狮子一样战斗。
She had offered up her life for her country.
Tā yǐjīng wèi tā de zǔguó xiànchūle shēngmìng。
她已经为她的祖国献出了生命。
I take my hat off to those who serve this country with honor.
Wǒ tuōmào xiàng nàxiē bàoxiào zǔguó de rén zhìjìng。
我脱帽向那些报效祖国的人致敬。
The spy betrayed his country.
Zhè míng jiàndié bèipànle tā de zǔguó。
这名间谍背叛了他的祖国。
He served his country meritoriously.
Tā wèi zìjǐ de zǔguó zuòchūle hěn dà de gòngxiàn。
他为自己的祖国做出了很大的贡献。
I feel at last that in some way I have made a contribution to my country.
wǒ zhōngyú juéde zìjǐ yǐ mǒuzhǒng fāngshì wèi zǔguó zuòle gòngxiàn。
我终于觉得自己以某种方式为祖国作了贡献。
English ancestor of American square dance was the Morris dance.
美洲方块舞的鼻祖是英国的莫里斯舞。
I inherited a castle from my French grandparents.
Wǒ cóng wǒ de Fǎguó zǔ fùmǔ nàlǐ jìchéngle yí zuò chéngbǎo。
我从我的法国祖父母那里继承了一座城堡。
Canadian people have roots in hundreds of countries.
加拿大人的祖先遍布上百个国家。
他今年暑假在祖父母家度过。
Tā jīnnián shǔjiǎ zài zǔfùmǔ jiā dùguò。
He stayed at his grandparents\' house during the summer holiday.
孩子由祖父母监护。
Háizǐ yóu zǔfùmǔ jiānhù.
The child\'s grandparents are its guardians.
曾祖父母
Zēngzǔfùmǔ
great-grandparents
远离祖父母。
A cousin-german is a first cousin
同祖父母(或外祖父母)的兄弟(或姐妹)，是堂(或表)兄弟(或姐妹)
Children should follow the well-meaning advice of parents or grandparents.
孩子应该听父母或祖父母的忠告。
maternal grandparents
外祖父母
paternal grandparents
祖父母
The sound of tiny feet must have brought much joy to their grandparents.
Xiǎohái kāishǐ xué zǒulù de shēngyīn xiǎngbì yídìng wèi tāmen de zǔ fùmǔ dàiláile jídà huānlè。
小孩开始学走路的声音想必一定为他们的祖父母带来了极大欢乐。
I only knew one of my grandparents had died long before I was born.
Wǒ zhǐ zhīdào wǒ zǔfùmǔ zhōng de yí wèi zài wǒ chūshēng zhīqián hěn jiǔ jiù qùshì le。
我只知道我祖父母中的一位在我出生之前很久就去世了。
Her grandparents set by a college fund for her when she was a baby.
Dāng háishì háizi shí，tā de zǔfùmǔ jiù wèi tā liú chū le dàxué jījīn。
当还是孩子时，她的祖父母就为她留出了大学基金。
I inherited a castle from my French grandparents.
Wǒ cóng wǒ de Fǎguó zǔ fùmǔ nàlǐ jìchéngle yí zuò chéngbǎo。
我从我的法国祖父母那里继承了一座城堡。
Clean up before you see your grandparents.
Dǎban zhěngqí hòu nǐ zài qù jiàn zǔfùmǔ。
打扮整齐后你再去见祖父母。
Grandparents often pamper the children.
Zǔfùmǔ jīngcháng fàngzòng háizi。
祖父母经常放纵孩子。
I incline to think that our grandfathers and grandmothers were great.
Wǒ yuànyì xiāngxìn wǒmen de zǔfù hé zǔmǔ shífēn wěidà。
我愿意相信我们的祖父和祖母十分伟大。
paternal grandmother/grandfather
祖母/父
My grandmother was born in 1919, while my grandfather was born in 1917.
我祖母生于1919年，祖父生于1917年。
祖父
zǔfù
(paternal) grandfather
他的高祖父是清朝的举人。
Tā de gāozǔfù shì Qīngcháo de jǔrén。
His great-great-grandfather was a successful candidate in the imperial examinations at the provincial level in the Qing dynasty.
我家有一坛陈年老窖，那是我祖父留下的。
Wǒjiā yǒu yì tán chénnián lǎojiào，nà shì wǒ zǔfù liúxià de。
I have an aged wine left by my grandpa.
那个留有虬髯的老人是我祖父。
Nàge liúyǒu qiúrán de lǎorén shì wǒ zǔfù。
The man with curly whiskers is my grandfather.
每次祭祀祖先时，祖父都会提前将香纸准备好。
Měi cì jìsì zǔxiān shí，zǔfù dōuhuì tíqián jiāng xiāngzhǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo。
My grandfather always prepares the joss sticks and candles in advance every time we go to make a sacrifice to our ancestors.
这条项链是我的曾祖父留下来的。
Zhè tiáo xiàng liàn shì wǒ de zēngzǔfù liúxiàlái de。
My great-grandpa left this necklace to me.
他今年暑假在祖父母家度过。
Tā jīnnián shǔjiǎ zài zǔfùmǔ jiā dùguò。
He stayed at his grandparents\' house during the summer holiday.
祖父
zǔfù
grandfather
孩子由祖父母监护。
Háizǐ yóu zǔfùmǔ jiānhù.
The child\'s grandparents are its guardians.
曾祖父母
Zēngzǔfùmǔ
great-grandparents
祖父
外祖父。
王父(祖父)。
曾祖父。
祖父。
祖父已经故世。

祖父不幸病逝。
曾祖父翰林出身
对祖父很恭顺
祖父对儿孙既慈祥又严格，全家无不敬畏。
祖父在老家的旧居至今保存完好。
他祖父已经不在世了。
A cousin-german is a first cousin
同祖父母(或外祖父母)的兄弟(或姐妹)，是堂(或表)兄弟(或姐妹)
I incline to think that our grandfathers and grandmothers were great.
Wǒ yuànyì xiāngxìn wǒmen de zǔfù hé zǔmǔ shífēn wěidà。
我愿意相信我们的祖父和祖母十分伟大。
maternal grandparents
外祖父母
paternal grandparents
祖父母
He was surprised to hear that his grandfather had died.
听到祖父去世的消息，他感到很震惊。
I wish I could be as active as your grandfather, he looks like a teenager.
我希望我能够像你祖父那样充满活力，他看起来就像十几岁的年轻人。
The notebook on that table was my grandfather\'s diary during the war.
桌上那个笔记本是我祖父在战争时期写的日记。
My grandmother was born in 1919, while my grandfather was born in 1917.
我祖母生于1919年，祖父生于1917年。
My grandfather used to work in the mines.
我祖父曾在矿上工作。
My grandfather started going blind in his seventies and now can\'t see a thing.
我祖父在七十岁时开始渐渐失明，现在他什么也看不到了。
He wasn\'t there when his grandfather breathed his last breath.
祖父咽气时他不在场。
My grandfather was kept in a labor camp for three years during the war.
战争期间，我祖父在劳动集中营待了三年。
My grandfather used to work in a coal mine.
我祖父曾在煤矿工作过。
His grandfather was a pilot.
他的祖父是个飞行员。
Children should follow the well-meaning advice of parents or grandparents.
孩子应该听父母或祖父母的忠告。
My grandfather always encouraged me to dream big.
Wǒ de zǔfù zǒngshì gǔlì wǒ yào yǒu yuǎndà de mèngxiǎng。
我的祖父总是鼓励我要有远大的梦想。
The sound of tiny feet must have brought much joy to their grandparents.
Xiǎohái kāishǐ xué zǒulù de shēngyīn xiǎngbì yídìng wèi tāmen de zǔ fùmǔ dàiláile jídà huānlè。
小孩开始学走路的声音想必一定为他们的祖父母带来了极大欢乐。
Did your grandnother have a contented life?
Nǐ zǔfù de shēnghuó měimǎn ma？
你祖父的生活美满吗？
His granddaughter is the beneficiary of the trust.
Tā de zǔfù shì xìntuō wù de shòuyìrén。
他的祖父是信托物的受益人。
He vented his spite on Grandfather and the rest of the family.
Tā xiàng tā zǔfù hé qítā jiārén xuānxiè tā de èdú。
他向他祖父和其他家人宣泄他的恶毒。
His grandfather had a chessboard made of horn and bone.
Wǒ de zǔfù yǒu yítào yòng jiǎo hé gǔtou zhìchéng de qípán。
我的祖父有一套用角和骨头制成的棋盘。
I am the indirect descendant of her great-grandfather.
Wǒ shì tā zéngzēngzǔfù de pángxì hòuyì。
我是她曾曾祖父的旁系后裔。
My grandfather left me his coin collection, when he died.
Zǔfù qùshì shí，bǎ tā de yìngbì shōucáng liúgěile wǒ。
祖父去世时，把他的硬币收藏留给了我。
My grandfather lives there, as it were.
Wǒ de zǔfù céngjīng zhùzài Nàli。
我的祖父曾经住在那里。
Kids charged down to their grandfather, whose hands were full of candies.
Kàndào tā Shǒulǐ ná mǎn le tángguǒ，háizǐmen chōng xiàqù pūxiàng tāmen de zǔfù。
看到他手里拿满了糖果，孩子们冲下去扑向他们的祖父。
My great-grandfather\'s watch still keeps perfect time.
Wǒ zēngzǔfù de shǒubiǎo yīrán zǒu de hěn zhǔn。
我曾祖父的手表依然走得很准。
I only knew one of my grandparents had died long before I was born.
Wǒ zhǐ zhīdào wǒ zǔfùmǔ zhōng de yí wèi zài wǒ chūshēng zhīqián hěn jiǔ jiù qùshì le。
我只知道我祖父母中的一位在我出生之前很久就去世了。
Her grandparents set by a college fund for her when she was a baby.
Dāng háishì háizi shí，tā de zǔfùmǔ jiù wèi tā liú chū le dàxué jījīn。
当还是孩子时，她的祖父母就为她留出了大学基金。
He sympathized on the loss of their grandfather.
Tā duì tāmen shīqù zǔfù biǎoshì tóngqíng。
他对他们失去祖父表示同情。
My grandfather lived until the end of war.
Wǒ zǔfù yìzhí huódào zhànzhēng jiéshù。
我祖父一直活到战争结束。
I inherited a castle from my French grandparents.
Wǒ cóng wǒ de Fǎguó zǔ fùmǔ nàlǐ jìchéngle yí zuò chéngbǎo。
我从我的法国祖父母那里继承了一座城堡。

打扮整齐后你再去见祖父母。
Grandparents often pamper the children.
Zǔfùmǔ jīngcháng fàngzòng háizi。
祖父母经常放纵孩子。
The grandfather dandled the small child.
Zǔfù hǒngzhe zhège xiǎohái。
祖父哄着这个小孩。
paternal grandmother/grandfather
祖母/父
他家有个祖传的翡翠扳指儿，很值钱。
Tā jiā yǒu gè zǔchuán de fěicuì bānzhǐr，hěnzhíqián。
He has a jadeite ring passed down from his ancestors. It is worth a lot of money now.
如今他就想多传几个徒弟，他不希望这祖传的行当成为绝门儿。
Rújīn tā jiù xiǎng duōchuán jǐgè túdì，tā bùxīwàng zhè zǔchuán de hángdàng chéngwéi juéménr。
All he thinks about nowadays is to have more apprentices, because he doesn\'t want this business that has been passed on for generations to have no-one inherit it from his generation.
祖传的医方据说对于治疗肾虚效果很好。
Zǔchuán de yīfāng jùshuō duìyú zhìliáo shènxū xiàoguǒ hěnhǎo。
The ancestral prescription is said to be efficacious against renal weakness.
他们祖上传下来的产业早就变卖掉了。
Tāmen zǔshàng chuán xiàlái de chǎnyè zǎo jiù biànmài diào le。
They sold their ancestral estate long ago.
这本图籍是祖上传下来的，你要好好保存。
Zhèběn tújí shì zǔshàng chuán xiàlái de，nǐ yào hǎohǎo bǎocún。
This land chart and census register has been handed down from our ancestors, so you should keep it safe.
这条老规矩是祖上传下来的。
Zhè tiáo lǎoguījū shì zǔshàng chuán xiàlái de。
This custom has been passed down by our predecessors.
过去的一年，祖国建设的各行各业捷音频传。
Guòqù de yìnián，zǔguó jiànshè de gè háng gè yè jiéyīn pínchuán。
All industries and fields in our country have gone smoothly in the past year.
此件为祖传墨宝，怎敢拱让！
把祖传秘方贡献出来
祖传秘方。
祖传绝技恕不外传。
把祖传文物献给国家，绝不是为了向政府邀赏。
祖传绝技。
这种习俗是祖辈流传下来的。
祖国优秀的传统文化具有强大的感召力量
光大祖国优秀文化传统
异国来信传达了海外赤子对祖国的眷恋之情
This ring means a lot to me, it was my grandma\'s.
这个戒指对我来说意义重大，那是我祖母传下来的。
It is an oral history，passed on from generation to generation.
Zhè shì yíduàn zǔzǔbèibèi、kǒukǒuxiāngchuán de lìshǐ。
这是一段祖祖辈辈、口口相传的历史。
作为祖率的提出者，古代科学家祖冲之不愧是一代大家。
Zuòwéi zǔlǜ de tíchūzhě，gǔdài kēxuéjiā Zǔ Chōngzhī búkuì shì yídài dàjiā。
As the person who put forward the approximate ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, the ancient scientist Zuchongzhi is really worthy of being called a master.
祖冲之很早就把圆周率准确推算到小数点后七位。
Zǔ Chōngzhī hěnzǎo jiù bǎ yuánzhōulǜ zhǔnquè tuīsuàn dào xiǎoshùdiǎn hòu qīwèi。
Zu Chongzhi accurately calculated the value of pi to seven decimal places.
我家祖祖辈辈都是种地的。
Wǒjiā zǔzǔbèibèi dōushì zhòngdì de。
Our family have been farmers for generations. or I come from a long line of farmers.
他们祖祖辈辈生活在敕勒川。
Tāmen zǔzǔbèibèi shēnghuó zài chìlèchuān。
They  have lived in Chile chuan for generations.
附近的船民都是世居此地，祖祖辈辈以打鱼为生。
Fùjìn de chuánmín dōushì shìjū cǐdì，zǔzǔbèibèi yǐ dǎyú wéishēng。
All the neighboring boatmen have lived here and made a living by fishing for generations.
每次祭祀祖先时，祖父都会提前将香纸准备好。
Měi cì jìsì zǔxiān shí，zǔfù dōuhuì tíqián jiāng xiāngzhǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo。
My grandfather always prepares the joss sticks and candles in advance every time we go to make a sacrifice to our ancestors.
他们是祖祖辈辈都住居在这片土地上的农民。
Tāmen shì zǔzǔbèibèi dōu zhùjū zài zhèpiàn tǔdì shàng de nóngmín。
They are farmers whose forefathers lived on this land.
作为祖率的提出者，古代科学家祖冲之不愧是一代大家。
Zuòwéi zǔlǜ de tíchūzhě，gǔdài kēxuéjiā Zǔ Chōngzhī búkuì shì yídài dàjiā。
As the person who put forward the approximate ratio of the circumference of a circle to its diameter, the ancient scientist Zuchongzhi is really worthy of being called a master.
保卫祖国
bǎowèi zǔguó 
defend one\'s country
我参军是为了报效祖国。
Wǒ cānjūn shì wèi le bàoxiào zǔguó。
I enlisted in order to serve my country.
他们祖上传下来的产业早就变卖掉了。
Tāmen zǔshàng chuán xiàlái de chǎnyè zǎo jiù biànmài diào le。
They sold their ancestral estate long ago.
走遍祖国大地
zǒubiàn zǔguó dàdì 
travel all over the land
胸怀祖国，放眼世界
Xiōng huái zǔguó, fàngyǎn shìjiè。
have the whole country in mind and the whole world in view
为祖国出一份力
wèi zǔguó chū yífèn lì
do one\'s bit for one\'s country
使祖国更加繁荣富强
shǐ zǔguó gèngjiā fánróngfùqiáng 
make our country more prosperous and powerful
歌唱祖国的繁荣昌盛
gēchàng zǔguó de fánróng chāngshèng
sing (in praise) of the prosperity of our country
光荣归于祖国。
Guānɡrónɡ ɡuī yú zǔɡuó。
The honour (or credit) goes to the country.
光耀祖国
ɡuānɡyào zǔɡuó
bring honour to one\'s country
光荣归于伟大的祖国。
Guāngróngguī yú wěidà de zǔguó。
Glory to the great motherland.
捍卫祖国
hànwèi zǔɡuó
defend one\'s motherland
祖国在呼唤我们！
Zǔguó zài hūhuàn wǒmen！
Our country is calling us.
儿童是祖国的花朵。
Értóngshì zǔguó de huāduǒ。
Children are the flowers of our country.
回到祖国的怀抱
huídào zǔguó de huáibào
return to the embrace of one\'s homeland
热烈欢送毕业生到祖国需要的地方去
rèliè huānsòngbìyèshēngdào zǔguó xūyào de dìfangqù
give a warm send-off to graduates going to where the country needs them
东北是祖国的粮仓。
Dōngběi shì zǔguó de liángcāng。
The Northeast is the granary of the country.
当时他心中只有一个念头，就是为祖国增光。
Dāngshí tā xīn zhōng zhǐyǒu yígè niàntou，jiùshì wèi zǔguó zēngguāng。
At that time he had only one thing in mind: to win credit for his country.
叛卖祖国
pànmài zǔɡuó
betray one\'s country
我们决不辜负祖国对我们的期望。
Wǒmen jué bùgūfù zǔguó duì wǒmen de qīwàng。
We will never disappoint our motherland in her expectations of us.
明成祖迁都北京。
Míngchéngzǔ qiāndū Běijīng。
Emperor Cheng Zu of the Ming Dynasty moved the capital to Beijing.
亲爱的祖国
qīn\'ài de zǔguó
one\'s beloved country
把青春献给祖国
Bǎ qīngchūn xiàngěi zǔguó
dedicate one\'s youth to serving one\'s country
社会主义建设使祖国面貌日新月异。
shèhuìzhǔyì jiànshè shǐ zǔguó miànmào rìxīnyuèyì。
Our socialist construction is changing the face of the land day by day.
为祖国赢得荣誉
wèi zǔguó yíngdé róngyù
win honour for one\'s country
祖国的锦绣山河
zǔguó de jǐnxiù shānhé
our beautiful land
自古以来，我们的祖先就劳动、生息、繁殖在这块土地上。
Zìgǔ yǐlái，wǒmen de zǔxiān jiù láodòng、shēngxī、fánzhí、zài zhèkuài tǔdì shàng。
From ancient times our forefathers have laboured, lived and multiplied on this land.
时刻准备保卫祖国
shíkè zhǔnbèi bǎowèi zǔguó
be ready to defend the country at any moment
誓死保卫祖国
shìsǐ bǎowèi zǔguó
pledge to fight to the death in defending one\'s country; be ready to die in defence of one\'s country
祀祖
sìzǔ
offer sacrifices to one\'s ancestors
勘探队踏遍了祖国的山山水水。
Kāntànduì tàbiàn le zǔguó de shānshānshuǐshuǐ。
The prospecting team has traversed the length and breadth of the land.
祖国在腾飞。
Zǔɡuó zài ténɡfēi。
Our country is developing rapidly.
我只要一息尚存，就要努力为祖国工作。
Wǒ zhǐyào yìxī shàngcún，jiùyào nǔlì wèi zǔguó gōngzuò。
I\'ll work hard for my country as long as I live.
回到日夜萦念的祖国
huídào rìyè yíngniàn de zǔguó 
return to one\'s sorely missed homeland
我今年八十岁了，希望能在有生之年看到祖国统一的实现。
Wǒ jīnnián bāshísuì le，xīwàngnéngzài yǒushēngzhīnián kàndào zǔguó tǒngyī de shíxiàn。
I\'m eighty now. I hope I shall live to see the reunification of our country.
为保卫祖国而战
wèi bǎowèi zǔguó ér zhàn
fight to defend one\'s motherland
祖国大地尽朝晖。
Zǔguó dàdì jìn zhāohuī。
This vast land of ours is glowing in the morning sun.
灿烂的阳光照耀着祖国大地。
Cànlàn de yángguāng zhàoyàozhe zǔguó dàdì。
A bright sun is shining over our country.
为祖国争光
wèi zǔguó zhēngguāng
win honour for our homeland; bring credit to (or be a credit to) our country
祖居绍兴
zǔjū Shàoxīng
be a native of Shaoxing
祖孙三代
zǔsūn sān dài

祖宗崇拜
zǔzonɡ chónɡbài 
ancestor (or ancestral) worship
鼻祖
bízǔ
the earliest ancestor; originator (of a tradition, school of thought, etc.)
祖父
zǔfù
(paternal) grandfather
祖籍
zǔjí
original family home; ancestral home; the land of one\'s ancestors

zǔmǔ
(paternal) grandmother
祖先
zǔxiān
ancestry; ancestors; forbears; forefathers
祖宗
zǔzong
forefathers; ancestry; forbears
远祖
yuǎnzǔ
remote ancestor
祝愿祖国岁岁安澜、年年昌盛！
Zhùyuàn zǔguó suìsuì ānlán、niánnián chāngshèng！
May our country thrive in peace, and prosperity every year.
他家有个祖传的翡翠扳指儿，很值钱。
Tā jiā yǒu gè zǔchuán de fěicuì bānzhǐr，hěnzhíqián。
He has a jadeite ring passed down from his ancestors. It is worth a lot of money now.
碑碣上的文字是研究祖国历史的宝贵资料。
Bēijié shàng de wénzì shì yánjiū zǔguó lìshǐ de bǎoguì zīliào。
The words on the tablet are a precious resource for studying the history of the country.
听说他祖上是位清代的贝勒爷。
Tīngshuō tā zǔshàng shì wèi qīngdài de bèilèyé。
I\'ve heard that he has an ancestor who was awarded Beile (a knighthood in the Qing Dynasty).
伯祖给他讲了许多过去的故事。
Bózǔ gěi tā jiǎng le xǔduō guòqù de gùshì。
His grand-uncle told him many stories in the past.
伯祖母共有三个女儿。
Bózǔmǔ gòng yǒu sāngè nǚ\'ér。
His grand-aunt has 3 daughters altogether.
他们祖上有过不少出将入相的人物。
Tāmen zǔshàng yǒuguò bùshǎo chūjiàng rù xiàng de rénwù。
Many of their ancestors were once people who were dignitaries.
祭祀活动的第一项是向祖先奠酒。
Jìsì huódòng de dìyī xiàng shì xiàng zǔxiān diànjiǔ。
The first thing to do at a sacrifice is to toast the elderly.
他家祖上曾经有人出任过封疆大吏。
Tā jiā zǔshàng céngjīng yǒurén chūrènguò fēngjiāng dàlì。
One of his ancestors was once the governor of a border province.
港澳的回归是祖国统一迈出的一大步。
Gǎng Ào de huíguī shì zǔguó tǒngyī màichū de yí dàbù。
The return of Hong Kong and Macao is a big step in the unification of the nation.
他的高祖父是清朝的举人。
Tā de gāozǔfù shì Qīngcháo de jǔrén。
His great-great-grandfather was a successful candidate in the imperial examinations at the provincial level in the Qing dynasty.
教育关乎祖国的未来，千万马虎不得。
Jiàoyù guānhū zǔguó de wèilái，qiānwàn mǎhu bùdé。
Education is related to the future of the country and we should take care of it.
这次回老家，他准备认祖归宗。
Zhècì huí lǎojiā，tā zhǔnbèi rènzǔ guīzōng。
He is planning to return to his ancestors during his trip to his hometown.
劳动者们为祖国建设谱写着新的华章。
Láodòngzhěmen wèi zǔguó jiànshè pǔxiě zhe xīn de huázhāng。
The labourers are composing new splendid passages for the construction of our country.
在农村新人结婚时要祭拜祖坟。
Zài nóngcūn xīnrén jiéhūn shí yào jìbài zǔfén。
In the countryside, new couples should offer a sacrifice at their ancestral graves.
孙中山在革命成功后到明孝陵前面祭告明太祖。
Sūn Zhōngshān zài gémìng chénggōng hòu dào míngxiàolíng qiánmiàn jìgào Míngtàizǔ。
Sun Yat-sen went to worship the first emperor of the Ming Dynasty at his tomb and tell him about the revolution\'s success.
清明节时人们纷纷回乡祭扫祖坟。
Qīngmíngjié shí rénmen fēnfēn huíxiāng jìsǎo zǔfén。
During Tomb Sweeping Festival, most people go back to their hometowns to clean their ancestral tombs and offer sacrifices. .
为保卫祖国的边境，许多战士浴血疆埸。
Wèi bǎowè zǔguó de biānjìng，xǔduō zhànshì yùxuè jiāngchǎng。
Many soldiers fight hard in bloody battles to guard the border.
过去的一年，祖国建设的各行各业捷音频传。
Guòqù de yìnián，zǔguó jiànshè de gè háng gè yè jiéyīn pínchuán。
All industries and fields in our country have gone smoothly in the past year.
老祖宗留下的旧物我们应当批判地继承。
Lǎozǔzōng liúxià de jiùwù wǒmen yīngdāng pīpàn de jìchéng。
In regard to our ancestors\' old systems, we must inherit critically.
这件旧物是他祖爷爷留下来的。
Zhèjiàn jiùwù shì tā zǔyéye liúxiàlái de。
This antique belonged to his great grandfather.
如今他就想多传几个徒弟，他不希望这祖传的行当成为绝门儿。
Rújīn tā jiù xiǎng duōchuán jǐgè túdì，tā bùxīwàng zhè zǔchuán de hángdàng chéngwéi juéménr。
All he thinks about nowadays is to have more apprentices, because he doesn\'t want this business that has been passed on for generations to have no-one inherit it from his generation.
国庆节时，全国人民祝愿祖国昌盛康泰！
Guóqìngjié shí，quánguó rénmín zhùyuàn zǔguó chāngshèng kāngtài！
On National Day, all the people wish their country prosperity and eternal peace.
他的祖先参加过前清的科考，曾经考中过秀才。
Tā de zǔxiān cānjiāguò qiánqīng de kēkǎo，céngjīng kǎozhòngguò xiùcái。
His ancestors took part in the imperial examinations at the early period of the Qing Dynasty. and passed the examination at the county level.
我家有一坛陈年老窖，那是我祖父留下的。
Wǒjiā yǒu yì tán chénnián lǎojiào，nà shì wǒ zǔfù liúxià de。
I have an aged wine left by my grandpa.
鲁班是建筑工匠的祖师。
Lǔ Bān shì jiànzhù gōngjiàng de zǔshī。
Lu Ban was the originator of architecture.
这里的妈祖庙香火很盛，据说挺灵验的。
Zhèlǐ de māzǔmiào xiānghuǒ hěnshèng，jùshuō tǐng língyàn de。
The Mazu temple here attracts a large number of pilgrims, and it is said that it is quite effective.
他从小就想当个能够保卫祖国一方宁靖的将军。
Tā cóng xiǎo jiù xiǎng dāng gè nénggòu bǎowè zǔguó yìfāng níngjìng de jiāngjūn。
He has dreamed of being a general defending his motherland since he was a child.
今天派送他们出国学习，是希望明天他们能够回来报效祖国。
Jīntiān pàisòng tāmen chūguó xuéxí，shì xīwàng míngtiān tāmen nénggòu huílái bàoxiào zǔguó。
We send them abroad to study today because we hope that they will come back to serve their country.
这是明成祖第五次亲征漠北了。
Zhè shì Míngchéngzǔ dìwǔ cì qīnzhēng mòběi le。
It is the fifth time that the Emperor Mingcheng has personally led a military expedition.
轻骑兵为了保卫祖国而整装待发。
Qīngqíbīng wèi le bǎowè zǔguó ér zhěngzhuāng dàifā。
The light cavalry gets ready for a journey in order to defend our motherland.
那个留有虬髯的老人是我祖父。
Nàge liúyǒu qiúrán de lǎorén shì wǒ zǔfù。
The man with curly whiskers is my grandfather.
原始时代的人类的祖先们都是群居穴处的。
Yuánshǐ shídài de rénlèi de zǔxiānmen dōushì qúnjū xuéchǔ de。
Man\'s ancestors lived in groups in caves in primitive times.
阔别多年，我终于又回到了祖国的热土上！
Kuòbié duōnián，wǒ zhōng yú yòu huídào le zǔguó de rètǔ shàng！
Having been away from my motherland for several years, I have finally returned to my native land!
我们每个公民都应该和祖国荣辱与共。
Wǒmen měigè gōngmín dōu yīnggāi hé zǔguó róngrǔ yǔgòng。
Every citizen should share honor and disgrace with our country.
我家有一本太祖爷爷自己选编并抄写的《李白诗钞》。
Wǒjiā yǒu yìběn tàizǔyéye zìjǐ xuǎnbiān bìng chāoxiě de《Lǐ Bái Shīchāo》。
There is A Copy of Libai\'s Poems selected and copied by my great grandfather himself at my home.
他家是有名的世医之家，祖上都是名医。
Tā jiā shì yǒumíng de shìyī zhī jiā，zǔshàng dōushì míngyī。
His family is well-known in medicine for generations, and has a long line of famous doctors.
先祖手泽怎能毁在后代手中呢？
Xiānzǔ shǒuzé zěnnéng huǐ zài hòudài shǒu zhōng ne？
How can the ancestor\'s handwriting and articles be ruined in the hand of their offspring?
唱起这些颂赞伟大祖国的歌曲，使人心情振奋。
Chàngqǐ zhèxiē sòngzàn wěidà zǔguó de gēqǔ，shǐ rén xīnqíng zhènfèn。
Singing these songs that praise our great country, one feels stimulated.
我已经决定学成后投效祖国。
Wǒ yǐjing juédìng xuéchéng hòu tóuxiào zǔguó。
I\'ve decided to devote myself to the nation after finishing my study.
这本图籍是祖上传下来的，你要好好保存。
Zhèběn tújí shì zǔshàng chuán xiàlái de，nǐ yào hǎohǎo bǎocún。
This land chart and census register has been handed down from our ancestors, so you should keep it safe.
根据家谱的记载，我的先祖是清末一名举人。
Gēnjù jiāpǔ de jìzǎi，wǒ de xiānzǔ shì qīngmò yìmíng jǔrén。
According to my family record, my late grandfather was a second degree candidate in the provincial examination.
我们立誓要为祖国再立新功。
Wǒmen lìshì yào wèi zǔguó zài lì xīngōng。
We swear to make new contributions to our motherland.
我们要学习他许身祖国的精神。
Wǒmen yào xuéxí tā xǔshēn zǔguó de jīngshén。
We should learn his spirit of devoting himself to the country.
轩辕黄帝是我们的祖先。
Xuānyuán huángdì shì wǒmen de zǔxiān。
The Yellow Emperor, Xuan Yuan, is our ancestor.
学童是祖国的希望，要好好引导教育。
Xuétóng shì zǔguó de xīwàng，yào hǎohǎo yǐndǎo jiàoyù。
School children are the hope of our country. They need to be well guided and educated.
听说他祖上在衙门里当过衙役，没什么出息。
Tīngshuō tā zǔshàng zài yámen lǐ dāng guò yáyì，méi shénme chūxi。
It is said that someone in his family was a runner in the government office, but didn\'t turn out well.
祖传的医方据说对于治疗肾虚效果很好。
Zǔchuán de yīfāng jùshuō duìyú zhìliáo shènxū xiàoguǒ hěnhǎo。
The ancestral prescription is said to be efficacious against renal weakness.
从那么高的地方摔下来都没事，你多亏了祖上积的阴骘。
Cóng nàme gāo de dìfāng shuāi xiàlái dōu méishì，nǐ duōkuī le zǔshàng jī de yīn zhì。
You fell from such a high place and you weren\'t hurt, you should thank the good deeds done in secret of your ancestors.
你的这种做法是有悖于祖宗家法的。
Nǐ de zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ shì yǒubèi yú zǔzōng jiāfǎ de。
Your method is against the domestic disciplines made by our forefathers.
我们要以祖国为荣，绝不能做有损于国格的事。
Wǒmen yào yǐ zǔguó wéiróng，jué bùnéng zuò yǒusǔnyú guógé de shì。
We should be proud of our country and never do things to violate our national character and morals.
钱学森远渡重洋，历经艰辛才终于回到祖国。
Qián Xuésēn yuǎndù chóngyáng，lìjīng jiānxīn cái zhōng yú huídào zǔguó。
Qianxuesin travelled all the way across the ocean, finally returning to his motherland after undergoing various difficulties.
这条项链是我的曾祖父留下来的。
Zhè tiáo xiàng liàn shì wǒ de zēngzǔfù liúxiàlái de。
My great-grandpa left this necklace to me.
祖母最喜欢的花是指甲花。
Zǔmǔ zuì xǐhuan de huā shì zhǐjiǎhuā。
Grandma\'s most favorite flower is balsam.
壮文作为祖国民族文字的一员得到了很好的保护和发扬。
Zhuàngwén zuòwéi zǔguó mínzú wénzì de yìyuán dédào le hěnhǎo de bǎohù hé fāyáng。
The Zhuang Characters, members of the country\'s national characters, are well protected and promoted.
他嗜赌成性，最后输光了自己的祖产。
Tā shìdǔ chéngxìng，zuìhòu shūguāng le zìjǐ de zǔchǎn。
Gambling became second nature to him, and he finally lost his ancestral estate.
他今年暑假在祖父母家度过。
Tā jīnnián shǔjiǎ zài zǔfùmǔ jiā dùguò。
He stayed at his grandparents\' house during the summer holiday.
他这种做法其实也只不过是祖述前人罢了。
Tā zhèzhǒng zuòfǎ qíshí yě zhǐbúguò shì zǔshù qiánrén bà le。
His method actually follows the example of his predecessors.
他祖述了前人的理论，同时结合了新时代的精神。
Tā zǔshù le qiánrén de lǐlùn，tóngshí jiéhé le xīn shídài de jīngshén。
He followed the theory of his predecessors while combining it with the spirit of the new era.
由于祖业丰厚，他这辈子可以衣食无忧了。
Yóuyú zǔyè fēnghòu，tā zhèbèizi kěyǐ yīshí wúyōu le。
Thanks to the generous ancestral estate, he has enough food and clothes for his entire life.
凭借祖业，他在朝廷里也能谋个一官半职。
Píngjiè zǔyè，tā zài cháotíng lǐ yě néng móu gè yìguān bànzhí。
With the property handed down from his ancestors, he was able to get a small post in the royal government.
任何国家的人民都不希望自己的祖国变成殖民者的附属国。
Rènhé guójiā de rénmín dōu bùxīwàng zìjǐ de zǔguó biànchéng zhímínzhě de fùshǔguó。
People in any country will not want their homeland to be a dependent colonial state.
为了祖国的明天，我们必须作好基础教育工作。
Wèile zǔguó de míngtiān，wǒmen bìxū zuòhǎo jīchǔ jiàoyù gōngzuò。
We must do well in our fundamental education for our country\'s future.
经过多年的转战，这个流亡政府终于回到了祖国。
Jīngguò duōnián de zhuǎnzhàn，zhège liúwáng zhèngfǔ zhōngyú huídàole zǔguó。
After years\' fighting in one place after another, the government-in-exile finally returned to its native land.
他是一个爱国的民主人士，多年来一直关注着祖国的建设发展。
Tā shì yígè àiguó de mínzhǔ rénshì，duōnián lái yìzhí guānzhùzhe zǔguó de jiànshè fāzhǎn。
He is a patriotic democratic personage, and has been paying close attention to the development of his motherland.
祖冲之很早就把圆周率准确推算到小数点后七位。
Zǔ Chōngzhī hěnzǎo jiù bǎ yuánzhōulǜ zhǔnquè tuīsuàn dào xiǎoshùdiǎn hòu qīwèi。
Zu Chongzhi accurately calculated the value of pi to seven decimal places.

àizǔguó

bízǔ

Háizǐ yóu zǔfùmǔ jiānhù.
The child\'s grandparents are its guardians.
他渴望回到祖国的怀抱。
Tā kěwàng huídào zǔguó de huáibào.
He longs to return to his country.
祖母
zǔmǔ
grandmother
他从小和祖母一起生活。
Tā cóngxiǎo hé zǔmǔ yìqǐ shēnghuó。
He\'s lived with his grandmother since he was little.

zǔsūn sāndài

This custom has been passed down by our predecessors.
