A cousin-german is a first cousin
同祖父母(或外祖父母)的兄弟(或姐妹)，是堂(或表)兄弟(或姐妹)
great-grandmother
曾祖母；外曾祖母
My grandmother was born in 1919, while my grandfather was born in 1917.
我祖母生于1919年，祖父生于1917年。
I incline to think that our grandfathers and grandmothers were great.
Wǒ yuànyì xiāngxìn wǒmen de zǔfù hé zǔmǔ shífēn wěidà。
我愿意相信我们的祖父和祖母十分伟大。
It is an oral history，passed on from generation to generation.
Zhè shì yíduàn zǔzǔbèibèi、kǒukǒuxiāngchuán de lìshǐ。
这是一段祖祖辈辈、口口相传的历史。
a Spaniard by birth
一个西班牙血统的人(或祖籍西班牙的人)
one\'s native land
祖国
maternal grandparents
外祖父母
paternal grandparents
祖父母
a remote ancestor
远祖
He was surprised to hear that his grandfather had died.
听到祖父去世的消息，他感到很震惊。

我希望我能够像你祖父那样充满活力，他看起来就像十几岁的年轻人。
What age is your grandmother? She looks so young.
你祖母高寿啊？她看起来好年轻啊。
The notebook on that table was my grandfather\'s diary during the war.
桌上那个笔记本是我祖父在战争时期写的日记。
My grandmother has a lock of my mother\'s hair among her pictures.
祖母的相片间夹着一缕我妈妈的头发。
My grandmother is a Roman Catholic and  goes to mass every week.
我祖母是罗马天主教徒，每周都去做礼拜。
My grandmother can\'t easily thread the needle.
穿针引线对我祖母来说可不容易。
As we give praise to god, let\'s remember our ancestors.
在我们歌颂上帝的同时，也不要忘记我们的祖先。
He climbed the stairs and knocked on the wooden door of his grandmother\'s room.
他爬上楼梯，敲他祖母房间的木门。
This ring means a lot to me, it was my grandma\'s.
这个戒指对我来说意义重大，那是我祖母传下来的。
When human ancestors began eating meat, they were forced to expand their territory to find food.
人类祖先在将肉类作为食物伊始，就被迫扩大自己的活动范围以获取食物。
My grandfather used to work in the mines.
我祖父曾在矿上工作。
Tomorrow is my grandmother\'s ninetieth birthday.
明天是我祖母九十大寿。

我祖母是一位道德高尚的人。
My grandfather started going blind in his seventies and now can\'t see a thing.
我祖父在七十岁时开始渐渐失明，现在他什么也看不到了。
He wasn\'t there when his grandfather breathed his last breath.
祖父咽气时他不在场。
Your grandmother is always bursting with life and happiness.
你祖母总是神采奕奕，洋溢着幸福。。

战争期间，我祖父在劳动集中营待了三年。

我祖父曾在煤矿工作过。

她正考虑搬到祖母的乡间小屋去。

他们一直都在努力捍卫自己的祖国。

他将自己的祖国描绘得非常美丽。

他的祖父是个飞行员。

她的祖母是个和善热心的人。

我祖母有个很好看的茶叶罐。
Canadian people have roots in hundreds of countries.
加拿大人的祖先遍布上百个国家。
This a china teapot belongs to my grandmother.
这个瓷质茶壶是祖母的。
English ancestor of American square dance was the Morris dance.
美洲方块舞的鼻祖是英国的莫里斯舞。

就职业/祖籍/天性而言
Her family came to Los Angeles at the turn of the century.
她的祖先在世纪初时来到洛杉矶。

country of origin

一些不同的物种是由同一祖先演化而来的。

凯恩在国外生活了三十年，他非常想念自己的祖国。

我祖母把她的汽车保养得很好。

Táowángzhě bèi qiǎnsòng huí zìjǐ de zǔguó。

Father can refer to a founder of a family.
Zǔxiān kěyǐ zhǐ yí gè jiātíng de chuàngshǐrén。

Tā de zǔmǔ shì tā de jiānhùrén jiān péngyou。

Always active, my grandmother continues to exercise well into her 90\'s.

&quot;Proto&quot; is a combining form in a word like &quot;protolanguage&quot; that refers to the hypothetical ancestor of another language or group of languages.
“Proto”shì“protolanguage”zhèyàng de cí de gòucí chéngfèn，hòuzhě shìzhǐ lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán huò lìng yì zǔ yǔyán de jiǎshè zǔxiān。
“Proto”是“protolanguage”这样的词的构词成分，后者是指另一种语言或另一组语言的假设祖先。
He served his country meritoriously.
Tā wèi zìjǐ de zǔguó zuòchūle hěn dà de gòngxiàn。

曾祖母；外曾祖母
I am the indirect descendant of her great-grandfather.
Wǒ shì tā zéngzēngzǔfù de pángxì hòuyì。
我是她曾曾祖父的旁系后裔。
My great-grandfather\'s watch still keeps perfect time.
Wǒ zēngzǔfù de shǒubiǎo yīrán zǒu de hěn zhǔn。
我曾祖父的手表依然走得很准。
My grandfather used to work in the mines.
我祖父曾在矿上工作。
My grandfather used to work in a coal mine.
我祖父曾在煤矿工作过。
My grandfather lives there, as it were.
Wǒ de zǔfù céngjīng zhùzài Nàli。
我的祖父曾经住在那里。
My grandmother used to go in and sit and read off the screen.
Wǒ zǔmǔ céngjīng jìnqù，ránhòu zuò xiàlái，liúlì de dúchū zhěng píng de nèiróng。
我祖母曾经进去，然后坐下来，流利地读出整屏的内容。

远祖
yuǎnzǔ
remote ancestor
钱学森远渡重洋，历经艰辛才终于回到祖国。
Qián Xuésēn yuǎndù chóngyáng，lìjīng jiānxīn cái zhōng yú huídào zǔguó。
Qianxuesin travelled all the way across the ocean, finally returning to his motherland after undergoing various difficulties.
人类的远祖是类人猿。
远离祖祖国
远离祖父母。
我爱祖国，她永远连着我的心。
祖母慈祥的面容永远印刻在我的脑海里。
a remote ancestor
远祖
My grandfather always encouraged me to dream big.
Wǒ de zǔfù zǒngshì gǔlì wǒ yào yǒu yuǎndà de mèngxiǎng。
我的祖父总是鼓励我要有远大的梦想。
显扬先祖。
先祖手泽怎能毁在后代手中呢？
Xiānzǔ shǒuzé zěnnéng huǐ zài hòudài shǒu zhōng ne？
How can the ancestor\'s handwriting and articles be ruined in the hand of their offspring?
根据家谱的记载，我的先祖是清末一名举人。
Gēnjù jiāpǔ de jìzǎi，wǒ de xiānzǔ shì qīngmò yìmíng jǔrén。
According to my family record, my late grandfather was a second degree candidate in the provincial examination.
每次祭祀祖先时，祖父都会提前将香纸准备好。
Měi cì jìsì zǔxiān shí，zǔfù dōuhuì tíqián jiāng xiāngzhǐ zhǔnbèi hǎo。
My grandfather always prepares the joss sticks and candles in advance every time we go to make a sacrifice to our ancestors.
自古以来，我们的祖先就劳动、生息、繁殖在这块土地上。
Zìgǔ yǐlái，wǒmen de zǔxiān jiù láodòng、shēngxī、fánzhí、zài zhèkuài tǔdì shàng。
From ancient times our forefathers have laboured, lived and multiplied on this land.
祖先
zǔxiān
ancestry; ancestors; forbears; forefathers
祭祀活动的第一项是向祖先奠酒。
Jìsì huódòng de dìyī xiàng shì xiàng zǔxiān diànjiǔ。
The first thing to do at a sacrifice is to toast the elderly.
他的祖先参加过前清的科考，曾经考中过秀才。
Tā de zǔxiān cānjiāguò qiánqīng de kēkǎo，céngjīng kǎozhòngguò xiùcái。
His ancestors took part in the imperial examinations at the early period of the Qing Dynasty. and passed the examination at the county level.
原始时代的人类的祖先们都是群居穴处的。
Yuánshǐ shídài de rénlèi de zǔxiānmen dōushì qúnjū xuéchǔ de。
Man\'s ancestors lived in groups in caves in primitive times.
轩辕黄帝是我们的祖先。
Xuānyuán huángdì shì wǒmen de zǔxiān。
The Yellow Emperor, Xuan Yuan, is our ancestor.
显扬先祖。
祖先|
祖先。
据说他们的祖先本姓文，后来才改姓闻的。
祭拜祖先。
As we give praise to god, let\'s remember our ancestors.
在我们歌颂上帝的同时，也不要忘记我们的祖先。
When human ancestors began eating meat, they were forced to expand their territory to find food.
人类祖先在将肉类作为食物伊始，就被迫扩大自己的活动范围以获取食物。
Canadian people have roots in hundreds of countries.
加拿大人的祖先遍布上百个国家。
Her family came to Los Angeles at the turn of the century.
她的祖先在世纪初时来到洛杉矶。
Some different species emerged from the same ancestors.
一些不同的物种是由同一祖先演化而来的。
Father can refer to a founder of a family.
Zǔxiān kěyǐ zhǐ yí gè jiātíng de chuàngshǐrén。
祖先可以指一个家庭的创始人。
Wolves are the ancestors of the modern dog.
Láng shì xiàndài gǒu de zǔxiān。
狼是现代狗的祖先。
A token of their ancestry will be seen in the curly tail feathers of the drakes.
Gōng yā de zǔxiān biāojì nénggòu cóng qí juǎnqū de wěi yǔ shàng kàn chūlái。
公鸭的祖先标记能够从其卷曲的尾羽上看出来。
Both species have a common ancestor.
Liǎng gè wùzhǒng yǒu yí gè gòngtóng de zǔxiān。
两个物种有一个共同的祖先。
Our ancestors never used cramps to secure their masonry.
Wǒmen de zǔxiān cóng méiyǒu yòng tiěgū lái gùdìng zhuānshí jiànzhù。
我们的祖先从没有用铁箍来固定砖石建筑。
The head of the family evoked the spirits of the ancestors.
Jiāzú de zhǎnglǎo huànchūle zǔxiān de shénlíng。
家族的长老唤出了祖先的神灵。
These objects and artifacts are tangible proof of the intellectual, artistic and social life of our ancestors.
Zhèxiē gǔlǎo wùjiàn hé shǐqián qìwù shì wǒmen zǔxiān de zhìlì、yìshù hé shèhuì shēnghuó de míngquè zhèngjù。
这些古老物件和史前器物是我们祖先的智力、艺术和社会生活的明确证据。
They were guarding the wisdom of their ancestors.
Tāmen bǎocúnzhe zǔxiān de zhīshi。
他们保存着祖先的知识。
Our ancestors gathered nuts in the fall.
Wǒmen de zǔxiān zài qiūtiān shōují jiānguǒ。
我们的祖先在秋天收集坚果。
Fire was one of our ancestors\' first discoveries.
Huǒ shì wǒmen de zǔxiān zuì chū de fāxiàn zhī yī。
火是我们的祖先最初的发现之一。
&quot;Proto&quot; is a combining form in a word like &quot;protolanguage&quot; that refers to the hypothetical ancestor of another language or group of languages.
“Proto”shì“protolanguage”zhèyàng de cí de gòucí chéngfèn，hòuzhě shìzhǐ lìng yì zhǒng yǔyán huò lìng yì zǔ yǔyán de jiǎshè zǔxiān。
“Proto”是“protolanguage”这样的词的构词成分，后者是指另一种语言或另一组语言的假设祖先。
Our forefathers brought forth a great nation.
Wǒmen de zǔxiān chuànglìle yí gè wěidà de mínzú。
我们的祖先创立了一个伟大的民族。
外祖母。

A cousin-german is a first cousin
同祖父母(或外祖父母)的兄弟(或姐妹)，是堂(或表)兄弟(或姐妹)

外祖父母

保卫祖国
bǎowèi zǔguó 
defend one\'s country
时刻准备保卫祖国
shíkè zhǔnbèi bǎowèi zǔguó
be ready to defend the country at any moment
誓死保卫祖国
shìsǐ bǎowèi zǔguó
pledge to fight to the death in defending one\'s country; be ready to die in defence of one\'s country
为保卫祖国而战
wèi bǎowèi zǔguó ér zhàn
fight to defend one\'s motherland
为保卫祖国的边境，许多战士浴血疆埸。
Wèi bǎowè zǔguó de biānjìng，xǔduō zhànshì yùxuè jiāngchǎng。

He has dreamed of being a general defending his motherland since he was a child.

Zhè háizi zhēn pí！
What a naughty child!

能办出这种事来，你真是个泼皮！

婴儿们细皮嫩肉的样子真是惹人喜爱。

Babies with their delicate skins are very lovely.
他皮笑肉不笑的样子真可恶。
Tā pí xiào ròu bú xiào de yàngzi zhēn kěwù.

这小家伙真皮
这孩子太调皮，真叫父母挂心

The Pennsylvania Dutch tole watering can might be a reproduction but it looks convincing.

那件宾夕法尼亚荷兰人用铁皮水罐可能是一件复制品，但看起来像是真品。

After playing computer games for such a long time, he couldn\'t keep his eyes open.
你眼皮子也太低了，这样的货色你也要。

你居然在警察眼皮底下偷东西，好大的胆子。

我眼皮直跳。
Wǒ yǎnpí zhí tiào。
My eyes kept twitching.
困得我上下眼皮直打架。
Kùn de wǒ shàngxià yǎnpí zhí dǎjià。

在某人眼皮底下发生/进行

这两个人在光天化日之下而且在敌人的眼皮底下继续前行。
In two minutes his eyelids closed, his chin fell on his breast, he gave a deep sigh, and instantly was in a profound sleep, breathing loudly.
Liǎng fēnzhōng hòu tā de yǎnpí héshàngle，xiàba chuídào xiōngkǒu，tā shēnshēn de tànle kǒu qì，suíhòu lìjí xiànrùle hānshuì，xiǎngliàng de dǎzhe hūlū。
两分钟后他的眼皮合上了，下巴垂到胸口，他深深地叹了口气，随后立即陷入了酣睡，响亮地打着呼噜。
To get into their cabins, he has to steal the keys from under their noses.
Xiǎng yào jìn dào tāmen de xiǎomùwū lǐ，tā děi cóng tāmen yǎnpí dǐxià tōudào yàoshi。

bags under the eyes
眼睛下的松垂的眼泡皮

西瓜皮
xīɡuāpí
watermelon rind

Zhèběn huángpíshū zhǐchū le wǒguó jīngjì fāzhǎn de qíngkuàng。

中国人是黄种人，他们有着黄皮肤和黑眼睛。
Zhōngguórén shì huángzhǒng rén，tāmen yǒu zhe huáng pífū hé hēi yǎnjīng。
Chinese people belong to the yellow race. They have yellow skin, and black eyes.
这人做了错事还理直气壮地说昏话，脸皮也太厚了！
Zhèrén zuò le cuòshì hái lǐzhí qìzhuàng de shuō hūnhuà，liǎnpí yě tài hòu le！
This man really has a thick skin! He said such absurd and unreasonable words after his mistake.
小刚家是做物流生意的，一发货就有十火车皮之多。
Xiǎo Gāng jiā shì zuò wùliú shēngyì de，yì fāhuò jiù yǒu shí huǒchēpí zhī duō。
Xiao Gang\'s family are in the logistics trade, and they deliver as many as ten railway cars of goods every time they do business.
一看她的鸡皮就知道她年纪很大了。
Yíkàn tā de jīpí jiù zhīdào tā niánjì hěndà le。
Her goose flesh shows that she is already of an advanced age.
她新买的皮鞋是尖头的，款式很新颖。
Tā xīnmǎi de píxié shì jiāntóu de，kuǎnshì hěnxīnyǐng。
She bought a new type of leather shoes with pointed ends.
这个顽皮的孩子，总是爱跟大人犟嘴。
Zhège wánpí de háizi，zǒngshì ài gēn dàrén jiàngzuǐ。
The naughty child likes to answer his parents back.
这孩子太调皮，必须严加拘管。
Zhè háizi tài tiáopí，bìxū yánjiā jūguǎn。
This naughty child must be strictly disciplined.
宝宝穿了小皮鞋，走起路来喀哒喀哒地响。
Bǎobao chuān le xiǎopíxié，zǒuqǐlùlái kādākādā de xiǎng。
The baby thumps about while wearing a pair of leather shoes.
她这个坎肩是软羊皮的，特别暖和。
Tā zhège kǎnjiān shì ruǎnyángpí de，tèbié nuǎnhé。
Her sleeveless jacket is made of soft sheepskin and is very warm.
他已经在这枯坐一天了，也没有人来找他擦皮鞋。
Tā yǐjing zài zhè kūzuò yìtiān le，yě méiyǒu rén lái zhǎo tā cā píxié。
He has sat there idly for a day, and no one asked him to polish shoes.
他夸海口说他一定可以买得到这款限量的皮包。
Tā kuāhǎikǒu shuō tā yídìng kěyǐ mǎidédào zhè kuǎn xiànliàng de píbāo。
He boasted that he would buy a limited edition leather bag.
这里的皮革加工业，逐渐形成了块状经济态势。
Zhèlǐ de pígé jiāgōngyè，zhújiàn xíngchéng le kuàizhuàng jīngjì tàishì。
A horizontal economic system has gradually shaped the leather processing industry in this area.
她新买的小皮包真是漂亮！
Tā xīnmǎi de xiǎopíbāo zhēnshì piàoliàng！
The little leather bag she just bought is really pretty.
他的皮鞋总是擦得亮光光的。
Tā de píxié zǒngshì cā de liàngguāngguāng de。
His shoes are always brilliantly brushed.
药房里有驴皮胶出售。
Yàofáng lǐ yǒu lǘpíjiāo chūshòu。
E-gelatin is sold in drug stores.
驴皮影的演出吸引了不少青少年。
Lǘpíyǐng de yǎnchū xīyǐn le bùshǎo qīngshàonián。
The performance of puppet shadow shows attract a lot of adolescents.
对于这件事，我也只是略知皮毛。
Duìyú zhèjiàn shì，wǒ yě zhǐshì lüèzhī pímáo。
I know only a little about this matter.
满地都是他扔下的桔子皮。
Mǎndì dōushì tā rēngxià de júzipí。
The floor was covered with the tangerine peel he scattered.
医生的检查报告显示他的皮肤已经感染了螨虫。
Yīshēng de jiǎnchá bàogào xiǎnshì tā de pífū yǐjing gǎnrǎn le mǎnchóng。
The examination report of the doctor reveals that his skin is infected with mites.
他总是这样没皮没脸的，招人讨厌。
Tā zǒngshì zhèyàng méipí méiliǎn de，zhāorén tǎoyàn。
He is always shameless, and is repulsive to others.
你最近皮肤看起来不太好，应该用点美容霜了。
Nǐ zuìjìn pífū kànqǐlái bú tài hào，yīnggāi yòng diǎn měiróngshuāng le。
Your skin does not look good recently. You’d better use facial cream.
她表面上很文静，内里却也有顽皮淘气的一面。
Tā biǎomiàn shàng hěnwénjìng，nèilǐ què yě yǒu wánpí táoqì de yí miàn。
She appears gentle and quiet, but she is naughty in her heart.
在开着暖风机的房间里呆久了，她觉得皮肤有些干燥。
Zài kāi zhe nuǎnfēngjī de fángjiān lǐ dāi jiǔ le，tā juédé pífū yǒuxiē gānzào。
Being in the room with a convection heater on, she felt her skin was a little bit dry.
这种没有信誉保证的皮包商，你千万别信他！
Zhèzhǒng méiyǒu xìnyù bǎozhèng de píbāoshāng，nǐ qiānwàn bié xìn tā！

她热爱自然、喜爱动物，所以她从来不穿皮大衣。

She loves nature and animals, so she never wears a leather coat.
坐在这个皮垫上感觉十分暖和、舒适。

Tā hěnxǐhuan píhuátǐng zhè xiàng yùndòng。
He likes canoeing.

她开了一家专营各类皮件工艺品的小店。

She runs a small shop which deals in fur goods.

Young girls like to tie their plaits with rubber bands of different colors.

他只是受了些皮肉伤，并没有伤到骨头。

He received only some bruises, his bones haven\'t been damaged.
这都是些皮相之谈，没什么深刻独到的见解。

These are all superficial opinions, not deep and profound understanding.

能办出这种事来，你真是个泼皮！

他是这条巷子里出了名的青皮，你可别惹他。

她一拿到工资就给妈妈买了一件裘皮大衣。

She bought her mother a fur coat as soon as she got her payment.

His skin has become very dark through prolonged sunbathing.

这些单位只会踢皮球，办事效率太低了。

老师最不喜欢这种调皮捣蛋的学生了。

这个小调皮鬼经常给家长惹麻烦。

这位老妇人每天蹒跚走向那个商店。

主婚人向这对新婚夫妇致新婚贺辞。

The master of the wedding ceremony delivers a speech of congratulation to the newlyweds.
在中国，妇女一般是对已婚女人的称呼。

Several women are washing clothes beside the river.

Tā yìzhí bǎ Lǎo Wáng fūfù dàngzuò shì zìjǐ de chóngshēng fùmǔ。
He has always considered the Wangs as his parents, for they were responsible for his rebirth.
这个时辰，村妇们都下厨做饭去了。
Zhège shíchén，cūnfùmen dōu xiàchú zuòfàn qù le。
Village women are usually in the kitchen cooking at this hour.
她简直就是个不讲道理的村妇。
Tā jiǎnzhí jiùshì gè bùjiǎng dàolǐ de cūnfù。

这种药专治妇女带下。

This medicine is used specifically for morbid leucorrhoea.
你也不管管你媳妇，就不怕戴绿帽子？

她的卧室里挂着一幅油画，上面是一位丰腴的少妇。

There is a painting of a plump beauty in her bedroom.
他们小两口，恩恩爱爱，夫倡妇随。

这位参加过妇救会的老人在给我们讲抗战的故事。

在古代中国，妇女是不可以随便改醮的。

The Labor Union, the Communist Youth League and the Women\'s Federation are jointly promoting the birth control policy.

Today is the International Working Women\'s Day, so I bought a gift for my mother.

Several women are washing clothes beside the river.

The master of the wedding ceremony delivers a speech of congratulation to the newlyweds.
家里人坚决不同意他娶一个后婚做媳妇。

结婚十几年来，妻子都是一个很典型的家庭妇女，很本分。

王总希望他老婆做一名家庭主妇。

这个变态的人，酷虐妇女儿童，真应该把他判死刑。

Gōngsī jiāngù，láozī liǎnglì céng shì wǒmen duì mínzú zīběnzhǔyì gōngshāngyè de zhèngcè。
Giving concurrent consideration to public and private interests and benefiting both labor and capital used to be our policy towards national capitalist industry and commerce.
劳资双方终于开始对话。
Láozīshuāngfāng zhōngyú kāishǐduìhuà。
Employers and employees began holding talks.
劳方与资方
láofāngyǔ zīfāng
labour and capital
马克思劳动价值论认为，只有必要劳动才有资格构成物品价值。
Mǎkèsī láodòng jiàzhílùn rènwéi，zhǐyǒu bìyào láodòng cái yǒu zīgé gòuchéng wùpǐn jiàzhí。
According to the Marxist value of labour theory, only necessary labour can create value.
秦始皇敕造的阿房宫耗资巨大，劳民伤财。
Qínshǐhuáng chìzào de Ēfánggōng hàozī jùdà，láomín shāngcái。
A\' Fang Palace, which was ordered to be built by Emperor Qinshihuang, wasted both money and man power.
资本家利用劳工的剩余价值发家致富。
Zīběnjiā lìyòng láogōng de shèngyú jiàzhí fājiā zhìfù。
Capitalists use laborers\' surplus value to make a fortune.
我国劳动人民最终推翻了官僚资本主义的压迫。
Wǒ guó láodòng rénmín zuì zhōng tuīfān le guānliáo zīběnzhǔyì de yāpò。
The working class of our country finally overthrew the oppression of bureaucrats.

the problems of labor and management
劳资问题

正如名字所示，多种经营的企业就需要对多种劳资关系进行区别管理。
I\'ll make a deal with you on how to solve the labor dispute.

我将和你就如何解决劳资纠纷达成协议。

They had labor trouble.

他们有劳资纠纷。

Employers are free to cut back costs by squeezing pay rather than by sacking marginal workers.
Gùzhǔ kěyǐ zìyóu xiāojiǎn chéngběn，yāsuō gōngzī，érbúshì jiěgù biānyuán láogōng。
雇主可以自由消减成本，压缩工资，而不是解雇边缘劳工。

Tā zhěngrì wèi le zhè dàjiātíng cāoláo，yǐjing shēnxīn láocuì le。
She is exhausted from working hard for her extended family.
我已经心劳计绌，你还有什么好办法吗？

I have exhausted all my ideas, do you have any?

shēnxīn píláo

Tā hěn zǎo jiù bèi dàiqù nóngchǎng zuò kǔlì，zài nàli，tā cóngzǎodàowǎn xīnkǔláozuò。
他很早就被带去农场做苦力，在那里，他从早到晚辛苦劳作。
If the effort brings no compensating gain it is a waste.
Rúguǒ nǔlì méiyǒu dàilái péicháng，nà jiùshì yì zhǒng túláo。
如果努力没有带来赔偿，那就是一种徒劳。
She was too drained to carry on this impossible, futile war any longer.
Tā yǐjīng jīnpílìjìn le，bùnéng zài jìxù zhè chǎng bùkěnéng de，túláo de zhànzhēng。
她已经筋疲力尽了，不能再继续这场不可能的，徒劳的战争。
不辞劳苦
bùcíláokǔ
spare no pains
劳苦大众
láokǔ dàzhòng
toiling masses; labouring people
我这鞍前马后的，没有功劳也有苦劳呀。
Wǒ zhè ānqián mǎhòu de，méiyǒu gōngláo yě yǒu kǔláo ya。
After all my loyal service I at least deserve some recognition for my efforts.
勤勤恳恳地干了许多年，他没有功劳也有点苦劳。

Having worked for so many years, he should be given some credit for hard work if not for merit (or good work).
吃苦耐劳
chīkǔ nàiláo 
bear hardships and stand hard work; work hard and endure hardships
刻苦耐劳
kèkǔ nàiláo
bear hardships and work hard

Chīkǔ nàiláo shì wǒmen de chuántǒng měidé。

He works hard every day.
这阵子真辛苦，好在多劳多得。

It\'s hard work, but luckily one gets paid more for doing more.

láoɡōnɡ yùndònɡ

Generally speaking, the laborers are subject to the intellectual class.
一般来说，体力劳动者受脑力劳动者的支配。
Workers between the ages of 16 and 18 are underage workers.
未成年工是指年满十六周岁未满十八周岁的劳动者。
Intellectuals usually have a specialty in a particular subject.
脑力劳动者一般在某一领域有自己的专长。
Some people look down on manual workers.
有些人鄙视体力劳动者。
We were told that in one area there was a high degree of labour turnover among women.
Wǒmen dézhī zài mǒugè dìfang nǚxìng láodòngzhě de liúdònglǜ hěn gāo。
我们得知在某个地方女性劳动者的流动率很高。
By this time professional cricketers\' earnings had fallen behind average manual wages.

工人阶层职业包括体力劳动者以及工业工人。

劳动人民的本色
láodòng rénmín de běnsè 
the true qualities of the labouring people

The working class of our country finally overthrew the oppression of bureaucrats.
这个会议的会众都是普通的劳动人民。

The changes in the size of the moon constituted the most vivid calendar for ancient workers.

quēfá láodònglì

hélǐ zhīpèi láodònglì

sàngshī láodònglì

劳动密集型产品
láodònɡ mìjíxínɡ chǎnpǐn
labour-intensive products
廉价劳动力
liánjià láodònglì 
cheap labour
这小伙子思想好，劳动好，真是没有说的。
Zhè xiǎohuǒzi sīxiǎnghǎo，láodònghǎo，zhēn shì méiyǒu shuō de。
He\'s good in ideology and in work, a really fine young chap.
我到钢厂劳动了一段时间，对炼钢摸着点门儿了。
Wǒ dào gāngchǎngláodòng le yíduàn shíjiān，duì liàngāngmōzháo diǎn ménr le。
After working in the steel mill for a while I got an inkling of how steel is made.
劳动模范
láodòngmófàn
model worker
被评为劳动模范
Bèi píngwéi láodòngmófàn
be chosen as a model worker
一切知识均起源于劳动。
Yíqiè zhīshi jūn qǐyuán yú láodòng。
All knowledge originates from labour.
我们的劳动条件一年比一年强。
Wǒmen de láodòngtiáojiàn yìnián bǐ yìnián qiáng。
Our working conditions are getting better each year.
强制劳动
qiángzhì láodòng
forced labour
窃取别人的劳动果实
qièqǔ biérén de láodòngguǒshí
grab (or seize) the fruits of other people\'s labour
劳动的权利
láodòng de quánlì
the right to work
缺乏劳动力
quēfá láodònglì
be short of labour power
自古以来，我们的祖先就劳动、生息、繁殖在这块土地上。
Zìgǔ yǐlái，wǒmen de zǔxiān jiù láodòng、shēngxī、fánzhí、zài zhèkuài tǔdì shàng。
From ancient times our forefathers have laboured, lived and multiplied on this land.
劳动手册
láodòng shǒucè
worker\'s book
劳动态度
láodòng tàidu
attitude towards labour
在田里劳动
zài tián li láodònɡ 
work in the fields; work on the land
调剂劳动力
tiáojì láodònglì 
redistribute labour power
和工人同吃、同住、同劳动
hé gōngrén tóngchī、tóngzhù、tóngláodòng
eat, live and work together with the workers
下地劳动
xiàdì láodòng
go to work in the fields
小伙子们劳动了一天，晚上睡得格外香甜。
Xiǎohuǒzimen láodòng le yì tiān，wǎnshàngshuì de géwài xiāngtián。
The boys slept soundly after a day\'s work.
辛勤劳动
xīnqín láodònɡ
work hard; labour assiduously
逐步扩充劳动者休息和休养的物质条件
zhúbùkuòchōngláodòngzhě xiūxi hé xiūyǎng de wùzhì tiáojiàn
gradually expand material facilities for the working people to rest and recuperate
利用外国工业技术来提高我们的劳动生产力就是洋为中用的一个例子。
Lìyòngwàiguó gōngyè jìshù lái tígāo wǒmen de láodòngshēngchǎnlì jiùshì yángwèi zhōng yòng de yígè lìzi。
When we use foreign industrial know-how to raise our labour productivity, we are making foreign things serve the needs of China.
学习也好，劳动也好，他都很积极。
Xuéxí yě hǎo，láodòngyě hǎo，tā dōu hěn jījí。
He is enthusiastic about both study and physical labour.
不论在全民所有制单位、集体所有制单位工作或从事个体劳动，都应视为在业人口。
Búlùn zài quánmín suǒyǒuzhì dānwèi、jítǐ suǒyǒuzhì dānwèi gōngzuò huò cóngshì gètǐ láodòng，dōu yīng shìwéi zàiyè rénkǒu。
Anyone employed by state or collective enterprises or self-employed should count as part of the working population.
上个月劳动竞赛，第一组占先了。
Shànggè yuè láodòngjìngsài，dìyī zǔ zhànxiān le。
The first team led all the others in last month\'s emulation drive.
合理支配劳动力
hélǐ zhīpèi láodònglì 
make a proper allocation of the labour force
劳动致富
láodònɡ zhìfù 
become rich through sweat and toil
义务劳动的学生很多，土筐周转不开。
Yìwù láodòng de xuéshenghěn duō，tǔkuāngzhōuzhuǎn bùkāi。
We have many students here to do volunteer labour, but there aren\'t enough carrying baskets to go round.
以一个普通劳动者的姿态出现 (
yǐ yígè pǔtōngláodòngzhě de zītài chūxiàn 
(of a senior cadre) appear among the masses as an ordinary worker
自食其力的劳动者
zìshíqílì de láodòngzhě 
working people living by their own labour
劳动密集型
láodòng mìjíxíng
labor-intensive
采收劳动果实的喜悦不时流露在他们的脸上。
Cǎishōu láodòng guǒshí de xǐyuè bùshí liúlù zài tāmen de liǎnshàng。
The joy of harvesting can be seen on their face from time to time.
靠诚实劳动致富是光荣的。
Kào chéngshí láodòng zhìfù shì guāngróng de。
It\'s a glorious to get rich through honest labor.
你虽然学历高，但未必能胜任这项复杂劳动。
Nǐ suīrán xuélì gāo，dàn wèibì néng shèngrèn zhè xiàng fùzá láodòng。
Having a high education doesn\'t mean you\'re competent for this complicated job.
公司给优秀劳动者派发了干股。
Gōngsī gěi yōuxiù láodòngzhě pàifā le gāngǔ。
The company apportioned shares to excellent workers.
培养高层劳动者是大学教育的目标。
Péiyǎng gāocéng láodòngzhě shì dàxué jiàoyù de mùbiāo。
The goal of college education is to develop high level workers.
劳动者应该享受公费医疗的待遇。
Láodòngzhě yīnggāi xiǎngshòu gōngfèi yīliáo de dàiyù。
Workers shall enjoy free medical treatment.
我国劳动人民最终推翻了官僚资本主义的压迫。
Wǒ guó láodòng rénmín zuì zhōng tuīfān le guānliáo zīběnzhǔyì de yāpò。
The working class of our country finally overthrew the oppression of bureaucrats.
今天是国际劳动妇女节，我给妈妈买了一个小礼物。
Jīntiān shì guójì láodòng fùnǚjié，wǒ gěi māma mǎi le yígè xiǎolǐwù。
Today is the International Working Women\'s Day, so I bought a gift for my mother.
劳动者们为祖国建设谱写着新的华章。
Láodòngzhěmen wèi zǔguó jiànshè pǔxiě zhe xīn de huázhāng。
The labourers are composing new splendid passages for the construction of our country.
这个会议的会众都是普通的劳动人民。
Zhège huìyì de huìzhòng dōushì pǔtōng de láodòng rénmín。
The people at this meeting are all ordinary laborers.

The changes in the size of the moon constituted the most vivid calendar for ancient workers.
活劳动是价值的唯一源泉，这是不容置疑的。
Huóláodòng shì jiàzhí de wéiyī yuánquán，zhè shì bùróng zhìyí de。
Undoubtedly, living labor is the only resource of value.
他没什么技能，只能做些简单劳动。
Tā méi shénme jìnéng，zhǐnéng zuò xiē jiǎndān láodòng。
He has mastered no skill, so he can only do a little simple manual work.
我们的工作服现在已经不是用劳动布做的了。
Wǒmen de gōngzuòfú xiànzài yǐjing búshì yòng láodòngbùzuò de le。
Now our work clothes are no longer made of denim.

Wǒ guó de《Láodòngfǎ》 shì zài yījiǔjiǔsì nián bānbùshíshī de。
Labour laws in our country were issued and implemented in 1994.

Gōngsī guīdìng shàngbān shíjiān bìxū chuān láodòngfú。
According to company regulations, workers must wear work clothes during work hours.
我们应该以那些劳动模范为榜样，认真钻研业务，提高工作水平。
Wǒmen yīnggāi yǐ nàxiē láodòng mófàn wéi bǎngyàng，rènzhēn zuānyán yèwù，tígāo gōngzuò shuǐpíng。
We should follow the good example of those model workers, endeavour to gain professional proficiency, and increase work capability.
我们每个公民都应该享有劳动权，也享有取得相应报酬的权利。
Wǒmen měigè gōngmín dōu yīnggāi xiǎngyǒu láodòngquán，yě xiǎngyǒu qǔdé xiāngyìng bàochóu de quánlì。
Every citizen should have the right to work and to get payment.
我的工作是按劳动日支付报酬，而不是月薪制。
Wǒ de gōngzuò shì àn láodòngrì zhīfù bàochóu，ér búshì yuèxīnzhì。
My work is paid according to workdays, rather than paid monthly.
忙月的时候我们需要大量的劳动力来收割庄稼。

In busy months, we need a large labour force to reap the harvest.
劳动了一阵子，他的额头上渗出了汗水。
Láodòng le yízhènzi，tā de étóu shàng shènchū le hànshuǐ。
His forehead sweated after doing some labor work.

Zhèzuò dàbà wánquán shì kào láodòngzhě de tiěbì jiànshè chūlái de。
The dam was built by the hands of the construction workers.

Qǐng bǎ měigè bān de tóngxué tǒngbiān chéng sì gè xiǎoduì cānjiā yìwù láodòng。

使用这台脱粒机可以大大地提高劳动效率。

“Wùhuà láodòng”shì jīngjìxué lǐngyù de yígè xīncíhuì。

Láodòngjú de Lǐ júcháng rèn xiànzhí yǐjing zúzú shíwǔ nián le。
Mr. Li has been the head of the labor bureau for 15 years.
长年的劳动使他的手上都是血泡。

be short of labour power
自古以来，我们的祖先就劳动、生息、繁殖在这块土地上。
Zìgǔ yǐlái，wǒmen de zǔxiān jiù láodòng、shēngxī、fánzhí、zài zhèkuài tǔdì shàng。
From ancient times our forefathers have laboured, lived and multiplied on this land.
劳动手册
láodòng shǒucè
worker\'s book
劳动态度
láodòng tàidu
attitude towards labour
有劳你们二位，我只能叨光了。
Yǒuláo nǐmen èr wèi，wǒ zhǐnéngtāoguāng le。
You two will have to do all the work. I\'m much obliged to you.
在田里劳动
zài tián li láodònɡ 
work in the fields; work on the land
调剂劳动力
tiáojì láodònglì 
redistribute labour power
和工人同吃、同住、同劳动
hé gōngrén tóngchī、tóngzhù、tóngláodòng
eat, live and work together with the workers
去跟他争辩是徒劳的。
Qù gēn tā zhēngbiàn shì túláo de。
It would be futile to argue with him.
终年劳累，不得温饱
zhōngnián láolèi，bùdé wēnbǎo 
toil all the year round without enough to eat and wear
下地劳动
xiàdì láodòng
go to work in the fields
小伙子们劳动了一天，晚上睡得格外香甜。
Xiǎohuǒzimen láodòng le yì tiān，wǎnshàngshuì de géwài xiāngtián。
The boys slept soundly after a day\'s work.
乐于为您效劳。
Lèyú wèi nín xiàoláo。
I\'m only too glad to offer you my services.
日夜辛劳
rìyè xīnláo
toil day and night
不辞辛劳
bùcí xīnláo
spare no pains
辛勤劳动
xīnqín láodònɡ
work hard; labour assiduously
逐步扩充劳动者休息和休养的物质条件
zhúbùkuòchōngláodòngzhě xiūxi hé xiūyǎng de wùzhì tiáojiàn
gradually expand material facilities for the working people to rest and recuperate
卓著勋劳
zhuōzhù xūnláo
noted for meritorious service
利用外国工业技术来提高我们的劳动生产力就是洋为中用的一个例子。
Lìyòngwàiguó gōngyè jìshù lái tígāo wǒmen de láodòngshēngchǎnlì jiùshì yángwèi zhōng yòng de yígè lìzi。
When we use foreign industrial know-how to raise our labour productivity, we are making foreign things serve the needs of China.
学习也好，劳动也好，他都很积极。
Xuéxí yě hǎo，láodòngyě hǎo，tā dōu hěn jījí。
He is enthusiastic about both study and physical labour.
一劳永逸的解决办法
yìláoyǒngyì de jiějué bànfǎ 
a solution that holds good for all time; a permanent solution
他想一手遮天，颠倒是非，这只能是徒劳的。
Tā xiǎngyìshǒuzhētiān，diāndǎo shìfēi，zhè zhǐ néngshì túláo de。
He was merely wasting his time trying to hoodwink the people of the whole world and confound right with wrong.
有劳有逸
yǒuláoyǒuyì 
alternate work with rest
勤劳勇敢的人民
qínláo yǒnggǎn de rénmín 
a brave and industrious people
忧劳成疾
yōuláochénɡjí 
fall ill from care and overwork
有劳您代我买本书。
Yǒuláo nín dài wǒ mǎi běn shū。
May I trouble you to buy a book for me?
这件事有劳您了。
Zhèjiànshì yǒuláo nín le。
Sorry to have bothered you with this matter.
不论在全民所有制单位、集体所有制单位工作或从事个体劳动，都应视为在业人口。
Búlùn zài quánmín suǒyǒuzhì dānwèi、jítǐ suǒyǒuzhì dānwèi gōngzuò huò cóngshì gètǐ láodòng，dōu yīng shìwéi zàiyè rénkǒu。
Anyone employed by state or collective enterprises or self-employed should count as part of the working population.
上个月劳动竞赛，第一组占先了。
Shànggè yuè láodòngjìngsài，dìyī zǔ zhànxiān le。
The first team led all the others in last month\'s emulation drive.
劳驾帮我照看一下行李。
Láojià bāngwǒ zhàokàn yíxià xíngli。
Will you please keep an eye on my luggage.
合理支配劳动力
hélǐ zhīpèi láodònglì 
make a proper allocation of the labour force
劳动致富
láodònɡ zhìfù 
become rich through sweat and toil
勤劳智慧的人民
qínláo zhìhuì de rénmín 
the industrious and ingenious people
义务劳动的学生很多，土筐周转不开。
Yìwù láodòng de xuéshenghěn duō，tǔkuāngzhōuzhuǎn bùkāi。
We have many students here to do volunteer labour, but there aren\'t enough carrying baskets to go round.
以一个普通劳动者的姿态出现 (
yǐ yígè pǔtōngláodòngzhě de zītài chūxiàn 
(of a senior cadre) appear among the masses as an ordinary worker
自食其力的劳动者
zìshíqílì de láodòngzhě 
working people living by their own labour
组织劳力
zǔzhī láolì 
organize a labour force; organize labour power
操劳
cāoláo
work hard
劳顿
láodùn
fatigued; wearied
劳驾
láojià
excuse me; may I trouble you...; would you please...
犒劳
kàoláo
reward with food and drink
积劳成疾
jīláochéngjí
fall ill from constant overwork
劳动密集型
láodòng mìjíxíng
labor-intensive
任劳任怨
rènláorènyuàn
work hard regardless of criticism; willingly bear the burden of office
劳役
láoyì
penal servitude; forced labour
有劳
yǒuláo
may I trouble you; sorry to bother you
长此以往，她必得会积劳成疾。
Chángcǐyǐwǎng，tā bìděi huì jīláochéngjí。
劳累多日，今天他终于得到了一夕安寝。
Láolèi duōrì，jīntiān tā zhōng yú dédào le yìxī ānqǐn。
After days of hard work, he had a good night sleep at last.
我一路上鞍马劳顿，权且歇息一下。
Wǒ yílùshàng ānmǎ láodùn，quánqiě xiēxī yíxià。
Let me have a break after this rough journey.
医生说，思虑和烦劳过度会导致心血暗耗。
Yīshēng shuō，sīlǜ hé fánláo guòdù huì dǎozhì xīnxuè ànhào。
The doctor said anxiety, and stress may lead to compromised health.
那边的坝地上，几位农民正在劳作。
Nàbiān de bàdì shàng，jǐ wèi nóngmín zhèngzài láozuò。
Some farmers are working on the dam.
为了全家的生计，父亲整日奔劳。
Wèile quánjiā de shēngjì，fùqīn zhěngrì bēnláo。
In order to support the family, Father bustles about every day.
他爷爷养了一只伯劳。
Tā yéye yǎng le yìzhī bóláo。
His grandfather keeps a shrike.
做这件事只是举手之劳，不值一提。
Zuò zhèjiànshì zhǐshì jǔshǒu zhī láo，bùzhí yìtí。
It is something that needs only a slight effort, and is not worth mentioning.
采收劳动果实的喜悦不时流露在他们的脸上。
Cǎishōu láodòng guǒshí de xǐyuè bùshí liúlù zài tāmen de liǎnshàng。
The joy of harvesting can be seen on their face from time to time.
成年累月的劳累，使他看起来十分苍老。
Chéngniánlěiyuè de láolèi，shǐ tā kànqǐlái shífēn cānglǎo。
He looks aged, because he has worked hard for years and years.
靠诚实劳动致富是光荣的。
Kào chéngshí láodòng zhìfù shì guāngróng de。
It\'s a glorious to get rich through honest labor.
我们都要勤劳致富，不能吃白饭。
Wǒmen dōuyào qínláo zhìfù，bùnéng chī báifàn。
We should get rich through honest labor, instead of sponging off others.
吃苦耐劳是我们的传统美德。
Chīkǔ nàiláo shì wǒmen de chuántǒng měidé。
Bearing hardship and hard working is our traditional values.
秦始皇敕造的阿房宫耗资巨大，劳民伤财。
Qínshǐhuáng chìzào de Ēfánggōng hàozī jùdà，láomín shāngcái。
A\' Fang Palace, which was ordered to be built by Emperor Qinshihuang, wasted both money and man power.
他胳膊经常搐动，医生说是劳累过度。
Tā gēbo jīngcháng chùdòng，yīshēng shuō shì láolèi guòdù。
His arms usually twitch . The doctor says it is because of excess tire.
这封介绍信，有劳您的大笔为我亲自写一下。
Zhè fēng jièshàoxìn，yǒu láo nín de dàbǐ wèi wǒ qīnzì xiě yíxià。
Would you please write the letter of recommendation for me?
这阵子真辛苦，好在多劳多得。
Zhè zhènzi zhēn xīnkǔ，hǎo zài duōláo duōdé。
It\'s hard work, but luckily one gets paid more for doing more.
在东北的长白山一带，住着勤劳勇敢的鄂伦春族人民。
Zài Dōngběi de Chángbáishān yídài，zhù zhe qínláo yǒnggǎn de Èlúnchūnzú rénmín。
The brave and hardworking Oroqen people live in the area of Changbai mountain, northeast of China.
经过一年的劳教，这名犯人终于幡然悔悟了。
Jīngguò yìnián de láojiào，zhè míng fànrén zhōng yú fānrán huǐwù le。
After a year of re-education through labor, the convict completely reformed.
那沸热的温泉，能够解除人体的疲劳。
Nà fèirè de wēnquán，nénggòu jiěchú réntǐ de píláo。
That near-boiling spring can ease one\'s fatigue.
这个项目他一点功劳都没有，按理说不该分利。
Zhège xiàng mù tā yìdiǎn gōngláo dōu méiyǒu，ànlǐ shuō bùgāi fēnlì。
He contributed nothing to the project and should not have shared the benefits.
我们是按劳分利的，谁也别想偷懒钻空子。
Wǒmen shì ànláo fēnlì de，shéi yě bié xiǎng tōulǎn zuànkōngzi。
We have adopted a payment system which is based on one\'s contributions, therefore no one can take benefit without working for it.
你虽然学历高，但未必能胜任这项复杂劳动。
Nǐ suīrán xuélì gāo，dàn wèibì néng shèngrèn zhè xiàng fùzá láodòng。
Having a high education doesn\'t mean you\'re competent for this complicated job.
他的腹背肌劳损是由于运动不当造成的。
Tā de fùbèijī láosǔn shì yóuyú yùndòng búdàng zàochéng de。
The strain of his abdominal muscles and dorsal muscles was induced by exercising improperly.
公司给优秀劳动者派发了干股。
Gōngsī gěi yōuxiù láodòngzhě pàifā le gāngǔ。
The company apportioned shares to excellent workers.
劳各位高参帮我选款汽车。
Láo gèwèi gāocān bāng wǒ xuǎn kuǎn qìchē。
Please select a car for me.
培养高层劳动者是大学教育的目标。
Péiyǎng gāocéng láodòngzhě shì dàxué jiàoyù de mùbiāo。
The goal of college education is to develop high level workers.
这几天大家的工作量很大，都很疲劳。
Zhè jǐtiān dàjiā de gōngzuòliàng hěndà，dōu hěnpíláo。
The work load is very heavy for everybody these days, so they are all very tired.
劳动者应该享受公费医疗的待遇。
Láodòngzhě yīnggāi xiǎngshòu gōngfèi yīliáo de dàiyù。
Workers shall enjoy free medical treatment.
公私兼顾，劳资两利曾是我们对民族资本主义工商业的政策。
Gōngsī jiāngù，láozī liǎnglì céng shì wǒmen duì mínzú zīběnzhǔyì gōngshāngyè de zhèngcè。
Giving concurrent consideration to public and private interests and benefiting both labor and capital used to be our policy towards national capitalist industry and commerce.
由于长年的劳累，她现在走路时总是佝偻着腰。
Yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，tā xiànzài zǒulù shí zǒngshì gōulóu zhe yāo。
Now because of long-term fatigue, her back is always bent over when she walks.
我国劳动人民最终推翻了官僚资本主义的压迫。
Wǒ guó láodòng rénmín zuì zhōng tuīfān le guānliáo zīběnzhǔyì de yāpò。
The working class of our country finally overthrew the oppression of bureaucrats.
她过去是我们家的管家婆，又聪明又勤劳。
Tā guòqù shì wǒmen jiā de guǎnjiāpó，yòu cōngmíng yòu qínláo。
She used to be our housekeeper; she\'s very smart and hard-working.
今天是国际劳动妇女节，我给妈妈买了一个小礼物。
Jīntiān shì guójì láodòng fùnǚjié，wǒ gěi māma mǎi le yígè xiǎolǐwù。
Today is the International Working Women\'s Day, so I bought a gift for my mother.
劳动者们为祖国建设谱写着新的华章。
Láodòngzhěmen wèi zǔguó jiànshè pǔxiě zhe xīn de huázhāng。
The labourers are composing new splendid passages for the construction of our country.
他为化募事业呕心沥血，操劳一生。
Tā wèi huàmù shìyè ǒuxīnlìxuè，cāoláo yìshēng。
He has worked hard his whole life collecting alms.
他这回立下了汗马功劳，地位也随之煌煌起来。
Tā zhèhuí lìxià le hànmǎ gōngláo，dìwèi yě suízhī huánghuáng qǐlái。
This time he established war exploits, and his status grew eminently.
这个会议的会众都是普通的劳动人民。
Zhège huìyì de huìzhòng dōushì pǔtōng de láodòng rénmín。
The people at this meeting are all ordinary laborers.
月相的晦朔是古代劳动人民最形象生动的日历。
Yuè xiàng de huìshuò shì gǔdài láodòng rénmín zuì xíng xiàng shēngdòng de rìlì。
The changes in the size of the moon constituted the most vivid calendar for ancient workers.
活劳动是价值的唯一源泉，这是不容置疑的。
Huóláodòng shì jiàzhí de wéiyī yuánquán，zhè shì bùróng zhìyí de。
Undoubtedly, living labor is the only resource of value.
他身体有疾患，不能太过操劳。
Tā shēntǐ yǒu jíhuàn，bùnéng tài guò cāoláo。
Having an illness, he couldn\'t do too much work.
他没什么技能，只能做些简单劳动。
Tā méi shénme jìnéng，zhǐnéng zuò xiē jiǎndān láodòng。
He has mastered no skill, so he can only do a little simple manual work.
过劳死的现象如此频繁真是令人嗟叹。
Guòláosǐ de xiàn xiàng rúcǐ pínfán zhēnshì lìngrén jiētàn。
How regretful that so many people kill themselves by working too much!
您劳步看我真让我受宠若惊。
Nín láobùkàn wǒ zhēn ràng wǒ shòuchǒng ruòjīng。
Your visit is highly appreciated.
我们的工作服现在已经不是用劳动布做的了。
Wǒmen de gōngzuòfú xiànzài yǐjing búshì yòng láodòngbùzuò de le。
Now our work clothes are no longer made of denim.
我国的《劳动法》是在1994年颁布实施的。
Wǒ guó de《Láodòngfǎ》 shì zài yījiǔjiǔsì nián bānbùshíshī de。
Labour laws in our country were issued and implemented in 1994.
公司规定上班时间必须穿劳动服。
Gōngsī guīdìng shàngbān shíjiān bìxū chuān láodòngfú。
According to company regulations, workers must wear work clothes during work hours.
我们应该以那些劳动模范为榜样，认真钻研业务，提高工作水平。
Wǒmen yīnggāi yǐ nàxiē láodòng mófàn wéi bǎngyàng，rènzhēn zuānyán yèwù，tígāo gōngzuò shuǐpíng。
We should follow the good example of those model workers, endeavour to gain professional proficiency, and increase work capability.
我们每个公民都应该享有劳动权，也享有取得相应报酬的权利。
Wǒmen měigè gōngmín dōu yīnggāi xiǎngyǒu láodòngquán，yě xiǎngyǒu qǔdé xiāngyìng bàochóu de quánlì。
Every citizen should have the right to work and to get payment.
我的工作是按劳动日支付报酬，而不是月薪制。
Wǒ de gōngzuò shì àn láodòngrì zhīfù bàochóu，ér búshì yuèxīnzhì。
My work is paid according to workdays, rather than paid monthly.
今天上了一天课，我很劳乏。
Jīntiān shàng le yìtiān kè，wǒ hěnláofá。
Having given classes all day long, I am exhausted.
总是劳烦您帮我买东西，真是过意不去。
Zǒngshì láofán nín bāng wǒ mǎidōngxi，zhēnshì guòyì búqù。
I\'m always troubling you to buy things for me. Thank you very much.
我们要打破大锅饭的体制，实行按劳绩分配，这样才能够调动大家的积极性。
Wǒmen yào dǎpò dàguōfàn de tǐzhì，shíxíng àn láojì fēnpèi，zhèyàng cái nénggòu diàodòng dàjiā de jījíxìng。
We should abandon indiscriminate egalitarianism and implement a system of distribution according to one\'s work, by which people will be enthusiastic to work.
他在劳教所表现得还不错，总算是有地方能管他了。
Tā zài láojiàosuǒ biǎoxiàn de hái búcuò，zǒng suànshì yǒu dìfāng néng guǎntā le。
He behaves well at the reform centre. Finally, a place which can control him.
她的脸上显示着劳倦的神情，但她却不能休息。
Tā de liǎnshàng xiǎnshì zhe láojuàn de shénqíng，dàn tā què bùnéng xiūxi。
She appears exhausted, but she can\'t rest.
我们的劳军演出团已经是第五次到这里慰问演出了。
Wǒmen de láojūn yǎnchūtuán yǐjing shì dìwǔ cì dào zhèlǐ wèiwèn yǎnchū le。
This is the fifth time our reward-the-troops performance troupe has given a special performance here.
你整天劳神费力的也不见有进展，我觉得是方法问题。
Nǐ zhěngtiān láoshén fèilì de yě bújiàn yǒu jìnzhǎn，wǒ juédé shì fāngfǎ wèntí。
I think you\'ve adopted an incorrect method, since you\'ve made no progress from your great energy.
我的这件事还得烦您多劳神！
Wǒ de zhèjiànshì hái děi fán nín duō láoshén！
Would you mind helping me with this matter?
我们的演出劳务费都是在演出结束时候才结算。
Wǒmen de yǎnchū láowùfèi dōushì zài yǎnchū jiéshù shíhou cái jiésuàn。
The service charge for our performance will be remitted at the end of the performance.
他每天都辛辛苦苦地劳作着。
Tā měitiān dōu xīnxīnkǔkǔ de láozuò zhe。
He works hard every day.
我小时候就爱上劳作课，因为可以亲手制作工艺品。
Wǒ xiǎoshíhou jiù ài shàng láozuòkè，yīnwèi kěyǐ qīnshǒu zhìzuò gōngyìpǐn。
I liked handiwork courses when I was young, because I could make handicrafts myself.
父母为了我操劳了一生，双手布满了老茧。
Fùmǔ wèi le wǒ cāoláo le yìshēng，shuāngshǒu bùmǎn le lǎojiǎn。
My parents have worked hard their whole lives for me and have callused hands.
妈妈由于长年的劳累，五十来岁的时候就已经生了老年斑。
Māma yóuyú chángnián de láolèi，wǔshí lái suì de shíhou jiù yǐjing shēng le lǎoniánbān。
Due to age-long exhaustion, my mother got senile plaque when she was fifty years old.
妈妈由于过度操劳，两鬓已经斑白了。
Māma yóuyú guòdù cāoláo，liǎngbìn yǐjing bānbái le。
Because of being overworked, my mother\'s hair graying at her temples.
今天的演出能顺利进行，领奏的功劳是最大的。
Jīntiān de yǎnchū néng shùnlì jìnxíng，lǐngzòu de gōngláo shì zuìdàde。
The lead player contributed most to the success of the performance today.
你就用心干吧！我会给你另加酬劳的。
Nǐ jiù yòngxīn gàn ba！Wǒ huì gěi nǐ lìngjiā chóuláo de。
Be intent in your work. I’ll add additional salary.
忙月的时候我们需要大量的劳动力来收割庄稼。

我一夜没睡着，反复思索这个问题。
Wǒ yí yè méi shuìzháo，fǎnfù sīsuǒ zhège wèntí。
I lay awake all night, turning the problem over and over in my mind.
她把孩子放在摇篮里，把他摇睡着了。
Tā bǎ háizi fàngzài yáolán lǐ，bǎ tā yáo shuìzháo le。
She rocked the baby to sleep in the cradle.
他折腾了好几个钟头才睡着。
Tā zhēténg le hǎo jǐgè zhōng tóu cái shuìzháo。
He tossed about in bed for hours before he got to sleep.
装作睡着了
zhuāngzuò shuìzháo le 
pretend to be asleep
奶奶觉得板床比“席梦思”睡着舒服。
Nǎinai juédé bǎnchuáng bǐ“xímèngsī”shuì zhe shūfu。
Grandmother feels sleeping on plank bed is more comfortable than on the spring mattress.
他很快睡着了，发出了重重的鼻息。
Tā hěnkuài shuìzháo le，fāchū le zhòngzhòng de bíxī。
He was fast asleep, and snored like thunder.
他太累了，一合眼就睡着了。
Tā tài lèi le，yìhéyǎn jiù shuìzháo le。
He was too tired and fell asleep the moment he closed his eyes.
十分疲惫的他，后仰在椅子上就睡着了。
Shífēn píbèi de tā，hòuyǎng zài yǐzi shàng jiù shuìzháo le。
He was so tired that he fell asleep, as soon as he leaned back in the chair.
他尽自睡着，也不管外面吵闹的声音。
Tā jìnzì shuì zhe，yě bùguǎn wàimiàn chǎonào de shēngyīn。
He sleeps regardless of the noise outside.
工作一天，她实在太累了，就在靠背椅上睡着了。
Gōngzuò yì tiān，tā shízai tài lèi le，jiù zài kàobèiyǐ shàng shuìzháo le。
After working for a whole day, she was so exhausted that she fell asleep while leaning against the back of a chair.
不知过了多久，我曚扙地睡着了。
Bùzhī guò le duōjiǔ，wǒ méngzhàng de shuìzháo le。
I felt asleep drowsily before I knew it.
我不想和他睡在一起，他睡着以后经常撒呓挣。
Wǒ bùxiǎng hé tā shuì zài yīqǐ，tā shuìzháo yǐhòu jīngcháng sāyìzhèng。
I don\'t want to sleep with him. He always talks, or acts in his sleep.
我每天都是头一挨枕，马上就能睡着。
Wǒ měitiān dōushì tóu yì āi zhěn，mǎshàng jiùnéng shuìzháo。
I can go to sleep the moment my head touches the pillow every day.
孩子躺在童车里，已经睡着了。
Háizi tǎngzài tóngchē lǐ，yǐjing shuìzháo le。
Lying in the baby carrier, the child has fallen to sleep.
由于有心事，小王辗转反侧，直到五更天才睡着。
Yóuyú yǒu xīnshì，Xiǎo Wáng niǎnzhuǎn fǎncè，zhídào wǔgēngtiān cái shuìzháo。
Having something on his mind Xiao Wang tossed and turned in his bed, and couldn\'t get to sleep until five o\'clock in the morning.
妈妈哼着摇篮曲，宝宝很快就睡着了。
Māma hēng zhe yáolánqǔ，bǎobao hěnkuài jiù shuìzháo le。
With mom singing lullabies, the baby fell asleep quickly.
他枕着衣服睡着了。
Tā zhěnzhe yīfu shuìzháo le。
He fell asleep with his head resting on his clothes.
白天我睡不着。
Báitiān wǒ shuìbuzháo。
I cannot sleep in the daytime.
他在床上翻来覆去睡不着。
Tā zài chuáng shàng fānláifùqù shuì bu zháo。
He tossed and turned in bed, unable to sleep.
翻来覆去睡不着
fānláifùqù shuì bùzháo
toss and turn in bed
他兴奋过度，睡不着觉。
Tā xīngfèn guòdù，shuì bu zháo jiào。
He was too excited to fall asleep.
他整夜翻来复去睡不着。
Tā zhěngyè fānláifùqù shuì bu zháo。
He tossed about all night, unable to get to sleep.
爸爸一天不串门儿就睡不着觉。
Bàba yìtiān bú chuànménr jiù shuìbùzháojiào。
Dad cannot go to sleep unless he has called at someone\'s home.
她对我嫣然一笑，我神魂颠倒，晚上都睡不着觉。
Tā duì wǒ yānrán yíxiào，wǒ shénhún diāndǎo，wǎnshàng dōu shuìbùzháo jiào。
I was possessed by her smile and could not get to sleep at night.
晚上喝酽茶，我怕你睡不着。
Wǎnshàng hē yànchá，wǒ pà nǐ shuìbùzháo。
I am afraid that you won\'t be able to fall asleep because you drunk strong tea in the evening.
他喜欢蜷伏着睡觉。
Tā xǐhuan quánfú zhe shuìjiào。
He likes to sleep with his knees drawn up. or He likes to sleep curled up on his side.
仰着睡
yǎng zhe shuì
sleep on one\'s back
由于没买着睡铺票，我只能坐十几个小时回家。
Yóuyú méi mǎizháo shuìpùpiào，wǒ zhǐnéng zuò shí jǐgè xiǎoshí huíjiā。
Since I didn\'t buy a berth ticket, I had to go home while sitting for a dozen hours.
侧着身子睡
cèzhe shēnzi shuì 
sleep on one\'s side
枕着胳臂睡觉
zhěn zhe gēbei shuìjiào 
sleep with one\'s head resting on one\'s arm
床板不平，睡觉时总搁着我。

The uneven bed planks always hurt me when I sleep.
这里用不着你，你只管睡你的去。
Zhèlǐ yòngbuzháo nǐ，nǐ zhǐguǎn shuì nǐ de qù。
We don\'t need you here. You just go to bed.
哼着歌儿哄孩子睡觉
hēng zhe gēr hǒngháizi shuìjiào
croon the baby to sleep
他房间桌灯还亮着，他应该还没有入睡。
Tā fángjiān zhuōdēng hái liàng zhe，tā yīnggāi hái méiyǒu rùshuì。
The desk lamp in his room is still on, so he shouldn\'t have gone to bed yet.

听着钟鼓喈喈的声音我难以入睡。

病人吃了药，睡觉安顿多了。
Bìngrén chī le yào，shuìjiào āndùn duō le。
The patient slept much better after taking the medicine.
这孩子即便睡觉也不安生。
Zhè háizi jíbiàn shuìjiào yě bùānshēng。
The kid won\'t keep still, not even in sleep.
哼着歌儿哄孩子睡觉
hēng zhe gēr hǒngháizi shuìjiào
croon the baby to sleep
他睡觉很惊醒，有点响动都知道。
Tā shuìjiào hěn jīngxing，yǒu diǎn xiǎngdòngdōu zhīdào。
He\'s a very light sleeper; any little noise disturbs him.
我累了，想去睡觉了。
Wǒ lèi le，xiǎngqù shuìjiào le。
I\'m tired and I want to go to sleep.
她睡觉轻。
Tā shuìjiào qīng。
She is a light sleeper.
小猫在沙发上蜷作一团睡觉。
Xiǎomāo zài shāfā shàng quánzuò yìtuán shuìjiào。
The kitten was sleeping curled up on the sofa.
他喜欢蜷伏着睡觉。
Tā xǐhuan quánfú zhe shuìjiào。
He likes to sleep with his knees drawn up. or He likes to sleep curled up on his side.
他忙得甚至好几夜没睡觉。
Tā máng de shènzhì hǎo jǐ yè méi shuìjiào。
He was so busy that he didn\'t even go to bed for several nights.
该睡觉了。
Gāi shuìjiào le。
It\'s time to go to bed.
素常他到十二点钟才睡觉。
Sùcháng tā dào shí\'èr diǎn zhōng cái shuìjiào

她一忙起来，吃饭睡觉都没有一定的时间了。
Tā yì mángqǐlái，chīfàn shuìjiào dōu méiyǒu yídìng de shíjiān le。
When she gets really busy, she doesn\'t keep regular hours for eating or sleeping.
他在干什么？—他还在睡觉呢。
Tā zài gàn shénme? —Tā hái zài shuìjiào ne。

zhěn zhe gēbei shuìjiào

这药在睡觉之前吃。
Zhè yào zài shuìjiào zhīqián chī。

别出声，他正在睡觉呢。
Bié chūshēng，tā zhèngzài shuìjiào ne。

妈妈将窗幔放下，准备哄孩子睡觉。

The mother closed the curtains so as to get ready to coax the child to sleep.
床板不平，睡觉时总搁着我。

Wǒ hěnlèi le，chuīdēng shuìjiào ba。
I am so tired. Let\'s blow out the lamp and go to sleep.
蝙蝠睡觉的时候，身体倒挂在房檐下。
Biānfú shuìjiào de shíhou，shēntǐ dàoguà zài fángyán xià。
Bats hang by their feet below when sleeping.
快睡觉的时候，他帮奶奶打开了电热毯。
Kuài shuìjiào de shíhou，tā bāng nǎinai dǎkāi le diànrètǎn。
He helped his grandmother turn on the electric blanket when they were about to sleep.
她睡觉的时候忘记摘下发套了。

She forgot to took her hair cap off when she went to sleep.
晚上，街上卡车的呼隆声吵得我们没法睡觉。

为了养家糊口，他几夜几夜不睡觉地工作。

今天有点热，我睡觉时就盖了层夹被。

It\'s a bit hot today, so I cover myself with only a double coverlet when I sleep.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。

小时候在奶奶家的暖炕上睡觉，那感觉就是暖和！

When I slept on the heated kang in my grandmother\'s family in my childhood, I felt warm at heart.
天刚刚起更，他就想睡觉了。

He wanted to go to bed as soon at the sound of the first night watch.

Shuìjiào qián tā huànshàng le qǐnyī。
He puts on his nightclothes when sleeping.
窗户透出的一丝微光说明他还没有睡觉。

The glimmer of light from his window showed that he hadn\'t gone to bed.
他今天上课居然没有睡觉，真是稀奇。

He didn\'t sleep in class today, which is rare.
学校规定晚上11点半学生必须熄灯睡觉。

老虎驯顺的在笼子里睡觉呢，一点都不吓人。

他的生活很简单，除了工作就是睡觉。

孩子们喜欢在户外星空下的帐篷里睡觉。

Wǒ bùnéng èrshísì xiǎoshí bú shuìjiào。
我不能24小时不睡觉。
I laid her down and took my rest.
Wǒ bǎ tā fàngxià，ránhòu tǎngxià shuìjiào le。
我把她放下，然后躺下睡觉了。
My bird tucks its head under its wing to sleep.
Wǒ de niǎo bǎ tóu sāizài chìbǎng xiàmiàn shuìjiào。
我的鸟把头塞在翅膀下面睡觉。
She would wait up till he came back and then she\'d speak to him.
Tā búqù shuìjiào，xiǎng děngzhe tā huílái ránhòu hé tā tányītán。
她不去睡觉，想等着他回来然后和他谈一谈。
He stayed up half the night playing video games.
Tā dàbànyè bú shuìjiào，wán diànzǐ yóuxì。
他大半夜不睡觉，玩电子游戏。
They stalk me in my sleep and they try to steal my breath away.

它们在我睡觉时悄悄潜进，想要带走我的呼吸。
She finished up the dishes and went to bed.
Tā bǎ cài chī de gè jīngguāng，ránhòu qù shuìjiào le。
她把菜吃的个精光，然后去睡觉了。
Their holiday was spent in sleep and vegetation.

他们的假日都花在睡觉和单调贫乏的生活上了。
We watched the late movie and then went to bed.
Wǒmen kànwán jiào wǎn bōchū de diànyǐng hòu jiù shuìjiào le。
我们看完较晚播出的电影后就睡觉了。
He took a sleeping draft.
Tā shuìjiào qián chīle yí jì yào。
他睡觉前吃了一剂药。
The children were bedded at ten o\'clock.
Háizǐmen wǎnshang shí diǎn shí shàngchuáng shuìjiào le。
孩子们晚上十点时上床睡觉了。
Shirt looked none the worse for having been slept in.
Chènshān yìdiǎn yě méiyǒu yīnwèi chuānzhe shuìjiào ér nònghuài。
衬衫一点也没有因为穿着睡觉而弄坏。

他破晓时分才去睡觉。

We prefer sleeping outside.

我们喜欢在外面睡觉。

教堂里的会众主要是些打盹睡觉并且鼾声如雷的年轻人。
The children had to be in bed before it was time for the trimming of the tree.
Háizǐmen bìxū zài jiǎn shù kāishǐ qián shàngchuáng shuìjiào。
孩子们必须在剪树开始前上床睡觉。

在那一刻，睡觉是世界上最美的享受。
the two children who were snuggled sleepily in the back of the car

两个依偎在汽车后座上想要睡觉的孩子。

Wǒ tōngcháng bànyè cái shuìjiào。

睡午觉，打盹儿

每逢星期天他总睡懒觉。

你需要睡上一觉。5公里外有家汽车旅馆，我们去那儿住一晚吧。

每天晚上，他都睡在这样的板房里。

蝙蝠睡觉的时候，身体倒挂在房檐下。

Bats hang by their feet below when sleeping.
他房间桌灯还亮着，他应该还没有入睡。

你和爸爸睡在一起，黛富妮和我睡另一个房间。

我儿子睡在我隔壁的房间里。
Mary sleeps in the middle room.
玛丽睡在中间的那个房间。

I\'m terribly sleepy today; I didn\'t sleep a wink last night.
一睡就睡到大天亮
yí shuì jiù shuìdào dà tiānliàng
sleep like a log till broad daylight
小时候在家时我总是睡在炕梢，让妈妈睡炕头上，因为她比我怕冷。

When I was little, I always slept at the end of the kang while mother slept at the warmer end, because she was less able to bear cold than I.

他昨天一夜没睡，今天一直睡眼蒙眬。

我不想和他睡在一起，他睡着以后经常撒呓挣。

看他的睡相就知道他睡得很沉，估计又做好梦了呢。

安睡
ānshuì 
sleep peacefully
病人吃了药，睡觉安顿多了。

The patient slept much better after taking the medicine.
安然入睡
ānrán rùshuì 
go to sleep peacefully

Zhè háizi jíbiàn shuìjiào yě bùānshēng。
The kid won\'t keep still, not even in sleep.
睡得很安稳
shuì de hěn ānwěn
sleep peacefully

I cannot sleep in the daytime.

cèzhe shēnzi shuì

睡得很沉
Shuì dé hěn chén
be in a deep sleep; be fast asleep; sleep like a log; sleep soundly
沉沉入睡
chénchén rùshuì 
sink into a deep sleep
睡得很沉稳
shuì de hěn chénwěn 
sleep soundly (or peacefully)

Wǒ dǎo zài chuángshàng jiù shuìzháo le。

倒头就睡
dǎotóu jiù shuì

We don\'t need you here. You just go to bed.

xīngfèn dào bùnéng rùshuì de dìbù

Tā zài chuáng shàng fānláifùqù shuì bu zháo。

他翻了个身又睡着了。
Tā fān le gè shēn yòu shuìzháo le。
He turned over in bed and fell asleep again.
内心的纷扰使他无法入睡。
Nèixīn de fēnrǎo shǐ tā wúfǎ rùshuì。

伏案入睡
fú\'àn rùshuì

The alarm clock roused me from my deep sleep.

I didn\'t want to wake him from his sound sleep.
我昨晚没睡好，头脑昏昏沉沉的。

他极度兴奋，一夜没睡着。

He was so elated that he couldn\'t sleep all night.
他得好好睡一觉，才能解乏。

He needs a good long sleep to get over his fatigue.
这孩子受了惊吓，睡得不安稳。
Zhè háizi shòu le jīngxià，shuì de bùānwěn。
The child has had a shock and isn\'t sleeping well.

He was awakened by a terrific bang.
他睡觉很惊醒，有点响动都知道。
Tā shuìjiào hěn jīngxing，yǒu diǎn xiǎngdòngdōu zhīdào。
He\'s a very light sleeper; any little noise disturbs him.
他睡了一会儿，精气神儿又来了。
Tā shuì le yíhuìr，jīngqìshénr yòu lái le。
He was refreshed and energetic after a short nap.
你困了就睡吧。
Nǐ kùn le jiù shuì ba。
Go to bed if you feel sleepy.
昨晚没有睡好，现在感到十分困倦。
Zuó wǎn méiyǒu shuìhǎo，xiànzài gǎndào shífēn kùnjuàn。
I feel very sleepy because I didn\'t sleep well last night.
翻来覆去睡不着
fānláifùqù shuì bùzháo
toss and turn in bed

I\'m tired and I want to go to sleep.
临睡
lín shuì 
just before going to bed; at bedtime
他一连两夜没有睡，满眼都是血丝。

蒙头睡大觉
méngtóu shuì dàjiào

shuìyǎn ménglóng

ménglóngshuìqù

睡迷糊了
shuì míhu le

Wǒ gānghéshàngyǎn jiù mímihūhū de shuìzháo le。
I dozed off as soon as I closed my eyes.
睡眼迷离
shuìyǎn mílí 
eyes dim with sleep
睡得迷迷怔怔的
shuì de mímizhēngzhēng de。
be dazed with sleep
乜斜的睡眼
miēxié de shuìyǎn

早睡早起
zǎoshuì zǎoqǐ
early to bed and early to rise
起了床还想睡。
Qǐ le chuánghái xiǎngshuì。
After I got up I still felt like going back to sleep.
她睡觉轻。
Tā shuìjiào qīng。
She is a light sleeper.
病人睡着了，轻点儿！
Bìngrén shuìzháo le，qīng diǎnr！
Be quiet! The patient is asleep.

Xiǎomāo zài shāfā shàng quánzuò yìtuán shuìjiào。
The kitten was sleeping curled up on the sofa.
他喜欢蜷伏着睡觉。
Tā xǐhuan quánfú zhe shuìjiào。
He likes to sleep with his knees drawn up. or He likes to sleep curled up on his side.
别嚷了，人家都睡了。
Bié rǎng le，rénjia dōu shuì le。

扰乱睡眠
rǎoluàn shuìmián
disturb sb.\'s sleep
他晚上工作时间长了就不容易入睡。
Tā wǎnshàng gōngzuò shí jiān cháng le jiù bùróngyì rùshuì。
He can\'t get to sleep easily if he works long hours at night.
吃了这种镇静剂很快就能入睡了。
Chī le zhèzhǒng zhènjìngjì hěn kuài jiùnéng rùshuì le。
You\'ll fall asleep soon after you take this sedative.
他忙得甚至好几夜没睡觉。
Tā máng de shènzhì hǎo jǐ yè méi shuìjiào。
He was so busy that he didn\'t even go to bed for several nights.
他仿佛睡着了似的。
Tā fǎngfú shuìzháo le shì de。
He seems to be asleep.
睡得很熟
shuì de hěn shú
sleep soundly
他睡了。
Tā shuì le。
He\'s gone to bed.
他睡着了。
Tā shuìzháo le。
He\'s asleep.
他睡得早起得也早。
Tā shuì de zǎo qǐ de yě zǎo。
He goes to bed early and gets up early.
该睡觉了。
Gāi shuìjiào le。
It\'s time to go to bed.
睡午觉
shuì wǔjiào
take a nap after lunch
睡懒觉
shuì lǎnjiào
get up late; sleep in; sleep late
一阵敲门声把他从睡梦中惊醒了。
Yízhèn qiāoménshēng bǎ tā cóng shuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng le。
He was roused from sleep by a heavy pounding on the door.
睡眠不足
shuìmián bù zú
not have enough sleep
进入睡乡
jìnrù shuìxiāng
fall asleep
有几分睡意
yǒu jǐ fēn shuìyì
feel somewhat sleepy; be drowsy
我一夜没睡着，反复思索这个问题。
Wǒ yí yè méi shuìzháo，fǎnfù sīsuǒ zhège wèntí。
I lay awake all night, turning the problem over and over in my mind.
素常他到十二点钟才睡觉。
Sùcháng tā dào shí\'èr diǎn zhōng cái shuìjiào
Ordinarily he doesn\'t go to bed until twelve o\'clock.
好好睡他一觉
hǎohāo shuì tā yí jiào
have a good sleep
睡得很塌实
shuì de hěn tāshi
enjoy a deep, quiet sleep; have a good, sound sleep
不要躺在过去的成绩上睡大觉。
Búyào tǎngzài guòqù de chéngjì shàng shuìdàjiào。
Don\'t rest content with past achievements. or Don\'t rest on your laurels.
睡得真甜
shuì de zhēn tián 
have a sound (or sweet) sleep; sleep soundly
睡了个甜美的午觉
shuì le gè tiánměi de wǔjiào 
have a refreshing nap after lunch
夏天我常在外头睡。
Xiàtiān wǒ chánɡ zài wàitou shuì。 
In summer I often sleep outdoors.
睡得晚
shuì de wǎn 
go to bed late
起五更，睡半夜
qǐ wǔ gēng，shuì bàn yè 
retire at midnight and rise before dawn
昨晚没睡好，吃饭不香。
Zuówǎn méi shuìhǎo，chīfàn bùxiāng。
I have no appetite because I didn\'t sleep well last night.
她睡得正香呢。
Tā shuì de zhèngxiāngne。
She\'s sound asleep.
小伙子们劳动了一天，晚上睡得格外香甜。
Xiǎohuǒzimen láodòng le yì tiān，wǎnshàngshuì de géwài xiāngtián。
The boys slept soundly after a day\'s work.
这孩子睡相不好。
Zhè háizi shuì xiàng bùhǎo。
The child sleeps sprawled all over the bed.
汽笛的啸鸣把人们从睡梦中惊醒。
Qìdí de xiàomíngbǎ rénmen cóngshuìmèng zhōng jīngxǐng。
The wails of the siren woke the people out of their dreams.
由于睡眠不足，他两眼布满血丝。
Yóuyú shuìmián bùzú，tā liǎngyǎn bùmǎn xiěsī。
His eyes are bloodshot because of lack of sleep.
她心潮翻滚，无法入睡。
Tā xīncháo fāngǔn，wúfǎ rùshuì。
Her mind being in a tumult, she could not go to sleep.
他兴奋过度，睡不着觉。
Tā xīngfèn guòdù，shuì bu zháo jiào。
He was too excited to fall asleep.
睡眼惺忪
shuìyǎn xīngsōng
eyes still heavy with sleep; sleepy eyes
嘘！ 轻一点儿，孩子们刚睡下。
Xū！qīngyìdiǎnr，háizimen gāngshuìxià。
Hush! The kids have just gone to bed.
恹恹欲睡
yānyānyùshuì
feel weak and sleepy
仰着睡
yǎng zhe shuì
sleep on one\'s back
她把孩子放在摇篮里，把他摇睡着了。
Tā bǎ háizi fàngzài yáolán lǐ，bǎ tā yáo shuìzháo le。
She rocked the baby to sleep in the cradle.
早点儿睡吧，明天还要起早呢。
Zǎo diǎnr shuì ba，míngtiān háiyào qǐzǎo ne。
Let\'s go to bed now. We\'ll have to get up early tomorrow morning.
她一忙起来，吃饭睡觉都没有一定的时间了。
Tā yì mángqǐlái，chīfàn shuìjiào dōu méiyǒu yídìng de shíjiān le。
When she gets really busy, she doesn\'t keep regular hours for eating or sleeping.
一宿没睡好
yìxiǔ méi shuìhǎo 
not sleep well the whole night; not sleep a wink the whole night
他在干什么？—他还在睡觉呢。
Tā zài gàn shénme? —Tā hái zài shuìjiào ne。
What\'s he doing? —He\'s still sleeping.
他整夜翻来复去睡不着。
Tā zhěngyè fānláifùqù shuì bu zháo。
He tossed about all night, unable to get to sleep.
他折腾了好几个钟头才睡着。
Tā zhēténg le hǎo jǐgè zhōng tóu cái shuìzháo。
He tossed about in bed for hours before he got to sleep.
枕着胳臂睡觉
zhěn zhe gēbei shuìjiào 
sleep with one\'s head resting on one\'s arm
这药在睡觉之前吃。
Zhè yào zài shuìjiào zhīqián chī。
Take the medicine before bedtime.
装作睡着了
zhuāngzuò shuìzháo le 
pretend to be asleep
单调的音符使这首乐曲催人入睡。
Dāndiào de yīnfú shǐ zhè shǒu yuèqǔ cuī rén rù shuì。
你不能因为睡眠不好就滥用安眠药。
Nǐ bùnéng yīnwèi shuìmián bùhǎo jiù lànyòng ānmiányào。
Because you have difficulty sleeping it doesn\'t mean you can overdose on sleeping pills.
外面噪音这么大，根本没法安睡。
Wàimiàn zàoyīn zhème dà，gēnběn méifǎ ānshuì。
With so much noise outside, I just can\'t sleep.
好久没有这样安恬熟睡了。
Hǎojiǔ méiyǒu zhèyàng āntián shúshuì le。
It has been a long time since I had a nice sleep like that.
我实在熬不住了，先去睡了。
Wǒ shízai áo búzhù le，xiān qù shuì le。
I couldn\'t stay up any longer, so I went to bed.
奶奶觉得板床比“席梦思”睡着舒服。
Nǎinai juédé bǎnchuáng bǐ“xímèngsī”shuì zhe shūfu。
Grandmother feels sleeping on plank bed is more comfortable than on the spring mattress.
每天晚上，他都睡在这样的板房里。
Měitiān wǎnshàng，tā dōu shuì zài zhèyàng de bǎnfáng lǐ。
Every night, he sleeps in the plank house.
谁说睡板铺不能做好梦呀？
Shéi shuō shuì bǎnpù bùnéng zuò hǎomèng ya？
Who said that one can\'t have good dreams when sleeping in a bunk bed?
半睡半醒之间，他忽然听见有人叫他的名字。
Bànshuìbànxǐng zhījiān，tā hūrán tīngjiàn yǒurén jiào tā de míngzi。
Halfway between sleeping and awake, he suddenly heard someone call his name.
他很快睡着了，发出了重重的鼻息。
Tā hěnkuài shuìzháo le，fāchū le zhòngzhòng de bíxī。
He was fast asleep, and snored like thunder.
惨厉的叫声惊醒了沉睡中的人们。
Cǎnlì de jiàoshēng jīngxǐng le chénshuì zhōng de rénmen。
The miserable shouting woke people from their sleep.
夜入丑时，大多数的人们都已经入睡了。
Yè rù chǒushí，dàduōshù de rénmen dōu yǐjing rùshuì le。
It came to the Chou Period (1am-3am), and most people had already fallen asleep.
别出声，他正在睡觉呢。
Bié chūshēng，tā zhèngzài shuìjiào ne。
Don\'t talk, he is sleeping.
爸爸一天不串门儿就睡不着觉。
Bàba yìtiān bú chuànménr jiù shuìbùzháojiào。
Dad cannot go to sleep unless he has called at someone\'s home.
妈妈将窗幔放下，准备哄孩子睡觉。
Māma jiāng chuāngmàn fàngxià，zhǔnbèi hǒng háizi shuìjiào。
The mother closed the curtains so as to get ready to coax the child to sleep.
床板不平，睡觉时总搁着我。
Chuángbǎn bùpíng，shuìjiào shí zǒng gē zhe wǒ。
The uneven bed planks always hurt me when I sleep.
我很累了，吹灯睡觉吧。
Wǒ hěnlèi le，chuīdēng shuìjiào ba。
I am so tired. Let\'s blow out the lamp and go to sleep.
听着催眠曲，宝宝很快就入睡了。
Tīng zhe cuīmiánqǔ，bǎobao hěnkuài jiù rùshuì le。
The baby fell asleep quickly while listening to the lullaby.
蝙蝠睡觉的时候，身体倒挂在房檐下。
Biānfú shuìjiào de shíhou，shēntǐ dàoguà zài fángyán xià。
Bats hang by their feet below when sleeping.
不能就这样睡在地上，地气凉！
Bùnéng jiù zhèyàng shuìzài dìshàng，dìqì liáng！
You can\'t sleep on the floor like this. It\'s too cold there!
快睡觉的时候，他帮奶奶打开了电热毯。
Kuài shuìjiào de shíhou，tā bāng nǎinai dǎkāi le diànrètǎn。
He helped his grandmother turn on the electric blanket when they were about to sleep.
她睡觉的时候忘记摘下发套了。
Tā shuìjiào de shíhou wàngjì zhāixià fàtào le。
She forgot to took her hair cap off when she went to sleep.
他中了大奖以后，兴奋得辗转反侧难以入睡。
Tā zhòng le dàjiǎng yǐhòu，xīngfèn de zhǎnzhuǎnfǎncè nányǐ rùshuì。
He tossed and turned in bed after winning a big prize, too excited to fall asleep.
怎么能让客人睡钢丝床呢？
Zěnme néng ràng kèrén shuì gāngsīchuáng ne？
How could you let your guests sleep on a spring bed?
他太累了，一合眼就睡着了。
Tā tài lèi le，yìhéyǎn jiù shuìzháo le。
He was too tired and fell asleep the moment he closed his eyes.
你们躺好了再睡，别横躺竖卧的。
Nǐmen tǎnghǎo le zài shuì，bié héngtǎng shùwò de。
Lie in order before you fall asleep, don\'t lie in disarray.
十分疲惫的他，后仰在椅子上就睡着了。
Shífēn píbèi de tā，hòuyǎng zài yǐzi shàng jiù shuìzháo le。
He was so tired that he fell asleep, as soon as he leaned back in the chair.
晚上，街上卡车的呼隆声吵得我们没法睡觉。
Wǎnshàng，jiēshàng kǎchē de hūlóngshēng chǎo de wǒmen méifǎ shuìjiào。
At night, the rumble of the trucks on the street made us unable to fall asleep.
为了养家糊口，他几夜几夜不睡觉地工作。
Wèile yǎngjiā húkǒu，tā jǐyè jǐyè bùshuìjiào de gōngzuò。
In order to support the family\'s living, he worked without sleeping for nights.
今天有点热，我睡觉时就盖了层夹被。
Jīntiān yǒu diǎn rè，wǒ shuìjiào shí jiù gài le céng jiábèi。
It\'s a bit hot today, so I cover myself with only a double coverlet when I sleep.
他昨天晚上在驾驶室里睡了一晚。
Tā zuótiān wǎnshàng zài jiàshǐshì lǐ shuì le yì wǎn。
Last night he slept in the driver\'s cab.
听着钟鼓喈喈的声音我难以入睡。
Tīng zhe zhōng gǔ jiējiē de shēngyīn wǒ nányǐ rùshuì。
I can\'t fall asleep while the drum is beating.
他尽自睡着，也不管外面吵闹的声音。
Tā jìnzì shuì zhe，yě bùguǎn wàimiàn chǎonào de shēngyīn。
He sleeps regardless of the noise outside.
仓库里存着贵重货物，咱们晚上睡觉要警醒些。
Cāngkù lǐ cúnzhe guìzhòng huòwù，zánmen wǎnshàng shuìjiào yào jǐngxǐng xiē。
We must be alert when we sleep and watch over the valuable goods in the garage.
工作一天，她实在太累了，就在靠背椅上睡着了。
Gōngzuò yì tiān，tā shízai tài lèi le，jiù zài kàobèiyǐ shàng shuìzháo le。
After working for a whole day, she was so exhausted that she fell asleep while leaning against the back of a chair.
一看到糖果，小孩儿马上就来神了，刚才的瞌睡劲一下全没了。
Yí kàndào tángguǒ，xiǎoháir mǎshàng jiù láishén le，gāngcái de kēshuìjìn yíxià quánméi le。
The minute the child sees candies, he becomes excited and no longer feels drowsy.
我夏天有睡凉枕的习惯。
Wǒ xiàtiān yǒu shuì liángzhěn de xíguàn。
I have the habit of sleeping on a cooling pillow in summer.
好不容易等到河水落槽，抗洪战士们才能睡上个安稳觉了。
Hǎo bùróngyì děngdào héshuǐ luòcáo，kànghóng zhànshìmen cáinéng shuì shàng gè ānwěnjiào le。
Flood-fighters did not have a sound sleep until the river receded.
一个晚上他漫语不断，不知道是不是睡糊涂了。
Yígè wǎnshàng tā mànyǔ búduàn，bùzhīdào shìbushì shuì hútú le。
He had been saying irrelevant remarks all evening. I’ve no idea whether he fell asleep.
太累了，我现在只想美美地睡上一觉。
Tài lèi le，wǒ xiànzài zhǐxiǎng měiměi de shuì shàng yíjiào。
I am so exhausted that I just want to have a sound sleep.
不知过了多久，我曚扙地睡着了。
Bùzhī guò le duōjiǔ，wǒ méngzhàng de shuìzháo le。
I felt asleep drowsily before I knew it.
小时候在奶奶家的暖炕上睡觉，那感觉就是暖和！
Xiǎoshíhou zài nǎinai jiā de nuǎnkàng shàng shuìjiào，nà gǎnjué jiùshì nuǎnhé！
When I slept on the heated kang in my grandmother\'s family in my childhood, I felt warm at heart.
小猫蟠据在它主人的床上，睡得可香了。
Xiǎomāo pánjù zài tā zhǔrén de chuáng shàng，shuì de kěxiāng le。
The cat is occupying its master\'s bed, sleeping soundly.
天刚刚起更，他就想睡觉了。
Tiān gānggāng qǐgēng，tā jiù xiǎng shuìjiào le。
He wanted to go to bed as soon at the sound of the first night watch.
睡觉前他换上了寝衣。
Shuìjiào qián tā huànshàng le qǐnyī。
He puts on his nightclothes when sleeping.
你今天就睡在我家的沙发床上吧。
Nǐ jīntiān jiù shuì zài wǒjiā de shāfāchuáng shàng ba。
Please sleep on our sofa tonight.
他这几天太累了，总是来不及洗漱倒头就睡。
Tā zhè jǐtiān tài lèi le，zǒngshì láibùjí xǐshù dǎotóu jiù shuì。
He has been too tired in recent days, he couldn\'t wait to brush his teeth and wash his face before going to sleep.
我从不睡懒觉，七点钟准时起床。
Wǒ cóng bú shuìlǎnjiào，qī diǎn zhōng zhǔnshí qǐchuáng。
I never sleep in, and get up at 7o\'clock every morning.
睡眠疗法对于他的病很有效，医生决定继续用这种方法对他进行治疗。
Shuìmián liáofǎ duìyú tā de bìng hěnyǒuxiào，yīshēng juédìng jìxù yòng zhèzhǒng fāngfǎ duì tā jìnxíng zhìliáo。
Sleep treatment is very effective for his disease, so the doctor decided to go on using it to treat him.
我们宿舍一共有四张睡铺，铺下是各自的写字台。
Wǒmen sùshè yígòng yǒu sì zhāng shuìpù，pù xià shì gèzì de xiězìtái。
We have four beds in our dormitory, and under each bed is a desk.
由于没买着睡铺票，我只能坐十几个小时回家。
Yóuyú méi mǎizháo shuìpùpiào，wǒ zhǐnéng zuò shí jǐgè xiǎoshí huíjiā。
Since I didn\'t buy a berth ticket, I had to go home while sitting for a dozen hours.
我去他家串门时她已经穿上睡裙了，所以我就没进去。
Wǒ qù tā jiā chuànmén shí tā yǐjing chuānshàng shuìqún le，suǒyǐ wǒ jiù méi jìnqù。
She was already in her pajamas when I went to her house, so I didn\'t enter.
他睡容还未消，大概是才起床没多久吧。
Tā shuìróng hái wèi xiāo，dàgài shì cái qǐchuáng méi duōjiǔ ba。
He still looks sleepy, he must have got up just a moment before.
妈妈说宝宝的睡态很好玩儿，像个熊猫。
Māma shuō bǎobao de shuìtài hěnhǎowánr，xiàng gè xióngmāo。
Mom said that the baby\'s sleeping posture was very funny, like a panda.
由于连续几天熬夜加班，他已经睡眼惺忪了。
Yóuyú liánxù jǐtiān áoyè jiābān，tā yǐjing shuìyǎn xīngsōng le。
He has stayed up late at night to do extra work for several days, so he is very sleepy now.
我每天都是头一挨枕，马上就能睡着。
Wǒ měitiān dōushì tóu yì āi zhěn，mǎshàng jiùnéng shuìzháo。
I can go to sleep the moment my head touches the pillow every day.
猫的睡姿十分可爱。
Māo de shuìzī shífēn kě\'ài。
Cats\' sleeping postures are very cute.
孩子躺在童车里，已经睡着了。
Háizi tǎngzài tóngchē lǐ，yǐjing shuìzháo le。
Lying in the baby carrier, the child has fallen to sleep.
由于沉迷于网络游戏，他养成了晚睡晚起的顽习。
Yóuyú chénmí yú wǎngluò yóuxì，tā yǎngchéng le wǎnshuì wǎnqǐ de wánxí。
Indulging in on-line games, he got into the inveterate habit of sleeping late at night and getting up late in the morning.
窗户透出的一丝微光说明他还没有睡觉。
Chuānghu tòuchū de yìsī wēiguāng shuōmíng tā hái méiyǒu shuìjiào。
The glimmer of light from his window showed that he hadn\'t gone to bed.
睡前温书已成为他多年来的一个习惯。
Shuìqián wēnshū yǐ chéngwéi tā duōniánlái de yígè xíguàn。
He usually takes a long time to revise his lessons before he goes to sleep.
这几天我一直睡在这个临时窝铺里。
Zhè jǐtiān wǒ yìzhí shuì zài zhège línshí wōpù lǐ。
I slept in this temporal shed for days.
由于有心事，小王辗转反侧，直到五更天才睡着。
Yóuyú yǒu xīnshì，Xiǎo Wáng niǎnzhuǎn fǎncè，zhídào wǔgēngtiān cái shuìzháo。
Having something on his mind Xiao Wang tossed and turned in his bed, and couldn\'t get to sleep until five o\'clock in the morning.
他今天上课居然没有睡觉，真是稀奇。
Tā jīntiān shàngkè jūrán méiyǒu shuìjiào，zhēnshì xīqí。
He didn\'t sleep in class today, which is rare.
学校规定晚上11点半学生必须熄灯睡觉。
Xuéxiào guīdìng wǎnshàng shíyīdiǎnbàn xuésheng bìxū xīdēng shuìjiào。
The school regulates that students must go to sleep before 11 o\'clock at night.
我们要从小养成睡前洗漱的好习惯。
Wǒmen yào cóng xiǎo yǎngchéng shuì qián xǐshù de hǎo xíguàn。
We must form the good habit of washing our face, and brushing our teeth before going to bed.
每个星期天他都要睡到向午才起床。
Měigè xīngqītiān tā dōuyào shuìdào xiàng wǔ cái qǐchuáng。
He doesn\'t get up until noon every Sunday.
夏日中午小睡片刻可以使人下午更有精神。
Xiàrì zhōng wǔ xiǎoshuì piànkè kěyǐ shǐ rén xiàwǔ gèng yǒu jīngshén。
Taking a nap at noon in summer can make one more refreshed in the afternoon.
睡衣上的蝴蝶是绣制的，又漂亮又精致。
Shuìyī shàng de húdié shì xiùzhì de，yòu piàoliàng yòu jīngzhì。
The butterfly pattern on the sleeping dress is embroidered, which looks beautiful and exquisite.
老虎驯顺的在笼子里睡觉呢，一点都不吓人。
Lǎohǔ xùnshùn de zài lóngzi lǐ shuìjiào ne，yìdiǎn dōu bú xiàrén。
The tiger doesn\'t look frightening at all when it is sleeping tamely in the cage.
她对我嫣然一笑，我神魂颠倒，晚上都睡不着觉。
Tā duì wǒ yānrán yíxiào，wǒ shénhún diāndǎo，wǎnshàng dōu shuìbùzháo jiào。
I was possessed by her smile and could not get to sleep at night.
晚上喝酽茶，我怕你睡不着。
Wǎnshàng hē yànchá，wǒ pà nǐ shuìbùzháo。
I am afraid that you won\'t be able to fall asleep because you drunk strong tea in the evening.
妈妈哼着摇篮曲，宝宝很快就睡着了。
Māma hēng zhe yáolánqǔ，bǎobao hěnkuài jiù shuìzháo le。
With mom singing lullabies, the baby fell asleep quickly.
最近工作忙，好几次衣不解带就上床睡觉了。
Zuìjìn gōngzuò máng，hǎo jǐ cì yībùjiědài jiù shàngchuáng shuìjiào le。
I\'ve been busy recently. I slept with my clothes on several times.
小明家里来了客人，今晚他只能睡折叠床了。
Xiǎo Míng jiā lǐ lái le kèrén，jīnwǎn tā zhǐnéng shuì zhédiéchuáng le。
There were guests at Xiaoming\'s house, so tonight he has to sleep in the folding bed.
无家可归的他只好睡在猪栏里。
Wújiā kěguī de tā zhǐhǎo shuìzài zhūlán lǐ。
Being homeless, he has no choice but to sleep in a pigsty.
由于家境贫穷，她每晚只能睡在简朴的竹榻上。
Yóuyú jiājìng pínqióng，tā měiwǎn zhǐnéng shuìzài jiǎnpǔ de zhútà shàng。
Due to poverty, she has to sleep on a simple bamboo couch every night.
他房间桌灯还亮着，他应该还没有入睡。
Tā fángjiān zhuōdēng hái liàng zhe，tā yīnggāi hái méiyǒu rùshuì。
The desk lamp in his room is still on, so he shouldn\'t have gone to bed yet.
今夜，他兴奋得辗转反侧不能入睡。
Jīnyè，tā xīngfèn dé niǎnzhuǎn fǎncè bùnéng rùshuì。
Tonight, he was too excited to go to sleep, and tossed about in his bed.
这儿太嘈杂，我睡不安顿。
Zhèr tàicáozá，wǒ shuì bù āndùn。
It\'s too noisy here – I can\'t sleep properly.
婴儿在小床上睡得很安静。
Yīng\'ér zài xiǎochuángshàng shuìde hěn ānjìng。
The baby was sleeping peacefully in its cot.
知道门已关好，她安然入睡了。
Zhīdào mén yǐguānhǎo，tā ānránrùshuì le。
Once she knew that the door had been locked, she fell a sleep peacefully.
昨晚我睡得很沉。
Zuówǎn wǒ shuìde hěnchén。
Last night I slept very deeply.
孩子们沉沉地睡了。
Háizǐmen chénchénde shuìle。
Children sleep deeply.
他一向睡得沉稳。
Tā yíxiàng shuìde chénwěn。
He always sleeps peacefully.
他的生活很简单，除了工作就是睡觉。
Tāde shēnghuó hěnjiǎndān，chúle gōngzuò jiùshì shuìjiào。
His life is pretty simple – the only thing he does apart from work is sleep.
我倒在床上就睡。
Wǒ dǎozàichuángshàng jiù shuì。
I collapsed into bed and fell asleep immediately.
一夜没睡，他的眼睛有些浮肿。
Yíyèméishuì，tāde yǎnjing yǒuxiē fúzhǒng。
After a sleepless night, his eyes are a bit puffy.
他睡懒觉误了火车，活该！
Tā shuìlǎnjiào wùlehuǒchē，huógāi！
He overslept and missed the train – serves him right!
妈妈哄小孩睡觉。
Māmā hǒngxiǎohái shuìjiào。
The mother calmed the child so that he could sleep.
睡觉去吧，别胡闹了。
Shuìjiàoqù bā，bié húnàole。
Go to bed, and no playing up.
缺乏睡眠对身体有坏处。
Quēfá shuìmián duì shēntǐ yǒu huàichù.
It\'s bad for you not to get enough sleep.
噪音搅得我无法入睡。
Zàoyīn jiǎo de wǒ wúfǎ rùshuì.
The noise disturbed me so much I couldn\'t sleep.
希望你睡个好觉。
Xīwàng nǐ shuìgèhǎojiào.
I hope you\'ll have a good sleep.
他连续干了3天，觉都没睡。
Tā liánxù gànle sāntiān，jiào dōu méi shuì.
He worked for three days in a row without sleeping.
你三更半夜不睡觉，跑出去干吗？

I slept with all my money under my pillow for fear of thieves.

It\'s late, and we should go to bed.

他睡觉时常说呓语。
Tā shuìjiào shí cháng shuō yìyǔ。
He often talks in his sleep.

我可以整晚都不睡，但绝不能起早。

因为考试，我这几天睡得很少。

我妻子睡觉总是很沉。

这本小说无聊得让我昏昏欲睡。

我闷透了，竟然睡着了。

他们允许自己的孩子们晚睡。

&lt;q&gt;我要睡觉了，&lt;/q&gt; 她说道。

睡着了

入睡

他整晚忧心忡忡地睡不着觉

重又睡着

他们睡了两个小时。

我一定至少睡了12个小时。

安然入睡
ānrán rùshuì 
go to sleep peacefully
沉沉入睡
chénchén rùshuì 
sink into a deep sleep
兴奋到不能入睡的地步
xīngfèn dào bùnéng rùshuì de dìbù
be so excited that one can\'t get to sleep

Nèixīn de fēnrǎo shǐ tā wúfǎ rùshuì。

伏案入睡
fú\'àn rùshuì

jìnrù shuìxiāng
fall asleep

Tīng zhe zhōng gǔ jiējiē de shēngyīn wǒ nányǐ rùshuì。
I can\'t fall asleep while the drum is beating.
他房间桌灯还亮着，他应该还没有入睡。
Tā fángjiān zhuōdēng hái liàng zhe，tā yīnggāi hái méiyǒu rùshuì。
The desk lamp in his room is still on, so he shouldn\'t have gone to bed yet.
今夜，他兴奋得辗转反侧不能入睡。
Jīnyè，tā xīngfèn dé niǎnzhuǎn fǎncè bùnéng rùshuì。
Tonight, he was too excited to go to sleep, and tossed about in his bed.
知道门已关好，她安然入睡了。
Zhīdào mén yǐguānhǎo，tā ānránrùshuì le。
Once she knew that the door had been locked, she fell a sleep peacefully.
噪音搅得我无法入睡。
Zàoyīn jiǎo de wǒ wúfǎ rùshuì.
The noise disturbed me so much I couldn\'t sleep.
他思潮起伏，久久不能入睡。
Tā sīcháoqǐfú，jiǔjiǔ bùnéng rùshuì。
His head was full of restless thoughts, and for a long time he could not sleep.
入睡。
安恬入睡
入睡后，他常发出呓语。
Accept your wakefulness and sleep in its own contrary way is more likely to come.
Jiēshòu shīmián。bìngqiě yǐ xiāngfǎn de fāngfǎ rùshuì gèng yǒu kěnéng bāngzhù rùshuì。
接受失眠，并且以相反的方法入睡更有可能帮助入睡。
to hum a child to sleep
哼歌使孩子入睡
to rock a baby to sleep
摇婴儿入睡
to sing a baby to sleep
唱得使小儿入睡
to slip off to sleep
慢慢入睡
She is rocking her baby to sleep in the garden.
她正在花园里摇着婴儿入睡。
to fall asleep
入睡
she can\'t sleep
她不能入睡
to send sb to sleep
使某人入睡
I used to recite a song instead of counting sheep when I couldn\'t fall sleep.
Shuì bù zháo jiào shí，wǒ céng yǐ bèisòng gēqǔ dàitì shǔshù yǐqiú rùshuì。
睡不着觉时，我曾以背诵歌曲代替数数以求入睡。
There are several things you can try to help you get off to sleep.
Yǒu yìxiē dōngxi nǐ kěyǐ chángshìzhe yònglái bāngzhù nǐ rùshuì。
有一些东西你可以尝试着用来帮助你入睡。
Many people have problems getting to sleep at night.
Hěnduō rén wǎnshang nányǐrùshuì。
很多人晚上难以入睡。
Mother put the child to to sleep.
Mǔqīn hǒng háizǐ rùshuì le。
母亲哄孩子入睡了。
My mother was trying to put my baby sister to sleep.
Wǒ māma zài shèfǎ ràng wǒ de xiǎomèimèi rùshuì。
我妈妈在设法让我的小妹妹入睡。
He needed silence in order to sleep.
Tā xūyào ānjìng cáinéng rùshuì。
他需要安静才能入睡。
He was so pumped he couldn\'t sleep.
Tā rúcǐ láolèi，yǐzhìyú wúfǎ rùshuì。
他如此劳累，以至于无法入睡。
I cuddled the baby.
Wǒ bàozhe háizi hǒngtā rùshuì。
我抱着孩子哄他入睡。
to be in/go into a trance
在/陷入迷睡状态
In two minutes his eyelids closed, his chin fell on his breast, he gave a deep sigh, and instantly was in a profound sleep, breathing loudly.
Liǎng fēnzhōng hòu tā de yǎnpí héshàngle，xiàba chuídào xiōngkǒu，tā shēnshēn de tànle kǒu qì，suíhòu lìjí xiànrùle hānshuì，xiǎngliàng de dǎzhe hūlū。
两分钟后他的眼皮合上了，下巴垂到胸口，他深深地叹了口气，随后立即陷入了酣睡，响亮地打着呼噜。
Finally he fell into a deep，deep sleep.
Zuìzhōng，tā xiànrù le shúshuì。
最终，他陷入了熟睡。
